http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 有效降低森吉米尔轧机轧辊成本的方法
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 青岛浦项不锈钢有限公司，山东青岛266510
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 森吉米尔二十辊轧机是国内不锈钢冷轧生产的主流设备，具有刚性好、辊系稳定、操作简单、易维护的优点。但森吉米尔轧机辊系复杂，轧辊有效直径范围较小，实际使用时，轧辊储备量大，管理和使用成本较高。青岛浦项不锈钢有限公司采用常规降低轧辊使用成本的方法，效果不明显。为此，提出了报废辊再利用1 mm,新辊直径增加 1 mm及采用差异化辊径轧制的新方法。介绍了新方法的实施方案，实践表明，采用新方法已正常轧制近50万t，设备及产品质量正常，每支轧辊的有效使用量增加了2 mm,年轧辊使用成本降低了40%。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Method of effectively reducing roll cost of Sendzimir mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The Sendzimir 20high rolling mill is the main equipment for cold rolled stainless steel strip in China.It has the advantages of good rigidity,stable roll system,simple operationand and easy maintenance.However,the roll system of the Sendzimir mill is complicated,and the effective diameter range of the roll is small.In actual use,the roll reserve amount is large,and the management and use costs are high.The conventional method of reducing the cost of rolls was adopted in Qingdao Pohang Stainless Steel Co.,Ltd.,and the effect is not obvious.To this end,new methods for reusing 1 mm of wasted rolls,increasing the diameter by 1 mm of new rolls,and rolling with differentiated roll diameters were proposed.The implementation scheme of the new methods was introduced.Practice shows that the new methods have been used for normal rolling nearly 500 000 tons,the equipment and product quality are normal,the effective use amount of each roll has increased by 2 mm,and the annual roll use cost has been reduced by 40%.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
侯波,王铁仁,李宁. 有效降低森吉米尔轧机轧辊成本的方法[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 98-100.
HOU Bo,WANG Tieren,LI Ning. Method of effectively reducing roll cost of Sendzimir mill. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 98-100.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 冷轧平整机吹扫系统的优化
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WU Tengfei，DUAN Xiaoxi，FU Wanshun，SI Guofei，YANG Xiucong，HOU Dawei#br#
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 吴腾飞，段晓溪，付万顺，司国飞，杨秀从，侯大伟
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对某冷轧平整机带钢表面平整液残留问题，分析了平整液残留的原因，根据吹扫系统吹扫位置分布以及压缩空气管路控制，采用了调整喷嘴角度、增加喷嘴数量、清理疏通气帘和导流槽以及定期检查压缩空气过虑装置等措施，基本杜绝了宽度1 800 mm以下规格带钢平整液残留缺陷，带钢表面质量得到明显提高。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Optimization of air purge system of cold rolling temper mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the problem of the temper solution residue on the surface of strip of a cold rolling temper mill,the causes were analyzed.According to the purge position distribution of the purge system and the control of the compressed air pipeline,some improvement measures were applied,such as adjusting the nozzle angle,adding nozzles,clearing the curtain and diversion channels, periodic inspecting compressed air filter,etc.,the temper solution residue defect of the strip which width gauge less than 1 800 mm was eliminated,and the strip surface quality had been significantly improved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
吴腾飞，段晓溪，付万顺，司国飞，杨秀从，侯大伟. 冷轧平整机吹扫系统的优化[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 95-97.
WU Tengfei，DUAN Xiaoxi，FU Wanshun，SI Guofei，YANG Xiucong，HOU Dawei. Optimization of air purge system of cold rolling temper mill. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 95-97.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 右旋锚杆钢筋二线切分轧制工艺的开发与实践
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 水城钢铁集团公司，贵州六盘水553028
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为提高右旋锚杆钢筋生产产能、降低能耗，水钢开发了 φ20 mm右旋锚杆钢筋二线切分轧制工艺。介绍了水钢右旋锚杆钢筋的开发情况，主要介绍了孔型系统设计，成品轧辊材质选择及加工要求，以及机组活套布置。生产实践表明，产品尺寸精度好，轧机小时产量达到170 t/h以上，日产量可达到2 800 t左右，吨钢混合煤气消耗由157 m3/t降至142 m3/t，平均电耗由95.0 kW·h/t降至64.5 kW·h/t。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development and practice of two-strand splitting rolling technology for right screw anchor bar
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to increase the production capacity of right screw anchor bar and reduce energy consumption,the twostrand splitting rolling process for 20 mm right screw anchor bar was developed in Shuigang.The right screw anchor bar development situation in Shuigang was introduced.The pass system design,material selection and processing requirements of the roll in the finishing mill,and the looper layout were mainly decribed.Production practice shows that the size accuracy of the product is good,the hourly output of the rolling mill is more than 170 t/h,and the daily output can reach about 2 800 t,the consumption of mixed gas is decreased from 157 m3/t to 142 m3/t,and the average power consumption is decreased from 95.0 kW·h/t to 64.5 kW·h/t .
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
杨延，夏朝开，王国祚，吴俊. 右旋锚杆钢筋二线切分轧制工艺的开发与实践[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 92-94.
YANG Yan,XIA Chaokai,WANG Guozuo,WU Jun. Development and practice of two-strand splitting rolling technology for right screw anchor bar. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 92-94.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 终轧温度对20CrMnTi圆钢组织及硬度的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中天钢铁集团有限公司，江苏常州214400
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对齿轮用20CrMnTi圆钢硬度偏高会造成锯切效率低、磨损消耗严重或剪切开裂等问题，采用控制轧制工艺，研究了不同终轧温度下20CrMnTi圆钢金相组织和硬度。结果表明，随终轧温度降低，20CrMnTi圆钢组织中铁素体及珠光体增多，硬度逐渐降低。终轧温度降低40 ℃以上时，圆钢组织为铁素体与珠光体，硬度在200HBW以下，满足了用户的要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of finishing rolling temperature on microstructure and hardness of 20CrMnTi round bar
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the problems that the high hardness of 20CrMnTi round bar for gears would cause low sawing efficiency,severe wear or shear cracking,the controlled rolling processes was used,and the micrstructure and hardness of 20CrMnTi round bar at different finishing rolling temperatures were studied.The results show that the ferrite and pearlite microstructure of the 20CrMnTi round bar are increased,and the hardness is gradually decreases when the finishing rolling temperature is decreased.As the finishing rolling temperature is reduced by more than 40 ℃,the bar microstructure are ferrite and pearlite,and the hardness is less than 200HBW,which meets the user's requirements.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
徐乐钱，吴炜，来永彪，孙宏飞. 终轧温度对20CrMnTi圆钢组织及硬度的影响[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 89-91.
XU Leqian，WU Wei,LAI Yongbiao，SUN Hongfei. Effect of finishing rolling temperature on microstructure and hardness of 20CrMnTi round bar. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 89-91.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 基于SPSS的345 MPa级热轧H型钢性能数据分析与建模
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 山东钢铁股份有限公司莱芜分公司技术中心，山东莱芜271104
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 基于大数据分析的方法，以实测数据为基础，采用SPSS软件对345 MPa级H型钢生产过程中的冶炼和轧制工序因素进行偏相关分析和因子分析，确定了影响产品性能的主要和次要影响因素。利用多元线性回归方法，分析了各因素与屈服强度、抗拉强度、断后伸长率的关系，得出各因素对性能的影响，并分别建立了回归模型。通过生产实测数据对回归模型进行验证，模型计算结果与实测数据的相对误差在±10%内的比例达97.07 %以上。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Performance data analysis and modeling of 345 MPa hot rolled H-beam based on SPSS
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the measured data and using SPSS software,partial correlation analysis and factor analysis were carried out to determine the main and secondary factors affecting the performance of 345 MPa grade H-beam.Multivariate linear regression method was used to analyze the relationship between each factor and yield strength,tensile strength and elongation after fracture,and the influence of each factor on the performance was obtained.The regression models were established respectively.The regression equation is verified by the measured data of actual production.The results show that the relative error rate between the predicted results and the measured data is within ±10%,which proportion is above 97.07%.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
付常伟. 基于SPSS的345 MPa级热轧H型钢性能数据分析与建模[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 83-88.
FU Changwei. Performance data analysis and modeling of 345 MPa hot rolled H-beam based on SPSS. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 83-88.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 550 MPa级冷轧滑轨用钢的开发
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 广州JFE钢板有限公司品质管理部，广东广州511464
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对我国高强度重型滑轨用冷轧板卷需进口的现状，采用低碳Nb微合金化钢和碳素结构钢两种化学成分设计，在工业冷轧生产线试制了滑轨用550 MPa冷轧钢卷。对试制钢卷的力学性能、微观组织和使用情况等进行了对比分析，结果表明，碳素结构钢的化学成分设计优于低碳Nb微合金化钢，其抗拉强度达550 MPa、屈服强度达380 MPa、伸长率达27.3%，满足客户要求且成本低，完全可以替代进口产品。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Devlopment of 550 MPa grade cold rolled strip for slide rail
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the current situation of the need to import cold rolled coils for highstrength heavy-duty slide rails in China，550 MPa grade cold rolled strip for slide rail was developed by two chemical compositions design of low-carbon niobium micro-alloyed steel and carbon structural steel,and produced on an industrial cold rolling production line.The mechanical properties,microstructure and usage of the trial produced strips were compared and analyzed.The results show that the chemical composition design of the carbon structural steel is better than that of the low carbon niobium micro-alloyed steel,and the strip tensile strength reaches 550 MPa,yield strength reaches 380 MPa and elongation rate reaches 27.3%.It meets customer requirements and has low cost,which can completely replace imported products.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
熊涛涛，陈新城，陈江锋. 550 MPa级冷轧滑轨用钢的开发[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 79-82.
XIONG Taotao,CHEN Xincheng, CHEN Jiangfeng. Devlopment of 550 MPa grade cold rolled strip for slide rail. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 79-82.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 六辊冷轧机工作辊正负弯辊平滑过渡系统
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.中国重型机械研究院股份公司，陕西西安710032；2.常德中联重科液压有限公司，湖南常德415001
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了六辊冷轧机工作辊弯辊的工作原理，在正负弯辊切换过程中，弯辊缸蘑菇头与工作辊轴承座处于非接触状态，蘑菇头需要走一段空行程才能与工作辊轴承座接触上，在此过程中工作辊弯辊处于失控状态，不能实现正弯与负弯的平滑过渡，导致此过程中带材的板形不能得到有效地控制。为此，在原系统及结构的基础上，在镶块上增加了2个辅助弯辊油缸，在正负弯切换过程中，油缸蘑菇头始终与轴承座接触，其作用力作用在轴承座上，故弯辊力可以始终处于受控状态，从而使正弯、负弯切换过程中带材的板形得到有效控制。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Smooth transition system for positive and negative bending of work roll of six-high cold rolling mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The working principle of work roll bending of a six-high cold rolling mill was introduced.During the switching process of positive and negative bending,the mushroom head of the bending roll cylinder and the work roll bearing seat were in a non-contact state,the mushroom head need to travel for an empty stroke to contact the work roll bearing seat,and the bending roll was out of control during this process.The smooth transition between positive and negative bending can not be achieved,which resulting in that the strip shape can not be effectively controlled in this process.For this reason,on the basis of the original system and structure,two auxiliary bending roll cylinders were added.During the positive and negative bending switching process,the mushroom head of the oil cylinder were always contacted the bearing seat,and the force were acted on the bearing seat.Therefore,the bending roll force could always be controlled,so that the strip shape could be effectively controlled during the switching between positive and negative bending.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
魏志毅，魏维刚，尤磊，宋春阳. 六辊冷轧机工作辊正负弯辊平滑过渡系统[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 77-78.
WEI Zhiyi,WEI Weigang,YOU Lei，SONG Chunyang. Smooth transition system for positive and negative bending of work roll of six-high cold rolling mill. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 77-78.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 宽厚板轧机主传动系统低速扭振现象研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 河钢集团邯钢公司中板厂,河北邯郸056015
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 轧机传动系统的扭振会对控制系统的稳定性和机械传动部件造成破坏。引起轧机系统扭振的因素很多，轧机本身的机械系统、电机的电磁性能改变以及电机传动控制系统都有可能造成轧机系统的扭振。针对邯钢中板轧机下辊传动系统的扭振现象，对轧机主电机、主传动机械系统、主传动控制系统进行了排查，发现主传动主回路阻容吸收电容性能下降是造成系统不稳定诱发轧机主传动机电耦合扭振的主要原因。为此，对相应设备进行了跟换，同时考虑到电解电容随着使用过程电容值会逐渐降低，指出在今后的设备维护过程中，需要定期对功率单元中的电容进行检测。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research of torsional vibration phenomenon of main drive system at low speed of wide and heavy plate mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The stability of the control system and mechanical components would be damaged caused by torsional vibration of the rolling mill drive system.There were many factors that cause torsional vibration of the rolling mill system,such as the mechanical system of the rolling mill itself,the change in the electromagnetic properties of the motor and the motor drive control system.In view of the torsional vibration phenomenon of the down roll drive system of plate mill in the Hansteel Co.,the main motor,main drive mechanical system and control system of the rolling mill were investigated.The main reason for torsional vibration of rolling mill main drive was found that the performance of the main circuit absorption capacitance was decreased.Therefore,the capacitor was replaced,and taking into account that the capacitor's capacitance value decreasing with the using,it pointed out that the capacitor in the power unit needs to be periodically checked in the equipment maintenance process.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
邢俊. 宽厚板轧机主传动系统低速扭振现象研究[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 73-76.
XING Jun. Research of torsional vibration phenomenon of main drive system at low speed of wide and heavy plate mill. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 73-76.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热轧极薄规格产品轧制稳定性研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 攀钢集团西昌钢钒有限公司，四川西昌615000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 热轧极薄规格产品是热轧生产的重要产品之一，更是实现“以热代冷”，降低用户成本的关键。在极薄规格产品的轧制过程中，由于带钢厚度极薄、轧制力大、轧制速度快，导致带钢的平直度和凸度控制难度很大，轧制稳定性差，带钢在轧机内极易产生跑偏、轧烂等现象。计算机二级模型是轧制极薄规格产品的关键控制技术，通过优化自学习参数，合理配置活套角度及张力，以及优化弯辊力和延时轧机升速等措施，提高了极薄规格产品在精轧机组的轧制稳定性，确保了极薄规格产品的顺利轧制。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on rolling stability for hot rolled ultra-thin gauge products
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Ultra-thin gauge strip is one of the important products of hot rollig production,and it is the key to achieving “hot rolled products instead of the cold rolled one” and reducing user costs.In the rolling process,due to the ultra-thin thickness,large rolling force and fast rolling speed,the control of the strip flatness is difficult,the rolling stability is bad,and the strip is prone to running deviation and rolled bad and so on in the rolling mill.The computer secondary model is the key control technology for rolling ultra-thin gauge strip.By adopting optimizing self-learning parameters,rationally configuring the loop angle and tension and optimizing the bending force and the speed of the rolling mill,the stability of rolling ultra-thin gauge strip could be improved,and the successfully rolling of ultra-thin gauge strip was assured.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
田维兵. 热轧极薄规格产品轧制稳定性研究[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 69-72.
TIAN Weibing. Research on rolling stability for hot rolled ultra-thin gauge products. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 69-72.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热轧奥氏体不锈钢无硝酸酸洗工艺机理分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶南方工程技术有限公司，湖北武汉430223
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 总结分析了热轧奥氏体不锈钢无硝酸酸洗工艺机理和酸洗过程中发生的化学反应。无硝酸酸洗采用的是H2SO4+HF+H2O2+Fe3+混合酸液，利用了H2O2+Fe3+的强氧化作用（替代HNO3氧化性）、HF的强活化能力和H2SO4+HF所提供的强酸性来溶解贫Cr层，并使带钢表面的氧化铁皮与基体发生剥离并脱落。与混酸酸洗工艺相比，无硝酸酸洗工艺从源头上解决了氮氧化物废气和含氮废水的环境污染和脱硝成本高的问题，具有很好的经济和环保效益。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis of mechanism in pickling process without HNO3 for hot rolled austenitic stainless steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The mechanism of pickling process without HNO3 for hot rolled austenitic stainless steel was particularly analyzed as well as the chemical reactions during pickling.The pickling solution without HNO3 was mixture of H2SO4,HF,H2O2 and Fe3+.Among them,the ability of strong oxidation of H2O2 and Fe3+ was utilized to replace HNO3.The poor chromium layer was dissolved due to the ability of strong activation of HF and the strong acidity of H2SO4 and HF.Then,the surface oxide scale was removed by mechanical exfoliation during pickling.Compared with traditional pickling process with mixed acid,pickling process without HNO3 is economic and environment friendly.Because it avoids environmental pollution of nitrogen oxides waste gas and nitrogen containing waste water from the origin and leaves out the high cost of denitration operation.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
谢霞， 乔军，贺立红. 热轧奥氏体不锈钢无硝酸酸洗工艺机理分析[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 64-68.
XIE Xia, QIAO Jun，HE Lihong. Analysis of mechanism in pickling process without HNO3 for hot rolled austenitic stainless steel. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 64-68.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 首钢京唐1 420 mm电镀锡机组工艺装备特点
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司，河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Technology and equipment characteristics of 1 420 mm electrolytic tinning line in Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co.,Ltd.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The equipment and process design have reached worldclass level of Shougang Jingtang 1 420 mm electrolytic tinning line,and it is the fastest electrolytic tinning line in China.The process flow of Shougang Jingtang 1 420 mm electrolytic tinning line and the process characteristics of the pre-treatment and posttreatment sections were introduced.The characteristics of environmental protection,low tin sludge,low power consumption and wide operating window of the MSA electrolytic tinning process were mainly analyzed.The advantages and disadvantages of soluble anodes and insoluble anodes were comparative analyzed,and the advantages of induction  heating reflow was introduced too.At present，the premium products,such as DR tinplate and K plate were successfully produced.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
周保欣,胡建军,刘伟,莫志英. 首钢京唐1 420 mm电镀锡机组工艺装备特点[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 60-63.
ZHOU Baoxin,HU Jianjun,LIU Wei,MO Zhiying. Technology and equipment characteristics of 1 420 mm electrolytic tinning line in Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co.,Ltd.. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 60-63.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 线棒材轧制用冷却器的优化设计与应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 湖南华菱湘潭钢铁有限公司，湖南湘潭411101
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对棒线材生产用套筒式冷却器存在冷却能力不足，难以满足低温轧制的要求；轧件表面周向温度均匀性较差等问题，对套筒式冷却器结构进行了优化设计，得到旋流式冷却器。其采用圆锥斜齿轮式喷嘴，使冷却管内的水流形成旋流，可以产生较高的压力和速度，大幅度提高冷却能力，同时有效改善轧件表面温度的均匀性。采用SOLIDWORKS软件建模，利用ANSYS CFX软件进行流体仿真，对两种冷却器的流场、压力、流速进行了仿真分析。结果表明，旋流式冷却器可以提高冷却效率，改善轧件温度的均匀性，为实现轧件的超快速冷却创造有利条件。对24 mm圆钢的冷却应用表明，旋流式冷却器对轧件的降温幅度为套筒式冷却器的1.5～2.0倍且冷却均匀性明显改善。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Optimization design and application of the cooler for wire rod and bar rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the insufficient cooling capacity and difficult to meet the requirements of low temperature rolling,and the bad circumferential temperature uniformity of the piece of the sleeve cooler for wire rod and bar production, the structure of sleeve cooler was improved designed,and the swirl cooler was obtained.It adopts a conical helical gear nozzle to make the water flow in the cooling pipe form a swirling flow,which can generate a higher pressure and speed,greatly improve the cooling capacity,and effectively improve the uniformity of the surface temperature of the piece.Modeling with SOLIDWORKS software and fluid simulation with ANSYS CFX software,the flow field,pressure,and flow rate of the two kinds of cooler were simulated.The results show that the cooling efficiency and the temperature uniformity of the piece are improved by the swirl cooler,and favorable conditions for achieving ultra-fast cooling of piece are created.The swirl cooler application for 24 mm round bar shows that the temperature drop of piece is 1.5 to 2.0 times that of the sleeve cooler and the cooling uniformity is significantly improved.
keywords_en: wire rod and bar;controlled rolling and
controlled cooling； sleeve cooler；swirl cooler；ultra-fast cooling;fluid simulation； cooling efficiency；cooling uniformity
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李为龙，曾凡政. 线棒材轧制用冷却器的优化设计与应用[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 56-59.
LI Weilong,ZENG Fanzheng. Optimization design and application of the cooler for wire rod and bar rolling. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 56-59.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 45钢圆钢热顶锻开裂原因分析及改进措施
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 福建省三钢集团有限责任公司，福建三明365000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对福建省三钢集团有限责任公司棒材厂45钢圆钢热顶锻出现的爆裂、斜向开裂、4角纵向通长开裂、纵向断续微裂4种开裂形式，从表面质量、组织、夹杂物、断口形貌等方面分析了其产生原因。结果表明，钢中存在粗大夹杂物是产生爆裂的主要原因；母材塑性不足是斜向开裂的主要原因；孔型设计不合理带来的皱褶缺陷引起了4角纵向通长开裂；除鳞不净，氧化铁皮压入导致了纵向断续微裂的产生。为此，提出了提高冶炼质量、改进化学成分、调整高压水除鳞工艺、优化孔型设计等措施，显著提高了其热顶锻合格率。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Causes analysis of hot heading cracking of 45 steel round bar and its countermeasures
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the burst cracking,oblique cracking,longitudinal vertical cracking at four corners,and intermittent micro-cracks during the hot heading of 45 steel round bars in the Bar Factory of Fujian Sanming Iron and Steel Group Co.,Ltd.,the causes were analyzed from surface quality,microstructure,inclusion and fracture morphology.The results show that the presence of coarse inclusions in the steel is the main reason for the burst cracking;the lack of plasticity of the base metal is the main reason for the oblique cracking;the wrinkle defects caused by the unreasonable pass design caused the longitudinal cracks at four corners;the oxide indentation caused the occurrence of longitudinal intermittent microcracks.For this reason,the measures such as improving the smelting quality,improving the chemical composition,adjusting the high-pressure water descaling process and optimizing the pass design were proposed,which significantly improved the hot heading qualification rate of 45 steel round bar.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
黎立璋. 45钢圆钢热顶锻开裂原因分析及改进措施[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 50-55.
LI Lizhang. Causes analysis of hot heading cracking of 45 steel round bar and its countermeasures. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 50-55.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 冷轧汽车板表面粗糙度控制研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 河钢集团邯钢公司邯宝冷轧厂，河北邯郸056000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 以邯宝2 300 mm镀锌光整机为研究对象，总结了毛化工艺参数对工作辊表面粗糙度的影响，获得了工作辊目标粗糙度控制模型；研究了光整机弯辊力、轧制力、延伸率、光整方式对带钢表面粗糙度和峰值密度的影响，并对光整工艺参数进行了优化。结果表明，轧辊表面粗糙度平均值为2.42 μm，偏差控制在±5%以内，表面峰值密度平均达到105 cm-1，能够满足汽车板生产的要求；轧辊轧制公里数为20～180 km时带钢表面粗糙度保持性较好，在1.0 μm以上，带钢表面峰值密度平均值在80 cm-1以上，能够满足汽车外板的要求；光整机采用湿光整方式，带钢表面粗糙度的复制率约为 40%~60%,峰值密度的复制率约为60%~80%；组织汽车板外板生产过程中，在保证汽车板性能条件下，采用较大的光整延伸率、高弯辊力和轧制力，获得的带钢表面峰值密度较高。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on surface roughness control of cold rolled strip for automobile
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Taking the 2 300 mm skin pass mill of Hanbao as research object,the effects of texturing process parameters on the surface roughness of work roll were summarized,and the target roughness control model of the work roll was obtained.The influences of bending force,rolling force，elongation rate and work type of skin pass mill on surface roughness and peak density of strip were studied,and the process parameters of skin passing were optimized.The results show that the average roll surface roughness is 2.42 μm,the deviation can be controlled within ± 5%,and the average peak density can reach 105 cm-1,which can meet the requirements of automobile sheet production.When the rolling kilometers is 20-180 km of roll,the surface roughness of strip is good above 10 μm,and the average peak density of the strip is above 80 cm-1,which can meet the requirements of automobile outer sheet requirements.Using wet temper rolling method,the strip surface roughness replication rate is about 40%-60%,and the peak density replication rate is about 60%-80%.Under the condition of guaranteeing the performance of the automobile sheet,the high surface peak density of the strip can be obtained by larger temper elongation rate,high bending force and rolling force during automobile outer sheet production.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
张云涛，周建军，曹永杰. 冷轧汽车板表面粗糙度控制研究[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 46-49.
ZHANG Yuntao,ZHOU Jianjun,CAO Yongjie. Research on surface roughness control of cold rolled strip for automobile. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 46-49.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 深冲用SPHC钢开裂原因分析及改进措施
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
.宝钢股份中央研究院武汉分院，湖北武汉430080；
2.武汉科技大学钢铁冶金及资源利用省部共建教育部重点实验室，湖北武汉430081
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对某厂生产的SPHC热轧酸洗卷在制作压缩机壳体过程中出现了制耳甚至开裂的现象，对其产生原因进行了研究。结果表明，SPHC低碳钢的Ar3温度较高，而终轧温度偏低，导致其在两相区轧制且带钢长度和宽度方向温度不均，使SPHC带钢产生混晶或粗晶组织，这是产生深冲开裂和制耳的主要原因。为此，提出了工艺改进措施，如提高加热温度、减少除鳞水；增加中间坯厚度、提高穿带和轧制速度、加盖保温罩、采用热卷取箱等，以保证薄规格SPHC带钢的终轧温度不小于910 ℃且改善带钢温度均匀性。生产实践表明，采用改进措施后，显著提高了薄规格SPHC带钢深冲性能，开裂率由30%降低至3‰。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Causes analysis and improvement measures of cracking of SPHC strip for deep drawing
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the problems of appearing ears and crack of the SPHC hot rolled and pickled coils produced by a factory during the process of making the compressor shell,the causes were studied.The results show that SPHC low carbon steel strip is rolled in twophase zone because of its high Ar3 temperature and low finishing rolling temperature, and the temperatures of length and width direction of strip are not uniform,which caused mixedgrain or coarsegrain microstructure and lead to the defects.Therefore,some  improvement measures were put forward,such as increasing the heating temperature and reducing descaling water,increasing the thickness of the intermediate slab,increasing the threading and rolling speed,covering the heat insulation cover,using a hot coiling box,etc.,to ensure finishing rolling temperature was not less than 910 ℃ of thin gauge SPHC strip,and the temperature uniformity of the strip was improved.Production practice shows that the deep drawing performance of thin gauge SPHC strip is significantly improved,and the cracking rate is reduced from 30% to 3‰ after adopting the improvement measures.
keywords_en: SPHC hot rolled and pickled coil
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
梁文，刘培灿，何龙义，彭浩. 深冲用SPHC钢开裂原因分析及改进措施[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 41-45.
LIANG Wen，LIU Peican，HE Longyi，PENG Hao. Causes analysis and improvement measures of cracking of SPHC strip for deep drawing. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 41-45.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 二次冷轧机组宽中浪板形缺陷控制研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.宝山钢铁股份有限公司，上海200941；2.北京科技大学，北京100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对某DCR（Double Cold Reduction）二次冷轧机组经常出现宽中浪板形缺陷的问题，基于二次冷轧的生产工艺特点，通过分析计算，发现1#机架与2#机架承载辊缝比例凸度相差较大是宽中浪板形缺陷产生的主要原因，且鉴于该机组现有中间辊轴向横移和弯辊调控手段都不能有效消除该类板形缺陷，设计了1#机架中间辊辊型，该辊型在有效减少1#机架与2#机架承载辊缝比例凸度差异的同时，轧机的弯辊调控功效、中间辊轴向横移调控功效以及辊缝横向刚度都得到了有效提升。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on control of wide and medium wave shape defects in double cold reduction unit
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the problems of wide and medium wave shape defects in a DCR(Double Cold Reduction)unit,based on the characteristics of DCR process and through analysis and calculation,it is found that the large difference of bearing roll gap proportional camber between the 1# stand and 2# stand is the main reason of this defects formation.In view of the fact that the intermediate roll axial shifting and bending roll control methods of the unit can not effectively eliminate this defects,the intermediate roll camber of 1# stand was designed.The difference of proportional camber of the bearing roll gap of the 1# stand and 2# stand was reduced,and the bending roll regulating effect,the intermediate roll axial shifting regulating effect and the roll gap lateral rigidity were effectively improved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
韦晓,李秀军,曾松. 二次冷轧机组宽中浪板形缺陷控制研究[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 34-40.
WEI Xiao,LI Xiujun,ZENG Song. Research on control of wide and medium wave shape defects in double cold reduction unit. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 34-40.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: C-Mn-Cr-B系低合金耐磨钢组织性能的研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: SONG Xin,YANG Haifeng,WANG Chuan,WANG Shuguo,LI Tinggang,WANG Xiaosen
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 五矿营口中板有限责任公司，辽宁营口115005
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对五矿营口中板有限责任公司对耐磨钢的开发，设计采用了C-Mn-Cr-B低合金化学成分体系，试验研究了淬火、回火工艺对30 mm厚钢板组织性能的影响，得到了最佳的热处理工艺，即加热时间42 min、在920 ℃保温15 min 淬火，可以得到均匀的板条马氏体组织；再经过加热时间50 min、400 ℃回火处理后，得到回火马氏体组织，钢板综合力学性能良好，屈服强度为1 080 MPa，抗拉强度为1 190 MPa，断后伸长率为25.5%，-20 ℃冲击功均值为39 J，硬度为399HB，满足GB/T 24186—2009标准对NM400耐磨钢的要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on the microstructures and mechanical properties  of the C-Mn-Cr-B low alloy wear resistance steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the wear resistance steel development situation in Minmetals Yingkou Medium Plate Co.,Ltd.,a C-Mn-Cr-B low-alloy chemical composition system was designed, and the influence of quenching process and tempering process on microstructure and properties of 30 mm thickness plate were experimentally studied.The best heat treatment processes were obtained,i.e. when the heating time was 42 minutes,quenched temperature at 920 ℃,and the holding time was 15 minutes,a uniform lath martensite structure could be obtained.After 50 minutes of heating time and tempered at 400 ℃,the tempered martensite structure was obtained.The comprehensive mechanical properties of the plate were good.The yield strength was 1 080 MPa,the tensile strength was 1 190 MPa,the elongation was 25.5%,the average impact energy at -20 ℃ was 39 J,and the hardness was 399HB,which met the requirements of GB/T 24186—2009 standard for NM400 wear resistance steel.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
宋欣，杨海峰，王川，王树国，李廷刚，王晓森. C-Mn-Cr-B系低合金耐磨钢组织性能的研究[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 26-33.
SONG Xin,YANG Haifeng,WANG Chuan,WANG Shuguo,LI Tinggang,WANG Xiaosen. Research on the microstructures and mechanical properties  of the C-Mn-Cr-B low alloy wear resistance steel. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 26-33.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热轧工艺对高铝铁素体耐热不锈钢组织性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.太原钢铁（集团）有限公司先进不锈钢材料国家重点实验室，山西太原030003；
2.山西太钢不锈钢股份有限公司技术中心，山西太原030003
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 电站锅炉的连接件需具有优良的抗高温氧化性、冲击韧性和塑性，主要采用铁素体耐热不锈钢0.1C-18Cr-1Al-1Si制造，热轧工艺对其塑韧性能有至关重要的影响。采用热轧试验，研究了不同热轧工艺对铁素体耐热不锈钢0.1C-18Cr-1Al-1Si组织性能的影响规律。结果表明，热轧温度为700 ℃时，0.1C-18Cr-1Al-1Si热轧板的再结晶最充分；横纵轧和纵轧不同轧制方式下0.1C-18Cr-1Al-1Si板材小角度晶界比例均较高，边部小角度晶界出现频率更高；采用横纵轧工艺可以明显减轻0.1C-18Cr-1Al-1Si板材力学性能的各向异性。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of hot rolling process on microstructure and properties of ferritic heat-resistant stainless steel with high aluminum content
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The connection parts of power station boilers need to have excellent high temperature oxidation resistance,impact toughness and plasticity,which are mainly manufactured by ferritic heatresistant stainless steel 0.1C-18Cr-1Al-1Si plate.Its plasticity and toughess are mainy affected by hot rolling praess.Through  hot rolling test,the effects of different hot rolling processes on the microstructure and properties of ferritic heat-resistant stainless steel 0.1C-18Cr-1Al-1Si were studied.The results show that the recrystallization of 0.1C-18Cr-1Al-1Si plate is the most sufficient at hot rolling temperature of 700 ℃.The proportions of small angle grain boundaries of 0.1C-18Cr-1Al-1Si plate are higher under cross-longitudinal rolling and longitudinal rolling modes,and the frequency of small angle grain boundaries at edges is higher.The anisotropy of mechanical properties of 0.1C-18Cr-1Al-1Si hot rolled plate can be significantly reduced by cross-longitudinal rolling.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李阳，王琦，张威，曾莉. 热轧工艺对高铝铁素体耐热不锈钢组织性能的影响[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 23-25.
LI Yang,WANG Qi,ZHANG Wei,ZENG Li. Effect of hot rolling process on microstructure and properties of ferritic heat-resistant stainless steel with high aluminum content. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 23-25.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 核反应堆用FeCrAl合金板材的试制及其组织性能研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LI Gang1,LIU Haitao2,WANG Hui1,HE Kun1,ZHENG Jiyun1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.中国核动力研究设计院反应堆燃料及材料重点实验室，四川成都610213；
2.东北大学轧制技术与连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 在对Fe13Cr5AlxNb合金熔炼、锻造、轧制等制备工艺研究的基础上，利用光学显微镜、透射电镜、扫描电镜以及电子背散射衍射研究了合金板材的微观组织演化特征。研究了不同热处理温度（800、850、900、1 000 ℃）下合金板材中第二相的析出特点及对其力学性能的影响规律。结果表明，合金板材在800 ℃保温5~25 h后，其室温力学性能稳定；合金板材在800~1 000 ℃、20 h高温时效后，在800~850 ℃时，其强度稍有降低，而在900~1 000 ℃时，其强度随温度的升高而提升。同时，对不同Nb含量的合金板材常温和高温力学性能进行了测试，Nb质量分数为1.0%~1.5%时，合金板材具有良好的力学性能。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development and study on microstructure and properties of FeCrAl alloy sheet for nuclear reactor
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the preparation process of Fe13Cr5AlxNb alloys，such as smelting,forging and rolling,the microstructure evolution of the alloy sheet was studied by means of optical microscope,transmission electron microscope,scanning electron microscope and electron backscatter diffraction.The precipitation characteristics of the second phase and its influence on the mechanical properties of the alloy sheet were studied under different heat treatment temperatures (800、850、900、 1 000 ℃).The results show that the mechanical properties of the alloy sheet at room temperature remains stable after aging at 800 ℃ for 5-25 h,but after aging at 800-1 000 ℃ for 20 h,the strength slightly decreases at 800-850 ℃,while the strength increases with the in crease of temperature at 900-1 000 ℃.The mechanical properties of Nbcontaining alloy sheets were tested at room temperature and high temperature.The results show that the alloy sheet have good mechanical properties when the Nb mass fraction is in the range of 1.0%-1.5%.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李刚，刘海涛，王辉，何琨，郑继云. 核反应堆用FeCrAl合金板材的试制及其组织性能研究[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 18-22.
LI Gang,LIU Haitao,WANG Hui,HE Kun,ZHENG Jiyun. Development and study on microstructure and properties of FeCrAl alloy sheet for nuclear reactor. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 18-22.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 焊接线能量对高强钢焊接接头组织性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIANG Liang1,2,ZHANG Bo3,DENG Xiangtao1,LIU Xuhui2,XIAO Aida2,OU Ling3#br# #br#
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819；2.湖南华菱涟源钢铁有限公司技术中心，
湖南娄底417009；3.湖南工业大学冶金与材料工程学院，湖南株洲412000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用1.3、1.6、1.9 kJ/mm 3种不同线能量对960QT钢进行焊接，研究了线能量对960QT钢焊接接头组织和性能的影响。研究表明，随着线能量的增加，焊接接头强度下降，但塑性提高，焊缝冲击韧性变化不大，热影响区冲击韧性先降低后增大，热影响区冲击韧性均高于焊缝。对3种线能量下960QT高强钢的焊接接头进行金相分析，发现焊缝组织主要为针状铁素体和粒状贝氏体。随着线能量的增加，针状铁素体发生粗化，数量相对减少，粒状贝氏体数量增多。焊接接头热影响区的金相组织主要为板条M/B和粒状贝氏体。随着焊接线能量的增大，冷却速率减小，粒状贝氏体组织数量相对增加，而板条贝氏体组织的数量逐渐减少。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Influence of welding energy inputs on microstructure and performance of welding joint of high strength steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：960QT steel was welded with three different energy inputs of 1.3、1.6、1.9 kJ/mm.The influence of energy inputs on the microstructure and properties of 960QT steel's welding joint  was studied.The results show that with the increase of energy inputs,the strength of welding joint decreases,but the plasticity increases,the impact toughness of welding seam does not change much,and the impact toughness of heat affected zone decreases first and then increases.The impact toughness of the heat affected zone is higher than that of the welding seam.Metallographic analysis of welding joint of 960QT high strength steel under three energy inputs show that the welding seam microstructure is mainly acicular ferrite and granular bainite.As the energy inputs increases,the acicular ferrite coarsens,the amount decreases,and the number of granular bainite increases.The metallographic structure of the heat affected zone of the welding joint is mainly lath M/B and granular bainite.As the welding energy inputs increases,the cooling rate slows down,the number of granular bainite structures increases,and the number of lath bainite structures decreases.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
梁亮，张波，邓想涛，刘旭辉，肖爱达，欧玲. 焊接线能量对高强钢焊接接头组织性能的影响[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 12-17.
LIANG Liang,ZHANG Bo,DENG Xiangtao,LIU Xuhui,XIAO Aida,OU Ling. Influence of welding energy inputs on microstructure and performance of welding joint of high strength steel. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 12-17.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 550 MPa级中厚板矫直过程中表面凹坑缺陷的成因与对策
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LU Rui1,LI Zhifeng2,WANG Hao2,GAO Ye2,CAO Guangming2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.河钢集团邯钢公司，河北邯郸056015；
2.东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对550 MPa级高强中厚板在矫直过程中极易出现氧化铁皮压入凹坑缺陷的问题，根据现场矫直工艺，研究了在不同温度下进行热变形时试样表面和横截面的形貌，钢基体与氧化铁皮界面处平直度的变化规律。结果表明，热变形温度为450 ℃时，表面氧化铁皮开始出现裂纹，且随着变形温度的降低，裂纹的数量逐渐增加；此外，氧化铁皮与钢基体之间的界面长度随变形温度的降低而呈直线增加，表明氧化铁皮与钢基体界面平直度随着热变形温度的降低越发粗糙、易脱落而形成凹坑缺陷。为此，应适当提高终轧温度以确保矫直时钢板表面温度大于450 ℃，同时提高钢板的运行速率，防止氧化铁皮在低温变形发生破碎和脱落的同时降低氧化铁皮厚度，从而减小因氧化铁皮脱落而造成凹坑缺陷的发生几率。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Causes and countermeasures of pit defect on the surface of 550 MPa grade plate during straightening process
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the pit defect formed on the surface of 550 MPa grade plate during straightening process,the morphologies of surface and crosssection of samples and the regularity of the flatness at the interface between the steel substrate and the scale under different deformation temperature were studied based actual straightening process.The results show that when the thermal deformation temperature is 450 ℃,cracks begin to appear on the surface oxide scale,and as the deformation temperature decreases,the number of cracks gradually increases.In addition,the interface length between the oxide scale and the steel substrate increases linearly with the decrease of the deformation temperature,indicating that the flatness of the interface between the scale and the steel substrate becomes rougher and scale easier to fall off to form pit defect with the decrease of the thermal deformation temperature.To this end,the finishing rolling temperature should be appropriately increased to ensure that the surface temperature of the plate is above 450 ℃ during straightening,and at the same time to increase the running speed of the plate to prevent the scale from breaking and falling,and reduce the thickness of the scale,thereby reducing occurrence of pit defect caused by scale fall off.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
卢锐,李志峰，王皓，高野，曹光明. 550 MPa级中厚板矫直过程中表面凹坑缺陷的成因与对策[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 7-11.
LU Rui,LI Zhifeng,WANG Hao,GAO Ye,CAO Guangming. Causes and countermeasures of pit defect on the surface of 550 MPa grade plate during straightening process. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 7-11.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: QP钢汽车板热处理工艺与设备探讨
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.中冶赛迪工程技术股份有限公司，重庆401122；2.重庆市许秀飞专家工作室，重庆401122
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过对第3代超高强钢QP钢连续热处理工艺原理的分析，指出目前的带钢连续退火炉不能完全满足生产现代汽车板的需要，必须对其进行改进；在研究QP钢热处理工艺流程、生产的关键工艺要点、两步法工艺路线的基础上，对现代汽车板连续镀锌线、镀锌和冷轧两用线热工炉设计的要领进行了探讨，提出了典型的工艺流程布局设计方案，并分别说明了加热段、保温段、缓冷段、快冷段应有的技术要求，特别是对各钢种在过时效段所发生的转变进行了分析，阐明了新型热工炉过时效段的结构和技术要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Discussion on heat treatment technology and furnace for QP steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the analysis of the principle of continuous heat treantment for QP steel automobile sheet,it pointed out that the current strip continuous annealing furnace can not be fully met the needs of producing QP automobile sheet,and it must be improved.Based on the study of heat treatment process of QP steel,the key technological points of production and the twostep process route,the design keys of heat treatmet furnaces were discussed for galvanizing line and dualpurpose line for galvanizing and cold rolling.The typical process layout was put forward,and the technical requirements of heating section,soaking section,slow cooling section and fast cooling section respectively were described.In particular,the changes of various steels in the overaging period were analyzed,and the structure and technical requirements of the overaging section of the new heat treatment furnace were decsribed.
keywords_en: heat treatment of high strength steel
dualpurpose line for galvanizing and cold rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
肖学文，许秀飞. QP钢汽车板热处理工艺与设备探讨[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(2): 1-6.
XIAO Xuewen1，XU Xiufei1,2. Discussion on heat treatment technology and furnace for QP steel. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(2): 1-6.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 60Si2MnA盘条控轧控冷工艺的优化
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 江苏永钢集团有限公司轧钢事业部，江苏张家港215628
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对弹簧钢盘条加工过程中出现断裂的问题，对盘条组织性能进行了分析，发现盘条表面存在脱碳层和马氏体组织是盘条冷弯断裂的根本原因。通过对盘条化学成分及控轧控冷工艺的优化控制，亦即采用低的加热温度、低的开轧温度、低的吐丝温度以及先快后慢的控冷方式，消除了盘条表面的异常组织，解决了弹簧断裂问题。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Optimization of controlled rolling and controlled cooling process for 60Si2MnA wire coil
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the problem of breakage of spring steel wire during processing ,the microstructure and performance of the wire coil were analyzed.The result shows that the presence of decarburization layer and martensite structure on the surface of the wire rod is the main cause of the cold bending fracture of the wire coil.The surface abnormal microstructure was eliminated by optimizing the chemical composition of the wire coil and the controlled rolling and cooling process,i.e.,using low heating temperature,low rolling temperature,low laying temperature and appling first fast and then slow cooling mode, the breakage problem of spring was resolved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
王鲁义，马志军，顾腾飞. 60Si2MnA盘条控轧控冷工艺的优化[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(1): 98-100.
WANG Luyi,MA Zhijun,GU Tengfei. Optimization of controlled rolling and controlled cooling process for 60Si2MnA wire coil. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(1): 98-100.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 冷镦钢线材表面微折叠缺陷原因分析及改进措施
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 河北钢铁集团邯钢公司大型轧钢厂，河北邯郸056015
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 冷锻钢最常见的质量问题为加工开裂，而导致加工开裂的常见原因为轧制折叠缺陷。对冷镦钢线材在轧制过程中出现的50 μm深微折叠缺陷的产生原因进行了分析，主要是轧制制度不合理、减定径孔型过充满、轧机孔型不对中、轧件存在轻微划伤缺陷而造成的。为此，对轧制压下量、孔型设计、轧制工艺备件进行了改进，杜绝了微裂纹缺陷的产生及冷镦开裂质量异议。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Cause analysis of micro-folding defects on the surface of cold heading steel wire and its countermeasures
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The most common quality problem of cold heading steel was cracking,and a common cause of cracking was rolled folding defect.The causes of 50 μm deep micro-folding defects of the cold heading steel wire during rolling were analyzed.The main reasons were the unreasonable rolling scheme,overfilling of reducing and sizing pass, misalignment of rolling mill passes and slight scratches on rolled products.Therefore,rolling reduction,pass design and rolling process equipment had been improved.The micro-crack defects and cold heading cracking quality objections were eliminated.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
郗雄涛，王志义，王红军. 冷镦钢线材表面微折叠缺陷原因分析及改进措施[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(1): 94-97.
XI Xiongtao,WANG Zhiyi,WANG Hongjun. Cause analysis of micro-folding defects on the surface of cold heading steel wire and its countermeasures. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(1): 94-97.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 矿用36U型钢产品质量稳定性控制
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 马鞍山钢铁股份有限公司长材事业部，安徽马鞍山243000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对马钢小H型钢线生产矿用36U型钢时产生尺寸超差、扭转、凸台和拉丝等缺陷问题，分析其主要原因是孔型设计不合理。通过对孔型系统、导卫安装、轧制规程进行优化，实现了矿用36U型钢的稳定生产，提高了生产效率。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Quality stability control of 36U section steel for mining
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the problems of oversize,torsion,bosses and wire drawing of 36U section steel for mining produced in small H-beam line of Masteel,the main cause was analyzed,which was using unreasonable pass system.By optimizing the pass system,guide and guard installation and rolling schemes,stable production of 36U section steel for mining had been achieved and production efficiency had been improved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
沈千成，金国法，孙晓明. 矿用36U型钢产品质量稳定性控制[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(1): 91-93.
SHEN Qiancheng,JIN Guofa，SUN Xiaoming. Quality stability control of 36U section steel for mining. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(1): 91-93.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: GH2747高温合金无缝管的试制
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.江苏银环精密钢管有限公司，江苏宜兴214200;2.江苏大学材料科学与工程学院，江苏镇江212013；
3.东方电气股份有限公司，四川成都611731
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用真空感应和电渣重熔工艺成功冶炼GH2747合金管坯，经过热穿孔、两道次冷轧及固溶热处理研发出规格为25 mm×3 mm的无缝管，并对其进行了无损检验、水压试验、表面检验、尺寸检测、化学成分分析、组织及性能检验。结果表明，GH2747高温合金无缝管工艺可靠，表面质量及尺寸精度良好；其化学成分满足GB/T 14992-2005的规定，各元素含量适中；无缝管基体为奥氏体等轴晶粒，平均晶粒度约为5.5级；无缝管的拉伸性能及维氏硬度、工艺性能及耐晶间腐蚀性能良好。研发出的GH2747高温合金无缝管的各项性能均满足其使用要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Trial production of GH2747 superalloy seamless tube
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The GH2747 alloy tube billet was successfully smelted by vacuum induction and electroslag remelting process,and the 25 mm×3 mm seamless tube was manufactured by hot piercing,twopass cold rolling and solution heat treatment.The seamless tube was subjected to nondestructive examination,hydrostatic test,surface inspection,dimensional inspection,chemical composition analysis,microstructure and performance testing.The results show that the manufacturing process of the GH2747 superalloy seamless tube is reliable,its surface quality and dimensional accuracy are very good.The chemical composition of the alloy meets the requirements of GB/T 14992—2005,the content of each element is moderate.The seamless tube matrix is austenitic equiaxed crystal,the average grain size is about 5.5.The tensile properties and Vickers hardness,process performance and intergranular corrosion resistance of the seamless tube are very good.The performance indicators of the developed GH2747 superalloy seamless tube meet the application requirements.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李宏，高佩，涂玉先，王洲航. GH2747高温合金无缝管的试制[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(1): 88-90.
LI Hong，GAO Pei，TU Yuxian，WANG Zhouhang. Trial production of GH2747 superalloy seamless tube. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(1): 88-90.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 取向硅钢卷取塔形影响因素分析与改进措施
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Yanlong, ZHANG Zhijie, HU Xiaozhou, ZHANG Liqiang, MIAO Hewu
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢智新迁安电磁材料有限公司，河北迁安064400
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis of influence factors on coiling telescope of grain oriented silicon steel strip and improvement measures
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The coiling quality of grain oriented silicon steel strip directly affects the yield index ect.in the subsequent process.For the coiling telescope defect of a grain oriented silicon steel units,the main influencing factors of this defect were analyzed.By optimizing the magnesium oxide coating and drying process,the magnesium oxide state and thickness uniformity on the surface of the strip were improved.Meanwhile,by optimizing the coiling tension parameters,ensuring the accuracy of the sleeve size and improving the quality of the strip head coiling,the gap between layers of coil was guaranteed,the misalignment between the layers was avoided,and the coiling telescope defect was eliminated.Therefore,the coiling quality of the strip was improved,and the yield of the grain oriented silicon in cold process was further increased.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 优钢冷轧起皮机理研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.河北天柱钢铁集团有限公司，河北唐山062350；2.唐山志威科技有限公司，河北唐山064200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对优钢冷轧后表面起皮现象，通过对起皮样品的检测分析，发现起皮处有大量铁和还原铁，这是造成冷轧起皮的直接起因；通过一系列试验，确认了铸坯在加热炉内因相变形成了微裂纹，这是造成冷轧起皮的根本原因。基于现场工况条件与设备实际情况，优化了生产组织模式，根据钢种和用途优化了中包温度、连铸拉速和铸坯入炉温度，有效杜绝了铸坯微裂纹的出现，遏制了铸坯内部氧化，优钢冷轧表面起皮得到显著改善。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Mechanism research on surface peeling of cold rolled special steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the peeling defect on the surface of special steel after cold rolling,through inspection and analysis of the peeling samples,a large amount of iron and reduced iron were found at the peeling point,which was the direct cause of peeling defect.Through a series of tests,it was confirmed that the there were microcracks of slab due to phase deformation in the heating furnace,which is the root cause of peeling defect.Based on the field conditions and the actual conditions of the equipment,the production organization mode was optimized,the tundish temperature,casting speed and slab charging temperature were optimized according to the steel type and application,which effectively prevented the occurrence of microcracks in the slab and internal oxidation. The peeling defect of cold rolled special steel was significantly improved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
华维，刘丹. 优钢冷轧起皮机理研究[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(1): 79-84.
HUA Wei，LIU Dan. Mechanism research on surface peeling of cold rolled special steel. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(1): 79-84.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 大规格圆棒用滚动导卫开度调节系统的改进
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 江苏永钢集团有限公司，a.特钢事业部；b.技术质量部，江苏张家港215628
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对大规格圆棒生产用滚动导卫在轧制过程中导辊开度不能保持在设定值，影响产品质量及生产顺行的问题，通过对该类型导卫开度调节装置的工作原理及结构分析，明确了结构设计及选用材质与使用工况不匹配是问题产生的主要原因。为此，对调节装置进行了设计优化，改进后的导卫在线时间显著提高。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Improvement of gap adjustment system of roller guides for large gauge round bar
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the problem of opening value of guide roll of roller guides unable maintained at the setting value for large gauge round bar,which affects product quality and production,the work principle and structure of roller guide opening adjustment device were analyzed.The main causes was found out that the opening adjustment device structural design and materials were not match the operating conditions.Therefore,the adjustment device was improved,and the online work time of the improved guide was significantly increased.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: REN Weichao1，GAO Menglu2，WANG Daojin1，MA Xiaoning1，ZU Yanping1，LI Jing1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司，河北唐山063200；2.北京首钢郎泽新能源科技有限公司，北京100041
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 带钢在立式退火炉内发生瓢曲、跑偏的临界张力与炉辊凸度、带钢规格都存在一定关系，但缺乏合理的定量分析方法，难以科学制定不同规格、不同钢种带钢的炉内单位张力。通过引入瓢曲风险因子BRI，可以定量地分析炉内板带瓢曲风险，从而确定冷硬板带炉内张力设定上限，即板带发生热瓢曲的临界张力σC，为连退炉加热段和冷却段的张力控制提供依据。采用该方法对连退炉加热、冷却区的张力进行了优化，应用结果表明，优化后的张力值与实测值更加吻合。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on tension setting model and application in vertical annealing furnace
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The critical tension of the strip running deviation and buckle in the vertical annealing furnace has a certain relationship with the roll crown and strip specifications.Because lack of a reasonable quantitative analysis method, it was difficult to scientifically formulate tension for different specifications and different steel types.By introducing the buckle risk factor BRI,the risk of strip buckle in the furnace could be quantitatively analyzed,so as to determine the upper limit of the critical tension of strip buckle.It was the reference of tension control in heating and cooling section of furnace.Practical application show that the optimized tension is more consistent with the actual measured value by the optimized meathod.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 不同工艺对低碳钢钢板力学性能及屈强比的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: SONG Xin， WANG Gen-ji， WANG Zhi-yong，　　　　　ZHENG Hui-ping， CHEN Tie-qiang， BAI Xue-jun
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 秦皇岛首秦金属材料有限公司，河北秦皇岛066326
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 本文研究了一种C-Mn-Nb-V成分体系低碳钢钢板在不同工艺条件下的力学性能。对比了TMCP控轧控冷，在线、离线淬火，亚温淬火工艺条件下钢板的力学性能及回火处理前后钢板屈强比。采用“TMCP+回火”工艺，钢板屈强比为0. 89；采用“在线、离线淬火+回火”工艺，钢板屈强比升至0. 92及以上；采用“亚温淬火+回火”工艺，得到了回火马氏体+亚临界铁素体的混合组织，钢板屈强比仅为0. 75。研究结果表明，采用“亚温淬火+回火”工艺，钢板综合力学性能良好且具有较低的屈强比。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of Different Processes on Mechanical Properties and Yield Ratio of Low Carbon Steel Plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The plate mechanical properties and yield ratio under different processes of the low carbon steel plate of the C-Mn-Nb-V component system were studied and compared. Using ‘TMCP+tempering’ process, plate yield ratio is 0. 89. Using ‘on-line or off-line quenching + tempering’process, plate yield ratio reach above 0. 92. Using ‘subcritical quenching + tempering’process, the mixed microstructure of tempered martensite + subcritical ferrite is got and the yield ratio is only 0. 75. The results show that plate mechanical properties are good and the yield ratio is also low by the ‘subcritical quenching + tempering’ process.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
宋欣， 王根矶， 王志勇， 郑会平， 谌铁强， 白学军. 不同工艺对低碳钢钢板力学性能及屈强比的影响[J]. , 2014, 31(3): 9-12.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热轧钢板表面翘皮缺陷的形成机理及控制
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: PANG Qi-hang, TANG Di, ZHAO Ai-min, ZHAO Zheng-zhi
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京科技大学高效轧制国家工程研究中心，北京100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过扫描电镜（SEM）和EDS能谱分析仪对IF钢热轧板的表面翘皮缺陷进行了分析，发现翘皮一侧明显与基体相连接，且沿轧制方向呈连续的直线分布；裂缝附近的微观组织具有明显的轧制组织特性，说明翘皮缺陷发生在轧制后半程。为此，结合工艺参数、设备状况进行了研究。结果表明：翘皮缺陷产生的主要原因是板坯边角部与芯部温差过大，在热轧过程中发生不均匀变形而导致的，对此提出了相应的控制措施。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Formation mechanism of the scar defect on the surface of hot rolled plate and its control measures
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The scar defect on the surface of hot rolled IF steel plate was investigated by scan electron microscope (SEM) and energy dispersive spectroscopy (EDS).The results showed that one side of the defect was connected with the matrix, and there was a continuous linear distribution along the rolling direction. As the microstructure near the crack had obvious characteristics of the microstructure of the rolling, it indicated that the surface scar defect had generated in the latter pass of the rolling. Combined with the process parameters and equipment status, this research show that the main formation reason of scar defect is that the temperature difference between the edge and the center of slab which leads to the non-uniform deformation in the course of hot rolling.Therefore, the control measures were put forward.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
庞启航，唐 荻，赵爱民，赵征志. 热轧钢板表面翘皮缺陷的形成机理及控制[J]. , 2014, 31(6): 9-11.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1. 中国钢研科技集团有限公司新冶高科技集团有限公司，北京100081
2. 马鞍山钢铁股份有限公司技术中心，安徽马鞍山243000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为研究钢板表面状态对磷酸盐保护膜的影响，本文对表面光洁、有色差、有“W”压氧3种表面状态的钢板进行了磷化处理，并进行表面形貌观察、磷化膜重测定、耐蚀性实验、扫描电镜及EDS分析。结果表明，钢板磷化后表面形貌受原板表面质量影响很大，有色差的基板在磷化后表面出现亮白条纹；有“W”压氧的基板磷化后表面会形成黑色条纹缺陷。但基板表面状态引起的磷化后表面缺陷基本不影响磷化膜的耐腐蚀性，膜重和粒径满足要求。本文指出，由于磷化膜遗传基板表面状态，要解决磷化后表面形貌缺陷，必须通过改善基板表面质量来消除。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Influences of Plate Surface States on Phosphate Protective Film
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：For the effect of surface state of plate on phosphate coating, three surface state plates of smooth, different color and have a "W" pressure were phosphating treated. Meanwhile, surface morphology of specimens were observed, phosphating film weight of specimens were determined, corrosion resistant tests were carried out, SEM and EDS analysis were used. The results showed that the surface morphology of plate by phosphating treated was greatly influenced by the surface quality of the original plate. The bright white stripes were appeared after different surface color plate phosphating . The plate surface could form black stripe defect after "W" pressure oxygen plate phosphating. But the plate surface state caused by phosphating surface defects after basically did not affect the corrosion resistance of the phosphating film, film weight and size to meet the requirements. Because of the phosphating film genetic substrate surface state, the surface defects after phosphating only can be eliminated by improving the substrate surface quality.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
郝晓东 ，刘昕，张建，张启富. 钢板表面状态对磷酸盐保护膜的影响[J]. , 2013, 30(6): 25-28.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 重轨矫直扭矩控制模型研究及应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: TAO Gong-ming, ZHU Hua-lin, ZHAO Yun, DENG Shu-hui, ZHANG Jian, CHEN Cong-mu
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 攀钢新钢钒轨梁厂，四川攀枝花617062
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 扭矩干涉是矫直生产的“顽疾”，各辊单独传动是解决干涉最好的改进方法，但各辊的矫直速度不及时调整同样会产生严重的扭矩“干涉”。本文介绍了一种通过调整矫直辊名义直径而改变矫直速度的方法，分析了矫直线速度与中心层高度、压下量、矫直节距及矫直辊直径的关系及理论线速度与实际线速度存在差异的原因。结合理论分析及现场数据建立了矫直扭矩干涉的控制模型。该模型投用后，使矫直扭矩绝对值由87%降低到21%，降低了矫直机电耗及设备损坏率，提高了生产作业率。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research and Application of Control Model of Straightening Torque for Rail
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Torque interference is one of the most complicated issues to resolve in straightening process, and individual drive is the best way to solve. It is necessary to adjust roll speed in time for preventing torque interference, and there are many ways to adjust straightening speed. In this paper, the method of change straightening speed by adjusting nominal roll diameter was adopted, the correlation between the straightening linear velocity and the height of center layer, reduction, roll pitch and diameter, and the reason of the difference between theoretical and actual velocity were analyzed. According to the theoretical analysis and practical data, the control model for rail straightening torque was built. After using of the model, the roll torque interference was significantly reduced, the absolute torque value was decreased from 87% to about 21%, and the power consumption and equipment damage of straightening mill were significantly reduced, and the productivity was improved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陶功明，朱华林，赵云，邓淑惠，张建，陈崇木. 重轨矫直扭矩控制模型研究及应用[J]. , 2013, 30(6): 29-32.
TAO Gong-ming, ZHU Hua-lin, ZHAO Yun, DENG Shu-hui, ZHANG Jian, CHEN Cong-mu. Research and Application of Control Model of Straightening Torque for Rail. , 2013, 30(6): 29-32.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 根据热轧带钢工作辊在工作中的实际传热情况, 将工作辊对称地分为轧制区、非轧制区、辊肩、辊端和辊颈5个部分, 充分考虑热轧工作辊的实际环境对轧辊温度场和热变形的影响, 来确定轧辊的热边界条件; 再利用有限差分法建立工作辊温度场及热变形的数学模型, 并利用VC++平台进行模拟研究, 建立适合在线计算的快速模拟软件; 最后分析了轧辊直径和压下率对轧辊热凸度的影响。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on simulation software of work roll thermal crown in hot mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the heat transfer of work roll in hot rolling process, the work roll was divided symmetrically into five sections of rolling area, non-rolling area, shoulder, roll end and roll neck. The thermal boundary conditions of work roll was determined under full consideration of the working environmental influence on work roll temperature field and its thermal deformation. The finite difference method was used to establish a mathematical model of work roll temperature field and thermal deformation. This model was applied online in practical production based on VC++ software, and good effect was reached. Also, the influence of roll diameter and reduction on the roll thermal crown was analyzed.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis of the inducing factors and prevention methods of strip fracture out of weld seam
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the morphology observation of cracked strip out of the weld seam and the analysis of relevant controlling parameters of cold rolling process, it was concluded that there were two kinds of strip fracture induced by different factors. One of which was induced by hot rolled strip flaws including fluctuation of strip shape, press-in foreign body, strip overlap and slab defects. The other one of which was caused by fluctuation of tensile stress because of operation problems and exception condition of equipment, occurred at the range out of weld seam. The proper methods against different types of strip fracture were put into practice, the occurrence times of cracked strip was effectively reduced.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 强化方式对HRB400E钢筋使用性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶建筑研究总院有限公司，北京 100088
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 对比分析了TMCP非微合金化（1#试样）和0.03%VN微合金化（2#试样）两种工艺生产的HRB400E钢筋的焊接和抗震性能差异。主要对焊接热影响区焊缝处的显微硬度和冲击功以及焊接强度作了对比试验，还对衡量抗震性能的强屈比指标进行了对比分析。结果表明，1#试样HV10整体硬度值高于2#试样大约20～30，，硬度最大处均在焊缝区，1#试样从焊缝中心向外的硬度呈现明显降低趋势，这主要是因为其焊缝区域产生了贝氏体；此外，1#试样焊接热影响区的韧-脆转变温度在5 ℃左右，2#试样则在10 ℃左右；1#试样的强屈比范围是1.30～1.35，2#试样为1.32～1.35，都满足了抗震钢筋的要求。
keywords_cn: 关键词：TMCP、 Nb微合金化、强化方式
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Influence of strengthening technology on service performance of HRB400E rebar
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The welding and seismic performance differences of HRB400E rebar produced by TMCP with non-microalloying (No.1 specimen) and 0.03%VN micro alloying (No.2 specimen) were compared. A comparative test was mainly made on the weld seam hardness , impact power and welding strength of the welding heat affected zone. The results showed that HV10 integral hardness value of No.1 specimen was higher than the No.2 specimen about 20-30, the maximum hardness were both in the welding zone, No.1 specimen hardness was significantly decreased from the welding center, mainly because of the bainite in welding heat affected zone. In addition, the ductile brittle transition temperature of welding heat affected zone was 5 ℃ of No.1 specimen, while the No.2 specimen was 10 ℃. The ratio of tensile strength and yield strength of No.1 specimen was 1.30－1.35,while No.2 specimen was 1.32－1.35.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陈 昕. 强化方式对HRB400E钢筋使用性能的影响[J]. , 2014, 31(6): 20-23.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对以中间产品（钢）为计算基准来分析钢铁企业能耗所存在的弊端，提出了一种以最终合格产品为计算基准、引入原料的初始载能和外供产品载能的新的工序能耗计算方法。对小型型钢热轧工序进行的实例分析得出，小型型钢热轧生产应以加热、轧制两个子工序的节能降耗为重点，兼顾水处理子工序能耗。并将加热、轧制、水处理3个子工序设置为3个相对独立的模块，以满足不同工序流程和产品结构的组合要求，且便于计算和评估。

含Nb 热轧多相钢板厚度方向显微组织的研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn:
通过热轧实验研究了控轧控冷工艺和化学成分对两种含Nb微合金化钢厚度方向显微组织的影响。
结果表明，从试样芯部到1/4厚度位置，再到表面层，铁素体晶粒和贝氏体束尺寸越来越小，相应位置处的铁素体量逐步增多，而M-A量则经历了先增加后减少的过程，并在1/4厚度位置处达到了峰值。在控轧控冷工艺参数相近的情况下，在厚度方向同一位置处，Nb-Ti钢的铁素体晶粒、贝氏体束以及M-A组元尺寸更小，并且厚度方向不同位置处的组织差异较Nb钢小，对减小厚度效应更为有利。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：For a wide skin pass mill at a factory production of IF steel with low precision problems of elongation,the elongation control system was studied.The rolling force and strip tension control method to adjust the elongation and its distribution system were described in detailed.At the same time, the effect of strip tension on the elongation control accuracy was studied,a scheme of optimization of the strip tension was brought forward.To the large fluctuation of elongation at the low speed and speed up and down of temper,adding the speed feedforward control system was put forward.To reaching minimum rolling force of elongation control system when the production of IF steel,the measures to decrease the minimum rolling force of system and reduce bending force of work and medium rolls when calibration rolling force were applied.Through the test,elongation control accuracy was greatly improved.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Cause analysis and measures for black spot defect on hot- dip galvanized sheet
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The black spots on passivation film of galvanized sheet were observed and analyzed by SEM and microscope. Black spots were caused by the water which had not been squeezed out and dried completely by the wringing rollers and dryer of tension leveler. In subsequent chromating process, the chromate solution had been diluted with residual water and formed uncoated point on the passivation film. During transportation and storage, the uncoated point on chromating film oxidized and became black spots defects. By optimizing the wringing rollers operation and raising the hot air temperature, this black spots defect was avoided.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: Nb元素对含Ti低碳微合金钢连续冷却转变及析出行为的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LI Xiao- lin, WANG Zhao- dong, DENG Xiang- tao, WEN Chang- fei, LI Ya- kui, WANG Guo- dong
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用热模拟试验机研究了Nb元素对含Ti低碳微合金钢的动态连续冷却转变行为的影响，利用OM和TEM对等温淬火工艺处理后实验钢的显微组织和析出行为进行观察和分析。结果表明：Nb元素使得含Ti低碳微合金钢的动态CCT曲线整体向右下方移动，大大减小了先共析铁素体和珠光体相变区，同时扩大了针状铁素体和贝氏体相变区，在较低冷速时能得到较多的针状铁素体；含Nb- Ti和含Ti两种实验钢经等温淬火工艺处理后的显微组织均由铁素体和马氏体两相组成，铁素体相中析出物平均尺寸分别为6.8、4.2 nm，利用Orowan机制对析出强化量进行计算得出析出强化量分别为90.6、142.3 MPa。
keywords_cn: 微合金钢，连续冷却转变行为，透射电子显微镜，纳米析出物
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of Nb on continuous cooling transformation process and precipitation behaviors of the Ti- bearing low- carbon steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The effect of Nb on austenite phase transformation behavior during its dynamic continuous cooling transformation process was investigated. The microstructure and precipitation behaviors of experimented steels treated by isothermal quenching process had been investigated by using optical microscopy and field- emission- gun transmission electron microscopy. The results show that Nb makes the overall CCT curve of the Ti- bearing low carbon steel move to the bottom right, which greatly reduces the eutectoid ferrite and pearlite transformation area, while expands the acicular ferrite and granular bainite transformation area. Thus the Nb- Ti- bearing steel can get more acicular ferrite at a lower cooling rate. The microstructure of the Nb- Ti bearing and Ti- bearing steel treated by isothermal quenching process mainly consists of ferrite and martensite. The size of the precipitation has been determined to be 6.8 nm and 4.2 nm, respectively. The contribution of the precipitation hardening to the yield strength have been identified to be 90.6 MPa and 142.3 MPa, respectively, based on the Orowan mechanism.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.华南理工大学机械与汽车工程学院，广东广州510641

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对韶钢3 450 mm中厚板生产线船板成材率低的问题进行了分析，通过大量的现场跟踪发现造成船板成材率低的主要原因：(1)船板的厚度偏差偏上限；(2)船板凸度偏大；(3)船板切边量过大；(4)生产过程中大量短板收不到。为此，对工艺进行了改进：(1)严格船板厚度偏差控制工艺，将船板的厚度偏差控制在0.2 mm以内；(2)设计了新的工作辊辊型曲线，改进了弯辊力使用工艺并缩短了轧辊的使用周期，有效控制了成品船板凸度，由0.3 mm控制到了0.1 mm以内；(3)优化了板坯长度，减少了短板收不到的情况。采用上述措施后，船板成材率由88%提升到了91%以上，经济效益显著。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Influence factors and improving measures of the ship plate yield rate in 3 450 mm mill of Shaoguan Iron and Steel Co.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The main causes of low yield rate of the ship plate produced by 3 450 mm mill of Shaoguan Iron and Steel Co.were found through a lot of field tracking. There were four main reasons. The first was big thickness tolerance. The second was large plate crown. The third was large value of edg cutting. The fourth was that a lot of short board could not be received. According to these four main reasons, some process measures were proposed. The first, strictly controlling of thickness tolerance, the thickness tolerance was controlled within 0.2 mm. The second, designing a new work roll shape curve, improved bending force using technology and shorten the cycle rolls, and these measures had effectively reduced the value of the crown, which was from 0.3 mm down to less than 0.1 mm. The third, ship plate designed trimming amount was decreased from 80 mm to 70 mm. The fourth, optimizing the slab length, reducing the short board. Through the above process measures, the yield rate of ship plate increased from 88% to more than 91%, and created significant economic benefits.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
戴杰涛 ，戴文笠，李烈军，方彪. 韶钢3 450 mm中厚板生产线船板成材率影响因素分析及提高措施[J]. , 2015, 32(5): 32-35.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 生产低碳钢带钢，采用层流冷却后段冷却且卷取温度低于空冷的Ar1时，由于抑制了先共析铁素体的析出，成品带钢组织中获得了远超平衡含量的退化伪珠光体组织。本试验研究了层流冷却后段冷却下不同卷取温度对带钢显微组织、力学性能的影响。结果表明：卷取温度在600 ℃以上时，卷取温度越低，带钢的强度越高；卷取温度为540 ℃时，带钢组织中渗碳体在晶界偏聚程度较高，导致力学性能恶化。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：To low carbon steel, far more than balance content of pseudo- eutectoid pearlite could be gotten by inhibiting proeutectoid ferrite transformation and making final coiling temperature lower than the Ar1 of air cooling. The influence of difference coiling temperature on the microstructure and mechanical properties of tested steel was researched by back section cooling pattern. The results show that when the coiling temperature is higher than 600 ℃, the strength of tested steel is higher while the coiling temperature decreasing. When the coiling temperature is 540 ℃, the percentage of the cementite is high in grain boundary, so the mechanical properties are worse.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 本文对方坯轧制圆钢过程中铸坯表面划伤演变规律进行了工业试验研究。首先统计了某钢厂常见的铸坯划伤类型，然后选取特征划伤铸坯进行轧制跟踪，最后对相应的圆钢进行酸洗和测量。结果表明：铸坯表面深度较浅的划伤经轧制后不会导致圆钢的表面缺陷；较深的划伤则会在圆钢表面形成三角口型的直线型裂纹，该类裂纹深度最大可达1.9 mm，呈间断性地分布在整个圆钢上，裂纹处的金相检测发现裂纹四周有明显的脱碳现象。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study on evolution behavior of billet surface scratch in hot rolling of round bar
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：An industrial experiment was carried out to study the evolution behavior of billet surface scratch in hot rolling process of round bar. Scratch types were observed and classified statistically and typical billets with scratch were rolled into round bar which was tracked. The corresponding round bar was picked out and pickled and cracks on the round bar were measured. The results show that shallow scratch will not result in serious cracks on the round bar, deep scratch (over 1 mm) will be rolled and changed into triangle-gap type cracks and the depth of crack can reach up to 1.9 mm. Cracks discontinuously appear on the surface of round bar and decarburization is discovered around the crack.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为了实现在厚度方向上具有优异强度均匀性的Q690级特厚钢板的研发，采用一种新型的差温轧制工艺进行了实验室轧制，并研究了差温轧制工艺对钢板显微组织、厚度方向上强度均匀性和力学性能的影响。结果表明：差温轧制工艺能够显著细化钢板芯部和1/4厚度处的原始奥氏体组织，增加芯部和1/4厚度处淬火组织中的两相区铁素体体积分数。通过差温轧制工艺生产的Q690级钢板具有优异的力学性能，钢板的伸长率和-40 ℃冲击功分别大于16%和60 J，从表面到芯部，钢板屈服强度差异小于10 MPa。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development of Q690 grade ultra- heavy plate rolled with a novel gradient temperature rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：To develop Q690 grade ultra- heavy plate with outstanding strength homogeneity in thickness direction,a novel method called gradient temperature rolling (GTR) process followed by intercritical quenching and tempering was employed,and the influence of GTR process on the microstructure,mechanical property were investigated.The results showed that GTR process could be effectively refined prior austenite grain size in half and quarter thickness of as- rolled plate,and increase the fraction of intercritical ferrite in as- quenched specimens.The ultra- heavy plate with yield strength of 690 MPa was developed by GTR and represented excellent mechanical property,such as the elongation and -40 ℃ impact energy were more than 16% and 60 J,respectively,and the maximum difference of yield strength was less than 10 MPa in full thickness indicating that an outstanding strength homogeneity was achieved.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 氧化铁皮粘结是UF轧机半万能法生产腿内侧为双斜度断面钢轨的主要问题，会影响钢轨表面质量，降低轧辊使用寿命及生产效率，增加人工劳动强度。本文通过仿真分析，认为腿内侧交界处摩擦阻力大，“刮蹭”流动的金属是形成氧化铁皮粘结的主要原因。采用润滑轧制工艺降低了腿内侧交界处的摩擦因数，可以解决氧化铁皮粘结问题，同时孔型修磨次数、孔型磨损量、轧制负荷及人工强度等均不同程度降低。

In this article, the simulation analysis results showed that friction resistance was big in joint with base and web, the flow of metal "scratches" was the main reason for scale bond. http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 分析了热轧氧化铁皮的生长机制和缺陷的遗传规律。在此基础上，通过系列实验，探讨了京唐公司1 580 mm生产线机架间除鳞的投用对带钢表面温度、精轧工作辊辊面质量和带钢成品表面质量的影响。采用SEM、EDS等方式分析了机架间除鳞投用后对带钢表面氧化铁皮厚度和结构的影响。结果表明：投用机架间除鳞，可以减薄带钢成品氧化铁皮厚度25%以上，提高精轧高速钢工作辊下机辊面质量0.5~1.0个等级，有效降低了产品50%以上的氧化铁皮缺陷率，同时延长了轧辊的使用寿命。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The growth mechanism and inherited characteristic of oxide scale on the surface of hot rolled strip were emphatically analyzed.Based on the analysis，the effect of inter-stand descaling on the temperature of strip，the quality of finishing work roll surface and the surface quality of the end product were discussed.SEM and EDS were used to analysis the thickness and structure of the oxide scale on the surface of strip before and after the inter-stand descaling being used.The result showed that the thickness of the oxide scale could be reduced more than 25%，the surface quality grade of the finishing work roll surface could be enhanced 05 to 10 grades，and the defect rate of oxide scale could be decreased 50%.Meanwhile,the service life of work roll also could be extended.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 基于Matlab的中厚板轧后冷却过程温度场数值研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 海军工程大学 热科学与动力工程研究室 舰船动力工程军队重点实验室 动力工程学院，湖北武汉430033
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 基于Matlab数值计算，对中厚板轧后冷却问题进行了研究，得到了中厚板随时间变化的温度场分布，分析了钢板厚度、终轧温度、冷却水温度、平均水流密度、钢板含碳量和冷却方式对钢板表面和芯部温度、终冷温度的影响。结果表明，钢板芯部与表面的温差，在空冷阶段先增大后趋于平稳；在层流冷却阶段随着冷却时间的增加不断增大；在返红阶段在较低的范围内趋于平稳。在相同的冷却时刻，随着钢板厚度的增大，钢板表面温度、芯部温度以及芯部与表面的温差均增大；随着终轧温度的降低和平均水流密度的增大，钢板表面和芯部终冷温度均降低。随着钢板含碳量的增加，其表面温度并不总是降低。与单水冷过程相比，间歇式冷却使钢板芯部与表面的温差更小，钢板温度均匀性更好，其对应的热应力也较小。同时，得到了终冷温度与钢板厚度、终轧温度、冷却水温度和平均水流密度的拟合关系式，结果表明钢板终轧温度对钢板终冷温度的影响最为显著，其次是钢板厚度和平均水流密度，冷却水温度对其影响较小。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Numerical Study on Temperature Field of Cooling Process after Plate Rolling Based on Matlab
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on numerical calculation with Matlab, the study on cooling process after plate rolling was carried out, and the temperature field distribution of the plate varying with the time was obtained. The effects of the plate thickness, final rolling temperature, cooling water temperature, average flow rate of the cooling water, carbon content of the plate and cooling method on the plate surface and central temperatures as well as final cooling temperature were discussed. The results show that during the air cooling stage, the temperature difference between the plate center and surface increases first, and then tends to be stable. During the laminar cooling stage, this temperature difference increases with the increase in cooling time. During the self-tempering stage, this temperature difference tends to be stable at a low value. For the same cooling time, the plate surface and central temperatures as well as their temperature difference increase. With the decrease in rolling temperature and the increase in average flow rate of the cooling water, the plate surface and center temperatures decrease. With the increase in carbon content of the plate, its surface temperature is not always decreased. Compared with the single water cooling process, the temperature difference between the plate center and surface based on intermittent cooling is lower. In this case, the temperature uniformity of the plate is better, and the corresponding thermal stress is lower. The fitting equation of the final cooling temperature with respect to plate thickness, final rolling temperature, cooling water temperature and average flow rate of the cooling water is also obtained. It is shown that the effect of the final rolling temperature on the final cooling temperature is more obvious, the effects of the plate thickness and average flow rate of the cooling water on the final cooling temperature are secondary, but the effect of the cooling water temperature on the final cooling temperature is little.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
冯辉君，陈林根，孙丰瑞. 基于Matlab的中厚板轧后冷却过程温度场数值研究[J]. , 2013, 30(6): 4-8.
FENG Hui-jun，CHEN Lin-gen，SUN Feng-rui. Numerical Study on Temperature Field of Cooling Process after Plate Rolling Based on Matlab. , 2013, 30(6): 4-8.
