http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 河北钢铁股份有限公司唐山分公司技术中心，河北唐山063016
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 分析了带钢平整时出现挫伤缺陷的形貌和分布规律及其原因，挫伤缺陷是由相互挤压的带钢的相对滑动导致局部金属产生剪切滑移而形成的，带卷板面的不平滑区域与相邻平滑区域存在明显的半径突变，滑动时在与相邻层的接触面区产生足够的压力，导致局部金属产生剪切滑移。避免挫伤缺陷的主要方法是抑制开卷时带卷的层间滑动。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis of Scratches in the Skin Pass Line
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The morphology and distribution low of scracch defect of strip during temper rolling were analyzed. Scratch defect is caused by the shear slip of local metal resulting from the relative sliding of adjacent layers with high pressure. The reason of relative sliding is that the static friction between adjacent layers is not enough to counteract the rotary inertia of coil. The radius mutation existing between the rugged area and the adjacent smooth area cause sufficient pressure on the local contact surface when existing relative sliding ,and result the shear slip of local metal. The scratch defect avoid method is suppress interlayer slip when uncoiling.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
吕 长 宝. 平整生产线带钢挫伤缺陷的原因分析[J]. , 2013, 30(6): 56-60.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 利用60 000 kN卧式挤压机，研究了TG700C合金挤压过程中工艺参数对峰值挤压力的影响规律。结果表明：影响峰值挤压力的主要因素有坯料加热温度、模具温度、挤压比、挤压速度、润滑剂等；随着挤压比和挤压速度的提高，峰值挤压力升高；随着加热温度的提高，峰值挤压力下降；挤压力的变化规律与J·塞茹尔内模型的理论计算值一致；挤压后的管材内外表面无裂纹，表面质量很好，晶粒较均匀，晶粒度为6~8级，常温力学性能及硬度均满足ASME SA213M的标准要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Influence of hot extrusion process parameters on the peak extrusion force of TG700C alloy tube
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Using 60 000 kN horizontal extrusion machine to study the effects of process parameters on the extrusion process of extrusion pressure peak, the results show that the main factors affecting the TG700C alloy peak pressure are heating temperature, mold temperature, extrusion ratio, extrusion speed, lubricant. With the extrusion ratio and extrusion speed increasing, the peak pressure increases. With the heating temperature increasing, the peak pressure decreases. The change rule of extrusion pressure is in conformity with J·sejour model calculated values. No crack on tube outer surface, and the grain is uniform, mechanical properties and hardness at room temperature of the pressed pipe can meet the requirements ASME SA213M standard.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢迁安钢铁有限责任公司，河北迁安064404
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对薄带冷连轧机助卷完成后出口失张断带问题进行了系统分析与研究，发现助卷圈数和卷取速度补偿是其中的主要影响因素。通过增大助卷圈数和卷取速度补偿值，有效提高了薄带的轧制稳定性，解决了薄带助卷完成后轧机出口失张断带的问题。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study and control on thin strip breakage at cold tandem mill exit
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aimed at the thin strip breakage at cold tandem mill exit, the cause was analyzed, and found that the influences factors were strip wrapper circle and coiling speed compensation. By increasing the wrapper circle and coiling speed compensation, rolling stability was improved, and the thin strip breakage at cold tandem mill exit was resolved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘玉金，王宇鹏，陈伟，范正军，张亮，郑利元. 薄带冷连轧机出口失张断带问题分析与控制[J]. , 2015, 32(6): 78-79.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 凌源钢铁股份有限公司技术中心，辽宁凌源122500
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 从连铸和轧制两方面，对热轧方钢角部横裂纹缺陷的产生原因进行了排查分析，得出了处于包晶反应的钢应避免在700~900 ℃脆性区进行连铸矫直，并通过一次冷却和二次冷却采用弱冷却、减缓加热炉中钢坯的加热速度等措施，可以避免热轧方钢角部横裂纹的缺陷。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Cause analysis of the corner transverse cracks on the hot- rolled square steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The causes of transverse cracks on the corner of hot- rolled square steel were investigated from continuous casting process to hot rolling process. The result showed that the cracks were caused in the CC straightening process in the temperature of 700~900 ℃,where the peritectic reaction of steel was occurred. So the crack defect was avoided by means of weak cooling in primary and second cooling area, lower heating speed in reheating furnace,etc.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
杜东福. 热轧方钢横裂纹缺陷的分析[J]. , 2015, 32(6): 83-85.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 基于动态加热系数的热处理线数学模型
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIN Feng- qin, SONG Yong, JING Feng- wei, ZHANG Zhi- mi, LI Xiao- zhan
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京科技大学高效轧制国家工程研究中心，北京100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 提高钢板出炉温度的命中率及均匀性是热处理线数学模型的目标，炉温优化是实现此目标的途径之一，但由于炉温的PID调节具有滞后性，实时效果并不理想。本文结合生产实际提出了动态修正加热系数的策略，通过控制板坯的运动方向和速度来实现模型的最终目标。经实践，达到了预期目标，保证了产品的合格率，同时节约了能源。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Mathematical model of heat treatment line based on dynamic heat coefficient
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The aim of mathematical model of heat treatment line is high hit rate and uniformity of plate′s discharged temperature. Optimization of furnace temperature is the one effective method, but its real- time effect is not ideal because of the lag of PID adjustment. A dynamic heat coefficient policy is proposed, which achieves the final target of mathematical model by controlling the direction and speed of plate movements. The policy is a effective way to resolve the problem of furnace temperature dynamic adjustment, which is proved by the actual production. This solution has met expected goals, at the same time it improved pass rate in production process and saved energy.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
蔺凤琴，宋勇，荆丰伟，张智密，李小占. 基于动态加热系数的热处理线数学模型[J]. , 2015, 32(6): 64-66.
LIN Feng- qin, SONG Yong, JING Feng- wei, ZHANG Zhi- mi, LI Xiao- zhan. Mathematical model of heat treatment line based on dynamic heat coefficient. , 2015, 32(6): 64-66.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 山东钢铁股份有限公司莱芜分公司技术中心，山东莱芜271105
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对莱钢型钢厂H120门架型钢热轧时K5轧件内槽凹坑及成品内槽折叠缺陷问题，对粗轧孔型系统进行了有限元模拟。分析了粗轧阶段变形特点，并根据K5孔型轧制稳定阶段接触弧区域轧件的受力情况，分析了缺陷产生的原因。以此为基础，优化了孔型系统，基本解决了成品内槽横折叠缺陷问题。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Finite element analysis of defect and pass optimization of section steel for forklift mast rail
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the problems of dent defect in internal groove of K5 workpiece and folding defect in internal groove of product during the hot rolling of H120 section steel for forklift mast rail in Laiwu Steel,pass system of roughing rolling was simulated by finite element method.The deformation characteristics in roughing rolling was analyzed,and according to the workpiece force of K5 pass in contact arc region of stable rolling stage,the causes of the defect was found.Based on this,the pass system was optimized and verified by finite element method,and the defects were excluded.
keywords_en: section steel for forklift mast rail
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
孔令坤，王中学，霍喜伟，纪进立. 基于有限元的门架型钢缺陷分析及孔型优化[J]. , 2016, 33(5): 39-44.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为提高市场竞争力，南阳汉冶特钢有限公司成功研制出80～120 mm特厚低温压力容器用09MnNiDR钢板，本文介绍了其化学成分设计及严格的生产过程工艺控制。试制的09MnNiDR钢板钢质纯净、内部夹杂物含量低、组织晶粒细小，具有良好的低温冲击韧性和强度匹配。

1.北京科技大学材料科学与工程学院，北京100083
2.首钢技术研究院，北京100043
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对高强低合金钢H420LA退火带钢表面存在的暗色条斑缺陷，采用SEM、EDX等手段对带钢表面正常区及条斑区进行了微观结构对比分析，并追溯了热轧态及模拟酸洗后带钢表面不同区域的宏观及微观形貌差别。结果表明：H420LA热轧带钢表面红锈缺陷可遗传演变为退火成品的表面条斑。通过对红锈缺陷的微观结构及其成因分析，提出了提高出炉温度、增加粗轧除鳞道次的工艺措施，有效地减少了H420LA热轧卷表面的红锈缺陷，冷轧成品表面质量因此得到改善。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis of streak defect on the strip surface of H420LA high strength low alloy steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Streak defect on the surface of annealed H420LA high strength low alloy steel sheet was researched with SEM and EDX,compared with the normal area.Macro-morphology and micro-morphology difference between normal and streak area on hot-rolled and pickled sheet surface was also characterized.The results show that "red scale" on hot-rolled H420LA strip can transform into streak defect on annealed H420LA sheet.By raising reheating temperature and increasing descaling pass,"red scale"on hot-rolled H420LA strip was reduced effectively,hence surface quality of H420LA product was improved.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 钢轨端头缺陷成因分析及其控制措施
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 攀钢新钢钒股份有限公司轨梁厂
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn:
攀钢新钢钒股份有限公司轨梁厂生产钢轨过程中UF轧机出钢后钢轨端头存在硬弯，端头扭转、跳
动，轨头R处撞伤，轨底摔伤等缺陷，分析了缺陷的形成原因；即万能轧机孔型均为直配，轧制重轨时头部悬空；轧机采用纵列式布置，出钢端头、底尖头长度与二辊模式差异较大；万能轧制线位置固定，轧制不同的产品需调整出口辊道高度等，由此提出了保证UF轧机出钢上翘，控制提升辊道工作面与出口轧件最低点距离，UF轧机出口辊道采取锥形辊道或UF轧机斜配孔型等相应改进措施，保证了端头质量。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Ming-di1, CHEN Bo-yu1, MENG Xiang2, LI Hui2, CHEN Yin-li2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1. 福建省三钢集团有限责任公司, 福建 三明 365000
2. 北京科技大学冶金工程研究院, 北京 100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过金相组织观察、硬度和拉伸试验测试, 分析了Cr含量对HRB400E热轧带肋钢筋组织和力学性能的影响。实验结果表明: 高Cr钢淬透层深, 过渡层厚度、回火索氏体区域厚度均大于低Cr钢; 高Cr钢芯部与回火区域硬度亦大于低Cr钢, 且低Cr钢的过渡层不明显; 控冷钢筋的力学性能与回火索氏体区的比例、钢筋芯部的组织有关。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Influence of Cr content on microstructure and mechanical properties of HRB400E rebar
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the microstructure observation, hardness test and tensile test, the microstructure evolution was analyzed for HRB400E rebar containing chromium during the cooling process. The result indicates that the quenched depth, the thickness of transition area and tempered sorbite area of high Cr steel are higher than low Cr steel. The hardness of the inner and tempered area of high Cr steel is higher than low Cr steel. The transition area of low Cr steel is not clear. The mechanical properties of water quenched bar is associated with the fraction of tempered sorbite and inner microstructure.

1.北京科技大学材料学院，北京100083
2.武钢研究院，湖北武汉400080

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 在分析钢铁材料热轧过程特点的基础上，提出了数字化热轧系统的构成框图、板带热轧过程数值模拟平台和型钢轧制数字化系统的基本架构。针对我国某热连轧生产线典型低合金高强钢Q345B钢的实际生产过程，对粗轧、精轧及轧后冷却残余应力形成的全过程进行了模拟分析和组织转变模拟预测，给出了数字化技术在百米重轨产品设计开发及尺寸精度控制中的应用以及在复杂断面型钢产品设计开发中应用的实例。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Application of digital technology in the plate-strip and section steel rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：A block diagram of hot rolling digital system,a simulation platform for the hot rolling process and a basic framework of section steel rolling digital system were established based on the analysis of hot rolling process.The whole roughing and finishing rolling process and the residual stress formation by the cooling after rolling of the typical high strength low alloy steel Q345B produced by a domestic hot continuous rolling line were simulated，and the microstructure transformation were predicted.Besides,the application of digital technology in the design，development and dimension precision control of 100-metre rail was discussed,some instances about the digital technology application in high precision complex section steel rolling were also given.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 冷连轧机组在轧制过程中发生的断带故障是冷轧工序的主要生产故障之一。首钢京唐2 230 mm酸轧机组从试生产到正式投产，高强钢接普碳钢动态变规格（FGC）时断带一直是生产的难题，影响了机组的产能释放和产品质量。首钢京唐冷轧厂针对轧制过程中发生断带的原因和规律进行了大量统计和分析，最终通过优化FGC楔形区以及抬辊缝操作法等多项手段，成功解决了FGC断带问题。目前该机组实现连续13个月 FGC“零”断带。

With the measures above mentioned，the number of running-off of thin gauge strip in the continuous annealing furnace was decreased from more than 30 times per mouth to less than 7 times per month. http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.中冶赛迪工程技术股份有限公司，重庆401122
2.重庆大学自动化学院控制理论与控制工程系，重庆400044
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 在分析了现有各种带钢对中传感检测方法的原理和研究现状的基础上，研究了带钢对中位置两段式脉冲电磁检测方法。该方法基于电磁感应工作原理，实验装置由原边激励线圈、两段式副边差分检测线圈、脉冲激励/检测装置组成。经功率放大的脉冲电压信号对原边激励线圈进行激励，通过数字示波器在线采集检测线圈输出的差动信号并进行分析。该装置具有1.2%线性度，±1.0 mm检测精度，±0.1 mm分辨率，能满足工业生产现场对带钢对中检测及纠偏控制的要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: A method for strip center position detection based on pulse electromagnetic induction
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The principal and present study status of the strip center position detection were briefly reviewed. A pulse electromagnetic sensor system was studied for measuring the center position of strip. This detection method was based on the principal of electromagnetic and consisted of an actuating coil, an induction coil and a pulse feeding devices. The actuating and induction coils were arranged at both sides of the strip. In the experiment, the actuating coil was fed by an amplified pulsed voltage, and as a result of coupling effect, a voltage signal in the induction coil was collected by the on-line digital oscilloscope. Through the difference method, the collected data was deal with. The study showed this device can satisfy the needs for both of position detection and center position controlling with linearity of 1.2%, precision of ±1.0 mm and resolving rate of ±0.1 mm.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘建兴，欧阳奇，彭松. 带钢对中位置脉冲电磁感应检测方法[J]. , 2015, 32(4): 73-76.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了近年来美国带肋钢筋的供需状况和进出口情况，以及美国主要带肋钢筋生产商纽柯公司、商业金属公司、盖尔道美洲公司、耶弗拉兹集团北美公司和TAMCO钢厂的带肋钢筋生产情况。当前美国政府为本土带肋钢筋生产厂创造了诸多有利条件，其供需和进出口状况都呈恢复性上升态势，本土钢厂均按照ASTM标准生产，钢级包括ASTMA615、ASTMA616和ASTMA706，规格包括Φ10（3号）～Φ57mm（18号），有直条，也有盘条。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 冷轧带钢平整吹扫系统的优化改进
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 山东钢铁集团有限公司钢铁研究院，山东济南250101
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对山东钢铁莱芜分公司冷轧线平整后带钢表面残留平整液斑的问题，结合现场生产实际，从压缩空气的纯净度、空气压力过程波动、吹扫强度不足等方面入手，通过采取增设储气罐、优化设计吹扫管道、改进吹扫梁等措施，大幅降低了平整液斑缺陷，提升了带钢的表面质量，减少了头尾切除量，综合成材率提高了1.65%。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Optimization and improvement of levelling line air purge system for cold rolled strip
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the problem of residual fluid on the cold rolled and flatted strip surface in Shandong Laiwu Iron and Steel Company,combined with the actual production site,the influences were studied,including the compressed air cleanliness,air pressure fluctuations in the process,blow sweep insufficient strength and other aspects.Through the adoption of additional gas tank,design optimization of blowing pipe,purge beams improvement and other measures,the flat liquid spot defects were dramatically reduced,with the surface quality of the strip improved,the volume of removed head and tail reduced,and the product yield was increased by 1.65%.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
康华伟. 冷轧带钢平整吹扫系统的优化改进[J]. , 2016, 33(3): 46-48.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Application of four-strand splitting rolling technology for 13 mm Korea standard rebar
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aimed at the special demand of cross profile size and mechanical property of the 13 mm Korea standard rebar,the rolling passes,chemical composition and cooling technology were developed on the basis of four-strand splitting rolling technology and controlled cooling technology in No.2 bar line of Rizhao Iron & Steel Co.,Ltd.The practice result showed that profile size and mechanical property of this 13 mm rebar met the demand of Korea standard well.The rolled piece size,guide and guard,mill spring were optimized also,so that the pile-up accident was reduced and the output per hour was increased.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 生产经验表明，轧机布置形式对钢轨质量有较大的影响，世界各钢轨生产厂的轧机布置形式不尽相同，但随着市场对钢轨质量要求的不断提高，建厂时就应考虑轧机的布置形式以保证钢轨质量。本文分析了轧机布置形式对钢轨质量的影响，讨论了传统轧机布置形式的优缺点，结合钢轨生产的发展趋势，从少增加设备投资及场地的角度提出了最佳轧机布置形式，以充分保证高质量钢轨的生产。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Production experience show that rolling mill arrangement form plays an important role on the quality of the rail.The rail mill arrangement forms are not the same in the world,but with the increasing requirements of the rail quality,the mill arrangement should be considered at the factory building.The influence of rail mill arrangement form on rail quality was analyzed,the advantages and disadvantages of traditional arrangement of different forms were discussed.Combining with the development trend and considering less increase investment in equipment and site, the best mill arrangement form was put forward which fully ensure the high quality rail production.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陶功明，马朝辉，朱华林，陈崇木，吕攀峰. 高质量钢轨的轧机布置形式探讨[J]. , 2017, 34(3): 48-51.

为调整产品结构#唐山钢铁股份有限公司冷轧薄板厂将其1#镀锌生产线改造为镀锌和退火两用机
组，介绍了退火工艺的实现，包括明火直燃退火工艺对带钢表面质量的影响与控制，退火后冷却段的改造，退火炉出口密封及旁路系统设计，退火炉控制系统的研发与优化。生产实践表明，退火板性能完全合格。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: Nb微合金化对高碳钢线材组织和性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: CHENG Si- hua1,2，ZHOU De1，KONG Xiang- tao1，SUN Qi- song1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.首钢技术研究院，北京100043
2.绿色可循环钢铁流程北京市重点实验室，北京100043
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 研究了Nb微合金化对高碳钢线材组织和性能的影响。结果表明：高碳钢中添加Nb后优化了材料的组织结构，一个奥氏体晶粒内部被分成若干个不同取向的索氏体团，索氏体团得到细化，索氏体团大小平均在10 μm左右，组织均匀性提高；片层间距减小，从150 nm减少到120 nm。同时，Nb的加入使得高碳钢线材的强度和塑性均得到提高，强度提高25 MPa，面缩率提高4%，断丝率明显降低，满足了用户的使用要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of microstructure and properties of Nb micro- alloyed high carbon steel wire rod
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The influence of Nb micro- alloyed on microstructure and properties of high carbon steel wire rod was studied.The results show that the organizational structure of the high- carbon steel is optimized after adding Nb.An austenite grain interior is divided into a number of different orientations sorbite pellets,and the sorbite group is refined.The sorbite average group size is about 10 μm,and the organizational uniformity is improved.The lamellar spacing is decreased from 150 nm to 120 nm.Meanwhile,Nb accession of high- carbon steel for strength and ductility are improved,the strength is increased 25 MPa,the lamellar spacing is increased by 4%,and the broken wire rate also has been significantly reduced.It could be meet users requirements.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
程四华 ，周德，孔祥涛，孙齐松. Nb微合金化对高碳钢线材组织和性能的影响[J]. , 2017, 34(3): 7-11.
CHENG Si- hua，ZHOU De，KONG Xiang- tao，SUN Qi- song. Effect of microstructure and properties of Nb micro- alloyed high carbon steel wire rod. , 2017, 34(3): 7-11.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 轧后冷却方式对钛微合金高强钢组织性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: XU Yang1，LI Fan1,2, SUN Ming-xue1，ZHOU Yan-lei1，YI Hai-long1，LIU Zhen-yu1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1. 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
2. 鞍山钢铁股份有限公司中板厂，辽宁鞍山114032
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 本文实验研究了轧后冷却方式对低碳钛微合金钢组织、析出行为以及力学性能的影响。结果表明，不同的轧后冷却方式（层流冷却、层流冷却+超快速冷却、超快速冷却）下实验钢的组织主要是细晶铁素体。与层流冷却工艺相比，采用超快速冷却工艺能够细化铁素体晶粒尺寸，促进微合金元素Ti在铁素体中的析出且细小弥散。采用超快速冷却工艺，实验钢的抗拉强度和屈服强度分别达到了760MPa和683MPa，比层流冷却工艺下实验钢分别提高了40MPa和20MPa。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: The Effect of Cooling Process after Rolling on Microstructure and Properties of Titanium Micro-alloyed High Strength Steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of cooling process after rolling on microstructure , precipitation behavior and properties of titanium micro-alloyed high strength steel were researched by using the laboratory rolling test. The results show that fine grain ferrite could be obtained at laminar cooling process, laminar cooling + ultra fast cooling process and ultra fast cooling process. The ultra fast cooling process could improve the grain size of ferrite, promote the finer dispersion precipitation of micro-alloying elements Ti in ferrite. The tensile strength and yield strength of strip are 760MPa and 670MPa by using the ultra fast cooling process, the yield strength and tension strength improved 25MPa and 30MPa respectively compared with laminar cooling strip.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
徐洋，李凡 ，孙明雪，周砚磊，衣海龙，刘振宇. 轧后冷却方式对钛微合金高强钢组织性能的影响[J]. , 2013, 30(6): 1-3.
XU Yang，LI Fan,, SUN Ming-xue，ZHOU Yan-lei，YI Hai-long，LIU Zhen-yu. The Effect of Cooling Process after Rolling on Microstructure and Properties of Titanium Micro-alloyed High Strength Steel. , 2013, 30(6): 1-3.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 高强TRIP钢焊接工艺及冲击韧性
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: ZHANG Xiao- ning1, ZHANG Hong- kun1, YU Teng- yi2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.攀钢集团西昌钢钒有限公司，四川西昌615012
2.鞍钢集团钒钛钢铁研究院，四川攀枝花617000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过对TRIP980钢进行二氧化碳激光焊接实验制定出适于TRIP980钢的焊接工艺参数，并对焊缝区域进行了冲击试验，通过SEM观察了焊缝区断口形貌。研究表明：TRIP980钢母材冲击断口形貌表现为韧性断裂，焊缝冲击断口形貌表现为脆性断裂，与原始材料相比，激光焊接后焊缝冲击韧性下降，主要原因是焊缝熔融区存在大量马氏体组织。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Welding process and impact toughness of high strength TRIP steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：CO2 laser welding test of TRIP980 steel had been carried out to get welding parameters in this paper. Then the fracture surface of welded seam was observed by SEM. The results show that the impact fracture morphology in the original material of TRIP980 steel is characterized by ductile rupture. And the impact fracture morphology in the welding point is characterized by brittle rupture. Comparing with the original material, the impact toughness of the laser welded samples is lower than the base material. The main reason is that there is large quantity of martensite in the welded seam melted zone.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 秦皇岛首秦金属材料有限公司，河北秦皇岛066326
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对正火态Q345E- Z35特厚板Z向性能不合问题，采用金相检验、扫描电镜等检测手段，对Z向拉伸断口形貌及断口处夹杂物进行了分析。结果发现：导致特厚板Z向性能不合格的主要原因是中心部位存在带状组织偏析，以及长条的硫化锰夹杂、Nb/Ti块状夹杂和Si/Mn球状夹杂。为此，提出控制钢水中S含量，保证合理的板坯浇铸速度，优化加热、控轧和正火工艺等措施，改善了特厚板的Z向性能。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis on unqualified causes of Z- direction property of Q345E- Z35 heavy plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of unqualified of Z- direction property of Q345E- Z35 heavy plate,the tensile fracture patters along Z- direction and inclusion at the fracture were studied by means of microscopes,SEM and EDS.The results showed that the main causes leading to the unqualified Z- direction property of plates were segregation of banded microstructure and inclusions in the center of the plate.The inclusions included long- striped sulfide,Nb or Ti massive inclusions and Si or Mn spherical inclusions.Therefore,the corresponding measures were put forward，such as controlling sulfur content,keeping proper temperature of casting velocity,optimizing the technologies of heating,controlled rolling and normalizing.Based on it,the Z- direction property of plate was improved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 研究了秦皇岛首秦金属材料有限公司中低温压力容器用A516Gr70钢板经不同循环次数模拟焊后热处理后的组织、性能变化情况。结果表明：A516Gr70钢板随着模拟焊后热处理循环次数的增加，屈服强度、抗拉强度呈下降趋势；韧脆转变温度（VTE）往高温方向移动。模拟焊后热处理后钢板组织仍为铁素体+珠光体带状组织，但随着模拟焊后热处理循环次数的增加，铁素体晶粒尺寸增加，珠光体层片粗化，导致钢板屈服强度及抗拉强度呈下降趋势。
keywords_cn: 压力容器、钢板、模拟焊后热处理、循环次数
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of simulated PWHT cycle times on microstructure and properties of A516Gr70 plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The changes of microstructure and properties of A516Gr70 plate were studied,which used for low and moderate temperature pressure vessel after simulated post weld heat treatment（PWHT） at different cycle times．The research indicate that the yield strength and tensile strength are decreasing with increasing simulated PWHT cycle times，ductile- brittle transition temperature (VTE) shift to high temperature.After simulated PWHT,the microstructure of plate is still ferrite pearlite banded structure.However,with the increasing of the cycle times of simulated PWHT,the grain size of ferrite increases,and the pearlite layer is thicker,which leads to the redution of yield strength and tensile strength of plate.
keywords_en: Pressure Vessel Steel Simulated PWHT Cycle times

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对厚度小于2.0 mm的热轧薄带全长卷取温度均匀性较差的问题，在分析升速轧制制度、终轧温度控制方式、带钢板形及轧制稳定性等因素对卷取温度均匀性影响的基础上，提出一种沿带钢全长变目标终冷温度的设定策略，目标终冷温度偏离目标卷取温度的程度可用温度补偿值来表征，卷取温度模型可根据各控制点距带钢头部或尾部起始点的距离，按照相应的温度偏差和斜率进行计算。现场应用表明：该策略可显著提升1.55 mm厚的集装箱板、1.80 mm厚的镀锡基板等热轧薄带的卷取温度均匀性。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Variable finishing cooling temperature setup strategy for hot rolled thin gauge strip
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：For the coiling temperature uniformity problem along the whole hot rolled strip length with thickness of less than 2.0 mm,especially on its head end or tail end.Based on the effect analysis of speed-up rolling scheme,the finishing temperature control (FTC) mode and the flatness of strip head end and rolling stability,a differentiated finishing cooling temperature setup strategy was represented which the finishing cooling temperature of each strip segment referenced for its cooling schedule calculation was different with the target coiling temperature.The offset temperature value could be inferred from the temperature interception value and temperature slop value according to the distance from the start point of the head end or tail end.Since the on-site application of this setup strategy,homogeneity and stability of the coiling temperature was obviously improved for the hot rolled thin gauge strip,such as the container plate with thickness 1.55 mm and the tinplate with thickness 1.80 mm.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: SPA- H钢高温氧化膜生长机理研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Chang1，YU Yang1，LI Wen- yuan1，WANG Lin1，CHEN Jin2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.首钢集团有限公司技术研究院,北京100043
2.首钢股份公司迁安钢铁公司,河北迁安064404
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 研究了 SPA- H钢在 950～1 200 ℃温度下氧化 1 min 的氧化膜生长规律。结果表明： 在1 000 ℃条件下元素界面扩散氧化造成界面形成一层致密的以Si、Cr、Cu为主的氧化膜，可以起到明显的抗氧化作用；随着温度升高到1 100 ℃，加之元素扩散能力的差异，Si逐渐向铁皮内扩散，Cu、Cr仍以界面富集为主，但是由于Si元素界面富集量的减小，其界面层内的Cu、Cr元素含量升高，开始出现零星的内氧化圆点；温度升高到1 200 ℃，P、Cr等高温相不稳定，且由于达到富Si高温相的熔化温度，界面富集氧化膜完整性遭到破坏，内部形成较厚的氧化圆点。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on the formation mechanism of interfacial oxidized film of SPA- H steel at elevated temperature
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The oxidation behavior of SPA- H steels under elevated temperature ranging from 950～1 200 ℃ and given oxidation atmosphere within 1 minute were investigated in this paper.The results showed that a compact Si，Cr，Cu enrichment band resulted from the diffusion and oxidation behavior of different element was found at the interface between scale and strip with strong antioxidant property.The enrichment characteristics of different element within the scale varied with the heating temperature because of the diffusion coefficient differences.As the temperature increasing up to 1 100 ℃,Si diffused to the outer layer of scale obviously and Cu，Cr still enriched at the interface between strip and scale.Because of the relevant lower ratio of Si at the internal layer of scale and increasing percentage of Cu，Cr,several internal oxidation spot was found at the temperature of 1 100 ℃.With the temperature increasing up to 1 200 ℃,the integrity of oxidized film was destroyed because of lower stability of P，Cr phase at high temperature and melting behavior of Si rich phase,resulting in thick oxidized spot layer in the scale.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
王畅，于洋，李文远，王林，陈瑾. SPA- H钢高温氧化膜生长机理研究[J]. , 2017, 34(5): 6-11.
WANG Chang，YU Yang，LI Wen- yuan，WANG Lin，CHEN Jin. Research on the formation mechanism of interfacial oxidized film of SPA- H steel at elevated temperature. , 2017, 34(5): 6-11.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了武汉钢铁集团公司新建成的高速铁路用重轨万能轧机生产线的原料与产品规格、工艺布置、设备组成和技术特点。该车间设计年生产能力为105万t，其中钢轨55万t，型钢及其他型钢45万t，全线轧机由2架开坯机、3架串列式万能轧机组成，钢轨采用万能法轧制，H型钢采用X-H法轧制，冷床后分设两条不同的钢轨精整线和型钢精整线，采用在线长尺冷却、长尺矫直、长尺探伤和检测、冷锯定尺锯切的冷却精整工艺，并设有激光检测断面尺寸及平直度、涡流探伤和超声波探伤检测钢轨表面及内部质量的在线检测中心，代表了轨梁生产的国际领先水平。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: Q550D钢板的研制及其回火工艺的分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 湘潭钢铁有限公司科技开发中心新品开发室
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn:
在工业试制条件下，通过成分设计和TMCP-T工艺设计，采用晶粒细化、沉淀强化、位错强化和
贝氏体组织强化等手段，辅以回火处理得到性能优异的低碳贝氏体Q550D高强钢板，其屈服强度约600-665MPa抗拉强度达725-775MPa金相组织为粒状贝氏体和细小板条贝氏体的混合组织。同时，分析了不同回火工艺对钢板组织结构与力学性能的影响。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 宽厚板头尾及边部形状对称性研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Jie1，CHEN Fu- qiang2，JIANG Yue- shan1，WANG Yu- jiao1，TU Jing1，HUANG Zhen- yi1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.安徽工业大学冶金工程学院，安徽马鞍山243032
2.南京钢铁股份有限公司，江苏南京210035
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用有限元模拟与现场试验研究相结合的方法对宽厚板平面形状变化规律进行了研究，分析了宽厚板头尾及两边形状不对称的形成原因。结果表明：转钢方向、总纵轧及总横轧道次数的奇偶性是影响宽厚板头尾及边部不对称的主要因素，通过控制转钢方向并限定总纵轧及总横轧道次数的奇偶性可有效地控制钢板头尾及两边形状的对称性，从而使宽厚板的成材率提高0.8％左右。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on shape symmetry of wide and heavy plate head,tail and edges
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Finite element simulation and physics experiment combined method were used to investigated the plan view pattern variation of wide and heavy plate,the causes of shape asymmetrical of wide and heavy plat head,tail and edges were analysised.The results show that the direction of turn steel,the parity of total longitudinal rolling and cross rolling passes number are the main factors that effect shape asymmetry of wide and heavy plat head,tail and edges.It can control the shape symmetry of head,tail and both edges effectively and let the yield of wide and heavy plate increased by 0.8% by controlling the direction of steel rotation and the parity of total longitudinal rolling and cross rolling passes number.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
汪杰，陈富强，姜岳杉，王玉娇，屠静，黄贞益. 宽厚板头尾及边部形状对称性研究[J]. , 2017, 34(5): 23-27.
WANG Jie，CHEN Fu- qiang，JIANG Yue- shan，WANG Yu- jiao，TU Jing，HUANG Zhen- yi. Research on shape symmetry of wide and heavy plate head,tail and edges. , 2017, 34(5): 23-27.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 湛江1 550 mm酸轧联合机组入口活套设计
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 宝钢工程技术集团有限公司，上海201900
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 结合湛江1 550 mm酸轧机组入口活套的设计分析结果及其控制方式，对常用的活套设计提出了有关的计算公式。具体阐述了该机组活套的工艺、设备选型、机组控制联锁和设备结构设计应考虑的技术要点，对常见活套的特点进行了分析比较，分析了活套基本原理和结构类别，结合具体的工程对活套进行了优化设计，阐述了活套设计计算过程。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the design and control method of Zhanjiang 1 550 mm PL- TCM entry looper,the common looper design related calculation formula were put forward.The main technical points of looping process,equipment type selection,control interlock and equipment structure design which should be consider were specifically elaborated.The characteristics of common looper were analyzed,the basic principle of loop structure and categories were researched.Combined with specific engineering for the looper optimized design,the looper design calculation process was introduced.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.福建三钢闽光股份有限公司,福建三明365000
2.上海策立工程技术有限公司，上海201900
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对福建三钢二棒生产线加热炉坯料加热温度不均，提出了采用延时换向优化控制的燃烧控制方式。此控制方式根据特定工况确定实时煤气调节阀的阀位开度，通过调整每对烧嘴的间歇延时时间以达到稳定控制坯料出炉温度均匀性的要求。实践证明：采用该方法，坯料温度均匀，在小流量、低热负荷工况下的加热效果有明显改善。
keywords_cn: 延时换向，温度均匀性，燃烧占空比
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Application of the control technology of intermittent time delay for regenerative heating furnace
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of billet reheating temperature uneven of No.2 bar rolling line of Sansteel,a commutation delay intermittent combustion control method for reheating furnace was put forward.The real- time gas regulating valve opening degree under the specific conditions was determined by this method.The billet temperature uniformity was obtained by adjusting the delay time interval of each pair of burners.Practice production show that the control method has good control effect on billet temperature uniformity,and the heating effect have improved significantly at low flow and low heat load conditions.
keywords_en: Intermittent delay, temperature uniformity, Combustion duty cycle

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 超高强DP980钢的动态再结晶模型
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: ZHANG Chu- bo1,2,MI Zhen- li2,MAO Xiao- ling2,XU Mei2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.北京航空材料研究院先进高温结构材料国防科技重点实验室，北京100095
2.北京科技大学工程技术研究院，北京100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用Gleeble- 3500热模拟试验机对超高强DP980钢进行热压缩试验，研究其在变形温度为900～1 200 ℃、应变速率为0.05～30 s-1条件下的动态再结晶行为，分析了变形温度和应变速率对真应力-真应变曲线的影响。结果表明：超高强DP980钢在变形过程中，存在动态再结晶和动态回复两种软化机制，且随着温度的升高和应变速率的降低，临界应变越小，动态再结晶越容易发生；同时，得到了发生动态再结晶时的形变激活能，建立了峰值应变模型、动态再结晶临界应力模型和动态再结晶动力学模型。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Dynamic recrystallization model of ultra- high strength DP980 steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The dynamic recrystallization behavior of DP980 ultra- high strength steel during hot compression deformation was investigated at 900～1 200 ℃ and strain rate of 0.05～30 s-1 on a Gleeble- 3500 thermo- simulation machine,and the effects of deformation temperature and strain rate on the true stress- true strain curves were analyzed.The results showed that dynamic recrystallization and dynamic recovery of these two kinds of softening mechanism were exited.When ultra high strength DP980 steel in the deformation process,as the deformation temperature increaseing and strain rate decreaseing，the critical strain and peak stress of dynamic recrystallization were decreased，and softening caused by dynamic recrystallization was more obvious.The dynamic recrystallization activation energy was obtained,peak strain model,dynamic recrystallization critical stress model and dynamic recrystallization kinetics model was set up.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
张楚博 ，米振莉，毛小玲，徐梅. 超高强DP980钢的动态再结晶模型[J]. , 2018, 35(1): 17-22.
ZHANG Chu- bo,,MI Zhen- li,MAO Xiao- ling,XU Mei. Dynamic recrystallization model of ultra- high strength DP980 steel. , 2018, 35(1): 17-22.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 连续处理机组入口带长控制的设定分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶陕压重工设备有限公司，陕西西安710119
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了连续处理机组入口带钢运行的循环、入口段与工艺段最大速度差，机组正常运行所需入口带钢设定的最小剩余长度。在不同机组中，根据设计控制思路的不同，分析和总结了速度差和入口速度两种控制模式，并分别就这两种控制模式对设定带钢剩余长度进行了计算，同时提供了可靠的数学模型，保证了机组的正常运行。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The circulation of the entrance strip,the maximum speed difference between the entrance section and the technology section and the setting of the minimum residual length when the line producing normally in the continuous processing line were introduced.Base on the different design and control ideas in the different lines,two models of speed difference model and entrance speed mode were analyzed and summarized.According the two models,the setting residual lengths separately and accurately were calculated,the credibility mathematical models were supplied too.The continuous producing normally of the line was assured.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢技术研究院
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对首钢京唐公司热轧板带生产中出现的M形板廓缺陷，从板形控制参数预设定和工作辊磨损辊型两方面分析了其产生原因，提出了简单、可行的改进措施，为同类机组技术改进提供了依据。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 节约型高强韧不锈钢及其薄带连铸制备技术
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIU Zhen-yu,ZHAO Yan,LIU Xin,CAO Guang-ming,LI Cheng-gang,WANG Guo-dong
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 双辊薄带连铸技术自上世纪80年代至今已有近40年，但在常规不锈钢的工业化生产方面一直未取得成功。究其原因，主要归因于生产消耗、产品利润与产能之间的不匹配。近年来，国际国内开始将薄带连铸应用于制备节约型高强韧不锈钢，从而简化了热轧生产工艺，解决了因热塑性差而造成的钢板边裂和中裂等缺陷，大大提高了成材率。韩国浦项制铁采用薄带连铸技术生产出节约型双相不锈钢，耐腐蚀性能与SUS304奥氏体不锈钢相当，而抗拉强度可提高1倍，产品主要用于取代材料成本过高的奥氏体不锈钢。我国东北大学开发出高强韧节约型不锈钢的成分体系及其薄带连铸技术，制备出0.30~15 mm厚薄带，其强塑积高达62 000 MPa·%且其耐腐蚀性能较SUS304高出10%~15%，可以应用于核电、石化、铁路交通及汽车结构等领域。本文就薄带连铸高强韧不锈钢的现状、应用及未来发展趋势进行了综述和分析。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development of cost-saving high strength stainless steels by twin-roll strip casting technology
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Modern twin-roll strip casting (TRSC) has been developed since nearly the 1980s.However,because of its relatively high cost and low productivity,most of the demonstration lines were discontinued about 10 years ago.Recently,the TRSC technology is being applied to manufacturing cost-saving high strength stainless steels,which has found numerous advantages including the "near-net shape forming" to avoid the formation of edge cracks and surface cracks during hot-rolling. By using strip casting,POSCO manufactured thin strip products of a novel lean duplex stainless steel (PosSD),with its tensile strength being almost higher than that of SUS304 by 100% and corrosion resistance similar to that of SUS304,in the aim of replacing Ni containing austenitic stainless steels. In China,a new grade of cost-saving high strength stainless steel,which is simply alloyed by Mn and N,has also been developed by Northeastern University with twin-roll strip casting.The product of strength and ductility for this new steel can be as high as 62 000 MPa·%,and it had slightly better corrosion resistance than that of SUS304,which has shown the potential to be widely applied in the fields of nuclear power,petrochemical and automobile industries.In the present paper,state-of-theart development of cost-saving high strength stainless steels,their TRSC manufacturing technologies and applications of the products have been reviewed and analyzed.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘振宇，赵岩，刘鑫，曹光明，李成刚，王国栋. 节约型高强韧不锈钢及其薄带连铸制备技术[J]. 轧钢, 2017, 34(1): 53-58.
LIU Zhen-yu,ZHAO Yan,LIU Xin,CAO Guang-ming,LI Cheng-gang,WANG Guo-dong. Development of cost-saving high strength stainless steels by twin-roll strip casting technology. Chinarolling, 2017, 34(1): 53-58.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 镀锌DX52D产品冲压起皱机理研究及解决办法
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 湖南华菱涟源钢铁有限公司技术中心，湖南娄底417009
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 镀锌薄板在加工过程中出现起皱缺陷是一种常见的现象，特别是国内用低材质高用带来的问题尤为突出。对涟钢DX52D镀锌板出现的批量性冲压起皱缺陷成因进行了研究分析。结果表明：其根本原因是DX52D镀锌板抗时效性能差，在使用过程中产生了吕德斯带，产生了拉伸应变痕。为此，通过调整拉伸深度，及对DX52D钢化学成分和生产工艺进行了优化，彻底解决了该产品的冲压起皱缺陷。
keywords_cn: 关键词：镀锌板 冲压起皱 抗时效性能 吕得斯带
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study of mechanism of wrinkling of DX52D gavalized sheet during stamping and its countermeasures
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Wrinkling is a common defect occurred during the processing of GI sheet,it is even more severe for the low quality material used for higher application performance.The cause of massive wrinkling defect happened in DX52D sheet was studied and analyzed.As it is shown,the main cause is that the anti- aging property of DX52D sheet is poor,Luders line and stretcher marks occurs during its application.Therefore,by adjusting stretching depth,and optimizing the chemistry and process route of DX52D,the wrinkling defect has been thoroughly solved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 研究了终轧温度对Q420qE钢板组织性能的影响。结果表明：采用控轧+弛豫+控冷工艺可以获得铁素体+贝氏体双相组织；终轧温度越高，铁素体晶粒尺寸越大，钢板屈强比越低，但冲击韧性也随之降低。当终轧温度为860 ℃时，钢板屈强比和韧性达到较佳匹配，此时钢板厚度1/4处和芯部未发生铁素体相变的奥氏体发生了贝氏体相变；终轧温度为880 ℃时，钢板芯部发生了上贝氏体转变，冲击韧性明显降低。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of finishing rolling temperature on microstructure and mechanical properties of Q420qE plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of finishing rolling temperature on microstructure and mechanical properties of Q420qE plate were studied.The results indicate that ferrite+bainite dual phase structure is obtained by the processing of controlled rolling+relaxation+controlled cooling.With rising of finishing rolling temperature,the size of ferrite is larger,which leads to lower yield ratio and impact toughness.When the finish rolling temperature is 860 ℃，the combination of yield ratio and impact toughness is perfect.The part of austenitic has not been transformed into ferrite,but transform into bainite at the 1/4 thickness and center.When the finish rolling temperature is 880 ℃,the tupper bainite is formed at the center,which will obviously reduce the impact toughness.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对2 150 mm连退机组生产超宽幅汽车外板的热瓢曲问题，对其产生机理及其影响因素进行了分析，并结合机组实际情况，提出了相应改进措施，即保证来料板形、安排足够适当的过渡料，并对张力、冷却风量、工艺速度等关键工艺参数进行了调整，保证了带钢横向温差和炉辊热凸度，从而解决了该机组生产超宽幅汽车板的热瓢曲问题。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Control and optimization of heat buckle of ultra- width and thin- gauge autobody sheet in annealing line
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the problem of heat buckle of ultra- width and thin gauge autobody sheet produced by 2 150 mm continuous annealing units,its cause mechanism and influence factors were analyzed.Combined with the actual conditions of the unit,relevant improvement measures were proposed,i.e.guaranting cold rolled strip shape,arranging adequately transition materials,and adjusting key process parameters such as tension,cooling air volume and process speed.Theses measures were able to ensure the transverse temperature difference of the strip and the thermal crown of the furnace roll,thereby disminale the defect of heat buckle of ultra- width autobody sheet.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
卢秉仲，张霞，王亚东. 薄规格超宽幅汽车板连退热瓢曲控制和优化[J]. , 2018, 35(3): 37-40.
LU Bing- zhong,ZHANG Xia,WANG Ya- dong. Control and optimization of heat buckle of ultra- width and thin- gauge autobody sheet in annealing line. , 2018, 35(3): 37-40.

So,the welding strip breakage rate was reduced by 62%, the production efficiency was increased by 23%.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: TAN Wen1,2,HAN Bin1,2,CAI Zhen1,2,ZHANG Jianjun1,2,ZHU Wanjun1,2

1.宝钢股份中央研究院武汉分院，湖北武汉430080
2.湖北省冶金工艺模拟工程实验室，湖北武汉430080
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了在武钢CSP短流程生产线开发优质中高碳宽带钢的情况。在系统研究中高碳钢炼钢、连铸、均热、轧制、冷却及退火工艺的基础上，开发了包括9SiCr在内的碳质量分数达1.0%的系列中高碳热轧宽带钢以及酸洗、退火产品。热轧及酸洗产品厚度最薄达到1.4 mm，产品非金属夹杂物级别达到D0.5级，铸坯宏观偏析小于1.0级，产品边裂发生率控制在0.5%以下，产品单面脱碳层与产品厚度比小于1.0%，扁卷发生率低于0.5%。产品广泛应用于汽车零部件、工程机械、冶金锯片、五金工器具等领域。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research and development of high performance high carbon steel strip on CSP line of WISCO
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Research and development situation of high carbon steel products carried out on CSP line of WISCO was introduced.Based on systematical research of steelmaking,LF refining,slab casting,equalizing heating,hot rolling and batch annealing processes,the high carbon steel strips including 9SiCr with carbon content up to 1.0% and thickness less than 1.4 mm were developed.Moreover,high carbon steel strips with pickling and annealing treatment were also developed.The nonmetallic inclusion level was reached D0.5,the macrosegregation level was less than 1.0,the incidence of both strip edge cracking and coil collapsing was lower than 0.5%,and the single face decarburization depth of strip was less than 1.0% of strip thickness.The developed high carbon steel was widely applied for manufacturing automobile,machinery,sawblades and hardware,and so on.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
谭文，韩斌，蔡珍，张剑君，朱万军，. 武钢CSP短流程优质中高碳钢的开发及应用[J]. , 2017, 34(6): 10-14.
TAN Wen，,HAN Bin，,CAI Zhen，,ZHANG Jianjun，,ZHU Wanjun，. Research and development of high performance high carbon steel strip on CSP line of WISCO. , 2017, 34(6): 10-14.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Technology of raising and keeping temperature for CC-billet in DROF process
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：It is a key factor for raising and keeping the temperature of billet so as to meet the needs of direct rolling.The measures were discussed to control the billet temperature at the cutting point,including optimizing the usage of cooling water in secondary cooling area,raising up the cast speed,and using the hydraulic shear instead of flame cutting machine.The normal methods,such as using the insulation heater cover,raising up the speed of the roll table,were also introduced to keep the billet temperature.Some technical problems in the process were analyzed and the solving measures were discussed.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 基于S7- 1500PLC的平整机延伸率控制系统
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 安泰科技股份有限公司，北京100081
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 平整是冷轧产品生产的最后一道工序，直接关系到产品的质量和性能。恒延伸率控制是平整机组的主要控制方式。介绍了基于西门子最新一代S7- 1500PLC的延伸率控制系统设计、延伸率的计算方法及控制策略。以该系统为核心的平整机延伸率控制系统在实际应用中取得了良好的效果。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Control system of skin pass elongation based on S7- 1500
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Skin passing is the last process in manufacturing of cold- rolled strip,which directly relates to the quality and performance of the product.Constant elongation control is one of the main control methods for flattening units.The elongation control system design,elongation calculation and control strategy were introduced based on the the latest generation of Siemens PLC S7- 1500.The elongation control for skin passing mill achieved good practical effect by using this system.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
王新彬. 基于S7- 1500PLC的平整机延伸率控制系统[J]. , 2018, 35(4): 71-72.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 汽车结构用SAPH440热轧钢板的试制
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 钢集团钢铁研究院有限公司
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了攀钢集团开发汽车结构用SAPH440热轧带钢的化学成分设计，冶炼、连铸和热轧工艺制订，以及实际试制钢板的化学成分、组织与性能。试制结果表明，通过降低钢中碳、硫含量，利用钙处理控制MnS夹杂物形态，并添加微量钛合金和控制卷取温度等措施，使SAPH440热轧钢板具有良好的冷成形性，冲压合格率高，性能波动小，生产成本低，现已应用于多家用户的汽车车轮、车架等结构件的制作。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热轧钢筋新标准下棒材轧机改造工艺技术分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京科技大学高效轧制国家工程研究中心，北京100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Technique analyses of bar mill upgrading for future new hot rolled ribbed bar standard
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Hot rolled ribbed bar is the largest quantity steel products in our country.But the quality improvement and cost reduction of rebar production is always the motivation of technology innovation.In order to meet the new rebar standard in our country,the controlled rolling and controlled cooling technique for high strength rebar was discussed,the processes for upgrading existing bar mills were analyzed in details.The advantages and disadvantages of splitting rolling and high speed rolling process were compared.The new idea of mill layout was put forward for controlled rolling and cooling process.The new thought was given an unique proposal for designing new rebar mill line or revamping old product line and developing new products for engineering and technical personnel in enterprise.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 极寒环境下厚规格船舶用钢的发展
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Hong- tao,TIAN Yong,YE Qi- bin,WANG Zhao- dong,WANG Guo- dong
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 北极地区能源和贸易航线潜力、南极地区科考行动等受到越来越多的关注，促进了大型高技术极寒环境下服役船舶的需求和发展，同时对满足极寒环境服役条件船舶用低温钢的各项性能提出了更高的要求，厚规格、具有优异低温韧性和易焊接的更高强度级别的极寒环境下船舶用低温钢是今后的发展趋势。介绍了国内外船舶用低温钢的发展状况和低温钢的成分、生产工艺特点，建议采用低碳当量成分设计的新TMCP工艺技术路线，应用纳米相强韧化理论并控制其组织构成，从而实现优异的低温强韧性和止裂性能。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development of heavy ship plate in extremely cold environment
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The potential of energy,trade routes in the Arctic region and the scientific exploration in the Antarctic have been attracted more and more attention.It has promoted the demand and development of service ships in large and high technology in extremely cold environment.At the same time,higher requirements were put forward for the performance of cryogenic steels used in ships with extremely cold environment.And the cryogenic steel used in ships under extreme cold conditions,with thick specifications,excellent toughness at low temperature and easy welding,is the trend of development in the future.The development of cryogenic steel using for ships at home and abroad was introduced as well as the composition of low temperature steel and its technological characteristics.At last the NG- TMCP process route was proposed by using low carbon equivalent components.The theory of strengthening and toughening of nano- phase was applied to control the composition of the microstructure,so as to achieve excellent low temperature toughness and crack arrest performance.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
王红涛，田勇，叶其斌，王昭东，王国栋. 极寒环境下厚规格船舶用钢的发展[J]. , 2018, 35(5): 48-53.

东北大学，a.研究总院
b.轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室
c.材料科学与工程学院,辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 复合材料是国家重点支持的新材料高新技术领域之一，而轧制法是最为广泛应用的层状复合材料的生产方式。利用异步轧制的剧烈塑性变形能力，在室温下进行了多道次多层复合叠轧试验，在没有中间退火和热处理的情况下，轧后的试样表现出了与普通轧制复合不同的特点。基于试验结果，描述了多层复合极薄金属带材的界面形貌演化、变形诱导扩散及金属间化合物生成等现象。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Interface phenomena in the accumulative rolling bonding of multilayer foil composite
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Composite material is one of the high- tech areas with key support.Rolling is the most widely used method to produce composite materials.Employing the special ability of asymmetrical rolling on severe plastic deformation,multilayer foil composite was rolled at room temperature for several passes without intermediate annealing and heat treating,different characters compared to common roll bonding were found in rolled material.Based on the rolling experiment,the interface morphology evolution，deformation induced diffusion and intermetallic matrix were described.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘相华 ，赵启林c. 极薄带多层复合轧制中的界面现象[J]. , 2018, 35(3): 1-6.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 本文利用扫描电镜、能谱仪对热轧高铬铸铁轧辊氧化膜在不同温度和保温时间下的表面和截面形貌进行了观察和研究，通过X射线衍射仪对轧辊氧化膜的组成和结构进行了分析。结果表明，高铬铸铁轧辊氧化膜主要由Fe3O4和FeCr2O4组成，而温度是影响氧化膜质量最重要的因素。同时，对氧化膜表面瘤状物形成的原因和氧化膜的失效机制进行了分析，为现场辊温控制，有效控制高铬铸铁轧辊氧化膜完好，提高带钢的表面质量提供了参考。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on Oxide Film of High Chromium Cast-iron Rolls in Hot Rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The surface and cross sectional morphologyies of oxide film of high chromium cast-iron rolls on different temperature and time were observed by SEM and EDS. The composition and structure of oxide film were analyzed by XRD. The results show that the oxide film is mainly composed of Fe3O4 and FeCr2O4.The temperature seriously affects the quality of oxide film. Mean while, the reason of the nodular deposit appearance and the failure mechanism of the oxide film were investigated. It provides reference for controlling the temperature of rolls and the oxide film state to improve the surface quality of the strip.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
孙蓟泉，张帆，赵爱民，于洋，庞启航. 热轧高铬铸铁轧辊氧化膜的研究[J]. 轧钢, 2014, 31(2): 1-5.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 辊缝的设定精度与轧机弹跳、辊缝零点漂移和系统误差等因素有关。本文将轧机弹跳分为两部分：辊系的弹性变形和轧机牌坊及其他部分的弹性变形，采用在线解析模型计算受轧制条件变化影响很大的辊系变形量，提高了轧机弹跳的计算精度；利用二维有限差分模型周期计算轧辊的温度场并确定其热膨胀量，可主动补偿其所引起的辊缝零点漂移；通过优化换辊后自学习初始值，可改善辊缝零点修正的效果。改进后的辊缝设定模型应用结果表明，对于３．０～４．５ｍｍ 厚度规格，９５％以上带钢的头部厚度控制偏差小于±０．０７５ｍｍ。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: The fiber laser random texturing technology for roll: random texturing application(part three)
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：A comparative study on the application of rolls treated by the fiber laser random texturing technology and the electrical discharge texturing technology were carried out,which were used in the continuous rolling mill，in the finishing mill and in the skin pass mill.The correlation between Ra and Rpc within the range of Ra=2.0 ~ 5.0 μm of the fiber laser random textured roll was studied.The research show that the fiber laser random textured roll is applicable used in the continuous rolling mill,the finishing mill and the skin pass mill.The Rpc value is higher than that of the EDT roll,and the correlation between Ra and Rpc is weak.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 低碳铝镇静钢热镀锌表面粗晶缺陷形成原因及对策
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LI Run- chang,XIAO Mao- yuan,QI Da
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司，河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 低碳铝镇静钢热镀锌板表面易产生“指甲印”缺陷，缺陷主要分布在整卷带钢带中1/3长度位置、带钢表面中间位置。通过金相观察可以确认缺陷处因晶粒明显长大，形成粗晶，晶界处开裂表现为“指甲印”缺陷。低碳铝镇静钢在热轧工序生产时的卷取温度为730 ℃，这个温度恰好处于A1温度以上，卷取后带钢仍处在奥氏体和铁素体两相区。在卷取后，带中1/3位置散热较慢，温度保持在A1线以上，奥氏体晶粒在此温度下继续长大，形成粗大晶粒。在冷轧工序的生产过程中，带钢表面受压应力和切应力作用，粗大的晶粒沿边界开裂，表现为“指甲印”缺陷。通过降低热轧卷取温度，使带钢卷取后的温度处于A1线以下，带钢组织由铁素体和渗碳体组成，使带钢晶粒在卷取后冷却的过程中不再长大形成粗晶，消除了低碳铝镇静钢热镀锌带钢表面“指甲印”缺陷。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis and countermeasure of coarse grain defect on surface of low- carbon aluminium killed steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：On the galvanized sheet surface of low- carbon aluminium killed steel,the ’nails’ defect was easily generated,and it was distributed in the middle position of length and width.By observing the microstructure,it can be confirmed that the grain under the ’nails’ growed bigger than others,and the defect was cracks located on coarse grain boundaries.During hot rolling process,low- carbon aluminium killed steel ends at coiling temperature 730 ℃,which still beyond A1 temperature that the steel is still in α- γ phase area.After coiling,the strip in 1/3 middle position cooling slowly,the austenitic grains grow up to coarse grains.In the process of cold rolling,the coarse grain boundaries crack under compressive stress and shear stress,appearing like ’nails’.Through lowering the coiling temperature under A1 temperature,composed of ferrite and cementite,the strip grain could not be growed any more during the cooling process after coiling,and the ’nails’ defects was eliminated.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李润昌，肖茂元，齐达. 低碳铝镇静钢热镀锌表面粗晶缺陷形成原因及对策[J]. , 2018, 35(4): 42-44.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 宽展是冷连轧机切边剪切边宽度设定的重要考虑因素。影响宽展的因素较多，若考虑各影响因素，建立宽展模型十分困难。为此，在满足生产需求的前提下，通过大量数据分析，拟合出宽展系数计算多项式，进而可计算出满足需求的考虑宽展的切边剪宽度设定值，并通过自动化系统的改造实现了切边剪宽度的自动设定。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.安徽工业大学冶金工程学院，安徽马鞍山243002
2.马鞍山钢铁股份有限公司技术中心,安徽马鞍山243000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为研究圆坯和矩形坯两种坯料形状对大棒材开坯轧制变形的影响，采用有限元分析软件MARC对大棒材开坯轧制进行了模拟。模拟结果表明：在箱型孔中开坯轧制时，轧件芯部附近变形区应力状态都是两拉一压，矩形坯残余应力呈两拉一压应力状态而圆坯是三向拉应力状态；矩形坯比圆坯在箱型孔中的充满度好，等效应变分布均匀；当孔型侧壁起限制宽展作用时，轧件芯部呈现两压一拉应力状态，变形向芯部渗透明显，利于芯部孔隙性缺陷的压实。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of billet shape on rolling deformation of large gauge bar
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the influences of round billet and rectangular billet on the rolling deformation of large gauge bar,FEM software MARC was used to simulate the hot rolling process.The simulation results indicate that when conducting break-down rolling in box pass,the stress state of rolled piece in deformation zone is two tensile stresses and one compressive stress.And the residual stress of rectangular billet is two tensile stresses and one compressive stress,while the residual stress of round billet is three tensile stresses.When the spread is restricted by the slope of side wall,the stress state is two compressive stresses and one tensile stress,and deformation significantly penetrates into the core which will help compact core porosity defects.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 40Mn2圆钢成品剪切断口裂纹成因分析与对策
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 福建三钢集团闽光股份有限公司棒材厂，福建三明365000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 40Mn2圆钢作为锰系合金结构钢产品，因其良好的加工性和使用性广泛用于机加工行业，本文介绍了该产品在用户机加工冷剪剪切下料及圆钢轧后冷剪剪切工序中产生端部裂纹的基本形貌，分析了产生此问题的冶炼及轧制工艺原因，并针对此现象采取降低铸坯中心疏松、减少气孔、提高剪切温度等对策，最终解决这一问题。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Cause analysis and countermeasures on shear crack of 40Mn2 rod bar
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：As a manganese alloy structural steel products with good workability and good applicability,40Mn2 steel is widely used in machining industry.The morphology of crack on the bar end cross section when being cold cut in user’s machining process or when being cut into length in rolling process was investigated.According to the analysis of smelting and rolling cause,some measures were put into use,such as reducing casting billet central porosity and air pore,raising shearing temperature,so the cracking problem was solved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
潘建洲. 40Mn2圆钢成品剪切断口裂纹成因分析与对策[J]. , 2016, 33(3): 67-70.
PAN Jian-zhou. Cause analysis and countermeasures on shear crack of 40Mn2 rod bar. , 2016, 33(3): 67-70.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 河钢邯钢热轧活套起套过程优化
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 河钢集团邯钢公司，河北邯郸056000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 邯钢2 250 mm热轧精轧机组采用“软接触控制+常规控制”的方式调节活套起套过程。在轧制管线钢、高强钢等产品时，经常出现带钢长时间失张、带钢头部拉窄、活套角度严重超调等问题，为此，详细分析了活套生产工艺和控制原理，结合生产实际，提出了通过调节活套张力力矩斜坡输入斜率来优化活套起套过程的控制策略，并通过编写PLC程序和上位机界面予以实施。该系统投入运行后，带钢头部尺寸命中率提升至96.9％，活套角度波动范围缩小到±２°之内。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Optimization of looper rising up procedure in hot strip mill of HBIS Group Hansteel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Looper rising up procedure of hot rolling would be controlled by ILQ control and conventional control in Hansteel.When rolling pipe line steel and high- strength steel,strip may loss tension for a moment,strip’s head may be narrowed down,or looper’s angle serious overshoot.Therefore，the looper production technology and control mechanism were studied,and the control strategy of adjusting the slope input of tension torque to solve those problems were put forward.Meanwhile,the control could be carried out by using PLC program and PC interface.Due to the operation of this system,the hit rate of strip’s head size rose to 96.9% and the wave range of looper’s angle reduced to ±２°.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
唐领强. 河钢邯钢热轧活套起套过程优化[J]. , 2018, 35(5): 61-63.
TANG Ling- qiang. Optimization of looper rising up procedure in hot strip mill of HBIS Group Hansteel. , 2018, 35(5): 61-63.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 纵筋板轧制技术的研究现状与展望
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: YU You, GONG Dian-yao, DI Hong-shuang, ZHANG Dian-hua
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁 沈阳 110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 纵筋板是在钢板的某一表面上均布纵向凸筋的一类异型钢板，其轧制过程是兼有板带和型钢变形特征的成形过程，局部具有严重畸变。本文介绍了纵筋板及其主要用途，以及国内外学者对纵筋板轧制理论和实验研究的现状。总结了筋底压下率、轧制温度、坯料厚度、轧制力以及板宽等因素对成筋率的影响。同时，对纵筋板研究与应用的前景进行了展望。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Review on research of strip steel with longitudinal ribs
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Strip steel with longitudinal ribs is a kind of specially shaped strip which on surface there are multiple longitudinal ribs throughout the strip width. The characteristic of the ribbed-strip rolling is that it has a combined feature of both strip rolling and section steel rolling. And it has severe local deformation. The strip with longitudinal ribs main application and its status of theory and experiment study by the scholars at home and abroad were introduced. The influence factors in the process of rolling, such as reduction, rolling temperature, thickness of raw strip, rolling force, plate width and so on ,on the rate of ribbing were summarized . Finally , the outlooks of the study and application prospect of strip steel with longitudinal ribs were put forward.
keywords_en: Key words:strip steel with longitudinal ribs
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
于 游，龚殿尧，邸洪双，张殿华. 纵筋板轧制技术的研究现状与展望[J]. , 2014, 31(5): 41-44.
YU You, GONG Dian-yao, DI Hong-shuang, ZHANG Dian-hua. Review on research of strip steel with longitudinal ribs. , 2014, 31(5): 41-44.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 冷轧工作辊密封解决方案
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 广州城尔信机械有限公司，广东广州510163
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对冷轧机工作辊轴承密封失效的问题，分析了密封失效的危害，对工作辊密封件的要求，以及原夹布密封的缺点，提出了采用HDS7无弹簧金属骨架密封 +HDS2金属骨架密封+VR4密封件+LDSLV耐磨衬套（轴有磨损时用）的新方案，并对比了新方案与夹布密封的技术指标。采用新的密封方案，密封效果好，密封件寿命更长，更加经济实用。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Seals solution for cold rolling work roll
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the mill work roll bearing seal failure problem,the harm of seal failure,the requirement on seal of working roll,and the shortcomings of the original cloth seal were analyzed.The new solution of using HDS7 spring metal skeleton seal +HDS2 metal skeleton seal +VR4 +LDSLV seal wear bushing (when shaft wear use) was put forward.The technology indexes were compared between the new scheme and the cloth seal.The sealing effect was good,and the seal service life was longer by using new scheme.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
程富强. 冷轧工作辊密封解决方案[J]. , 2015, 32(3): 91-93.
CHENG Fu-qiang. Seals solution for cold rolling work roll. , 2015, 32(3): 91-93.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 极薄带微轧制中的系列新发现
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIU Xiang- hua1a，1b，ZHAO Qi- lin1b，YU Qing- bo2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.东北大学，a.轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室
b.材料科学与工程学院,辽宁沈阳110819
2.江苏理工学院机械工程学院，江苏常州213001
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 在对极薄带微轧制的研究中，陆续发现一系列用传统轧制理论不能解释的新现象,如工业纯铜的超延展现象、脆性材料的非典型塑性现象、异种金属多层复合中的变形诱导反应扩散现象等。这些新现象与微成形中的尺寸效应有关，对其进行深入研究，一方面，能够有助于揭示微成形的深层规律，加深对塑性变形本质的认识；另一方面，有助于在微成形领域产生新思路，开发微成形新工艺，促进微成形产品开发，推动微成形技术的进步。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: New discoveries in micro rolling of metal foils
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：A series of new phenomena,such as extreme extensibility of commercial pure copper,atypical plasticity of brittle materials and deformation- induced reaction diffusion in multi- layer composite of different metals,were discovered in study of micro rolling of metal foils.These phenomena could not be explained by conventional theories,and was found having relation to size effects in micro forming.Further study on these new phenomena might reveal the underlying laws of micro forming and increase our knowledge on plastic deformation;on the other hand,it would inspire new ideas,promote new processes development,thus contribute to product development of micro forming,and propel the technological progress in micro forming.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘相华 ，赵启林，于庆波. 极薄带微轧制中的系列新发现[J]. , 2018, 35(6): 1-5.
LIU Xiang- huaa，b，ZHAO Qi- linb，YU Qing- bo. New discoveries in micro rolling of metal foils. , 2018, 35(6): 1-5.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 中板厂避峰就谷品种生产计划策略
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: ZHANG Hong- Chang,DU Jian- bin,XING Jun
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 河钢集团邯钢公司中板厂，河北邯郸056003
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 利用自动化控制系统采集的主电机电流数据，以及一定时间段內轧制钢板块数，计算了不同牌号生产节奏、单块电耗和单位时间电耗。结果表明，待温钢板的单位时间电耗比不待温钢板少27%。所以在峰段生产需要工艺待温的品种，谷段生产不待温的品种，就可达到峰段少用电、谷段多用电的目的，从而大大降低了用电成本。
keywords_cn: 中厚板 避峰就谷 生产策略 单位时间电耗
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Manufacture strategies in power valley time in medium plate plant
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Making use of the main motor electric current collected from the automatic control system and the rolled plate pieces in one period,the rolling rhythm and power consumption per hour were figured out.The results showed that the power consumption per hour of temperature controlled rolled pieces was reduced 27% than that of not controlled rolled.So,producing the temperature controlled rolled pieces in apex period and producing the not temperature controlled rolled pieces in vale period can greatly reduce the power cost.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
张宏昌，杜建斌，邢俊. 中板厂避峰就谷品种生产计划策略[J]. , 2018, 35(5): 82-83.
ZHANG Hong- Chang,DU Jian- bin,XING Jun. Manufacture strategies in power valley time in medium plate plant. , 2018, 35(5): 82-83.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 双相钢在塑性变形中塑性功向热能的转变
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京科技大学冶金工程学院
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 研究了在较低应变速率（0.00067s-1）下，双相钢试样静态拉伸过程中塑性功向热能的转变规律。在对静态拉伸过程能量分布分析的基础上，建立了传热模型，对室温下拉伸过程试样标距内材料的温度进行了数值求解。利用红外测像仪测量了拉伸过程中试样表面的温度，通过比较模拟值与实测值求得了β值（塑性功向热能转变系数），真应变大于0.02时β值随应变增加而上升较小， β值可以取0.93。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: U- E连轧失张对钢轨“高点”的影响分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: TAO Gong- ming,WU Guo- xian,ZHU Hua- lin
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 攀钢集团攀枝花钢钒有限公司轨梁厂，四川攀枝花617062
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为了解决现场万能轧机与轧边机连轧60 kg/m钢轨过程中距尾部3.6 m处出现局部“高点”的问题，经试验与分析，对可能导致“高点”产生的第3道次轧制过程利用有限元仿真软件进行了仿真模拟，分析得出连轧失张产生的收缩力是导致局部“高点”产生的主要原因，最后从纵波和能量的角度提出了措施，解决了该问题。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis of the effect of U- E rolling losing tension on rail ’high- point’
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to solve the problem of local ’high point’ at 3.6 m from the tail in the process of continuous rolling of 60 kg/m rails on site by universal rolling mills and edgers,the finite element simulation software was used to simulate the rolling process of the third pass.The analysis show that the contraction force caused by the loss of continuous rolling is the main reason for the local ’high point’.Finally,measures were taken from the perspective of longitudinal wave and energy to solve the problem.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陶功明，吴郭贤，朱华林. U- E连轧失张对钢轨“高点”的影响分析[J]. , 2018, 35(3): 57-60.
TAO Gong- ming,WU Guo- xian,ZHU Hua- lin. Analysis of the effect of U- E rolling losing tension on rail ’high- point’. , 2018, 35(3): 57-60.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热浸镀锌带钢表层锌波纹的数值预测
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 华南理工大学机械与汽车工程学院，广东广州510641
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 热浸镀锌工业线生产的热镀锌带钢表面不均匀的锌层厚度称为锌波纹，严重影响了产品的质量。为了分析和预测锌波纹的特性，采用大涡模拟的方法求解了射流冲击带钢表面的三维瞬态湍射流问题，以及采用带钢表面锌液流动的简化分析模型预测了三维锌层厚度的变化，预测结果与实测结果吻合较好。同时，结合生产现场研究了工况对锌波纹的影响，即随着气刀到带钢距离的减小、气刀入口压强的增大，镀锌带钢表层的锌波纹现象减轻。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Numerical prediction of zinc ripples on hot- dip galvanized strips
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Industrial galvanization produced strip with uneven coating has been called zinc ripples,which severely influence the product quality.In order to predict and analyze the characteristics of the zinc ripples，the large eddy simulation （LES） method was adopted to numerically solve the three- dimensional transient turbulent jet flow impinging on the strip.A simplified analytical model of the liquid zinc flow on the strip surface was also utilized to predict the temporally and spatially varying coating thickness.The numerically predicted coating thickness distribution agreed well with that on a real galvanized strip.The influence of the working condition on the zinc ripple then was studied by using the simplified analytical model.It was found that with impingement distance getting smaller and air- knife pressure getting larger，the zinc ripples became less severe.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
易永芳，马龙威. 热浸镀锌带钢表层锌波纹的数值预测[J]. , 2018, 35(6): 6-12.
YI Yong- fang，MA Long- wei. Numerical prediction of zinc ripples on hot- dip galvanized strips. , 2018, 35(6): 6-12.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: JI Jiang1,2，HU Hong1，YOU Lei1，LIU Yun- fei1，ZHAO Xiao- hui1，WEI Wei- gang1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.中国重型机械研究院股份公司，陕西西安710032
2.重庆大学机械传动国家重点实验室，重庆400030
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 中国重型机械研究院股份公司为国内某钢厂自主研制开发出国内首套高品质超薄镀锡原板平整及二次冷轧机组。介绍了该机组的设备组成及工艺流程、主要技术参数、机组功能实现等，并着重介绍了自主开发的高效上卷穿带系统、单（双）机架干（湿）平整工艺模型、高精度薄带板厚控制技术、板形综合调控技术、表面缺陷预报与质量控制技术、小张力高精度稳定控制技术和快速换辊技术等。机组自投产以来，运行稳定可靠，可高效生产出厚度精度高、板形和表面质量优良的超薄镀锡原板，可满足高端市场的需求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development and application of skin pass and double cold- reduced mill processing for high quality ultra- thin uncoated tin- plated sheet
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The first set of high quality ultra- thin tinplate flat and double cold- reduced mill was developed by China Heavy Machinery Research Institute Co.,Ltd.Combining with the equipment and process,the main technical parameters and unit function realization were introduced.The efficient roll threading system,single (double) a dry (wet) smooth process model and high precision thin strip thickness control technology,integrated flatness control technology,surface defect prediction and quality control technology high precision stability control technology and rapid roll changing technology were mainly described.The unit running was stable and reliable,and the high- precision thickness and flatness and surface quality of ultrathin tinplate could be produced.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
计江 ，胡洪，尤磊，刘云飞，赵晓辉，魏维刚. 超薄镀锡原板平整及二次冷轧工艺装备的研发应用[J]. , 2018, 35(1): 49-51.
JI Jiang，HU Hong，YOU Lei，LIU Yun- fei，ZHAO Xiao- hui，WEI Wei- gang. Development and application of skin pass and double cold- reduced mill processing for high quality ultra- thin uncoated tin- plated sheet. , 2018, 35(1): 49-51.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 冷轧平整工艺参数对带钢性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LI Kun1, CUI Hong- tao2, ZHU Dan- qing1, DU Jian- wei1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.中冶南方工程技术有限公司，湖北武汉430223
2.本钢集团产品研究院，辽宁本溪117000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 平整是带钢加工的最后工序，其产品经涂油、包装后直接面向市场，为客户所用。平整工艺通过对轧制力、弯辊力、张力、速度等工艺参数和轧辊表面粗糙度的调整来改善退火后带钢的板形、获得需要的力学性能和表面质量。本文分析了各工艺参数对产品质量的影响，提出了平整产品质量的控制方法，为冷轧带钢平整生产提供了参考。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Influence of skin pass process parameters on cold- rolled strip steel performance
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Skin pass is the final step of strip steel processing operation, its products is directly delivered to marker after oiled and packaged. The skin pass process can improve annealed strip shape, obtain the required mechanical properties and surface quality by adjusting the rolling force , bending force, tension, speed and the roll surface roughness. So the effects of various skin process parameters on product quality was analyzed, and quality control methods of the skin pass was proposed as a reference for the production of cold- rolled strip steel.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李坤，崔宏涛，朱丹青，杜建伟. 冷轧平整工艺参数对带钢性能的影响[J]. , 2015, 32(6): 24-26.
LI Kun, CUI Hong- tao, ZHU Dan- qing, DU Jian- wei. Influence of skin pass process parameters on cold- rolled strip steel performance. , 2015, 32(6): 24-26.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 超宽幅特殊钢中厚板连续热处理装备技术研发和应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Zhaodong,LI Jiadong,FU Tianliang,LI Yong,HAN Jun#br#
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development and application of continuous heat treatment equipment and technology for ultra wide special steel plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The ultra wide special steel plate is of great significance to the equipment for the thirdgeneration nuclear power plant and military fields.Solid solution treatment is the key process.Property uniformity,flatness and surface quality of steel plate are important indexes,which can not be produced stably in batches using conventional heat treatment equipment.Therefore,the first set of 4 300mm ultrawide special steel plate heat treatment line has been developed independently in China by the State Key Lab.of Rolling and Automation of Northeastern University.Practice show that the heating uniformity is within 5 degrees Celsius,the difficult problem of high homogeneous and high flatness quenching of wide special steel plate is solved,and automatic production is realized.It provides a successful demonstration for the construction of ultrawide heat treatment line in special steel industry.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 永磁电机及变频变量泵液压系统在AGC中的应用

1.中国钢研科技集团有限公司安泰科技股份有限公司，北京100081

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 辊底式退火炉与台车式退火炉处理45A小圆钢正火质量对比
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 抚顺特殊钢股份有限公司技术处，辽宁抚顺113001
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用辊底式退火炉与台车式退火炉两种方式对45A小圆钢进行正火处理，并分析了其力学性能、表面脱碳及晶粒度。结果表明：辊底式退火炉正火的45A小圆钢综合力学性能明显较台车式退火炉处理的好，强度指标可以提高50～100 MPa，表面脱碳层深度减少0.2～0.5 mm，晶粒度为8级，较台车式退火炉处理的高3～6级，且钢材表面弯曲度小，为后续机械矫直工序节约了人力物力，缩短了生产周期。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Comparison of 45A bar normalization quality treated by roll bottom annealing furnace and car-type annealing
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Two different annealing furnace of roll bottom annealing furnace and car-type annealing furnace were used for normalizing the 45A small round bars.This test results of the mechanical properties,surface decarburization and grain size of bars were analyzed,and showed that the mechanical properties of 45A small bars treated by roll bottom annealing furnace were better than that by car-type annealing furnace.Its strength index increased by 50-100 MPa,surface decarburization depth reduced by 0.2-0.5 mm,and grain size reduced by 2-5 grade.The bending curve of bars was smaller,which saved the straightening work time.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
牛伟，包文全，刘桂江. 辊底式退火炉与台车式退火炉处理45A小圆钢正火质量对比[J]. , 2017, 34(4): 81-83.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司2 250 mm生产线自投产至今，由于设备本身存在的问题以及侧导板标定精度差等原因，存在着带钢对中性差及带钢刮蹭侧导板产生粘钢等问题。为此，对2 250 mm精轧侧导板系统存在的问题进行了研究分析，制定了有效的改进措施，提高了精轧侧导板系统的对中精度，并且消除了侧导板粘钢的问题。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Cause analysis and control measureas of sticking steel on 2 250 mm finishing mill side guide
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Since the establishment of 2 250 mm production line of shougan Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co.,Ltd.,due to the equipment itself problem and the poor side plate calibration accuracy,there were some problems such as sticking steel on the side guide and bad strip centring.Therefore,the problems existing in the 2 250 mm finishing side guide were studied and analyzed,and the effective improvement measures were put forward.The alignment accuracy of the finishing side guide plate were improved,and the problem of sticking steel on the side guide plate was eliminated.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过低碳及微合金化学成分设计，研究了始冷温度对低屈强比铁路用Q345NQR2钢组织和性能的影响。结果表明，在相同终轧温度下，随着始冷温度的降低，钢板的屈服强度降低，抗拉强度变化不大。实验钢的组织为铁素体+珠光体，组织内珠光体与铁素体微区维氏显微硬度差不小于14HV时，钢板的屈强比不大于0.73，-40 ℃冲击功大于90 J，满足了铁路车辆用钢的性能要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development of Q345NQR2 highstrength steel plate used for railway
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of initial cooling temperature on the microstructure and properties of Q345NQR2 steel with low yield ratio were studied by low carbon and microalloy composition design.The results show that at the same finishing temperature,the yield strength of the plate decreases and the tensile strength changes little with the decrease of the initial cooling temperature.The microstructure of the experimental steel is mainly ferrite + pearlite.When the ratio of the Vickers microhardness in the microstructure of the pearlite to the ferrite microarea is more than 14HV,the yield ratio of the steel plate is less than 0.73 and the -40  ℃ Charpy impact energy is more than 90 J.The propeties of testd plate meets the performance requirements of railway use steel.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
王军，王超，崔强，唐春霞，武会宾. Q345NQR2铁路用高强度钢板的开发[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(3): 10-13.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 宝钢股份中央研究院武汉分院（武钢有限技术中心），湖北武汉430083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 以Orbit专利分析平台为主要研究工具，从专利文献中抽取专利数量指标和专利质量指标来构建评价薄板坯连铸连轧技术竞争力和企业创新能力的指标体系，结合其他文献研究的成果，从产业发展的实际出发做出分析，系统揭示了自薄板坯连铸连轧技术开发以来的技术进步、专利布局、发展演化、国内外发展现状、技术竞争实力等，有助于在专利文献提供的线索启发下开发新产品、新技术，从而有效提高研发效率。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: An analysis of globle patents on thin slab continuous casting and rolling process
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The orbit patent analysis platform was used as the main research tool.Patent quantity indicators and patent quality indicators were extracted from patent literatures to construct an index system for evaluating the competitiveness of thin slab continuous casting and rolling technology and the innovation ability of enterprises.Combining with the research results of other literatures,an analysis from the reality of industrial development was carried out.The technical progress,the patent layout,the development and evolution,the development situation at home and abroad,the technical competitiveness etc.since the thin slab continuous casting and rolling technology developmented were systematically revealed.It is helpful to develop new products and new technologies inspired by the clues provided in patent literature,thus effectively improving the research and development efficiency.
keywords_en: Key words：thin slab continuous casting and rolling；patent analysis
