http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: YAO Yulin1， SONG Zhigang1,MEI Shuwen1，LI Xu2#br#
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.河钢集团唐钢公司，河北唐山063000;
2.东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用X射线衍射分析仪（XRD）和扫描电子显微镜（SEM）研究了Zn2.0%Al1.5%Mg锌铝镁镀层物相、形貌及组织结构，对锌铝镁及镀锌试样进行SST、CCT耐蚀性对比试验，并测定了维氏硬度、动摩擦因数。结果表明，锌铝镁镀层主要由初生Zn相、Zn/MgZn2二元共晶组织和Zn/MgZn2/Al三元共晶组织组成；锌铝镁镀层较纯锌镀层具有良好的耐腐蚀性，同时较纯锌镀层具有较高的硬度以及较低的动摩擦因数。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Experimental study on microstructure and performance of Zn2.0%Al1.5%Mg alloy coating
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The phase of matter morphology and structure of Zn2.0%Al1.5%Mg alloy coatings were analyzed by means of XRD and SEM.SST and CCT corrosion resistance contrast tests were carried out on the ZnAlMg alloy coating and Zn coating，then Vickershardness and frictional coefficient were measured.The results show that Zn2.0%Al1.5%Mg alloy coating is mainly composed of coarse Zn grain,Zn/MgZn2 binary eutectic and Zn/MgZn2/Al ternary eutectic structure.ZnAl Mg alloy coating has good more excellent corrosion resistance than zine coating.Meanwhile,ZnAlMg coating has higher hardness and lower dynamic friction coefficient.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
么玉林，宋志岗，梅淑文，李旭. Zn2.0%Al1.5%Mg合金镀层组织结构及性能研究[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(3): 33-36.
YAO Yulin1， SONG Zhigang1,MEI Shuwen1，LI Xu2. Experimental study on microstructure and performance of Zn2.0%Al1.5%Mg alloy coating. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(3): 33-36.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢京唐钢铁股份有限公司，河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对某1 420 mm酸轧机组生产极薄带钢（最薄0.15 mm）时，出现轧机出口飞剪剪切后穿带带头与设备刮蹭而堆钢的问题，通过解决带钢与机械设备之间刮蹭问题、调整出口压缩空气吹扫方向和力度、控制板形和轧机出口设备前导率，使薄带钢穿带成功率由93%提高到100%，提高了生产效率。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aimed at the piece pillingup problem caused by scratching with device after the flying shear when 0.15 mm ultrathin strip rolled in a 1 420 mm pickling line tandem cold rolling mill,the causes were analyzed.By resolving the scratching with device after the flying shear,adjusting the air sweeping direction and intensity,controlling the strip shape and the speed leading rate of outlet device after mill,the strip threading success rate was increased from 93 percent to 100 percent.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 冷轧处理机组刷洗系统的优化和应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 宝山钢铁股份有限公司冷轧厂，上海200941
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Optimization and application of scrubbing system used in cold rolling line
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：How to improve the washing effect of the degreasing section of the cold rolling processing unit,and prolong the brush roll life,has been a comprehensive problem for designing and application.The following measures are proved effectively.The first is the selection of appropriate brush wool and brush combination to ensure the quality of the strip surface.The second is threepoint positioning mode of the brush plate and mandrel which is more stable and can avoid the brush roller vibration.The third is suitable roller core and brush length size which can effectively improve the available brush length and the service life of brush roller.The fourth is the offset of the brush roller and the support roll which can improve the stability of brush roll.The fifth is reasonable selection of the reverse brush process and the suitable nozzle which can reduce the investment cost,the energy consumption and the foam produced by scrubbing.The sixth is proper setting and control of the roller pressure which can reduce the abnormal wear of the bristles and prolong the service life of the brush.The seventh is the optimization of the adjusting structure which can improve the adjusting precision and avoid the death when the dynamic regulation is applied.The eighth is optimization of nozzle configuration which can improve the cooling effect,and the spray surface cross arrangement of nozzle which can avoid the blockage of individual nozzle causing the loss of brush hair.The ninth is optimization of the flap and filtration device which can reduce the foreign body entering the system,improve the filtration effect,and ensure the smooth and cooling effect of the nozzle.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.鞍山钢铁股份公司技术中心，辽宁鞍山114009
2. 鞍山钢铁股份公司鲅鱼圈分公司热轧部, 辽宁营口115007
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用铁素体区轧制工艺能够大大提高IF钢冷、热轧带钢的深冲性能。本研究通过工业试验验证了铁素体区轧制工艺的可行性。试制带钢组织、织构及性能检测的结果表明：热轧带钢1/4厚度处和芯部初步形成了γ织构，连续退火冷轧带钢中形成了强烈的γ织构，冷轧带钢的伸长率达到50%以上，r值达到3.15，具有优良的成形性能。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Influence of ferritic- region hot rolling on final properties of IF steel strip
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The deep drawing property of hot rolled and cold rolled IF steel sheets could be highly improved by ferritic- region hot rolling techology. The feasibility of ferritic- region hot rolling was validated by manufacturing experiments in this article. The results of microstructure, texture and performance examination showed that γ texture were initially formed at the center and 1/4 thickness of hot rolled sheet, and it was intensively formed in continuous annealing cold- rolled steel sheet, which elongation was more than 50% and r value was 3.15. It was proved that the forming performance of hot rolled and cold rolled sheet were improved by ferritic- region hot rolling technology.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
吕家舜 ，乔磊 ，李锋， 何浩， 杨洪刚， 周芳. IF钢铁素体区轧制对带钢最终性能的影响[J]. , 2016, 33(1): 10-14.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.北京首钢股份有限公司，河北迁安064404；2.首钢集团有限公司技术研究院薄板所，北京100043

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 分析了SUS436L超纯铁素体不锈钢热带退火酸洗线生产时焊接断带的原因，发现焊接熔合区存在大量的TiN，且断带卷Ti含量高于未断带卷，这是造成焊接时焊接熔合区TiN析出的主要原因。将 Ti质量分数控制在0.25%以内后，避免了SUS436L焊接后沿焊缝断带的问题。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The cause of strip breakage in hot strip annealing and pickling line of SUS436L ultrapure ferritic stainless steel was analyzed.The result showed the content of Ti in the broken strip was higher than unbroken strip,and a lot of TiN precipitates in the welding fusion zone was found,which was the main reason of strip breakage.By controlling the Ti mass fraction of SUS436L within 025%,the strip breakage problem was avoided.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 湖南华菱涟源钢铁有限公司，湖南娄底417009
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对IF钢制作转向油罐过程中出现的冲压开裂现象，对其冷轧板化学成分、力学性能、显微组织及断口形貌进行了分析。结果表明，由于IF钢钢质纯净，晶界强度低，用于冲压制作转向油罐时会产生二次加工脆性现象，导致冲压件在二次加工使用过程中因受冲击负荷加剧脆化而开裂。通过优化化学成分，提高了IF钢晶界强度，解决了后续加工使用开裂问题。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Causes analysis and countermeasures of cracking of IF steel strip used for steering oil tank
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the crack generated during stamping to manufacture steering oil tank with IF steel strip,the chemical composition,mechanic properties,microstructure and fracture morphology of IF cold rolled strip were analyzed.The result show that IF steel is possible to have secondary processing brittleness because of its clean quality and low strength grain boundary,which will lead to the stamping part brittle cracking due to stamping in the secondary processing.By chemical composition optimization,the grain boundary strength of IF steel had been improved,thus the cracking problem in the subsequent processing had been resolved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

液残留问题，通过对乳化液羁留、飞散情况的分析与计算，调整了乳化液防溅板的安装角度和引流能力，减小轧机入口、出口封闭设施与牌坊间的单边间隙至10mm以内，在出口封闭设施上增设出口挡液辊，调整吹扫装置的布置和吹扫角度等，解决了乳化液残留问题，使带钢表面由原来不规则局部色斑变成了亮银白色。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LI Qun,WANG Zhi-yong, TIAN Peng, LIU Yong-li, DONG Zhan-bin
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 秦皇岛首秦金属材料有限公司，河北 秦皇岛 066326
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: TMCP工艺可改善钢板力学性能，但同时钢板内应力增加，板形控制难度增大。本文根据TMCP工艺的特点，结合实际工业生产数据，研究了支撑辊辊型、弯辊力调节对钢板板凸度的影响；分析了钢板连续冷却过程中发生相变膨胀的温度点，结合实际水冷工艺，可明确水比调节方向。现场实例表明，采用上述措施，钢板板形控制良好。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research of plate shape control strategy for quality steel using TMCP technology
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The mechanical properties of plate could be improved by TMCP technology, but at the same time, the internal stress level of the plate was increased significantly. It was harder to control the plate shape. In this paper, based on the characteristics of TMCP process, combined with the actual industrial production data, the effects of roll profile and bending force adjusting on plate crown were researched. Meanwhile, the expansion phase transformation temperature during continuous cooling process was analyzed. Combined with the actual plate cooling process , the water ratio adjustment direction was obtained. Practical example showed that the plate shape was controlled well by above measures.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李 群，王志勇，田 鹏，刘永利，董占斌. 中厚板TMCP工艺品种钢板形控制策略研究[J]. , 2014, 31(5): 20-22.
LI Qun,WANG Zhi-yong, TIAN Peng, LIU Yong-li, DONG Zhan-bin. Research of plate shape control strategy for quality steel using TMCP technology. , 2014, 31(5): 20-22.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热处理工艺对10B38钢组织性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: CHEN Ji- lin, GUO Ming- yi, CUI Juan, ZHANG Zhi- guang
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 邢台钢铁有限责任公司，河北省线材工程技术研究中心，河北邢台054027
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 研究了热处理工艺对10B38钢微观组织、力学性能以及低温冲击韧性的影响。结果表明：随淬火温度的升高，淬火硬度呈先上升后降低的趋势，在870 ℃时，淬火硬度最大；随着回火温度的升高，马氏体晶界及晶面逐渐有碳化物析出，组织中碳化物由片状连续不均匀分布变为颗粒状弥散分布；抗拉强度与屈服强度都随回火温度的升高而下降，断面收缩率及断后伸长率随回火温度的升高而增加；在350～450 ℃温度区间，冲击功随回火温度升高稳定增加，回火温度在550 ℃以上时，冲击功急速升高，10B38钢经油淬后在550～650 ℃区间回火能够同时满足强度和冲击功的要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of heat treatment process on microstructure and mechanical properties of 10B38 steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of heat treatment process on microstructure, mechanical properties and cryogenic impact toughness were investigated. The results showed that the quenching hardness was first increased then decreased with the quenching temperature increasing, the max quenching hardness appeared at 870 ℃, the carbide precipitation occurred on the grain boundary and crystal plane with tempering temperature increasing, and carbide changed from flake continuous uneven distribution to particle dispersion distribution. The tensile strength and yield strength were decreased with reduction of area and the elongation were increased with the tempering temperature increasing. From 350 ℃ to 450 ℃ of tempering temperature, the steel impact energy increased stably with the tempering temperature increasing, when above 550 ℃, impact energy went into a state of rapid rise. The 10B38 steel could meet the requirements of strength and impact energy at the same time after oil quenched and tempered within 550-650 ℃.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陈继林，郭明仪，崔娟，张治广. 热处理工艺对10B38钢组织性能的影响[J]. , 2016, 33(1): 67-71.
CHEN Ji- lin, GUO Ming- yi, CUI Juan, ZHANG Zhi- guang. Effect of heat treatment process on microstructure and mechanical properties of 10B38 steel. , 2016, 33(1): 67-71.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 钢铁企业设备编码体系的研究与实践
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: CHEN Jianhua1,YU Hongxi1,GAO Fuqiang1,ZHANG Jin1,ZHANG Xintao1,MENG Jiani2#br#
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.北京首钢股份有限公司，河北迁安064409；2.首钢国际贸易工程有限公司，北京100082
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 设备编码是设备管理系统最重要的基础，构成设备管理活动所依附的框架，实现设备管理各业务模块的数据贯通和工作协同，使设备管理真正成为一个有机整体。根据设备管理对设备编码的需求，用12位数字和字母的组合定义设备，并对其2位码、4位码、6位码、9位码及12位码的编码规则、设计目的及功能分担进行规定。该设备编码模型既能够满足设备管理的需要，也兼顾计算机处理所要求的简化高效。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research and practice of equipment coding system in iron and steel enterprises
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Equipment coding is the foundation of the equipment management system,which constitutes the hierarchical main thread attached to various equipment management activities,and makes the whole equipment management realize data penetrate and become an organic whole.According to the requirement of equipment management for equipment coding,the equipment is defined with the combination of twelve digit and alphabet,and the code rules,design purposes and function sharing of the binary code,four bit code,six bit code,nine bit code and twelve bit code are stipulated.The coding model of the device can meet the needs of device management and the simplification and efficiency of computer processing.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陈建华，于洪喜，高福强，张金，张新涛，孟佳旎. 钢铁企业设备编码体系的研究与实践[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(3): 70-74.
CHEN Jianhua,YU Hongxi,GAO Fuqiang1,ZHANG Jin1,ZHANG Xintao1,MENG Jiani2. Research and practice of equipment coding system in iron and steel enterprises. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(3): 70-74.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: Al-Mg-Si 合金的高温流变过程动态再结晶研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: CHEN Xuejiao1，WANG Huawei2，ZHAO Zhuo1，XU Zhen1,LI Jiayu1,MA Zhixuan1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.辽宁科技大学，辽宁鞍山114000；2.鞍钢集团工程技术有限公司，辽宁鞍山114000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用热力模拟试验机对Al-0.83Mg-0.59Si铝合金进行热压缩实验，研究了变形温度300～500 ℃、变形速率0.001～10 s-1下材料的动态再结晶行为。实验得到Al0.83Mg0.59Si合金在300～500 ℃变形时，软化机制以动态再结晶为主；流变应力会随着变形温度的降低和变形速率的升高而升高，较低变形速率下，动态再结晶行为更充分，应力软化现象更明显。统计实验所得流变应力曲线数据，建立了热变形本构方程，确定了合金热变形激活能Q为480.243 kJ/mol 。基于加工硬化率曲线，建立了其动态再结晶临界应变模型。结果表明，Al-0.83Mg-0.59Si铝合金的流变应力随温度的升高和变形速率的降低而降低，动态再结晶是其主要的软化机制。临界应力与峰值应力存在线性关系：σc=0.85σp-5.061 58。引入ZenerHollomon参数来描述变形条件对临界条件的影响，得到临界应变与Z参数的关系为：εc=0.000 134Z0.051 64。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study on dynamic recrystallization of Al-Mg-Si alloy during high temperature rheological process
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The thermal compression experiments of Al0.83Mg0.59Si aluminum alloy were carried out with thermal simulator.The dynamic recrystallization behavior of Al0.83Mg0.59Si aluminum alloy was studied at deformation temperatures of 300-500 ℃ and deformation rates of 0.001-10 s-1.The experimental results showed that the softening mechanism of Al0.83Mg0.59Si alloy was mainly dynamic recrystallization when deformed at 300-500 ℃.The flow stress increased with the decrease of deformation temperature and the increase of strain rate.At lower strain rate,the dynamic recrystallization behavior was more sufficient and the stress softening phenomenon was more obvious.The constitutive equation of hot deformation was established based on the data of rheological stress curve obtained from experiments.The activation energy Q of hot deformation was determined to be 480.243 kJ/mol.Based on the work hardening rate curve,the critical strain model of material dynamic recrystallization was established.The results show that the rheological stress of Al0.83Mg0.59Si alloy decreases with the increase of temperature and the decrease of strain rate.Dynamic recrystallization was the main softening mechanism.There was a linear relationship between critical stress and peak stress:σc=0.85σp-5.061 58.ZenerHollomon parameters were introduced to describe the effect of deformation conditions on the critical conditions.The relationship between critical strain and Z parameters was obtained:εc=0000 134Z0.051 64.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陈雪娇,王华巍，赵卓，徐振，李佳宇，马志轩. Al-Mg-Si 合金的高温流变过程动态再结晶研究[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(4): 7-12.
CHEN Xuejiao，WANG Huawei，ZHAO Zhuo，XU Zhen,LI Jiayu,MA Zhixuan. Study on dynamic recrystallization of Al-Mg-Si alloy during high temperature rheological process. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(4): 7-12.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1. 首钢技术研究院，北京100043
2. 首钢迁安钢铁有限责任公司，河北迁安064404
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对迁钢2250mm生产线热轧卷出现局部高点的问题，分析了轧辊辊间接触压力、轧制计划编排、工作辊热凸度等因素对产生带钢局部高点的影响规律，提出了优化末机架工作辊辊型、合理编排轧制计划、严格冷却水喷嘴管理制度、控制轧辊热凸度、调整精轧轧制工艺等措施，改善了轧辊的不均匀磨损程度，使带钢局部高点控制在10μm以下。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on Generation Mechanism and Control of Hot Rolled Strip Local High Point
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of appearing local high points on hot rolled strip in 2250mm Hot Rolling Mill of Qianan Iron and Steel Company, the influence rules of contact pressure between rolls, rolling scheme and thermal crown of work roll on producing local high points were studied. Based on it, some optimization measures, such as optimizing work roll contour curve of F6 stand, applying reasonable rolling scheme, strictly managing spraying cooling water, controlling roll thermal crown,etc. , were put forward. Therefore, the uneven wearing of work roll was lightened, and the control level of strip local high point was controlled below 10μm.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 甘肃酒钢集团宏兴钢铁股份有限公司，甘肃嘉峪关735100
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过对带肋钢筋不同的轧后穿水冷却强度工艺对比试验，定量研究了轧后穿水冷却工艺对钢筋的强化效果。试验结果表明，随着带肋钢筋轧后冷却强度的提高，钢筋的强度上升、塑性下降，但钢筋轧后冷却强度与其力学性能指标呈非线性关系。当带肋钢筋轧后快速冷却到贝氏体温度区以下时，随冷却强度的提高，钢筋强度大幅上升；在贝氏体温度区以上进行冷却时，随冷却强度的提高，钢筋强度增幅缓慢。
keywords_cn: 热轧螺纹钢筋，穿水冷却，强化效果
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on the Effect of Fast Cooling after Rolling of Hot Rolled Ribbed Bar
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Comparing different cooling intensities after rolling of hot rolled ribbed bar, the results show that the strength of ribbed bar is increased and plasticity is reduced with the cooling intensity increasing, but the relationship of bar properties and cooling intensity is nonlinear relationship. When the ribbed bar fast cooling to below temperature of bainite,its strength is increased significantly with cooling intensity increasing. When the ribbed bar cooling in the above temperature bainite,its strength increased slowly with cooling intensity increasing.

付 红 卫. 热轧带肋钢筋轧后快速冷却强化效果研究[J]. , 2013, 30(5): 60-63.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 鞍山钢铁股份有限公司通过合理的成分及工艺设计，解决了连铸坯生产特厚钢板因压缩比小所造成的偏析、疏松等问题。采用300mm铸坯可以生产最大厚度为150mm的特厚钢板，最小压缩比为2∶1，生产的特厚钢板探伤合格、性能稳定，各项指标均符合国家标准。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study on the problem of the head curling of hot strip rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In the production,the strip head curling phenomenon often occurs,that is,the head of hot rolled strip is lifted up after highspeed finishing rolled,which has a serious impact on the rolling yield rate and rolling stability.Aiming at the strip head curling phenomenon of a 1 580 mm semicontinuous hot strip rolling line,the curling was divided into two types,i.e.delay type strip head curling and instant type strip head curling.According to its performance and combined with force analysis,the influencing factors and formation causes of different types of strip head curling were clarified,and targeted control measures were proposed.After being applied to production,the problem of strip head curling was effectively controlled.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对热镀铝锌硅产品，采用了中性盐雾试验，结合SEM微观分析等手段，研究了产品耐腐蚀性能；分析了产品表面点状及线状缺陷的形成原因，其分别由锌灰缺陷及针孔漏镀缺陷而导致。为此，提出了相应的工艺优化措施，减少了产品表面缺陷，有效提高了镀铝锌硅产品的耐腐蚀性。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：For the hotdipped galvalume products,the neutral salt spray test combined with SEM microanalysis were used to study its corrosion resistance performance.The formation of point and line defects on the surface of the products were analyzed,which caused by zinc dust and plating miss defects respectively.Therefore,the corresponding process optimization measures were proposed to reduce the surface defects of the products,and effectively improved the corrosion resistance of the galvalume products.

2．燕山大学亚稳材料制备技术与科学国家重点实验室，河北秦皇岛066000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 研究了Q420qENH钢板显微组织与拉伸性能随终轧温度的变化规律。研究发现，随终轧温度的升高，Q420qENH钢板组织中粒状贝氏体的数量减少，多边形铁素体增多，屈服强度和抗拉强度均降低，屈强比降低。将屈服强度和晶粒尺寸进行HallPetch拟合，得到的拟合式与试验结果吻合，能够反映出Q420qENH钢在不同终轧温度下的强度随晶粒尺寸的变化趋势。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of finishing rolling temperature on the microstructure and properties of Q420qENH plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of different finishing rolling temperatures on the microstructure and properties of Q420qENH plate were studied.The results show that the microstructure is mainly composed of polygonal ferrite and granular bainite.With the increasing of finishing rolling temperature,the quantity of granular bainite is decreased the polygonal ferrite is increased,the yield strength and tensile strength are decreased,and the yield ratio is decreased.HallPetch fitting was carried out for yield strength and grain size,and the fitting formula was in good agreement with the experimental results,which could reflect the change trend of strength of Q420qENH plate with grain size at different finishing rolling temperatures.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 超快冷供水系统自动化控制研究及优化
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.江苏沙钢集团有限公司，江苏苏州215625；2.东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 超快冷是轧机后冷却钢板的重要生产工艺设备，其供水系统的合理、稳定对冷却工艺、钢板温度的准确性及均匀性有良好的作用，并且合理的供水系统自动化控制减少了人工操作，有节能作用。介绍了沙钢3 500 mm宽厚板生产线的超快冷供水系统，采用可编程序控制器PLC和交流电机变频调速技术在原有设备控制的基础上进行了优化改进，节能降耗、保持水压平稳及自动化控制方面效果明显。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research and optimization of automatic control of ultrafast cooling water supply system
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Ultra-fast cooling is an important production process equipment for cooling plate after rolling mill.The control of water supply system is particularly important for ultra-fast cooling system.The rational and stable water supply system has a good effect on the cooling process,the accuracy and uniformity of the plate temperature,and the rational automation control of the water supply system can reduce the manual operation and has the function of energy saving.The ultra-fast cooling water supply system of the 3 500 mm wide plate production line of Shagang was introduced.The programmable controller PLC and the AC motor frequency conversion technology were used on the basis of the original equipment control.It has good effect in saving energy and reducing consumption,keeping water pressure stable and automatic control.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
黄卫国，游大秀，武志强. 超快冷供水系统自动化控制研究及优化[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(6): 74-77.
HUANG Weiguo，YOU Daxiu，WU Zhiqiang. Research and optimization of automatic control of ultrafast cooling water supply system. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(6): 74-77.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 薄带热连轧液压活套控制技术的改进
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 山西太钢不锈钢股份有限公司热连轧厂, 山西 太原 030003
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过对活套装置控制过程的分析, 结合对热连轧液压活套系统的高度位置和力矩控制双输入、双输出耦合系统控制方法的研究, 提出了薄规格、硅钢带钢的尾部活套力矩控制一定要优先于高度位置控制的思想。通过应用自适应、分段控制等技术, 解决了实际生产中工艺、设备变化对活套控制的影响, 保证了连轧过程中带钢不虚套、不跑偏。该控制方法已在实际的热轧现场得到了应用, 并取得了较好的控制效果。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Improvement of hydraulic looper control technology for thin strip hot rolling line
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Through the processes analysis of hydraulic looper in continuous rolling line,and combined with the result of height position and tension torque for the hydraulic looper control of hot strip mill, a torque control mode prior to the height position control in the strip tail was proposed. By the application of the control theory about self-adaptive、multi-control etc, the influence of process and equipment change on the looper control was solved. The false looper torque of the strip and sideslip of the strip tail was avoided. This control strategy was applied in hot rolling line, and better control result was achieved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
闫峥嵘 张世厚. 薄带热连轧液压活套控制技术的改进[J]. , 2015, 32(1): 66-69.
YAN Zheng-rong, ZHANG Shi-hou. Improvement of hydraulic looper control technology for thin strip hot rolling line. , 2015, 32(1): 66-69.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 薄规格铝镇静钢板形缺陷的控制研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: CHANG An1，WANG Shu- gang2，ZHANG Dong1，LIN Hai- hai1，WANG Yong- qing1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.首钢集团有限公司技术研究院，北京100043
2.首钢集团有限公司，北京100041
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 对薄规格铝镇静钢高次浪形缺陷问题进行了研究，从目标板形曲线补偿、轧辊磨损以及性能均匀性方面开展了试验工作。存在高次浪形缺陷的带钢，宽度方向的性能存在较大的性能差异。提高退火温度、降低快冷温度以及提高卷取温度，理论上都会改善连退带钢的性能。试验结果表明：提高卷取温度，明显改善了带钢宽度方向上的性能均匀性，同时有效地抑制了薄规格铝镇静钢高次浪形缺陷的产生。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on control of shape defect of thin gauge Al- killed steel strip
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to study the high order wave defects of the thin gauge aluminum- killed steel strip,the experimental work had been carried out from the aspects of the target shape curve compensation,roll wear and the uniformity of the performance.There were a large performance difference in the width direction of the strip with higher wave shape defects.Increasing the annealing temperature,reducing the rapid cooling temperature and increasing the coiling temperature in theory would improve the performance of strip products.The test results showed that increasing the coiling temperature,the performance uniformity was improved of the strip width direction,and the thin gauge aluminum- killed steel higher- order wave shape defects could effectively restrained.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
常安，王树岗，张栋，林海海，王永强. 薄规格铝镇静钢板形缺陷的控制研究[J]. , 2017, 34(5): 35-37.
CHANG An，WANG Shu- gang，ZHANG Dong，LIN Hai- hai，WANG Yong- qing. Research on control of shape defect of thin gauge Al- killed steel strip. , 2017, 34(5): 35-37.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 短小厂房内兼容棒材和不锈钢高线的设计改造
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京科技大学
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对郑州永通特钢公司在长度仅185m的厂房内原有1条轴承钢棒材生产线的基础上欲再增加1条不锈钢高线的情况，北京科技大学轧钢研究所对其进行了设计改造，本文分析了其技术难点，采用了吐丝机与散冷辊道垂直布置，以及导管加侧活套的方案。生产实践证明，该工艺合理可行，为其他厂家提供了可供借鉴的模式

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热轧带钢轧后冷却过程控制系统的设计与应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为实现热轧带钢轧后冷却过程智能化控制，本文遵循软件工程设计思想，提出了一套完整的热轧带钢轧后冷却过程控制系统设计方案，建立了系统层次结构模型、功能结构模型及其后台数据库，实现了热轧带钢轧后冷却过程的智能化控制。现场应用表明，带钢卷取温度控制精度在±10℃以内。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 两自由度轧机辊系参激刚度非线性振动特性研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 南昌工学院基础教学部，江西南昌330108
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 考虑轧机辊系间的参激刚度以及轧制过程中辊系受到的动态轧制力，建立了两自由度轧机辊系参激刚度振动模型。运用多尺度法求解给出了系统1/2亚谐共振和内共振的幅频方程，以某冷轧机实际轧制参数为例，通过数值仿真得到结构阻尼、非线性刚度以及参激刚度等工艺参数变化下系统的幅频响应特性。并采用奇异性理论分析了1/2亚谐共振的静态分岔特性，同时分析了内共振情形下3组不同的转迁集以及相应的分岔拓扑结构图, 得到了轧机稳定与不稳定振动的工艺参数区域。最后研究了工作辊、支撑辊随参激刚度变化的分岔混沌动力学行为，且用最大Lyapunov指数、相轨图以及Poincare截面对其加以验证，发现带材表面出现振纹或振痕的原因是系统在周期运动、倍周期运动与混沌运动多种运动形式间相互转换造成的。因此适当选取系统参数可有效减弱轧机系统的振动，这为消除和抑制轧机振动提供了理论依据。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on nonlinear vibration characteristics of parametrically excited stiffness of 2- DOF rolling mill rolls
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In this paper, considering the impact of the parametrically excited stiffness among the rolling mill rolls and the dynamical rolling force in the rolling process,a nonlinear vibrntion model of parametrically excited stiffness was established. Using the multiple- scale method to solve the amplitude- frequency equation of 1/2 harmonic resonance and inner resonance about the system, by taking the actual parameters of cold rolling mill for example, the variational characteristics of the amplitude- frequency response curve about the system were gotten by using the numerical simulation, which changs with the parametrically excited stiffness, finding that rolling mill vibration can be reduced when reducing the parametrically excited stiffness. The static bifurcation characteristics of 1/2 harmonic resonance were analyzed with singularity theory，3 groups of different transition set and the corresponding bifurcation topology structure under the inner resonance were also studyed, and the process parameters area with the stable and unstable vibration of the rolling mill was reached. Finally, studying on the bifurcation chaos dynamics behavior of the work roll and back- up roll with the parametrically excited stiffness changing, and adopting the top Lyapunov exponent maps, the phase plane plots and the Poincare section maps to verify it, the reason- that the strip surface appears chatter or vibration marks was found that is was caused by the dynamic behaviors such as period, period- 3 motion and chaos of the rolling mill. So by choosing proper system parameter can restrain this behavior effectively, which provides a theory basis to eliminate and control the rolling mill vibration.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
彭荣荣. 两自由度轧机辊系参激刚度非线性振动特性研究[J]. , 2015, 32(6): 40-47.
PENG Rong- rong. Research on nonlinear vibration characteristics of parametrically excited stiffness of 2- DOF rolling mill rolls. , 2015, 32(6): 40-47.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 中厚板轧机平面形状控制模型的优化与应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 河钢集团邯钢公司中板厂，河北邯郸056001
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过研究平面形状控制技术，建立了宽展模型、头尾形状计算模型，同时采用理论推导和统计分析相结合的方法确定了平面形状控制模型参数，得到了中厚板轧机平面形状控制模型。对模型进行了现场校验、优化，在现场成功实现了平面形状控制功能，显著提高了成材率。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Optimization and application of plan view patter control model for plate mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Basd on the research of plan view patter control model,the wide spreading and the head and tail shape calculation models were established.Meanwhile,the parameters of plan view pattern control model were determined by theoretical derivation and statistical analysis method.The plan view pattern control function was successfully used in industry production by checked and optimized onsite,the yield rate was obviously improved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
檀丽静，张帅，马有辉. 中厚板轧机平面形状控制模型的优化与应用[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(3): 14-17.
TAN Lijing，ZHANG Shuai，MA Youhui. Optimization and application of plan view patter control model for plate mill. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(3): 14-17.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热轧工艺参数对汽车梁用钢表面氧化铁皮结构的影响
镀锡板冲压黑线缺陷的成因分析与改进
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.首钢集团有限公司技术研究院，北京100043；2.绿色可循环钢铁流程北京市重点实验室，北京100043；
3.首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司，河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 利用扫描电子显微镜、能谱仪、电化学工作站分析了化工喷雾罐顶盖冲压黑线及镀锡基板的缺陷形貌。结果表明，喷雾罐顶盖黑线处已裸露铁基体，且部分部位被氧化，镀锡板针状黑点或短线状黑点处的锡层已被破坏和氧化。利用电化学法脱去锡层，观察基板形貌，发现针状黑点对应的基板部位存在缺陷，而短线状黑点对应的基板部位未见异常。可以推断冲压黑线是由于镀锡板锡层因基板缺陷或擦伤而遭到破坏，经冲压变形后加剧铁基体裸露在外的程度导致形成黑色短线。为此，提出了相应的改进措施，避免了缺陷的产生。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Cause  analysis and improvement of the stamping dark linear defects on the tinplate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The defects morphologies of the stamping dark line of the chemical spray cans top and tin-plated substrate were analyzed by scanning electron microscope,energy spectrometer and electrochemical workstation.The results showed that the iron matrix had been exposed at the dark line of the spray cans top,and some parts were oxidized.The tin layer at the dark acicular  spots or shortline dark spots of the tinplate had been destroyed and oxidized by removed tin layer with electrochemical method,and the morphology of the substrate was observed.It was found that there was a defect in the substrate portion corresponding to the dark aciculuar spots,and no abnormality was observed in the substrate portion corresponding to the short-line dark  spot.It can be inferred that the stamping dark line is caused by the destruction of the tin layer of the tinplate due to substrate defects or scratches,and the appearance of the black matrix is exaggerated after the stamping deformation,resulting in the formation of darkshort lines defect.Thus corresponding improvement measures were put forward,and the dark line defect were avoided.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
吴志国，方圆，李永新，刘洋. 镀锡板冲压黑线缺陷的成因分析与改进[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(6): 53-55.
WU Zhiguo，FANG Yuan，LI Yongxin，LIU Yang. Cause  analysis and improvement of the stamping dark linear defects on the tinplate. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(6): 53-55.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 中板轧制过程翘头影响因素模拟分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: CHEN Hui1，HUANG Zhenyi1，XU Yiping2，CHEN Dongwen2，YE Chunyang1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.安徽工业大学冶金工程学院，安徽马鞍山243000；2.南京钢铁股份有限公司，江苏南京210035
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对中板轧制过程出现的翘头问题，分析研究了辊速差、辊径差、摩擦因数、轧件上下表面温差以及轧制线高度对翘头的影响规律，将出炉坯料上下表面温差控制在25 ℃以内，粗、精轧轧制线高度分别设置为-2 mm和+4~+6 mm，可有效地改善轧件翘头问题，提高生产效益。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Simulation analysis on the factors affecting the head warping in medium plate rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the head warping problem during medium plate rolling process,the influences of the roll speed difference,the roll diameter difference,the friction coefficient,the temperature difference between the upper and lower surfaces of the rolled piece and the height of the rolling line on the head warping were analyzed.The temperature difference was controlled within 25 ℃,and the heights of the roughing and finishing rolling lines were set to -2 mm and +4~+6 mm respectively,which could effectively improve the head warping problem of the rolled piece and improve the production efficiency.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陈辉，黄贞益，徐益平，陈东文，叶春阳. 中板轧制过程翘头影响因素模拟分析[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(2): 23-25.
CHEN Hui，HUANG Zhenyi，XU Yiping，CHEN Dongwen，YE Chunyang. Simulation analysis on the factors affecting the head warping in medium plate rolling. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(2): 23-25.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 金属冷热切圆锯片开裂、掉块原因分析及改进措施
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 唐山冶金锯片有限公司，河北唐山063020
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 锯片开裂或者掉块是圆锯片最常见的失效形式，也最具危险性。针对金属冷热切圆锯片使用后的失效形态，对照其使用状况、工件条件，分析了圆锯片裂纹产生的原因及扩展规律。结合生产实际，从锯切设备、锯切参数控制、锯片性能、锯片管理方面提出了防范措施。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Causes analysis of cracking and falling problem of metal cold and hot cutting circular saw blade  and its improvement measures
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The cracking or falling of the saw blade is the most common failure mode of the circular saw blade,and it is also the most dangerous.According to the failure mode of the metal cold and hot cutting circular saw blade,the causes and expansion laws of the crack of the circular saw blade were analyzed according to the use condition and workpiece condition.Combined with the actual production,the prevention measures are proposed from the aspects of sawing equipment,sawing parameter control,saw blade performance and saw blade management.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
郭继富，韩会杰，赵东岩，张艳龙. 金属冷热切圆锯片开裂、掉块原因分析及改进措施[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(5): 93-.
GUO Jifu,HAN Huijie,ZHAO Dongyan,ZHANG Yanlong. Causes analysis of cracking and falling problem of metal cold and hot cutting circular saw blade  and its improvement measures. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(5): 93-.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 连铸坯内生超硬TiC超级耐磨钢的研究与应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: DENG Xiangtao1,WANG Zhaodong1,HUANG Long1,LIANG Liang1,2,YAN Qiangjun3,WANG Guodong1#br#
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819；
2.湖南华菱涟源钢铁有限公司，湖南娄底417009；3.南京钢铁股份有限公司，江苏南京210035
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 在常规低合金马氏体耐磨钢合金成分的基础上，添加一定量的Ti元素，通过冶炼连铸过程中形成大量微米、亚微米超硬TiC陶瓷颗粒，并结合控制轧制和控制热处理的工艺控制，使其弥散均匀分布在板条马氏体基体上，研发出一种新型连铸坯内生超硬TiC陶瓷颗粒增强耐磨性超级耐磨钢板，并在国内某钢厂进行了工业化生产。分析了连铸、热轧和离线热处理时实验钢中TiC的演变规律和组织性能的变化，并研究了其耐磨性能。结果表明，新型钢板中由于较多Ti元素的添加，在连铸凝固过程中形成仿晶界的微米、亚微米级的超硬TiC粒子，轧制和离线热处理过程中，仿晶界的TiC粒子在马氏体基体中弥散均匀分布；耐磨性测试表明，在同等硬度的条件下，新型耐磨钢板的耐磨性达到传统马氏体耐磨钢的1.5~1.8倍，具有优异的耐磨性能。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development and industrial application of new super low alloy abrasion resistant steel dependenting on continuous casting formed TiC particles
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：A new super abrasion resistant steel which dependent on the super hard TiC particles formed during continuous casting was developed.The new steel contained large amount of Ti element which formed micron and submicron TiC particles in martensite compared to conventional low alloy martenstic wear resistant steel,and the steel was also industrial produced in a domestic steel company.The formation and evolution of TiC particles during continuous casting,rolling and heat treatment were studied,the mechanical properties and wear behavior of industrial steel were also analyzed.The results indicated that the new steel exhibits excellent combination of mechanical properties and wear resistance because of the TiC particles which dispersed on martensitic matrix,the wear resistance of the new development steel was about 1.5 to 1.8 time to the same grade hardness steel,which exhibits excellent wear resistant.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：With the thickness increasing of heavy gauge pipeline steel plate, its drop weight tear test property control difficulty increasing dramatically, it was become a key technology for pipeline steel plate development. The influence rules of slab thickness, reduction rate at nonrecrystallization zone, the deformation rate and rolling schedule optimization on seepage deformation at roughing stage and DWTT property of plate were analyzed, and the industrialization of rolling test was carried out. The results showed that rolling the same specifications (22 mm thick) pipeline steel plate, the plate hammer shear area was increased from 85%—90% to 90%—100% with slab thickness increased from 300 mm to 400 mm. By the same (400 mm thickness) thickness slab to rolling 25 mm gauge pipeline steel plate, the hammer shear area was increased from 85%—90% to 90%—95%.

1.东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819；
2.江苏沙钢集管有限公司，江苏张家港215625；3.敬业集团,河北石家庄050400
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 超快速冷却技术因具有冷却强度高、冷却均匀性好等优点，已经成为弥补热轧带钢轧后冷却能力不足的最有效手段。但在应用过程中，带钢运行速度具有时变性，变化规律差别大，同时受轧后冷却段长度短及布置特点限制，使轧后冷却工艺温度精度控制难度增大。结合国内某现场轧后冷却系统特点，对影响轧后冷却工艺温度精度的因素进行了研究，揭示了关键因素对工艺温度精度的影响规律；首次将中间温度引入计算过程，开发了超快速冷却系统多阶计算修正智能化控制策略，结合轧制生产过程中的历史数据规律，引入数据挖掘技术，减少了上游工序工艺波动对下游工艺控制的遗传性，实现了对轧后冷却工艺温度的精确控制。现场应用表明，该控制策略增强了系统运行稳定性，卷取温度命中率提高了近3%~5%，为产品的开发及批量生产提供了技术保证。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on intelligentize control strategy for ultrafast cooling in hot rolled strip
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：For the characteristics of high cooling strength and strong cooling uniformity,ultrafast cooling technology has been to the most effective method to make up the cooling capacity of hot rolled strip cooling after rolling.However,during the application process,timedependent strip velocity,big difference variation,at the same time limited by the length of the cooling section after rolling and layout characteristics,which increased the difficulty of control accuracy cooling temperature after rolling.In this paper,combined with a domestic production line cooling system characteristics,the factors affecting the temperature accuracy of the cooling after rolling were studied,the influence of key factors on temperature accuracy was revealed.The intermediate temperature was first introduced into the calculation process,intelligent control strategy for multistage calculation and correction of ultra  fast cooling system was developed.Combined with the historical data of the rolling process,the fluctuations of upstream process on the downstream process control heredity was decreased.The precise controlling cooling temperature after rolling was improved.Industrial applications show that the stability of system is enhanced,the hit rate of CT is increased by 3%-5%,and the technical assurance for production development and batch production was provided.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李振垒，陈冬，袁国，尹锋，曹利芹，王国栋. 热轧带钢超快速冷却系统智能化控制策略研究[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(6): 69-73.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 特厚钢板轧制缺陷压合和双鼓形有限元分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对某厂采用400mm厚 Q345连铸坯生产120mm特厚钢板时铸坯中心缺陷压合及轧后钢板出现双鼓形缺陷的问题，以刚-粘塑性有限元软件模拟了缺陷压合条件和双鼓形形成过程。结果表明，400mm厚铸坯不能在开轧后1~3道次内压合缺陷，但随压合参数l/的增大和应变累积作用，中心裂纹被压合；第1道次压合400mm厚铸坯中心矩形裂纹的临界压下率为158%，转化为几何参数l/=0511；400mm厚铸坯在轧制的各个阶段均存在双鼓形缺陷，双鼓形最大峰值的临界变形条件为l/=0542，增大轧辊尺寸、减少横轧道次可减轻双鼓形缺陷。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 冷轧压下率对连续退火MR钢组织性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: SUN Zhong- hua a, ZHANG Peng a, CHEN Wena, GONG Zhi- qiang b, SUN Xiao- ran a, LIU Hong- qianga
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
河北钢铁集团，a.河北钢铁技术研究总院，河北石家庄052165
b.河北钢铁集团衡水板业有限公司，河北衡水053000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 细小均匀的晶粒尺寸是保证高档MR钢镀锡板产品力学性能均匀性至关重要的因素。本文利用冷轧及连续退火模拟试验机，研究了冷轧压下率对连续退火MR钢镀锡基板组织性能的影响。结果表明：试样经620 ℃保温40 s处理后可以获得完全再结晶显微组织，且退火再结晶平均晶粒尺寸随冷轧压下率呈非线性变化关系, 平均晶粒尺寸与屈服强度、抗拉强度和显微维氏硬度之间符合Hall- Petch公式。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Influence of the cold rolling reduction rate on microstructures and mechanical properties of the continuous annealing MR steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The homogeneous fine grain size is the essential factor for guaranteeing the mechanical property uniformity of the top- grade MR- based tinplate products. In this paper, using the cold rolling and continuous annealing simulation equipment , the influence of the cold rolling reduction rate on the microstructures and the mechanical properties of continuous annealing MR- based tinplate were investigated. The results show that the MR steels has the full recrystallization microstructures of annealing at 620 ℃ for 40 s , and furthermore, the cold rolling reduction rate dependence of the average grain sizes of the recrystallization microstructures is non- linear. By compared with the microstructures and the mechanical properties, it is revealed that the average grain size is fit to the Hall- Petch formula with the yield strength, the tensile strength and the micro- vickershardness.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
孙中华，张鹏， 陈文， 龚志强， 孙晓冉， 刘宏强. 冷轧压下率对连续退火MR钢组织性能的影响[J]. , 2015, 32(4): 34-37.
SUN Zhong- hua a, ZHANG Peng a, CHEN Wena, GONG Zhi- qiang b, SUN Xiao- ran a, LIU Hong- qianga. Influence of the cold rolling reduction rate on microstructures and mechanical properties of the continuous annealing MR steel. , 2015, 32(4): 34-37.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 复合轧制工艺对SM45钢组织性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LI Guang-long，ZHAO Tan，YUAN Si-yu，LI Wen-bin，FAN Liu-qun,GUO Xiao-bo
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 鞍钢集团钢铁研究院，辽宁鞍山114009
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用Gleeble 3800热模拟试验机，对SM45钢不同保温时间、不同变形量的复合轧制过程进行了研究；对试样的结合强度、复合界面金相组织进行了检验。结果表明：试样的结合强度、界面结合率随着试样保温时间的延长以及变形量的增加而增加，保温时间3 min、变形量20%时，结合强度可达370 MPa，界面结合率达90%以上；界面处金相组织为一条铁素体带状组织，该组织是由先共析铁素体的析出导致的；在带状组织上分布有点状夹杂物，夹杂物的形成与试样加工后表面的粗糙度有关。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effects of clad rolling technology on microstructure and properties of SM45 steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Different holding time and different reduction of SM45 steel clad rolling process were studied in hot simulation experiment machine Gleeble 3800.Strength of samples and metallographic structure of interface were tested.The results indicated that the combination strength of sample and union rate of interface increased with extending heat holding time and increasing reduction.At the holding time of 3 min,reduction of 20%,the combination strength reached 370 MPa,and union rate of interface reached above 90%.The metallographic structure of interface was a ferrite belt which formed because of the proeutectoid ferrite.There were some point inclusions in ferrite belt,the formation of inclusions was correlated with roughness of samples surface after machining.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李广龙，赵坦，原思宇，李文斌，范刘群，郭晓波. 复合轧制工艺对SM45钢组织性能的影响[J]. , 2016, 33(5): 11-14.
LI Guang-long，ZHAO Tan，YUAN Si-yu，LI Wen-bin，FAN Liu-qun,GUO Xiao-bo. Effects of clad rolling technology on microstructure and properties of SM45 steel. , 2016, 33(5): 11-14.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: Q420qNHE耐候钢板的研发
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIU Qingbo，XU Shaopu，CHEN Xi，YUAN Yongqi，QUAN Weibo
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 南阳汉冶特钢有限公司钢研所，河南南阳474500
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过对Q420qNHE耐候钢化学成分设计，确定合理的加热温度，以及对轧制工艺优化（采用非再结晶区控制轧制+细化晶粒控制轧制），获得了低碳贝氏体组织，有效地提高了钢板的综合力学性能和耐腐蚀性能，保证了80 mm厚及以下规格耐大气腐蚀用钢板Q420qNHE的各项性能均满足技术要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development of Q420qNHE atmospheric corrosion resisting steel plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Through designing chemical composition of Q420qNHE atmospheric corrosion resisting steel,determining the reasonable heating temperature and optimizing the rolling process (the nonrecrystallization zone and grain refinement controlled rolling),the low carbon bainite stucture was obtained,which effectively improved the comprehensive mechanical properties and corrosion resistance of this steel plate.The whole properties were guaranted to meet the technical requirements of the 80 mm or smaller thichness plate.
keywords_en: Q420qNHE atmospheric corrossion steel plate；heating temperature
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘庆波，许少普，陈熙，袁永旗，全微波. Q420qNHE耐候钢板的研发[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(1): 18-23.
LIU Qingbo，XU Shaopu，CHEN Xi，YUAN Yongqi，QUAN Weibo. Development of Q420qNHE atmospheric corrosion resisting steel plate. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(1): 18-23.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: Nb-Ti连铸坯热芯大压下轧制动态再结晶行为研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用热模拟单道次压缩实验，研究了Nb-Ti连铸坯热芯大压下轧制中动态再结晶行为及奥氏体晶粒转变规律。结果表明，变形温度越高，应变速率越低，发生动态再结晶的临界应变值越小，动态再结晶越充分。在变形温度1 350 ℃，继续增加应变至0.8和增加应变速率至10 s-1，奥氏体晶粒尺寸并未得到进一步细化，反而较应变0.5和应变速率5 s-1下的奥氏体晶粒更加粗大。这是因为高温粘塑性区的金属晶间粘性流动增加，位错增殖速度增大，在动态再结晶过程中会重新形成新的无畸变再结晶晶粒，这些新的无畸变晶粒的亚动态再结晶动力学极快，在较大驱动力下使奥氏体晶界快速迁移，从而使奥氏体发生一定程度的粗化。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study on dynamic recrystallization in Nb-Ti microalloyed slab during hot-core heavy reduction rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Dynamic recrystallization behavior and austenite grain morphology of NbTi microalloyed steel during hotcore heavy reduction rolling was studied by single pass compression thermal simulation experiment.The result showed that higher deformation temperature and lower strain rate were more advantageous to occur dynamic recrystallization.At higher temperature of 1 350 ℃,when the strain was increased to 0.8 and the strain rate was increased to 10 s-1,the austenite grain size was no more decreased and even coarsened  compared at  strain of 0.5 and strain rate of 5 s-1.This was because the viscous flow between the metal crystals in the high temperature viscoplastic region increased,and the dislocation growth rate increased.During the dynamic recrystallization process,new distortionfree recrystallized grains would be reformed.The recrystallization kinetics was extremely fast,and the austenite grain boundaries were rapidly migrated under a large driving force,so that the austenite coarsens to a certain extent.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
宫美娜，李海军，王斌，王昭东. Nb-Ti连铸坯热芯大压下轧制动态再结晶行为研究[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(1): 12-17.
GONG Meina,LI Haijun,WANG Bin,WANG Zhaodong. Study on dynamic recrystallization in Nb-Ti microalloyed slab during hot-core heavy reduction rolling. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(1): 12-17.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 汽车门板用450 mm特厚模具钢1.2311钢板的试制
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 南阳汉冶特钢有限公司钢研所，河南南阳474500
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 南阳汉冶特钢有限公司采用转炉洁净钢冶炼技术、水冷铜板结晶锭模技术、高温低速大压下轧制技术以及先进的热处理工艺，成功研发出450 mm厚汽车门板用模具钢1.2311特厚板。通过水冷模浇铸凝固、缓冷回火扩氢、JMatPro软件模拟该钢种静态CCT曲线制定合理的热处理冷却工艺，保证了该钢种优良的可切削性及镜面研磨性能，硬度指标均匀且稳定。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development of 450 mm thickness 1.2311 die steel plate for automotive door panel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The 450 mm thickness 1.2311 die steel plate was developed by converter clean steel smelting technology,water- cooled copper mould technology,low speed and high pressure rolling technology and advanced heat treatment technology in Nanyang Hanye Special Steel Co.,Ltd.Through the mold casting solidification process,slow cooling hydrogen expansion treatment,JMatPro software simulation of the steel static CCT curve,the machinability and mirror grinding performance of this steel plate were ensured with uniform hardness.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
康文举. 汽车门板用450 mm特厚模具钢1.2311钢板的试制[J]. , 2018, 35(5): 71-74.
KANG Wen- ju. Development of 450 mm thickness 1.2311 die steel plate for automotive door panel. , 2018, 35(5): 71-74.

通过对酸洗-轧机联合机组工艺流程的剖析，介绍了一种计算该机组酸洗线产量及相关参数的计算

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: AGC液压缸是板带热轧机的关键部件之一，缸体材质为42CrMo高强钢，其焊接性较差，容易出现裂纹，整体更换液压缸的成本相当高，补焊修复是首选措施。通过合理的焊接工艺，实现了缸体补焊修复，延长了液压缸的使用寿命，降低了生产成本。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：AGC cylinder is one of the key component of strip mill.The material of cylinder body is 42CrMo steel.Its weldability is very poor,and the crack is easily appeared.The cost is very high of replacing it by a new cylinder.To repair it is preferred measure.The proper welding technology had been determined to realize cylinder body welding repairing.Finally,the service life of the hydraulic cylinder was prolonged,and the production cost was reduced.
keywords_en: inner surface of AGC cylinder body
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 燕山大学工业计算机控制工程河北省重点实验室
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为提高轧制力模型的设定精度，以包含冷连轧带钢轧制过程变形区金属塑性变形和入口、出口弹性变形的Bland-Ford-Hill模型作为冷连轧轧制力模型，提出利用改进自适应遗传算法对平均变形抗力和摩擦系数进行寻优搜索，得出满足实际轧制力精度的平均变形抗力和摩擦系数，进而通过指数平滑法计算出平均变形抗力和摩擦系数的自学习系数，实验结果表明：该模型自学习后轧制力的设定精度可以满足在线控制的要求。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 轧后快冷工艺对叉车门架型钢20MnSiV组织性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学材料科学与工程学院，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为满足客户对叉车门架型钢20MnSiV性能的要求，在不添加合金元素的条件下，研究了不同终轧温度和快冷工艺对20MnSiV钢组织性能的影响。结果表明：在950 ℃终轧，然后以40 ℃/s的冷却速率将试样冷却到600 ℃左右，最后空冷，实验钢组织为粒状贝氏体+少量针状铁素体，其强度和韧性均有较大幅度提高，综合力学性能良好。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis of mechanical properties and microstructure of 20MnSiV fork lift truck door frame steel after rolling and fast cooling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to meet the need of customers′performance requirement for the 20MnSiV fork lift truck door frame steel,the influence of different finishing rolling temperature and fast cooling process on the performance of 20MnSiV steel were studied under the condition of not adding alloy elements.The results show that the finishing rolling temperature is 950 ℃,the cooling rate is 40 ℃/s,and the sample is cooled to about 600 ℃ then air cooling.Based on these processes,the microstructure of tested steel is granular bainite+small amount acicular ferrite,its strength and toughness are obviously improved,and the good comprehensive mechanical property is obtained.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对梅钢热镀铝锌产品常出现锌点凸起表面缺陷的问题，分析认为氧化铁皮是缺陷产生的根本原因。因此，通过采取设备状态优化、生产工艺优化及规范操作标准等措施严格控制氧化铁皮的产生，使该缺陷大幅减少，改判量从每月120t降低到每月的40t以内。

Based on it, the defect was greatly reduced, and the amount of change from 120t per month lowered within 40t.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 冷轧机油雾分离器排液系统的改进
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 济南钢铁集团有限公司冷轧板厂
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对冷轧机油雾分离器排液系统须定期手动排液而带来的系列问题，利用“负压差大于零”的原理，对排液系统进行了改进，使手动排液变为自动排液。同时对分离器外部的集油坑进行改造，使集油坑也实现了自动排液。系统改进后不仅提高了生产效率和风机的使用寿命，而且还有益于现场作业环境的改善。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: UCMW六辊冷连轧机刚度测定方法研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: CHEN Dan1, HE Xu-ling2, GAO Lei1, GUO Li-wei1, LI Shu-chang1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1. 北京首钢自动化信息技术有限公司自动化研究所, 北京 100041
2. 首钢迁安钢铁有限责任公司, 河北 迁安 064404
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 轧机刚度对产品的厚度精度和板形控制都十分重要, 但轧机刚性系数不是固定不变的, 而是受现场工况和实际轧制条件所影响的, 故实际生产一段时间后, 需要对轧机刚度进行测定, 获得与现场实际生产相符的轧机刚度系数。本文在传统压靠法的基础上, 结合现场实际生产中UCMW轧机特性, 分别测量和计算了UCMW轧机中间辊在不同横移位置处的轧机刚度, 同时在测定过程中考虑了轧制力上升和下降的情况, 保证了数据的可靠性, 提高了轧机刚度计算的精确度, 从而提高了辊缝计算模型的精确度。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on the rigidity measure method for 6-high tandem cold mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Mill rigidity is very important for the thickness accuracy and shape control of products, however the mill rigidity coefficient is not intrinsic constant in various rolling conditions. So the mill rigidity should be measured in actual production for a period of time. In this paper, taking into account the characteristics of UCMW mill, and based on the traditional pressing method, the mill rigidity was measured and calculated under different intermediate roll shifting position with the rolling force in the rising and declining situation. This method ensured the reliability of the data and improved the calculation accuracy of rolling mill rigidity.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陈 丹 何绪铃 高 雷 郭立伟 李书昌. UCMW六辊冷连轧机刚度测定方法研究[J]. , 2015, 32(2): 32-35.
CHEN Dan, HE Xu-ling, GAO Lei, GUO Li-wei, LI Shu-chang. Research on the rigidity measure method for 6-high tandem cold mill. , 2015, 32(2): 32-35.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: CVC热连轧机支撑辊倒角的工作性能研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京科技大学高效轧制国家工程研究中心
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 分析了热连轧机支撑辊大圆弧复合型倒角的设计思想，并以某２２５０ｍｍ 常规热连轧精轧机为例，运用基于影响函数法的辊系弹性变形理论，分析了不同支撑辊倒角参数对轧机板形控制性能的影响。结果表明，支撑辊倒角高度越大，承载辊缝横向刚度越大，但还需考虑带钢临界宽度对板形控制的影响；支撑辊倒角高度大的弯辊调控效果要优于倒角高度小的，且随着宽度的增加效果也会越明显；使用较小的支撑辊倒角高度可以在一定程度上改善轧辊磨损的不均匀性。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：For the problems of biting difficult,running deviated of strip,rolling broken and unable increasing rolling speed which affects the production efficiency during rolling 45 steel and 50 steel,the reasons were analyzed.Therefore,the rolling strategy,the tension deviation,the preset parameters of the strip shape and the selflearning function of the rolling mill were optimized.The stable rolling of 45 steel and 50 steel were realized,the probability of strip running deviation in the 1# stand was reduced,and the rolling speed was increased to 500 m/min.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了热轧双相钢的生产工艺以及典型工艺参数对其组织性能的影响。热轧双相钢的生产工艺类型分为低温卷取型和中温卷取型，终轧温度、空冷温度、空冷时间等工艺参数对双相钢的组织和性能影响显著。同时，介绍了国内外短流程生产热轧双相钢的现状、发展趋势和存在问题，指出高强化、减薄化是双相钢未来的发展方向，而性能稳定性、表面质量和薄规格产品的板形问题是短流程热轧双相钢亟需解决的问题。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Production process and influence of typical parameters on microstructure and properties of hot rolled dual- phase steel were introduced.Its production process types include low- temperature coiling and medium- temperature coiling.Production parameters,such as finishing rolling temperature,air cooling temperature and air cooling time had significant influence on microstructure and properties of dual- phase steel.In addition,present situation,development trend and problems of producing dual- phase steel in TSCR (thin slab casting and direct rolling) line were also introduced.High strength and thickness reducing would be development direction of dual- phase steel,properties stability,surface quality and shape of thin gauge products were problems to be solved.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn:
二次冷轧过程产生的废乳化液COD值高达20.00mg/L以上,由于其成分复杂,在钢铁企业广泛应
用的超滤预处理方法不能满足后续的生化处理要求。为此，采用化学混凝法对二次冷轧废乳化液进行了预处理。实验结果表明，改性聚合硫酸铁对二次冷轧废乳化液具有良好的破乳作用；用于处理500ml二次冷轧废乳化液的最佳条件为：改性聚合硫酸铁的用量4ml，絮凝剂PAM的用量0.3ml，ph值为8左右，沉降时间20min，COD去除率可达到98%以上，在实际工程中得以应用，取得了满意效果。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Strategy Optimization of Final Stand Gauge Control for Tandem Cold Mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The overload of stand 4 and low tension control accuracy between stand 4 and stand 5 were caused, and then the gauge control accuracy was influenced, since the rolling force control closed-loop mode for final stand was adopted in five-stand tandem cold mill. In order to improve gauge control accuracy under the premise of high rolling force control accuracy for final stand, an optimized strategy for last stand gauge control was proposed. By building up dynamic rolling force compensation controller and dynamic load balance controller, the effects of speed adjustment on tension and gauge were compensated, and the load distribution of stands was balanced. The practical application results show that the high accuracy control result of final stand rolling force is achieved, and the load of stand 4 is optimized. In addition, the gauge control accuracy of product is better than ±1%. This optimized strategy can satisfy well the need of gauge control of tandem cold mill.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
张浩宇，张殿华，孙杰，李旭. 冷连轧末机架厚度控制策略的优化[J]. , 2013, 30(6): 50-55.
ZHANG Hao-yu, ZHANG Dian-hua, SUN Jie, LI Xu. Strategy Optimization of Final Stand Gauge Control for Tandem Cold Mill. , 2013, 30(6): 50-55.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 中厚板轧制中间冷却过程研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 中厚板控制轧制工艺中需对中间坯进行待温控制，由于待温时间长，因而轧制效率低。为此，本文研究了控轧待温水冷过程，并建立了摆动冷却模型，进行了冷却过程参数预计算，建立了微跟踪模型，准确跟踪冷却过程的中间坯位置，保证了冷却过程的顺利执行。实验表明，中间冷却过程可有效缩短待温时间，提高轧制效率。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 非等温碳分配条件下的热轧DQ&P工艺研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LI Yun-jie, LIU Ming-fu, HU Hong-ling, YANG Jing-yan, LIU Ming-rui, WANG Guo-dong
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁 沈阳 110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为满足汽车轻量化的发展要求, 先进高强度钢已成为研究热点, 近年来以淬火-分配(Q&P)理念为基础的工艺研究备受关注。本文将Q&P理念引入热轧工艺过程中, 并进行了实验研究, 即采用直接淬火（DQ）工艺结合非等温条件下碳分配处理(碳分配过程在模拟卷取过程中进行)。实验结果表明: 实验钢组织由马氏体、残余奥氏体及少量铁素体组成。当卷取温度为350 ℃时, 实验钢组织中残余奥氏体体积分数较高, 达到11.5%, 同时抗拉强度达到1 370 MPa, 伸长率为14.20%, 强塑积为19.5 GPa·%。进行TEM观察, 发现马氏体板条束之间存在以薄膜状形态分布的残余奥氏体。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on hot-rolling DQ&P process under non-isothermal carbon partition
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to satisfy the requirements of lightweight in the automotive industry, advanced high strength steel has become a hot topic. In recent years, the research based on Q&P concept has been paid extensive attentions. The present work takes Q&P concept into considerations during hot rolling process, combining direct quenching with non-isothermal carbon partition that the partition process will occur during the coiling process. The test results show that martensite , retained austenite and a little ferrite are obtained in the tested steel. When the coiling temperature is at 350 ℃, the microstructure includes a higher fraction of retained austenite reaching 11.5%,and the tested steel exhibits high ultimate tensile strength exceeding 1 375 MPa and fine elongation of 14.2% and TS ×TEL of 19.5 GPa·% .In addition, there is thin film retained austenite presenting in martensite lath when observed by TEM.
keywords_en: product of tensile strength and elongation
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李云杰，刘洺甫，胡虹玲，杨靖妍，刘明瑞，王国栋. 非等温碳分配条件下的热轧DQ&P工艺研究[J]. , 2015, 32(2): 13-17.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 在高速电气化铁路系统中，接触网是铁路电气化工程的主构架，热轧H型钢作为接触网的重要支撑构件，具有质量轻、强度高、寿命长、弹性变形大、施工方便、绿色环保等优点。介绍了我国电气化铁路接触网支柱用热轧H型钢的开发过程及研究现状，分析和讨论了大规格、超厚度、高强度、耐低温电气化铁路接触网支柱用热轧H型钢的未来发展,助推我国高速铁路建设的国际化发展。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Current situation and development of hot rolled H-beam section steel for electrified railway contact net pole
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In the high speed electrified railway system,contact net is the main frame for electrification engineering.As an important supporting pole for contact net,the hot rolled Hbeam section steel has the characteristics of light weight,high strength,long service life,large elastic deformation,convenient construction and environmental conservation.The development process and research status of hot rolled Hbeam section steel for electrified railway contact net supporting pole were introduced,and the future development of large size,super thickness,high strength,low temperature resistance of this steel was analyzed and discussed so as to boost the international development of Chinese high speed railway manufacturing.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 边部翘皮缺陷是热轧带钢常见的表面缺陷之一，具有形貌多样化、发生几率高、易于批量爆发的特点，生产中控制较为困难。本文根据宏观形貌的不同对某1 580 mm热轧带钢生产线所发生的带钢边部翘皮缺陷进行归类。并采用扫描电镜对缺陷微观组织进行分析，对其形成机理进行深入探究，依据所得结论制定合理的控制方法并应用于实践，取得了良好效果。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为了探究冷轧过程及轧制工艺参数对带钢温度的影响及演变规律，采用有限元方法对冷轧带钢进行建模，利用温度场反算的方法确定了带钢和轧辊间的传热热流密度，在此基础上通过改变模型参数对带钢温度场进行了模拟计算。结果表明，带钢温度在前4架轧制区呈阶梯式增长趋势，而在末机架出口呈下降趋势；此外，带钢出口温度随轧制速度、道次压下率、摩擦因数、变形抗力等的增加而升高。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study on temperature evolution of cold rolled strip and its influence factors
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to investigate the influence and evolution law of cold rolling process and rolling process parameters on strip temperature,the finite element method was used to model the cold rolled strip,and the basic heat flux between strip and roll was determined by the method of back calculation of temperature field.On this basis,the strip temperature field was simulated by changing the model parameters.The finite element simulation results show that the strip temperature is in a stepwise growth trend in the rolling area of the first and the fourth stands,while the outlet temperature in the final stand is decreased.In addition,the strip outlet temperature increases with the increase of the rolling speed,the pass reduction ratio,the friction coefficient,and the deformation resistance.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 宽幅汽车板重卷及中剖技术
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: XU Yuanjun, QIAO Jun，XIE Shaodong，LI Zequn，TIAN Ying，TANG Wen
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶南方工程技术有限公司，湖北 武汉 430223
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 将宽幅汽车板重卷技术和剖分技术融合，兼顾带钢重卷检查、分卷、切边、涂油、称重、打捆及剖分功能，设计了1条重卷剖分机组，重卷和剖分模式可自动切换。介绍了其主要技术参数、工艺流程及其设计特点。采用该项技术，节约了工厂建设用地和工程投资，减少了劳动定员和维护成本。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis of recoiling and splitting technique for wide automobile sheet
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The recoiling and splitting technique was mixed together on one line for wide automobile sheet,its function including recoiling,inspection,coil dividing,trimming,weighing,bundling and splitting.The recoiling mode and splitting mode could be switched automatically.The main technique parameters,processes and design characteristis were introduced.By using this technique,the space and investment for the plant were saved,and manpower and maintenance cost were decreased.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
徐远军，乔军，谢少东，李泽群，田莺，唐文 . 宽幅汽车板重卷及中剖技术[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(1): 51-53.
XU Yuanjun, QIAO Jun，XIE Shaodong，LI Zequn，TIAN Ying，TANG Wen. Analysis of recoiling and splitting technique for wide automobile sheet. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(1): 51-53.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 六辊冷连轧机带钢边降控制性能仿真研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: XUAN Kangle1,YU Wei1,TANG Wei1,XIONG Aiming2，ZHANG Xiaofeng2，REN Xinyi2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.北京科技大学冶金工程研究院，北京100083
2.首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司， 河北唐山063210
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 以首钢京唐公司2 230 mm冷连轧机为研究对象，针对目前国内外板带材生产中被广泛选用的CVC冷轧机机型，运用ABAQUS仿真软件建立了3D有限元模型，对比分析了ESS冷轧机对带钢边降的控制性能，证明ESS冷轧机对带钢边部减薄的控制较好。通过ESS冷轧机3D有限元模型，实现了对超宽薄极限规格带钢轧制过程的模拟；深入分析了ESS冷轧机对带钢边部减薄的控制规律。结合现场轧制数据，对有限元模型进行了现场验证，模拟值与实测值切合度很高，相对误差在10 μm以内，绝对误差在0.69%以内。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Simulation study of strip edge drop control performance of sixhigh cold rolling mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Taking the 2 230 mm cold rolling mill of Shougang Jingtang company as the research object,in view of the widely used in cold rolling of CVC mill at home and abroad,a 3D finite element model was established using ABAQUS simulation software.The control performance of CVC and ESS cold rolling mill on the strip edge drop was comparaticely analyzed.The results showed that the ESS cold rolling mill had the advantage of reducing the edge of the strip.By 3D finite element model of ESS cold rolling mill,the limit specifications of ultra wide thin strip rolling process simulation was carried out.The control law of ESS cold rolling mill on the strip edge dropping was analyzed.Combining with field data of rolling,the finite element model validation was verified.The simulated and measured values were in a high degree，relative error within 10 μm,the absolute error was within 0.69%.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
轩康乐，余伟，唐伟，熊爱明，张晓峰，任新意. 六辊冷连轧机带钢边降控制性能仿真研究[J]. , 2017, 34(6): 33-37.
XUAN Kangle,YU Wei,TANG Wei,XIONG Aiming，ZHANG Xiaofeng，REN Xinyi. Simulation study of strip edge drop control performance of sixhigh cold rolling mill. , 2017, 34(6): 33-37.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热轧带钢边部减薄解决对策
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 唐山建龙简舟钢铁有限公司
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 分析了唐山建龙简舟钢铁有限公司热轧中宽带钢边部减薄的特征，提出了采用曲线辊轧制、精确调整入口导卫开口度、优化轧辊冷却等解决措施，使边部减薄比例由14.94%降至5.98%

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 采用400 mm特厚连铸板坯生产高韧性厚规格管线钢技术研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LI Qun1， WANG Zhi- yong1，LI Shao- po2， CHEN Tie- qiang1， DONG Zhan- bin1，LIU Yong- li1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.秦皇岛首秦金属材料有限公司，河北秦皇岛066326
2.首钢技术研究院，北京100043
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用400 mm特厚连铸板坯生产厚规格管线用钢具有压缩比大的优点，能够有效细化晶粒尺寸，改善钢板韧性。为保证厚规格管线用钢板的低温韧性，以及充分发挥400 mm特厚连铸板坯的优势，论述了保证其芯部质量及加热温度均匀性的必要性和措施，同时重点研究了再结晶区轧制温度、变形量及奥氏体晶粒尺寸的变化规律，在生产实践中应用效果良好。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on technology of using 400 mm ultra- thickness slab to produce high toughness pipeline steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：There is advantage of large compression ratio of using 400 mm ultra- thickness continuous casting slab producing heavy gauge pipeline steel plate. It can refine the grain size effectively and improve plate toughness. In order to ensure the low temperature toughness of heavy gauge pipeline steel plate and fully apply the advantage of 400 mm slab, the necessary and measures to ensure the center quality of 400 mm slab and the heating temperature uniformity were described. The relationship of temperature, deformation amount and austenitic grain size of recrystallization zone rolling was researched too. The result has good application effect in the production practice.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李群，王志勇，李少坡，谌铁强，董占斌 刘永利. 采用400 mm特厚连铸板坯生产高韧性厚规格管线钢技术研究[J]. , 2016, 33(1): 19-22.
LI Qun， WANG Zhi- yong，LI Shao- po， CHEN Tie- qiang， DONG Zhan- bin，LIU Yong- li. Research on technology of using 400 mm ultra- thickness slab to produce high toughness pipeline steel. , 2016, 33(1): 19-22.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 中厚板UFC-ACC过程控制系统的建立及冷却策略的制定
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室#
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn:
分析了UFC-ACC工艺的设计原理及特点，建立了中厚板UFC-ACC过程控制系统。在分析该系统
功能及实现方式的同时，着重说明了模型计算系统的组成及计算原理。同时，对超快冷段冷却策略、层冷段冷却策略及两段协调策略进行了阐述。结合现场实测数据，得出该过程控制系统具有较好的计算稳定性及较高的计算精度，计算终冷温度与目标温度的偏差在4%以内，计算终冷温度与实测值的偏差在3.5%以内，可满足生产需要。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 弹粘塑性材料模型在H型钢热轧模拟中的应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 河南城建学院土木与材料工程系
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用弹粘塑性材料模型，利用有限元分析软件ANSYS-DYNA对H型钢开坯6道次连轧进行了模拟。说明了建模和材料参数的选取方法#以及轧件的变形、应力和应变等计算结果，有效解决了模拟过程中易出现的堆钢问题。模拟结果与理论值较接近，为生产提供了理论依据。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 南钢层流冷却系统流量标定与板形控制
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 南京钢铁联合有限公司中厚板卷厂
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对南钢中厚板卷厂冷却系统冷却不均而带来的板形问题，开发了一种新型流量控制技术，可标定调节阀在不同开口度下集管流量值，并回归出流量－ 开口度设定曲线。生产中根据该曲线进行交流量比的调整，提高了冷却系统流量控制精度，从而改善了控冷后钢板板形。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 含铬焊瓶钢在热轧过程中产生边裂的原因分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 本钢板材股份有限公司热连轧厂，辽宁本溪117000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对本钢板材股份有限公司1 700 mm热轧线生产的含铬焊瓶钢存在边裂的问题，对缺陷处进行了取样分析。结果表明，由于微观组织的不均匀导致带钢性能不均而发生边裂缺陷，通过调整热轧温度制度和冷却制度，消除了边裂缺陷。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Cause analysis of edge cracking of Cr bearing welded gas cylinder steel plate in hot rolling process
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aimed at the edge cracking problem of Crbearing welded gas cylinder steel plate in hot rolling process in Benxi Iron and Steel Plate Co.,Ltd.The microstructure of edge cracking was analyzed.The results showed that the cause was due to the microstructure unevenness,which led to the steel mechanical heterogeneity.By adjusting the hot rolling process,this defect was eliminated.

张海宾，张吉胜，孙开宇. 含铬焊瓶钢在热轧过程中产生边裂的原因分析[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(1): 44-45.
ZHANG Haibin,ZHANG Jisheng,SUN Kaiyu. Cause analysis of edge cracking of Cr bearing welded gas cylinder steel plate in hot rolling process. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(1): 44-45.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 压下率对冷轧铝/钢(4A60/08Al)复合带材组织性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: CHEN Xin, LI Long, ZENG Xiang-yong, ZHANG Xiao-jun, ZHAO Jia-ying, ZHOU De-jing
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 银邦金属复合材料股份有限公司金属层状复合材料技术研究院, 江苏 无锡 214145
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 结合金相组织观察、显微硬度测量及室温拉伸实验, 对压下率分别为30%、40%、50%及60%时的4A60/08Al冷轧复合带的组织与力学性能进行了研究。采用模拟钎焊后拉剪实验对复合带的界面结合强度进行了评价。结果表明: 随着压下率的增加, 复合带钢层的硬度和屈服强度明显增加, 而铝层的硬度变化不大; 压下率从30%增加到50%时, 界面平均抗剪强度从52 MPa增加到65 MPa, 拉剪断裂位置也从铝钢界面断裂过渡到铝层断裂, 因此把压下率50%定义为4A60/08Al冷轧复合带的稳定压下率; 另外, 当压下率超过50%时, 复合带材的钢层在520℃×24 h退火后的组织基本为等轴的再结晶组织, 综合力学性能良好。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Influence of cold rolling reduction on microstructure and mechanical properties of 4A60/08Al clad strip
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Effect of cold rolling reduction on microstructure and mechanical properties of 4A60/08Al clad steel strips was studied through microstructure observation, micro-hardness measurements and tensile test. Bonding strength of interface between 4A60 and 08Al was evaluated by tensile shear test after brazing another Al alloy material on the 4A60. The results showed that the hardness and strength of 08Al would increase with the reduction and while the 4A60 hardness was almost unchanged. With the increase of reduction from 30% to 50%, the average bonding strength was raised from 52 MPa to 65 MPa, and fracture characteristic was transited from 4A60 and 08Al interface to 4A60 layer, and reduction of 50% was suggested as the stable percent reduction of the clad strips. When the reduction was higher than 50%, the microstructure of 08Al layer with equiaxed ferrite grain presented better mechanical properties after being treated at 520 ℃×24 h.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陈 鑫 李 龙 曾祥勇 张小军 赵嘉莹 周德敬. 压下率对冷轧铝/钢(4A60/08Al)复合带材组织性能的影响[J]. , 2015, 32(2): 36-40.
CHEN Xin, LI Long, ZENG Xiang-yong, ZHANG Xiao-jun, ZHAO Jia-ying, ZHOU De-jing. Influence of cold rolling reduction on microstructure and mechanical properties of 4A60/08Al clad strip. , 2015, 32(2): 36-40.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 宽厚板成分异常坯轧制工艺研究与应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
莱芜钢铁集团,a.银山型钢有限公司宽厚板事业部
b.郑州经贸有限公司，山东莱芜271104
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 宽厚板生产中，经常会出现成分异常坯，即连铸坯的某个或几个化学成分超出内控要求的钢坯，主要为混浇改判坯。如果不进行控轧控冷工艺的调整，则成分异常坯钢板的性能合格率非常低。本论文通过对成分异常坯的工艺研究，分析了原料成分、控轧控冷工艺、钢板性能之间的对应关系，结合大量的生产试验，总结出一套能够量化的经验公式，实现了柔性工艺轧制技术，极大地提高了成分异常坯钢板的性能合格率。
keywords_cn: 关键词： 混浇坯 改判坯 柔性工艺轧制 性能合格率
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research and application of process control of heavy plate by abnormal components slab
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：During heavy and wide plate production, some slabs with abnormal components of one or more chemical components beyond the internal control requirements often appeared, which were mainly the mixed irrigation or change grade slabs. If the controlled rolling and controlled cooling process did not adjust, the performance of qualified rate of plate rolled by these slabs would be very low. Therefore, the relationships between the composition of raw material, controlled rolling and controlled cooling process and plate performance were analyzed. Based on a number of industrial experiments, a set of experience formulas which could be quantitative controlled was built. The flexible rolling technology was realized, and the qualified rate of plate rolled by abnormal components slab was obviously increased.
keywords_en: [Key words] : Mixed casting billet, change grade billet ,Flexible process rolling, Performance qualification rate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李新东 李永强. 宽厚板成分异常坯轧制工艺研究与应用[J]. , 2015, 32(4): 30-33.
LI Xin- donga，LI Yong- qiangb. Research and application of process control of heavy plate by abnormal components slab. , 2015, 32(4): 30-33.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 卷取温度是影响带钢组织性能的重要工艺参数之一，受头尾板形、速度变化等因素影响，薄规格带钢卷取温度控制较为困难。首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司1 580 mm热轧生产线采用优化钢种族、差异化的目标卷取温度策略和干头温度补偿等手段，较好地提高了薄规格带钢卷取温度控制的稳定性和头尾温度控制的精度。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Measures and practice of improving coiling temperature control accuracy for thin gauge hot rolled strip
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Coiling temperature is one of the most critical factors which determine the final mechanical performance of strip.Under the influence of the bad shape of strip head and tail and the speed variation,it is much difficulty to control coiling temperature for the thin gauge hot rolled strip,especially for its head and tail.Optimizing steel grade family,using control strategy of variable target coiling temperature and using coiling temperature compensation for dryhead were adopted in Shougang Jingtang 1 580 mm hot strip mill.By these methods,coiling temperature control stability and the control precision for head and tail of thin strip were improved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
秦红波，滕洪宝，陈彤，徐芳. 提高薄规格带钢卷取温度控制精度的措施[J]. , 2017, 34(6): 62-65.
QIN Hongbo,TENG Hongbao,CHEN Tong,XU Fang. Measures and practice of improving coiling temperature control accuracy for thin gauge hot rolled strip. , 2017, 34(6): 62-65.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 单宁酸H2TiF6涂层的耐蚀性能研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 攀钢集团研究院有限公司
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 本文研究了镀锌板锌层表面单宁酸钛涂层的结构和防腐性能，结果表明，固化温度和单宁酸H2TiF6溶液的pH值对涂层耐蚀性能影响较大，单宁酸H2TiF6溶液pH = 3、试样固化温度（PMT）为60～80℃时，涂层耐腐蚀性能最佳。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 2 050 mm生产线精轧温度预报精度的提升
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 宝山钢铁股份有限公司热轧厂一热轧分厂，上海201900
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 宝山钢铁股份有限公司2 050 mm热轧线穿带速度设定功能有人工和自动两种方式，因自学习计算不合理导致遗传系数不合理而存在温度预报偏差大，自动速度投入率低等问题，通过优化温降计算参数和遗传学习策略，提高了温度预报准确性，从而提高了穿带速度的自动方式投入率。
keywords_cn: 穿带速度 出口温度预报 温度遗传系数
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Prediction accuracy upgrade of Finishing rolling temperature of 2 050 mm rolling line
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The automatic control ratio of threading head speed in the 2 050 mm hot rolling line of Baoshan Iron & Steel Co.,Ltd.was lower,and the temperature deviation between predicted and actual was bigger,because the unreasonable selflearning calculation resulted that the temperature heredity coefficient was unreasonable.Through optimizing the temperature drop mode and heredity learning strategy,the accuracy of temperature forecasting was improved,thus the automatic control ratio of threading head speed was increased.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
张先念，刘苗. 2 050 mm生产线精轧温度预报精度的提升[J]. , 2017, 34(6): 59-61.
