http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 60Si2Mn热卷弹簧纵向裂纹的原因分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: HAO Zhichao,XU Bin，ZHAO Jiang,SUN Junxi,SHEN Wenjun#br#
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 河钢集团邯钢股份有限公司技术中心，河北邯郸056015
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对60Si2Mn圆钢在卷簧淬火后出现纵向开裂的问题，分析了试样裂纹形貌、裂纹分布特征及裂纹贯穿情况；结合金相显微镜、扫描电镜对60Si2Mn圆钢金相组织、脱碳情况及高温氧化物进行了分析研究。结果表明，该纵向裂纹是由于连铸坯表面存在缺陷而导致的，在圆钢轧制过程中暴露和扩展，在组织应力的作用下，裂纹迅速扩展成为沿轧制方向分布的淬火裂纹。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Cause analysis of the quenching-cracking for hot-forging 60Si2Mn spring
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：For the problem of vertical cracking of 60Si2Mn spring after quenching,the crack morphology,crack distribution and crack penetration of the specimen were analyzed.The metallographic structure,decarburization and high temperature oxides of 60Si2Mn round steel were studied with metallographic microscope and scanning electron microscope.The results show that the longitudinal crack is caused by the defect of the surface of the continuous casting billet,which is exposed and expanded during the  round bar rolling process.Under the action of the tissue stress,the crack rapidly expands into a quenching crack distributed along the rolling direction.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
郝志超，徐斌，赵江，孙俊喜，申文军. 60Si2Mn热卷弹簧纵向裂纹的原因分析[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(6): 96-98.
HAO Zhichao,XU Bin，ZHAO Jiang,SUN Junxi,SHEN Wenjun. Cause analysis of the quenching-cracking for hot-forging 60Si2Mn spring. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(6): 96-98.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 提高热轧中间坯头尾剪切精度的控制技术
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Jian- gong,LI Ji- xin，TONG Yan- cheng,CHEN Rui- yan，CHEN Tong,LI Rui
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司热轧部，河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 结合某热轧厂半连轧生产线上的飞剪控制原理，分析了飞剪在剪切过程中存在的问题以及对切损造成的影响。同时从激光测速仪的应用、热金属探测器（HMD）的检测精度改善以及现场工况条件的干扰预防等方面做了技术分析和措施落实，使中间坯头部剪切精度平均提高了48%，尾部剪切精度平均提高了72%，进而降低了产线金属损失，提高了热轧厂经济效益。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Improvement of the head and tail shearing precision of intermediate slab
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the shearing principle of a flying shear in a hot strip rolling line,the existing problems and its effect on cutting loss were analyzed.By application of laser velocimetry,detection accuracy improvement of HMD and interference prevention of the working conditions,the head cutting precision increased average 48% and tail precision increased average 72%.And then，the metal loss was reduced and the economic benefit was improved of the hot rolling mill.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
王建功，李继新，童燕成，陈瑞岩，陈彤，李瑞. 提高热轧中间坯头尾剪切精度的控制技术[J]. , 2018, 35(2): 68-70.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 基板表面粗糙度对合金化热镀锌板镀层组织的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中国钢研科技集团有限公司先进金属材料涂镀国家工程实验室
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 利用扫描电镜和电感耦合实验观察了不同基板粗糙度的合金化热镀锌钢板表面形貌，测定了镀层中的Fe含量。结果表明，在相同的合金化工艺条件下，基板表面粗糙度越大，合金化镀层中的Fe含量越高。较大的基板粗糙度使镀层中的微裂纹增多，镀层均匀性变差。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 基于BP神经网络的中厚板热处理洗炉试验模拟与应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: DONG Zhan-bin, WANG Xue-song, LIU Xiao-hui, LIU Yong-li
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 秦皇岛首秦金属材料有限公司, 河北 秦皇岛 066326
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对影响热处理钢板表面质量的炉底辊压痕缺陷, 分析了其产生机理, 并结合首秦公司实际生产情况, 采用现场实测数据和人工神经网络技术建模。根据模拟计算结果, 确定了最优的洗炉制度, 同时通过加强抛丸质量控制、在线炉内气氛检测等措施, 使钢板(生产温度不小于900 ℃、钢板厚度不小于30 mm)压痕比例由12%降至5%, 大大提高了热处理钢板的表面质量。
keywords_cn: 热处理 洗炉制度 炉底辊压痕 BP神经网络
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Simulation and application of cleaning test for plate heat treatment furnace by BP artificial neural network
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the furnace roller indentation defect which was the effect factor of heat treatment plate surface quality, the formation mechanism of this defect was analyzed. Combining with the actual production situation of Shouqin Company, and using the measured data, the model of BP neural network was established. Based on the simulation results, the best scheme of cleaning furnace was obtained. And through the strengthening control of the shot blasting quality and furnace atmosphere on-line detection, for the plate, which producing temperature was over 900 ℃ and thickness was over 30 mm, the indentation ratio was reduced from 12% to 5%.
keywords_en: Heat treatment Cleaning furnace system Indentation of furnace roller BP artificial neural network
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
董占斌 王雪松 刘晓辉 刘永利. 基于BP神经网络的中厚板热处理洗炉试验模拟与应用[J]. , 2015, 32(2): 51-54.
DONG Zhan-bin, WANG Xue-song, LIU Xiao-hui, LIU Yong-li. Simulation and application of cleaning test for plate heat treatment furnace by BP artificial neural network. , 2015, 32(2): 51-54.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 高性能机械式试样剪切设备综合性能分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶京诚工程技术有限公司，北京100176
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 对高性能机械式试样剪切设备进行了综合性能分析。用剪切力计算公式对设备公称剪切能力进行了计算；分析了设备在剪切过程中的轨迹，其中特殊位置的确定为今后电气调试提供了可靠有用的数据，可对剪机控制进行优化；通过静力矩等计算确定了传动基本参数；通过仿真软件对机构进行了受力分析；通过等效转动惯量对系统进行了能量计算，并对已经确认的传动参数进行了校核；对设备关键受力件进行了有限元分析。结果表明设备结构可靠，参数设计正确。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Comprehensive performance analysis of high performance mechanical sample shearer
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The comprehensive performance analysis of high performance mechanical sample shearer was carried out.The shearing ability of the equipment was calculated.The trajectory of the equipment during shearing process was analyzed,and the special positions were given,which could provide reliable and useful data for future electrical debugging and the control system optimization.The basic parameters of the drive were determined by calculation of static moment.The mechanism was analyzed by simulation software.The energy calculation of the system was carried out by the equivalent rotational inertia,and the confirmed driving parameters were checked.Finite element analysis was carried out on the key components of the equipment.The results show that the equipment structure is reliable and the parameters design are correct.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
郝建伟，陈曦，韩文. 高性能机械式试样剪切设备综合性能分析[J]. , 2017, 34(4): 39-43.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 宝山钢铁股份有限公司，上海201900
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 实验研究了搅拌器转速、搅拌时间和静置时间等因素对冷轧乳化液的粒径大小及浓度变化的影响；对生产现场磁性过滤器内不同粒径乳化液的两相流动进行了数值模拟研究，发现过大粒径的乳化液是导致现场乳化液浓度不稳定的关键因素。根据研究结果指导现场生产时对乳化液粒径进行了优化，最终解决了生产过程中因乳化液系统导致的轧制不稳定问题。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research of cold rolling emulsion flow characteristics in magnetic filter device
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The relationships between the mean particle size of cold rolling emulsion and the factors of agitation rate,agitation time and waiting time were studied.The numerical simulation of flow field of different oil drops′ diameter in the on-site magnetic filter had been finished by using DPM model in Fluent software.The results indicate that those oil drops with over-bigger diameter are the key factor of instability of emulsion concentration in cold rolling production.Finally,the relevant optimization of on-site emulsion has been made according the research,and the problem of production instability about emulsion during cold rolling process has been successfully resolved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
智西巍，瞿培磊，王康健. 冷轧磁性过滤设备内乳化液流动特性的研究[J]. , 2017, 34(4): 30-35.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 天津轧一冷轧薄板有限公司，天津300220
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 冷轧家电板是冷轧高端产品之一，屈服强度达到280 MPa以上的高强度家电板越来越受到用户青睐，本文针对罩式退火工艺生产高强度家电板实践中遇到的问题进行探讨分析，得出通过提升退火均匀性并结合平整延伸率的控制能够使强度级别达到用户要求，而对于表面活性及下游磷化或陶化过程中的锈蚀问题，不宜采取调整原料成分的方式，而应调整清洗剂、平整液。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Production experiences of high- strength cold- rolled strip for household electrical appliances in batch annealing process
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Cold- rolled strip for household electrical appliance is the high- end product in cold rolling industry, with more and more popularity of more than 280 MPa high- strength plate. The production problems of high- strength cold- rolled strip in batch annealing process were analyzed. It concluded that combining annealing uniformity improvement and skin pass elongation control could make the strip strength meet the user needs, modifying the cleaning agent and tempering lubricant but not the strip chemical composition could resolve the corrosion problems in zirconia ceramic process.
keywords_en: cold-rolled strip for for household electrical appliances
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘洋，贺响琳. 罩退工艺生产高强度家电板的经验探讨[J]. , 2016, 33(1): 84-86.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 卡罗塞尔卷取机转盘旋转对卷取张力影响分析及对策
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 上海宝立自动化工程有限公司，上海200083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 卡罗塞尔卷取机是连轧机组出口的关键设备，在其回转期间，消除转盘转动给卷取张力带来的扰动是一个控制难点。本文根据卡罗塞尔卷取机的机械结构，推导出转盘旋转和芯轴卷取速度之间的关系式，通过数值分析软件离线计算生成转盘在不同回转位置对应的卷取加速度变化的插值函数，通过查表方式，在线实时进行卷取机动态力矩补偿。该方法已成功应用于工程实践，为提高大转盘转动过程中卷取张力动态控制精度提供了理论依据和解决方案。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis and countermeasure of effect of Carrousel casing revolution on coiling tension
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Carrousel coiler is the key equipment of exit section in tandem cold mill line,and to cancel its interference to coiling tension is a difficulty.Based on the Carrousel coiler mechanical structure,the relation between Carrousel casing turning and coiling speed was deduced.Forming the interpolating function of acceleration value and Carrousel turning position by simulation software offline calculation,and through table lookup,the online dynamic torque compensation for coiling tension control was implemented.This method which had been practiced in production application and provided a theoretical basis and solutions for enhancing the coiling tension accuracy while Carrousel casing revolution.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
姚康，张会来. 卡罗塞尔卷取机转盘旋转对卷取张力影响分析及对策[J]. , 2016, 33(4): 53-57.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 秦皇岛首秦金属材料有限公司，河北秦皇岛066326
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了钢板超声波探伤的缺陷类型，对连铸板坯轧制中厚板后出现超声波探伤不合格的钢板进行取样、金相、电镜分析，找出引起中厚板探伤不合格的主要因素是钢中氢含量、铸坯中心偏析以及夹杂物；通过采用RH真空处理、钢水洁净度控制、铸机动态轻压下、加热工艺优化、控轧控冷工艺优化及板材堆垛缓冷等关键工艺技术，使钢板内在质量得到改善，探伤合格率明显提高。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis on the mechanism and control measures of ultrasonic detected defects in plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Ultrasonic detected defect type of plate in practice was presented.The samples from plates disqualified by ultrasonic inspection were observed by macrostructure examination,microstructure examination and SEM.The results show that the central segregation,inclusion and microcrack inside the strand are the internal causes of nonconformity in the ultrasonic flaw inspection on the plate.The pass ratio of the plate ultrasonic flaw inspection can be effectively improved by RH treatment,steel cleanliness control,dynamic soft reduction,reheating optimization,slow cooling,etc.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
白松莲，万潇，王东柱，沈开照，何元春，周希楠. 中厚板超声波探伤缺陷及控制技术[J]. , 2017, 34(2): 76-78.
BAI Song-lian,WAN Xiao,WANG Dong-zhu,SHEN Kai-zhao,HE Yuan-chun,ZHOU Xi-nan. Analysis on the mechanism and control measures of ultrasonic detected defects in plate. , 2017, 34(2): 76-78.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 冷轧带钢电解清洗极板腐蚀机理和原因
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: CHEN Hai- lin，HE Li- hong ，SHAO Yuan- jing，YE Li- de，CAI Wei，CHEN Lian- long
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶南方工程技术有限公司技术研究院，湖北武汉430080
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用线性电位扫描法研究了碳钢在不同脱脂剂浓度下的阳极极化过程，进一步研究了碳钢在不同不同脱脂剂浓度条件下、不同电位下的恒电位、恒电流电解行为，在此基础上对生产现场进行了考察。电化学实验表明：碳钢阳极极化过程依次经历活化区、钝化区、过钝化区及极限区；活化区基体活化溶解电流小，不影响电极寿命；过钝化区电极表面开始发生析氧反应；极限区析氧反应达到极限，使基体腐蚀反应大量发生，电极寿命降低；脱脂剂浓度越低、阳极电位越高，电极表面基体溶解反应速率越大，相应电极使用寿命越短。实际生产中，极板表面由于电流分布不均使其局部电流超过极限电流导致局部腐蚀发生，而电解槽内极板安装精度、电极表面气泡无法逸出、极板表面污泥淤积等都均会影响电流分布。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis of corrosion mechanism and reason of electrode plates used in electrolytic cleaning to cold rolled strip
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Anodic polarization process of carbon steel in alkali solution was studied by linear potential scan,and electrolysis behavior was also analyzed under differential alkali concentration and electric potential by electrolysis at constant potential and current test.On this basis,the production site was inspected.Electrochemical experiments showed anodic polarization process of carbon steel in solution included activated region,passive region,transpassive region,and terminal region.Matrix dissolution current was small,does not affect electrode life in active region.Oxygen evolution reaction occurred on electrode plates in transpassive region.Dissolution reaction of matrix would start in terminal region caused by limit of oxygen evolution reaction which resulting in short- lived of electrode plates.The lower the concentration of the degreasing agent,the higher the potential of the anode,the greater the dissolution of the electrode surface of the substrate the reaction rate,the shorter the service life of the electrode.A high incidence of localized corrosion occurred due to localized current exceeding limited current which was resulted by uneven current distribution,and installed inaccurate of plate in electrolytic cell will influences distribution of current but also hardly escape of bubble on the electrode surface and sludge depositing on the electrode plates.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陈海林，贺立红，邵远敬，叶理德，蔡炜，陈连龙. 冷轧带钢电解清洗极板腐蚀机理和原因[J]. , 2017, 34(3): 34-38.
CHEN Hai- lin，HE Li- hong ，SHAO Yuan- jing，YE Li- de，CAI Wei，CHEN Lian- long. Analysis of corrosion mechanism and reason of electrode plates used in electrolytic cleaning to cold rolled strip. , 2017, 34(3): 34-38.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the pipe and bar straightening theory and elastic-plastic mechanics, the bending theory of the thin pipe was studied, and a mathematical model of [M－ζ] was established, providing a convenient method for searching pipe straightening parameters.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 三辊张力单元作为无传动张力辊的模型，主要用在卷取机前，为卷取机提供前张力。本文从三辊张力单元使用环境以及自身的结构特点出发，提出了采用圆弧来代替辊子压下后带钢的运动曲线，以此为依据，推导出三辊张力单元提供张力大小的计算公式。

From the application environment and the characteristics of 3- roll bridle roll unit, the calculation method for the value of tension provided by the 3- roll bridle roll unit was derived on the basis of using circularity instead of running curve of the strip after screw down of the rolls.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 轧后冷却速率对GCr15钢棒材组织的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: TIAN Zhen- zhuo1,HUO Xiang- dong 1, LI Lie- jun 2, CHEN Song- jun1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.江苏大学材料科学与工程学院，江苏镇江212013
2.华南理工大学国家金属材料近净成形工程技术研究中心，广东广州510641
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: GCr15轴承钢棒材在轧制后的冷却过程中往往会有网状碳化物的形成，对轴承钢的质量和寿命产生影响。通过Gleeble3800热模拟试验机对其轧制后的控冷工艺进行模拟研究，结果表明：在860 ℃终轧温度下，随着冷却速率的增加，晶界处二次碳化物由网状分布逐渐变为半网状、短条状分布，珠光体球团直径明显细化，CCT曲线得到的珠光体析出温度区间主要集中在600~700 ℃范围内，高温终轧后，控制冷却速率和终冷温度可以达到控制网状碳化物析出并得到珠光体的目的。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of cooling rate after rolling on microstructure of GCr15 bearing steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In the cooling process of GCr15 bearing steel,a network carbide formats after hot rolling ,which leads to detrimental effects on the steel′s quality and life. Different cooling processes simulation was conducted by Gleeble3800 thermal / mechanical simulator. The research showed that the secondary carbide in the grain boundary convered from network to half network, strip distribution and the diameter of pearlite nodule obviously refined with the increase of cooling rates for GCr15 bearing steel after high temperature deformation at 860 ℃. The precipitation temperature of pearlite obtained from CCT curves mainly concentrated in the range of 600-700 ℃，controlling the cooling rate and fish cooling temperature can restrain the precipitation of network carbide.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
田振卓 霍向东 李烈军，陈松军. 轧后冷却速率对GCr15钢棒材组织的影响[J]. , 2015, 32(6): 27-32.
TIAN Zhen- zhuo,HUO Xiang- dong , LI Lie- jun , CHEN Song- jun. Effect of cooling rate after rolling on microstructure of GCr15 bearing steel. , 2015, 32(6): 27-32.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIU Xiang- huaa，c, LIU Xinc, FU Shu- taoc, LIU Li- zhongb
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
东北大学，a.研究院
b.材料学院
c.轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室,辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 从产品深加工角度，介绍了3类纵向变厚度板的生产方法、用途及其节材效果。差厚板（TRB）通常由单机架四辊冷轧机生产，目前主要用于汽车轻量化；纵向变厚度板（LP）由现代化热轧中厚板轧机生产，主要用于造船、桥梁和建筑；介于二者之间的统称为优化承载变厚度板材（LOP），可热轧、冷轧或者温轧，其宽度小于LP板，厚度一般大于TRB板，目前及有前景的典型应用有卡车用变断面板簧、局部变壁厚管、锥形管原料等等。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Products by variable gauge rolling and their deep processing
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：From the view point of deep processing, the rolling technology of the three kinds of variable gauge products were introduced, including their usage and the effects of saving materials. The TRB normally was rolled on a cold mill single stand with four high. Nowadays it was used in car lightweight. The LP plate was rolled on a modern plate mill, and it was used in shipbuilding, bridge and construction. Another one, called LOP, was between TRB and LP, it could be rolled in a hot mill，a cold mill or a warm mill, its width was much smaller than LP and the thickness was often larger than TRB. Its application could be found in the plate spring for trucks, pipes with variable gauge wall, continuous taper tubes and so on.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘相华，c，刘鑫c，付书涛c，刘立忠. 变厚度板带材产品及其深加工[J]. , 2015, 32(5): 1-7.

Through the development of the biting function with differential speed, optimization of the stand gap, rationalization of the centering guide operation mode and the roll gap deviation setting according to the plate thickness coming from the roughing mill, this problem was solved. The plate plane shape was improved, the yield was raised.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 本文运用有限元方法对HW100mm×100mm、HW150mm×150mm两种规格小型H型钢全轧程进行了三维热力耦合数值模拟，介绍了小型H型钢轧制的有限元模型和模拟参数设置。针对模拟结果，详细分析了典型道次轧件的金属流动状况、有效塑性应变和温度变化规律，并对数值模拟结果进行了验证。本文还建立了小型H型钢斜轧孔型的轧制力模型，计算了各道次轧制力解析结果，并将轧制力解析结果、数值模拟结果与轧机实际负荷电流趋势进行了对比，规律性吻合较好。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Whole Rolling Process Simulation and Incline Rolling Force Model for the Small Size H-beam Steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The 3D thermo-mechanical coupled simulation of whole rolling process for small size H-beam steels(HW100mm×10 mm and HW150mm×150mm) were accomplished by FEM method. The finite element model and simulation parameters were introduced. Based on simulation results, the metal flow, effective plastic strain and temperature variation law of workpiece for typical passes were analyzed in detail, and simulation results were verified. At the same time, rolling force model for incline rolling groove of small size H-beam was built and analytical results of rolling force were computed. Then, the analytical results, simulation results of rolling force were compared with practical load current trend of roller, and the regularity were in good agreement.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 65钢拉拔笔尖状断裂分析及工艺改进
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: YANG Wen- tao, SHANG Wei- wei
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 陕钢集团汉中钢铁有限责任公司，陕西汉中724200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 利用光谱分析、金相分析等方法对65钢盘条拉拔过程中出现的笔尖状断口进行了分析，结果表明：出现笔尖状断裂的原因为钢材内部存在混晶组织。在其他工艺不变的情况下最大限度缩短末端水箱和吐丝机之间的距离以减少盘条头部未穿水部分长度，并将未穿水部分剪切掉可以消除这类质量问题。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis of pen fracture in drawing of 65 grade steel and wire rod production process improvement
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：By means of spectrum analysis and metallographic examination, the cause of pen fracture in 65 grade steel wire rod drawing process was analyzed. The result showed that this pen fracture was caused by the mixed grain structure in wire rod. In the case of other process unchanged, shortening the distance between terminal water tank and spinning machine as far as possible and cutting off the wire rod head can eliminate this quality problem.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京科技大学冶金工程研究院，北京100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过合理成分设计和采用高温终轧及空冷的生产工艺，在实验室制备出厚度分别为12mm和16mm的160MPa级抗震用低屈服点钢板。钢板组织均为单一的多边形铁素体，晶粒平均直径分别为4418μm和4717μm，屈服强度分别为177MPa和172MPa，具有良好的高应变低周疲劳性能，满足160MPa级建筑抗震用钢的性能要求，为160MPa级低屈服点钢的工业试制提供了依据。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：160MPa low yield point steel plates with thickness respectively of 12mm and 16mm used to resist earthquake for buildings were developed by reasonable chemical composition design and high temperature finishing rolling and air cooling processes.Its microstructure as well as properties were studied Only polygonal ferrite could be observed in the experimental steels, the mean grain diameter respectively were 4418μm and 4717μm, and the corresponding yield strength were 177MPa and 172MPa Having excellent high strain low cycles fatigue properties, the experimental steels could meet the requirement of the LYP160 steel used for earthquake resistant. It was reference for the industrial trial of the 160MPa low yield point steel

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对酸轧联合机组中拉伸矫直机工作辊磨损快、使用寿命短等问题，根据拉矫机工作辊磨损实测数据，通过现场测试及实验，分析了工作辊磨损机理,建立了基于带钢生产吨位下工作辊最大磨损量预测模型、基于拉矫工艺参数下工作辊轴向整体磨损预测模型，并采用遗传算法优化了模型参数，优化后的模型可用于拉矫机工作辊磨损在线预报。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on Prediction of Working Roll Abrasion in Stretcher Leveller
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Some practical problems in the pickling line and tandem cold mill were researched, including the severe abrasion and short lifetime of working roll in stretcher leveller. According to the measured data for abrasion of working rolls in stretcher leveller, wearing mechanisms for the working rolls were studied by field test and experiment method. The prediction model of maximum wear values based on strip production and that of overall wear based on parameters were established, and the specific model parameters were optimized using genetic algorithms. The optimized model could be used for online wearing forecasting of working rolls.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 压下变形参数对超高强钢再结晶规律的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
2.重庆科技学院冶金与材料工程学院，重庆401331
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 以一种超高强钢为研究对象，对其进行了热力学计算分析和热模拟压下实验，采用金相组织和扫描形貌分析等手段，研究了压下变形参数对超高强钢再结晶的影响规律。研究结果表明：变形速率越大，变形温度越低，实验钢动态再结晶越不容易发生；变形温度为950 ℃，变形速率为0.1 s-1时，真应变为0.1，奥氏体晶粒尺寸为6524 μm；真应变为05时，稳态连续再结晶形成的奥氏体沿着原来奥氏体向晶内长大，尺寸较为均匀，晶粒细化到4821 μm；真应变为08时，发生非连续再结晶，晶粒细化到3045 μm，呈现多边形等轴状。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect laws of deformation parameters on recrystallization of ultra-high strength steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In this study,an ultra-high strength steel(UHSS) as the research object,thermodynamics and thermal simulation compression experiments were carried out to study the effect laws of deformation parameters on recrystallization by using scanning means microstructure and morphology analysis.The results showed that the greater the strain rate and the lower the deformation temperature,the dynamic recrystallization was less likely to occur.When the deformation temperature was 950 ℃，the strain rate was 0.1 s-1 and the true strain was 0.1,the austenite grain size was 65.24 μm.When the true strain was 0.5,steady continuous recrystallization uniform austenite was formed along new boundaries growing into the grains body,and grain size was 48.21 μm.When the true strain was 0.8,non-continuous recrystallization was occurred on condition of the true strain of 0.8,and grain size was 30.45 μm,showing equiaxed polygon.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陈永利 ，赵阳，周雪娇，黄建国. 压下变形参数对超高强钢再结晶规律的影响[J]. , 2016, 33(3): 12-15.
CHEN Yong-li,,ZHAO Yang,ZHOU Xue-jiao,HUANG Jian-guo. Effect laws of deformation parameters on recrystallization of ultra-high strength steel. , 2016, 33(3): 12-15.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: QIU Mu- sheng1,2，HUANG Xue- qi1,2，LI Ya- dong1,2，ZHAO Hu1,2，TENG Hua- xiang1,2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.首钢技术研究院薄板研究所，北京100043
2.绿色可循环钢铁流程北京市重点实验室,北京100043
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 实验对比研究了Ti- IF和Ti+Nb- IF钢热轧、退火过程中微观组织和织构的变化，采用透射电镜和能谱仪研究分析了二相粒子在热轧、冷轧、退火过程中的形貌、尺寸及分布。实验结果表明：添加Nb使得Ti+Nb- IF钢中析出粒子较Ti- IF钢更为细小且弥散，抑制了γ纤维再结晶织构的发展，削弱了{111}〈110〉在γ纤维织构中的强度，且细小的析出物有助于提高IF钢的抗拉强度，但两者成形性能没有明显差异。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Microstructure and texture of Ti- IF and Nb+Ti- IF hot- dip galvanized steels
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The microstructure and texture evolution during hot rolling and continuous annealing processes of Ti bearing and Ti+Nb stabilized IF steels were experimentally studied,and the morphology,size and distribution of the second phase precipitates during hot rolling,cold rolling and continuous annealing were also analyzed by transmission electron microscope (TEM) equipped with an EDS.The results showed that the size of precipitates in Ti +Nb stabilized IF steel was smaller than that of Ti bearing IF steel,which inhibited γ fiber recrystallization texture development,weakened {111}〈110〉 texture intensity in the γ fiber,and prompted fine precipitates average grain size smaller.Nb addition does not improve the formability as such,but it beneficial to enhance the tensile strength of steel.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
邱木生 ，黄学启 ，李亚东 ，赵虎 ，滕华湘 . 热浸镀锌Ti- IF和Nb+Ti- IF钢组织和织构研究[J]. , 2017, 34(3): 29-33.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司，河北唐山063000
2.首钢集团有限公司技术研究院，北京100043
3.中国科学院过程工程研究所，北京100190
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 研究了铁在高温氧化过程中的扩散机理，通过氧化增重试验进行了动力学计算；通过X射线衍射，对晶格参数进行了计算，提出高温下Fe的扩散以及Mg对高温氧化的抑制作用机理。结果表明：Mg2+填充氧化层内层FeO的晶格空位，降低了空位浓度，减小了阳离子穿过FeO层的扩散速率，从而降低了氧化速率。Mg2+取代氧化层外层Fe3O4中氧八面体中心的Fe2+，生成MgxFe(1- x)O和MgxFe(1- x)Fe2O4，通过提高八面体扩散能垒，可以降低阳离子穿过该层的扩散速率。
keywords_cn: 扩散速率 晶格参数 空位 抑制
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study on the diffusion control of ion in oxide scale
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The diffusion mechanism of Fe at high temperature oxidation process was studied.The dynamic parameters were calculated based on the oxidation weight gain test.The lattice parameters were calculated too based on the X- ray experiment.The mechanism of Mg2+ refrain Fe diffusion at high temperature was put forward.The result showed that Mg2+ could occupy the vacancies in wüstite and reduce the concentration of vacancies in wüstite,which lead to the decrease of the velocity of cation diffusion through the oxide scale.As a result,the oxidation rate was reduced.At the same time,Mg2+ could substitute for Fe2+ in inner wüstite and outer spinel layer,and form the relative compact MgxFe(1- x)O solid solution and MgxFe(1- x)Fe2O4 spinel respectively.The substitution would reduce the lattice parameter and enhance the energy barrier of which Fe ions diffusion through the layers.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
周旬，艾矫健，王晓东，徐海卫，刘朋，魏连启. 铁氧化层中离子扩散抑制问题研究[J]. , 2017, 34(5): 12-15.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIU Sheng，LIU Yu-xin，ZHOU Qing-peng，HE Chong-kai，DING Xue-song
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 武汉科技大学钢铁冶金及资源利用省部共建教育部重点实验室，湖北武汉430081
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 利用铅试样在实验室轧机上对钢板桩异型断面轧制过程进行模拟实验，通过改变轧制速度、辊缝压下量、导入角、轧辊直径以及轧制润滑条件，研究了轧制断面的宽展变化规律。实验结果表明，其他轧制工艺参数不变时，异型断面的宽展随轧制速度和导入角的增加而减小,随摩擦系数和压下量的增加而增加，且异型断面形状对宽展的影响因子约为0. 5；对于辊径差不大于8%的异型孔型，可选巴赫契诺夫公式结合现场情况进行修正后使用。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Experimental Research on Profile Spread of Hot Rolled Steel Sheet Pile
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Pass rolling process of profile has been simulated by using lead material in laboratory mill, to look for the spread relative laws of profiles by changing rolling velocity，rolling reduction of gap，opening angle，rolling diameter and rolling lubrication. The test results show that spread of profile will reduce as rolling velocity and opening angle increase, it will increase as rolling reduction of gaps and friction increase when other rolling process parameters keep constant.The spread impact factor of profile shape is about 0. 5.The bachs′formula has been rectified ,which would be choosed to fit the situation while rolling diameter deviation of profile grooves is not more than 8%.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘升，刘宇鑫，周庆鹏，贺充恺，丁雪松. 热轧钢板桩异型断面宽展的实验研究[J]. , 2014, 31(3): 27-30.
LIU Sheng，LIU Yu-xin，ZHOU Qing-peng，HE Chong-kai，DING Xue-song. Experimental Research on Profile Spread of Hot Rolled Steel Sheet Pile. , 2014, 31(3): 27-30.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: X90管线钢板调质处理后的组织与性能
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: XU You-chun, XIE Tao, DENG Li
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 华菱湘潭钢铁有限公司宽厚板厂，湖南 湘潭 411101
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 本文对16.3 mm厚 X90管线钢板在不同调质处理工艺下的组织性能进行了研究。结果表明：930 ℃淬火温度下，随着回火温度的升高，钢板屈服强度先增加后降低，抗拉强度逐渐降低，从而导致屈强比升高；回火温度为630 ℃时，落锤剪切面中脆性区增多，落锤性能最差。在870 ℃两相区淬火，钢板组织中奥氏体晶粒大幅度细化，再经530 ℃回火，细化的马氏体或者贝氏体组织中出现亚结构的回复软化，板条边界钝化和M/A组元分解的综合作用，使该调质工艺下X90管线钢板的综合性能最佳。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on microstructure and properties of quenched X90 pipeline steel plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The microstructures and properties of X90 pipeline steel plates produced by different quenching and tempering processes were analyzed. The result showed that quenching temperature at 930 ℃, the yield strength was firstly increased and then declined as the tempering temperature increased, while tensile-strength was decreased gradually and reached the lowest at 630 ℃.So, the ratio of yield strength/tensile strength was increased and the DWTT value became the worst. Quenching temperature at 870 ℃ of two phase zone and tempering at 530 ℃, X90 pipeline steel plate had the optimum comprehensive properties. This could be attributed to the fine grain austenite microstructure after quenching at 870 ℃, the combined effect of recovery and softening of the dislocation sub-structure, the blunting mechanism along strip boundaries and the precipitation strengthening from decomposition of massive M-A after tempering at 530 ℃.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
徐优春，谢 韬，邓 丽. X90管线钢板调质处理后的组织与性能[J]. , 2014, 31(5): 17-19.
XU You-chun, XIE Tao, DENG Li. Research on microstructure and properties of quenched X90 pipeline steel plate. , 2014, 31(5): 17-19.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 四辊板带轧机辊颈载荷分布及板形影响因素分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LI Yue, ZHANG Xiao-ping, LIU Guang-ming, MA Yan-fei, WANG Qiang
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 太原科技大学重型机械教育部工程研究中心，山西 太原 030024
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 板形是板带材产品的重要质量指标之一。辊系弹性变形是影响板形的主要因素，轧机辊颈载荷分布直接影响轧机的辊系弹性变形，因此精确分析辊颈载荷分布对板形控制和轴承使用有着重要的意义。针对实验室四辊可逆冷轧机，采用ANSYS/LS-DYNA有限元软件，基于显式动力学建立了耦合支撑辊轴承、轧辊和轧件的三维实体模型，分析了板宽、摩擦因数、张力和压下量等因素对支撑辊辊径载荷分布和板凸度的影响，对四辊板带轧机板形控制和轴承使用提供了理论支持。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Roll neck load distribution and strip shape analysis of four-high strip mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Shape is one of the most important quality indexes of strip products. Roll system elastic deformation of strip mills is the major factor affecting strip flatness. The setup style of roll neck load distribution has significant influence on the roll elastic deformation calculating precision. Then an accurate analysis of roll neck load distribution is significant to strip shape controlling strategy and bearing usage. Based on dynamic explicit elastic-plastic finite element method, the three dimensional elastic-plastic deformation calculation model including backup roll bearings, strip, backup rolls and work rolls was established using ANSYS/LS-DYNA. The influences of factors such as strip width, friction coefficient, tension and reduction on backup roll neck load distribution and strip crown were analyzed. The research was beneficial for shape control and bearing usage of four-high strip mill.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李 月，张小平，刘光明，马艳飞，王 强. 四辊板带轧机辊颈载荷分布及板形影响因素分析[J]. , 2014, 31(6): 1-4.
LI Yue, ZHANG Xiao-ping, LIU Guang-ming, MA Yan-fei, WANG Qiang. Roll neck load distribution and strip shape analysis of four-high strip mill. , 2014, 31(6): 1-4.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 低合金高强焊丝用BZJ60-Ti热轧盘条轧制相变模拟与实践
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Xian-hua,L Jian-xuna,ZHU Jiangb,WANG Xin-minb,KANG Dong-meic
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
本溪钢铁集团有限公司，a.棒线材研发所
b.北营轧钢厂
c.北营质管中心
辽宁本溪117017
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过Gleeble热模拟试验，研究了低合金焊丝用母材BZJ60-Ti热轧盘条在不同工艺条件下的相变规律和所能获取的最终显微组织，通过对热膨胀曲线相变段斜率及相对膨胀恢复量的对比，回避了显微组织直接对比法的局限性和难点，将显微组织作为辅助判断条件，推断出了在现有工艺条件下，此钢种要获得尽可能多的高温转变组织的合理工艺。并参照模拟结果，优化了此热轧盘条在生产过程中的工艺参数，获得了理想的显微组织，有效地降低了热轧盘条的抗拉强度。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Simulation and practice of phase transformation for BZJ60-Ti HSLA wire rod hot rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：By means of Gleeble simulation,the phase transformation and its latest microstructure of the BZJ60-Ti wire rod for HSLA steel wielding wire during the rolling process were studied.By comparing the slope of thermal expansion curve and recovery deformation amount of phase transformation during the simulating procession,the limitation and difficulties of direct comparison methods of microstructure were avoided.Making the microstructure just as a auxiliary judging benchmark,the possible process to obtain a sort of maximum high-temperature phase was concluded.The rolling parameters were optimized for the target of better microstructure and lower tensile strength of BZJ60-Ti hot-rolled wire and rod,with reference to this result of simulation.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
汪先虎，吕建勋，朱江，王新民，康冬梅c. 低合金高强焊丝用BZJ60-Ti热轧盘条轧制相变模拟与实践[J]. , 2016, 33(4): 62-67.
WANG Xian-hua,L Jian-xuna,ZHU Jiangb,WANG Xin-minb,KANG Dong-meic. Simulation and practice of phase transformation for BZJ60-Ti HSLA wire rod hot rolling. , 2016, 33(4): 62-67.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 不同正火工艺对钢板力学性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: YUAN Yong-qi1,2,YU Sa2,TANG Zheng-lei1,2,XU Shao-pu1,2,LI Zhong-bo1,2,ZHU Xian-xing2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.北京科技大学冶金与生态工程学院，北京100083
2.南阳汉冶特钢有限公司，河南南阳474500
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 试验研究了含Nb、V、Ti微合金元素的低合金钢板采用880、900、920 ℃不同正火温度及不同保温时间热处理后的力学性能和金相组织，结果表明：在合适的温度范围内，适当延长保温时间，在细化晶粒的同时，还可以消除内部偏析现象和带状组织等缺陷，最终使钢板获得优异的综合力学性能。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of different normalizing processes on the mechanical properties of plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The mechanical properties and microstructure of Nb,V,Ti micro-alloying plate were studied under different normalizing temperature of 880,900,920 ℃and different holding time.The result showed that in the appropriate normalizing temperature and holding time,the grains were refined as well as the internal segregation phenomenon and banded structure of defects were eliminated,so the excellent comprehensive mechanical properties of this plate were obtained.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
袁永旗 ，于飒，唐郑磊 ，许少普 ，李忠波 ，朱先兴. 不同正火工艺对钢板力学性能的影响[J]. , 2016, 33(5): 71-74.
YUAN Yong-qi,,YU Sa,TANG Zheng-lei,,XU Shao-pu,,LI Zhong-bo,,ZHU Xian-xing. Effect of different normalizing processes on the mechanical properties of plate. , 2016, 33(5): 71-74.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 薄板坯连铸连轧超薄规格板带技术及其应用进展
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京科技大学材料科学与工程学院, 北京 100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 在简要介绍我国薄板坯连铸连轧生产技术发展的基础上, 重点介绍了我国热轧薄规格板带的市场及应用现状, 分析了CSP线生产超薄规格高强板带的工艺、FTSR线生产超薄规格板带的进展、半无头轧制技术生产超薄规格板带涉及的关键技术以及高质量薄规格板带技术开发生产应用情况。最后指出: 薄规格、超薄规格热轧板带在节能减排、"以热代冷"提高产品附加值方面具有一定的市场空间, 但需要主动积极开拓市场; 需要解决相关工艺机理及工艺控制上的关键技术, 并进行全面技术集成与创新, 才能大批量稳定生产薄规格、超薄规格板带。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: The technology and application progress of ultra-thin hot rolled strip produced by thin slab casting and rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the brief introduction of the development status of thin slab casting and rolling in China, the present situation of market and application of hot rolled thin strips was mainly introduced. The processing, microstructure and properties of ultra-thin hot rolled strips produced by CSP line, the progress of FTSR line, and the key technologies of semi-endless rolling process and the technological development and production application of high quality thin strips were introduced. Finally, It pointed out that using the thin gauge and ultra thin gauge hot rolled strip to instead cold rolled one, there was benefit in the energy-saving, emission reduction and the added value improvement of the product , but need to actively explore the market. Meanwhile, based on the key technologies related process mechanism and process control, and a comprehensive integration of technology and innovation, the stable production on a large scale of thin gauge and ultra-thin strips would be realized.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
康永林. 薄板坯连铸连轧超薄规格板带技术及其应用进展[J]. , 2015, 32(1): 7-11.
KANG Yong-lin. The technology and application progress of ultra-thin hot rolled strip produced by thin slab casting and rolling. , 2015, 32(1): 7-11.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 汽车板深加工技术发展趋势
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: TANG Di, MI Zhen-li, SU Lan
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京科技大学冶金工程研究院, 北京 100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了激光拼焊板与连续变截面板技术、内高压成形技术、热成形技术和冷弯成形技术等多种先进的汽车板成形及深加工技术, 总结了汽车板及其深加工技术的发展趋势及特点。同时指出: 多种成形技术之间, 多种材料之间的融合发展将成为今后汽车板及其应用技术重要的发展方向; 钢铁生产企业需要更多地关注深加工技术发展, 并不断延伸其产品产业链, 不仅可以形成新的利润增长点, 而且有利于对主业及深加工产业形成良性的循环, 形成相互促进的局面。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Trend of development in automobile sheet deep working technology
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The technology of deep working in automobile sheet was introduced, containing tailor welded blanks, tailor rolling blanks, internal high pressure forming, hot stamping and roll forming technology. And the production principle, characteristics and application on automobile were also introduced. The trend of development in automobile sheet deep working technology was summarized. The first was collaborative application of different forming technology. The second was collaborative application of different material. And the finaly was coordinated development of steel industry and automobile sheet deep working technology.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
唐 荻 米振莉 苏 岚. 汽车板深加工技术发展趋势[J]. 轧钢, 2015, 32(1): 1-6.
TANG Di, MI Zhen-li, SU Lan. Trend of development in automobile sheet deep working technology. Chinarolling, 2015, 32(1): 1-6.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 浅谈冷轧乳化液系统节能减排技术
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.宝钢湛江钢铁有限公司，广东湛江524033；2.宝钢工程技术集团有限公司，上海201900
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 乳化液系统是冷轧机的关键组成部分，直接影响带钢产品的表面质量。同时，乳化液系统也是冷轧生产中的重要能介消耗和废水排放工艺环节。在满足冷连轧机生产需求的基础上，通过工程设计源头策划和现场生产具体改进相结合，摸索出一套包括降低轧制油消耗，减少蒸汽、循环冷却水和脱盐水消耗，减少废水排放等方面的节能减排方法和技术。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: A brief analysis on energy saving and emission reduction technology of cold rolling emulsion system
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Emulsion system is a key part of cold rolling mill,which directly affects the surface quality of strip.Emulsion system is also an important energy consumption and waste water treatment process in cold tandem rolling mill.On the basis of meeting the production demand of cold rolling mill,through the combination of the source planning of engineering design and the concrete improvement of field production,a set of energysaving and emission reduction methods and technologies were put forward,including reducing the consumption of rolling oil,reducing the consumption of steam,circulating cooling water and desalting water,reducing the discharge of waste water and so on.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
鲁鹏，刘兴祥，于浩. 浅谈冷轧乳化液系统节能减排技术[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(2): 52-54.
LU Peng，LIU Xingxiang，YU Hao. A brief analysis on energy saving and emission reduction technology of cold rolling emulsion system. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(2): 52-54.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 一种热轧翘皮缺陷的分析与控制
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: HAN Le,LI Xiangkui,LI Zhishuang,MEI Ning,WANG Zhangling,XU Hua#br#
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司，河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对一种热轧工序产生的带钢表面翘皮缺陷，利用扫描电镜，结合缺陷的形貌及分布规律，分析了其形成原因。结果表明，此类缺陷与基体存在明显分层，为热轧精轧工序侧导板粘钢掉落至带钢表面所致。通过抑制中间坯跑偏、预设侧导板开度余量、及时更换修磨侧导板等措施，有效减少了此类翘皮缺陷的发生。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis and control of a warping defect in hot rolling process
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aimed at a kind of warping defect occurring in hot strip rolling process,the morphology and distribution of the defect were studied by scanning electron microscope (SEM).And its formation cause was analyzed.The results showed that there was an obvious stratification between the defects and the matrix,and this kind of defect was caused by the scale falling off from the side guide plate in the hot rolling finishing process.Through restraining the deviation of the slab,opening allowance of the side guide plate and the timely replacement of the side guide plate and grinding,this kind of warping defect were effectively reduced.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
韩乐，李向奎，李志双，梅宁，王章岭，徐华. 一种热轧翘皮缺陷的分析与控制[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(2): 76-79.
HAN Le,LI Xiangkui,LI Zhishuang,MEI Ning,WANG Zhangling,XU Hua. Analysis and control of a warping defect in hot rolling process. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(2): 76-79.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: UCMW冷连轧机有带钢模式标定技术研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIU Yujin,CHEN Wei,FAN Zhengjun,CAO Jing,LIU Lei,YOU Xuechang
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢智新迁安电磁材料有限公司，河北迁安064400
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 以五机架冷连轧UCMW轧机为研究对象，研究了其有带钢模式的轧机标定技术。阐述了标定理论，对标定流程和一、二级通信信息进行了研究，建立了标定数据档案，并对标定程序进行了优化。通过实际轧制数据，分析了压上缸位置差、标定力设定和调平控制对轧制的影响。结果表明，压上缸位置差影响轧制力偏差和张力偏差；提高标定力，可有效去除弹跳曲线的非线性段对辊缝值计算的影响，有利于厚度控制精度的提高；减少调平控制投入时的压上缸位置差，提高了轧机自动化控制精度及轧制稳定性。标定数据档案已在现场实际应用，为轧制调平和轧机功能精度管理提供了依据。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on calibration technology of strip in UCMW cold tandem mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Taking the UCMW cold tandem mill as the research object,the calibration technology of strip in mill was studied.The calibration theory was described,and the calibration process and communication informations of L1 and L2 system were researched.The calibration data file was established,and the program was optimized.The effects of cylinder position difference,calibration force setting and leveling control on rolling stability were analyzed by the actual rolling.The results showed that the rolling force difference and tension difference were influenced by cylinder position difference.The nonlinear segment of spring curve could be eliminated by increasing calibration force，and the automatic control precision could be improved by decreasing cylinder position difference when leveling.The application of calibration data file had been used in practial production, and it provided the basis for leveling and mill function precision management.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘玉金，陈伟，范正军，曹静，刘磊，游学昌. UCMW冷连轧机有带钢模式标定技术研究[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(4): 58-61.
LIU Yujin,CHEN Wei,FAN Zhengjun,CAO Jing,LIU Lei,YOU Xuechang. Research on calibration technology of strip in UCMW cold tandem mill. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(4): 58-61.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.燕山大学机械学院，河北秦皇岛066004
2.华北理工大学，a.机械工程学院
b.冶金与能源学院，河北唐山063009
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 市场对带钢产品需求的多样化要求热连轧生产过程中对板坯进行在线调宽以实现连铸与连轧之间板坯宽度上的衔接。按照轧制过程调宽技术的发展历程，分别就大立辊调宽以及定宽机调宽技术从应用、结构组成、调宽方法、调宽原理、性能特点等角度进行了分析，并重点分析了这些调宽技术在结构改造及板形控制等方面的研究进展情况。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Advances in width adjustment technology of continuous strip production line
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Market demands for strip steel products are various，so slab width from caster to rolling mill should be adjusted to meet the demands in continuous strip production line.According to the development of width adjustment technology,the advanced width adjustment technologies such as large vertical rolling mill and slab sizing press (SSP) in hot strip continuous rolling line were analyzed from application,structural components,width adjustment method,width reduction principle,performance characteristics，and so on.The research progresses in technical innovation and the shape control of slab were especialy analyzed.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
王彦凤 ，张玉柱 . 热连轧带钢调宽技术研究进展[J]. , 2016, 33(4): 45-48.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 中厚板瓢曲浪形的仿真分析与抑制措施研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1．宝钢集团广东韶关钢铁有限公司，广东韶关512123
2．华南理工大学机械与汽车工程学院，广东广州510641
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为了解决某3 450 mm生产线中厚板瓢曲浪形缺陷问题，本文应用ANSYS软件对中厚板各种浪形瓢曲缺陷进行了有限元仿真模拟计算，采用温度场对宽度方向上纵向延伸不一致的情况进行了模拟，获得了各种浪形屈曲模态，并与现场实际的板形瓢曲浪形进行了对比，两者符合较好；同时，获得了各种不同浪形的屈曲临界载荷条件和屈曲临界波长，并对中浪和边浪的主要影响因素进行了分析。在有限元仿真计算的基础上对现场的工艺措施进行了改进，调整了机组工作辊辊型和弯辊力使用策略，有效地减少了机组存在的中浪和边浪问题。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Simulation of plate buckling wave and research of control methods
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to solve the plate buckling wave problems in a 3 450 mm mill,the different kinds of plate buckling wave defects were simulated with finite element software ANSYS.The condition that temperature field in longitudinal extension is different along width was adopted in simulation,and various buckling wave modes were obtained.After comparing with the plate buckling waves in the practical sites,the similarity was well.The critical load condition and critical buckling wave length of various waves are obtained.And the main factors caused for central wave and edge wave were analyzed.On the basis of finite element simulation,the process measures in the production site were improved,and the using policy of work roll contour and roll bending force were adjusted,effectively reduced the central wave and edge wave problems existed in roll train.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
张祖江，戴杰涛 ，戴文笠. 中厚板瓢曲浪形的仿真分析与抑制措施研究[J]. , 2016, 33(5): 22-26.
ZHANG Zu-jiang，DAI Jie-tao，DAI Wen-li. Simulation of plate buckling wave and research of control methods. , 2016, 33(5): 22-26.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热连轧粗轧机架空过技术分析

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: DROF工艺中轧件头尾温差与组织性能均匀性控制
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIU Xiang-huaa,c，WANG Saic,WANG Jic，CHEN Qing-anc，LIU Xinc,LIU Li-zhongb
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
东北大学,a.研究院
b.材料科学与工程学院
c.轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 棒线材免加热直接轧制（DROF）工艺有一个难以避免的问题，即轧件头尾温差问题。当轧件头尾温差较大时，会对产品组织性能均匀性产生不利影响。本文讨论了由于轧件头尾温差带来的产品组织性能波动范围，分析了在铸坯切断、送到轧机入口处、上冷床等几个特殊时刻，轧件沿纵向的温度分布特点。为了解决轧件头尾温差问题，提出采用精轧机组前变水量冷却、粗轧机组前变功率感应补热、切坯台加变长度保温罩等3种方式，以有效减小免加热条件下轧件头尾温差，控制其组织性能差异，获得质量优良的产品。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Temperature difference on head and tail of billet and control for homogeneity in microstructure and properties of products in DROF process
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The temperature difference at the ends (head and tail) is a hard problem in DROF process.When the temperature difference is big,it would lead to have a bad influence on the homogeneity in microstructure and properties of the products.The fluctuation range of the microstructure and properties by DROF technology was discussed.The temperature distribution along longitude at the cut-off point,the roughing mill and the cooling bed were analyzed.Three different ways were proposed in order to solve this problem,that is changeable cooling water used at the entrance of finishing train,changeable induce heating system used before the roughing mill and changeable heat cover used at cutting platform.All of them were useful to reduce the temperature difference on the work piece,so as to produce products with good quality.
keywords_en: temperature difference at head and tail
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘相华，c，王赛c，王吉c，陈庆安c，刘鑫c，刘立忠+. DROF工艺中轧件头尾温差与组织性能均匀性控制[J]. , 2016, 33(5): 1-5.
LIU Xiang-huaa,c，WANG Saic,WANG Jic，CHEN Qing-anc，LIU Xinc,LIU Li-zhongb. Temperature difference on head and tail of billet and control for homogeneity in microstructure and properties of products in DROF process. , 2016, 33(5): 1-5.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.首钢技术研究院，北京100043

3.首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司，河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用SEM微观检测分析，结合产线工艺排查，对镀锡基板表面孔洞缺陷成因进行了分析。孔洞主要是由于炼钢保护渣卷入、异物压入、氧化铁皮残留和机械损伤造成的。为此，对结晶器流场进行优化，减少液面波动，定期开展热轧设备维检，增加粗轧除鳞道次，加开精轧机架间除鳞水，加强工序产线设备工况保障，有效降低了基板表面孔洞缺陷的发生率。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis on causes of hole defects on tin mill black plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The causes of hole defect on the surface of tin mill black plate (TMBP) were analyzed by SEM. The main reason was due to slag entrapment from continuous casting, incrustation pressed-in and scale residual from hot-rolling, mechanical damage. Therefore,some measures were taken to decrease the incidence of hole defects,which include optimizing the flow field of the mold and lessening the mould level fluctuation ,regularly maintaining the hot rolling equipments ,increasing descaling passes during the rough rolling process,adding descaling unit between the mills of finish rolling process,assuring the regular working conditions of equipments ,etc. Basing on these measurement,the occurrence rate of hole defect was obviously decreased.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
孙超凡 ，周旬，方圆 ，李瑞，王雅晴，. 镀锡基板表面孔洞缺陷成因分析及其控制[J]. , 2017, 34(4): 23-25.
SUN Chao-fan，ZHOU Xun，FANG Yuan， LI Rui，WANG Ya-qing,. Analysis on causes of hole defects on tin mill black plate. , 2017, 34(4): 23-25.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为解决某1 580 mm生产线生产薄规格产品时的穿带稳定性难题，经过分析后，从温度控制、精轧模型设定以及速度控制等方面进行了改进，由此降低了轧制薄规格带钢时穿带起浪、轧破及跑偏等事故发生率，使穿带稳定性得到了显著提高。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：To solve the finishing mill threading difficulty of hot rolled thin gauge strip in a 1 580 mm line,some improvement measures about the temperature control,model setting,and speed control were taken into practice.The accident rate was reduced,such as shape wave,strip breaking and strip running deviation,and the finishing mill threading stability was upgraded greatly.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LI Hua,ZHOU Ying- chao,SHEN Hai- long,NING Guo- yan
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 河钢集团邯钢公司邯宝2 250 mm热轧厂，河北邯郸056002
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对邯钢2 250 mm热轧厂生产中支撑辊存在的在机剥落、辊型磨损严重、板形控制困难等问题，研究了支撑辊疲劳裂纹的产生机理，优化了辊型曲线，开发了疲劳裂纹检测技术、磨削量预测技术、支撑辊堆焊与检测技术，以及支撑辊使用评价体系。实践表明：杜绝了疲劳裂纹引起支撑辊在机发生剥落、掉肩等轧辊失效事故；延长了支撑辊在机服役时间；减少了辊型在机磨损，支撑辊辊耗降低了0.03 kg/t。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Usage technology of back- up roll in Hanbao 2 250 mm hot rolling mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the problems,such as spalling,serious wear of the back- up rolls and difficult strip flatness control in the Hanbao 2 250 mm Hot Rolling Mill in Hansteel,the mechanism of the fatigue crack of the back- up roll was study,the roll shape curve was optimized.Meanwhile,the fatigue crack detection technology,the grinding volume prediction technology,the surfacing and detecting technology of back- up roll were developed,and the evaluation system for back- up roll was established. The practice showed that the fatigue crack caused to spalling of the back- up roll was eliminated,its service time was increased,and the wear of back- up roll was reduced,the roll consumption reduced 0.03 kg/t.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 液压辊缝控制系统 (HGC) 是单机架冷轧机带钢厚度控制的关键环节，但随着工况的变化，HGC系统多次发生振动，在对HGC控制系统展开研究的基础上，从系统背压、位置闭环控制的角度提出了优化改进措施，有效解决了轧机振动的问题。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Solution of HGC vibration problem for single stand cold mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Hydraulic roll gap control system（HGC）is the key link of the strip thickness control for single stand cold rolling mill.But with the change of working conditions,the HGC system vibrated many times.Based on the analysis on HGC control system,optimization and improvement measures about the back pressure and position closedloop control were put forward,and this problem was solved.
Key words：single stand cold mill;hydraulic roll gap control;vibration;back pressure;position control

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 结合内蒙古包钢钢联股份有限公司薄板坯连铸连轧厂利用CSP流程生产无取向硅钢的工艺特点，针对CSP流程在连浇过程中出现的诸如轧机换辊、铸机降速、工艺状态波动等情况下产出的过渡坯不能轧制成目标厚度的问题，利用厂里现有冷轧罩式炉、冷轧重卷分卷生产线，进行二次轧制、罩式退火、重卷扩径，处理了大量计划带出品，并得到了磁性能更好的硅钢产品。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Treatment scheme for intermediate unoriented silicon steel in CSP process
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the characteristics of unoriented silicon steel production process in Baotou Steel CSP Plant,in order to solve the problem of intermediate silicon steel slab could not rolled into target gauge when mill roll changing,casting machine downspeed and other process condition fluctuations in the sequence casting,the new processes of secondary rolling,batch annealing and then recoiling were studied and carried out.A large number of intermediate silicon steel slabs were retreated,further more the magnetic property of silicon steel was improved.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.河钢集团钢研总院，河北石家庄050023 ；2.河钢集团承钢公司，河北承德067002
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了国内某带肋钢筋产线进行直接轧制的改造实践。对提高连铸坯温度和降低输送过程中钢坯温度损失的方法等直接轧制工艺中的关键因素进行了讨论；用实际生产中的数据对相关文献中的模拟结果进行了验证。实践表明，采用直接轧制工艺生产抗震带肋钢筋产品，钢坯温度满足轧制需要，轧机轧制负载正常，产品性能满足国标要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Reformation practice of direct rolling for bar and rod
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The reformation practice of direct rolling technology in a ribbed bar production line was introduced.The key factors in direct rolling process,such as increasing the temperature of continuous billet and reducing its temperature loss in  transportation process,were discussed.The simulation results in related literatures were verified by the actual production data.The practice shows that the billet temperature meets the rolling needs,the load of the rolling mill is normal,and the product performance meets the requirements of the chinese national standard by the direct rolling technology to produce the high strength aseismic reinforcement ribbed bar.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李杰，常金宝，郭子强，张俊粉，邢建军. 棒材直接轧制工艺改造实践[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(3): 47-50.
LI Jie,CHANG Jinbao,GUO Ziqiang,ZHANG Junfen,XING Jianjun. Reformation practice of direct rolling for bar and rod. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(3): 47-50.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: SS400B热轧带钢四次氧化铁皮成因分析及控制
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LEI Kai,TANG Huasheng,LI Guobao,YU Shuang,YANG Guiling#br#
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 山东钢铁集团日照有限公司，山东日照276800
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对厚规格（h≥8 mm）SS400B热轧带钢用户开平后出现黑色起粉问题，从板坯规格、轧制温度、轧制速率以及轧后冷却过程等方面详细分析了其氧化铁皮形成原因，通过提高轧制速率、降低卷取温度、将钢卷放置通风处等措施，减少了氧化铁皮残留和四次氧化铁皮的形成，解决了卷取后带钢表面氧化铁皮起粉问题。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Causes analysis of the fourth iron oxide scale in SS400B strip hot rolling process and its control measures
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aimed at the black powder on the thick gauge (above 8 mm) SS400B strip surface after levelling process,the causes were analyzed in the way of slab specifications,rolling temperature,rolling speed and cooling process after rolling.Based on it,the measures of increasing rolling speed,decreasing coiling temperature and placing the coil in open air were put into practice,so the residual scale and the fourth scale were reduced,and the black powder problem was resolved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
雷凯，汤化胜，李国宝，于爽，杨贵玲. SS400B热轧带钢四次氧化铁皮成因分析及控制[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(3): 75-77.
LEI Kai,TANG Huasheng,LI Guobao,YU Shuang,YANG Guiling. Causes analysis of the fourth iron oxide scale in SS400B strip hot rolling process and its control measures. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(3): 75-77.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热模拟试验机通用单元多道次压缩实现的研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.太原钢铁（集团）有限公司先进不锈钢材料国家重点实验室，山西太原030003；
2.山西太钢不锈钢股份有限公司技术中心，山西太原030003
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对Gleeble 3800热模拟试验机通用单元只能模拟单道次压缩试验，进行多道次压缩试验需将通用单元更换为液压楔单元费力费时的缺点，详细分析了Gleeble 3800热模拟试验机的液压动力系统和高速伺服阀快速压缩试验过程中的响应能力，通过控制位移（stroke）传感器的参数设置和空气锤夹持试样相结的方式，实现了多道次压缩试验的物理模拟。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on multi-pass compression implementation of mobile conversion unit of Gleeble 3800 thermal simulation test machine
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the shortcomings of only simulating the single pass compression test of the mobile conversion unit of Gleeble 3800 thermal simulation test machine,and the multi-pass compression test needs to replace the mobile conversion unit with the hydraulic wedge unit,which is laborious and timeconsuming,the response ability of high speed servo valve and hydraulic system of the Gleeble 3800 thermal simulated test machine in rapid compression tests were analyzed in detail.The physical simulation of the multipass compression test was realized by controlling the parameter setting of the stroke sensor and the air hammer clamping sample.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
廉晓洁. 热模拟试验机通用单元多道次压缩实现的研究[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(6): 33-37.
LIAN Xiaojie. Research on multi-pass compression implementation of mobile conversion unit of Gleeble 3800 thermal simulation test machine. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(6): 33-37.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 酸洗生产中硅泥问题分析与探讨
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 宝钢日铁汽车板有限公司，上海200941
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 在硅钢酸洗和超高强钢酸洗工艺过程中，带钢表面的氧化层及少量基体会与盐酸反应，同时也会有少量不与盐酸反应的Si、Mn、Nb、Ti、Cr及其氧化物，这些物质会被带到盐酸循环系统中，容易在循环系统设备表面结垢，堵塞如酸加热器、喷梁、阀门等设备，影响带钢酸洗质量。通过钽管加热器在酸循环系统中的应用实例及高温除硅泥的试验分析，对比了几种硅泥问题解决方案，提出了采用钽管酸加热器和高温除硅泥工艺相结合的硅泥问题解决方案。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis and discussion about the problem of silicon sludge by pickling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In the silicon steel and ultrhigh strength steel pickling process,the oxide layer of the strip and a small amount of matrix react with hydrochloric.At the same time，there will be a small amount elements such as Si,Mn,Nb,Ti,Cr and its oxide,these substances don′t react with hydrochloric acid and scattered in the circulation system.It is easily scaling on the surface of the equipment and block them in the circulation system,such as acid heat exchanger,acid spray header,valves and other equipment.It affect the quality of strip pickling.Through application of tantalum tube heater in the acid circulation system and test analysis of silicon sludge removal at high temperature,several kinds solutions to silicon sludge were compared.The countermeasures to silicon sludge were put forward,which the tantalum tube acid heater and the process of silicon sludge removal at high temperature were used at the same time.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
潘勋平. 酸洗生产中硅泥问题分析与探讨[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(6): 43-47.
PAN Xunping. Analysis and discussion about the problem of silicon sludge by pickling. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(6): 43-47.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 冷轧厚规格带钢表面乳化液或水残留成因与对策
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司冷轧作业部，河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对某冷连轧产线生产厚规格（h≥1.5 mm）带钢时表面出现乳化液或水珠残留现象而影响带钢表面质量的问题，分析排除了轧制力、张力等轧制参数的影响，找到该问题的根本原因是第5机架喷原设计吹扫效果不良，乳化液与水未及时被吹扫系统吹掉，在轧制厚规格产品辊缝较大的情况下造成乳化液或水不沿辊缝回流，从而出现带钢边部乳化液或水残留的质量问题。为此，对空气吹扫喷梁进行了改造，有效吹除了带钢表面乳化液与水等液体，提升了带钢表面质量。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Causes analysis of emulsion or water residue on the surface of cold rolled thick gauge strip and its countermeasures
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the problem of emulsion or water residue on the surface of thick gauge (h≥1.5 mm) cold rolled strip,the production data of rolling force,tension were analyzed and excluded.The results show that there is poor purging effect of air blow spray beam of No.5 stand,the emulsion and water can not be blown off by the purging system in time,and the emulsion or water can not flowed back along the roll gap when rolling thick gauge strip used large roll gap,which causes the quality problems.By modifying the air blow spray beam,the liquid of emulsion or water could be purged,and the strip quality was improved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
杨洪凯，李靖，张良，万军. 冷轧厚规格带钢表面乳化液或水残留成因与对策[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(6): 93-95.
YANG Hongkai,LI Jing,ZHANG Liang,WAN Jun. Causes analysis of emulsion or water residue on the surface of cold rolled thick gauge strip and its countermeasures. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(6): 93-95.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 钢轨"高点"缺陷分析与控制
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: TAO Gong-ming, Lü Pan-feng, LI You-qin, ZHU Hua-lin, FAN Hong-ping
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 攀钢集团攀枝花钢钒有限公司, 四川 攀枝花 617062
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis and control of the rail "high zone" defect
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Local abnormal height of rail is called "high zone" which affects safety of high speed train. It is prominent and difficult to solve it in the production of high speed rail. "high zone"of rail in tandem rolling process is analysised. The results show that primary cause of "high zone"is "tail swinging" the moment that rolling piece leaving rollers. Measures to reduce or remove "high zone" such as controlling tandem rolling tension, adjusting exit side guard gap, adding rolling pass in tandem, optimizing section coefficient of extension are verified. But using single finish rolling mill instead of tandem mills is more stable and reliable, and it can control "high zone" below 0.2 mm.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 铝钢复合带材异径轧制变形规律的研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: GAO Chuang,LI Long, ZHAO Jia- ying, ZHANG Xiao- jun, ZHOU De- jing
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 银邦金属复合材料股份有限公司，金属层状复合材料技术研究院，江苏无锡214145
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 以4A60铝合金和08Al低碳钢为研究对象，利用异径轧机进行异径同速轧制，从厚度变化、硬度分布及金相组织等几个方面对薄铝复层的铝/钢轧制复合变形区的金属流动规律进行了研究分析。结果表明：铝钢轧制复合过程中铝先于钢达到稳定塑性变形，轧制复合过程中变形区可分为铝钢变形未复合区、铝钢变形复合区和钢变形区。当变形量增加到55%时，钢的硬度从约110 HV升高到210 HV，而铝层的硬度变化不大，基本保持在（40±5） HV。4A60铝和08Al钢的临界复合压下量为15%左右，当压下量超过45%时，仅发生钢的变形，而铝的厚度基本保持不变。铝层厚度与总厚度的比值（复合比）由轧前的0.054降低到轧后的0.052，说明轧制复合过程中铝的变形更大。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Deformation behavior of aluminum clad steel strip bonded by mills with different diameter rolls
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：4A60 aluminum clad 08Al steel strip was cold rolled using mills with different diameter rolls but the same speed, and the bonding behavior in deformation zone of 4A60 aluminum clad 08Al steel strip was investigated by using optical microscopy (OM) and Vickers hardmeter. The results show that it is easy for Al to achieve stable plastic deformation, and deformation zone may be divided into three zones from the entrance to exit of rolling, i.e. deformed but unbonded zone, deformed and bonded zone, and steel deformation zone. The hardness of 08Al increases from 110 HV to 210 HV but the one of 4A60 almost keep the value of （40±5） HV when the reduction increases to 55% from 0. The critical bonding reduction is about 15%, and deformation of 4A60 aluminum ceases but 08Al steel keep deforming in thickness when the reduction is over 45%. Clad ratio of clad strip decreases from 0.054 to 0.052 that means 4A60 aluminum undergoes the larger deformation during roll bonding.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
高闯，李龙，赵嘉莹，张小军，周德敬. 铝钢复合带材异径轧制变形规律的研究[J]. , 2015, 32(4): 41-45.
GAO Chuang,LI Long, ZHAO Jia- ying, ZHANG Xiao- jun, ZHOU De- jing. Deformation behavior of aluminum clad steel strip bonded by mills with different diameter rolls. , 2015, 32(4): 41-45.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热连轧超快冷系统水压控制策略的开发与应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development and application of pressure control strategy for ultra-fast cooling on hot strip rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The pressure control system of ultra-fast cooling(UFC) on hot strip rolling was studied.The opening degree of UFC pressure adjusting valve and the flow capacity were analyzed.Modulatory-efficiency equation for UFC pressure adjusting valve was established based on the results of this analysis.Low-cost and high efficiency optimal pressure control strategy was developed for UFC on hot strip rolling in combination with modulatory-efficiency equation.A stable pressure control result was obtained by using this optimal pressure control strategy in practical application,which provided a strong guarantee for low-cost and high efficiency production.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 三辊全浮连轧管机工艺计算模型及有限元模拟
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶东方工程技术有限公司， 山东青岛266555
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 阐述了三辊全浮连轧管工艺的技术优势，并分析说明了“竹节”控制原理和实施方案。以国内经多年生产实践并运行良好的某140 mm二辊全浮连轧管机组为基础，以淘汰落后产能为目标，开发出新型三辊全浮连轧管机。从孔型设计、变形分配、力能参数3个方面建立数学模型，并进行实例分析。结合实例，建立了有限元计算模型，采用有限元分析方法对三辊全浮连轧管机组的轧制全过程进行计算机模拟，为三辊全浮芯棒连轧管机的实际生产提供技术参考。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Calculating model and finite element simulation of 3-roll full float mandrel pipe mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The technical advantages of 3-roll full float mandrel were expounded, and the “bamboo” control principle and implementation scheme were introduced.Based on a 140 mm 2-roll full float mandrel pipe mill in China which run a good production over years，a new 3-roll full float mandrel pipe mill was developed to close down backward production capacity as a goal.The mathematical models of the roll pass were designed,the distribution of deformation and mechanical energy parameters were established,and the analysis example was introduced.Combined with example,the finite element model was established,and the computer simulation for the whole rolling process was carried out.It would provide technical reference for actual production of the 3-roll full float mill.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
赵宏彬，李元德， 崔明亮. 三辊全浮连轧管机工艺计算模型及有限元模拟[J]. , 2017, 34(2): 32-37.
ZHAO Hong-bin，LI Yuan-de，CUI Ming-liang. Calculating model and finite element simulation of 3-roll full float mandrel pipe mill. , 2017, 34(2): 32-37.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 双根对称轧制34#球扁钢的工艺特点
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 日照钢铁有限公司，山东日照276806
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对球扁钢轧制过程中变形不对称的特征，采用双根对称轧制法解决了非对称球扁钢轧制困难和冷却弯曲等问题，介绍了孔型强迫宽展、冷床冷却、剖分矫直的独特设计，保证了生产稳定和产品质量。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aimed at the problem of asymmetric deformation of flat-bulb steel rolling,a double symmetry rolling way was developed to solve the rolling difficulty and cooling problem.The special designs of forced spreading,cooling method and splitting straightening were introduced,which played an important role to stable production and increasing output.
keywords_en: Flat-bulb steel Double symmetry rolling Groove Cooling Splitting straighten The special designs
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
魏振洲，刘春颖. 双根对称轧制34#球扁钢的工艺特点[J]. , 2017, 34(2): 82-84.
WEI Zhen-zhou,LIU Chun-ying. Process characteristics of double symmetry rolling for No.34 flat-bulb steel. , 2017, 34(2): 82-84.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热轧平整机工作辊表面划伤的成因与控制
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢京唐钢铁有限责任公司热轧部，河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 平整机组工作辊划伤现象是热轧平整工序常见的一类问题，本文分析了工作辊划伤的成因，并有针对性地提出了控制措施，避免了实际生产中工作辊划伤问题的发生。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The work roll scratch of the skin pass mill is a common problem in hot rolled strip flattening process.The causes were analyzed,and control measures were proposed,by which scratch problem of the work roll was avoided in practical production.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
张明生，孙腾飞. 热轧平整机工作辊表面划伤的成因与控制[J]. , 2017, 34(2): 74-75.
ZHANG Ming-sheng,SUN Teng-fei. Cause analysis and control measures of work roll scratch in the skin pass mill. , 2017, 34(2): 74-75.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶京诚工程技术有限公司，北京100176
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了薄带铸轧生产线轧制润滑系统的原理、元件组成、设备布置、技术参数，以及该技术在国内铸轧生产线的应用情况，结果表明，轧制润滑能降低轧制力10%～30%，保证了轧制过程的稳定性。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Application of roll gap lubrication in thin gauge strip casting and rolling production
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The principle,equipment and its layout,main technical parameters of roll gap lubrication system,and its application in one thin gauge strip casting and rolling plant were introduced.The result showed that rolling force was reduced by 10%-30%,and the rolling stability was ensured well after used this technology.
keywords_en: thin gauge strip casting and rolling

李龙，张薇，宋则进. 轧制润滑系统在薄带铸轧生产中的应用[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(4): 69-71.
LI Long,ZHANG Wei,SONG Zejin. Application of roll gap lubrication in thin gauge strip casting and rolling production. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(4): 69-71.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 先进高强钢尾部翘曲行为的工艺优化
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Zhangling，FU Baosheng，XIA Yinfeng,HAN Le，ZHAO Xu，TIAN Guichang
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司  河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: DP780及以上级别先进高强钢经热轧平整后，存在带钢尾部向上翘曲行为，导致酸连轧生产时无法顺利穿带。针对该问题，从平整机组设备状态、工艺控制、技术操作等方面进行了分析。结果表明，不同的控制工艺对先进高强钢尾部翘曲行为的改善效果存在明显差异。通过采取平整机组定尾后投入出口张力辊对尾部进行压紧，并适当提高张力辊压力的措施，有效解决了先进高强钢平整后的尾部翘曲问题，提高了高强钢板形质量，为下游工序生产顺行提供了有力保障。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Process optimization of tail warping behavior of advanced high strength steel strip
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The tail of the DP780 and above grade advanced high strength steel strip was warped upward after passing through the hot rolling and levelling unit,which led to the threading failure in the production of pickling and continuous rolling.In view of this problem,the equipment state,process control and technique operation,etc.of  the levelling unit were analyzed.,The results show that there are significant differences in the improvement effect of different control processes on the tail warping behavior of the advanced high strength steel strip.After the tail is thrown off by the levelling unit,the tail is compressed by the tension roller at the outlet and the pressure value of the tension roller is appropriately raised,which effectively improves the tail warping problem,and the downstream production process is guaranteed.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

WANG Zhangling，FU Baosheng，XIA Yinfeng,HAN Le，ZHAO Xu，TIAN Guichang. Process optimization of tail warping behavior of advanced high strength steel strip. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(4): 78-80.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The process schemes of reducing the yield/tensile strength ratio of high strength steel strip content Nb and Ti by CSP line for cold rolling were studied.Combined with the characteristics of CSP production line,the properties,microstructure and precipitates of cold rolled high strength steel content Nb and Ti were analyzed which were produced by different coiling temperature and layer cooling mode.The results show that the yield/tensile strength ratio of cold rolled high strength steel strip content Nb and Ti can be degraded,and the product performance is stable by controlling the coiling temperature and laminar cooling mode in CSP production line.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 山钢股份莱芜分公司在石油套管用钢的开发生产中发现圆钢表面出现裂纹，有的裂纹甚至从表面延伸至芯部。为此，对裂纹样进行化学成分、金相组织、电镜扫描等检测分析。结果表明，是由于连铸圆坯冷却不均导致应力集中产生原始裂纹，裂纹在后续的轧制工艺中暴露并且延伸扩展所致。因此，对连铸圆坯的缓冷工艺进行了优化，杜绝了裂纹的产生。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 中厚板表面麻坑缺陷形成机理分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: ZHANG Yue-fei, WANG Suo-tao, LIU Yong-li, DONG Zhan-bin
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 秦皇岛首秦金属材料有限公司， 河北秦皇岛066326
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 本文描述了中厚板表面麻坑缺陷宏观形貌、特征，并采用金相显微镜、扫描电镜对中厚板表面麻坑缺陷的形态、组成进行微观分析。结果表明，麻坑缺陷的宏观形貌为连续的片状粗糙面，其下有形状不一、大小不同的凹坑；麻坑缺陷处成分存在Fe、O、Na、Mg、Si、S、K、Ca元素；缺陷处O含量明显增高，证明缺陷处成分主要为铁的氧化物。因此，麻坑缺陷为轧制过程中氧化铁皮、设备锈蚀物等异物掉落到钢板表面并被压入导致。经过优化轧制水冷工艺、除鳞工艺、及时彻底清理设备上堆积的氧化铁皮沉淀物及锈蚀物，可有效控制麻坑缺陷。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis of Pit Defect Formation Mechanism on Plate Surface
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The macro-morphology and characteristics of pit defect on surface of plate were described, and the micro-morphology and component were analyzed by optical microscope and scanning electronic microscopy. The results show that the pit defect macro-morphology is continuous flake rough surface and has various pots below it. By the EDS analysis, the pit defect mainly contains the elements like Fe, O, Na，Mg, Si，S，K，Ca and so on, and the content of O increases obviously, which shows the evidence that the major element of defect is oxides. Therefore, the main reason of pit defect formation is the oxidation, equipment corrosion and other foreign bodies fell and pressed in the plate surface. After optimization of rolling process, descaling technology, timely and thorough cleaning of accumulated deposit and corrosion of equipment, pit defect can be effectively controlled.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
张跃飞，王锁涛，刘永利，董占斌. 中厚板表面麻坑缺陷形成机理分析[J]. , 2014, 31(3): 18-19.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: Q345R钢板分层缺陷原因分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: ZHAO Qiang，XU Ya- nan，CAO Jia- li，MA Xiao- xiao，CHAI Jian- feng，CHENG Ya- nan
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 国网新源控股有限公司技术中心，北京100161
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 对Q345R钢板分层缺陷原因进行了研究。结果表明：分层缺陷钢板的夹杂物超标，且在钢板厚度方向存在明显的偏析线。分层处有明显的点列状孔洞分布，这是引起裂纹扩展的主要原因。钢板的基体组织为珠光体+铁素体，分层处组织为马氏体+少量贝氏体+少量铁素体。裂纹起源处的夹杂物为MnS和Al2O3且以MnS为主，沿着带状组织和夹层分布。分层处的断口形貌为解理断裂，呈片层状或羽毛状，断口有明显的分层现象。分层处的贝氏体、马氏体组织使材料脆性增加，在与MnS夹杂物的共同作用下，形成应力集中而产生裂纹。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Cause analysis of lamination defect of Q345R plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The causes of forming lamination defect of Q345R plate were analyzed.The results showed that the over standard inclusions were obvioused in plate,and the segregation lines in plate thickness direction were found.The points and column shape holes distribution in lamination position were obvioused too,which was the main cause of crack propagation.The basic microstructure type of the plate was ferrite+pearlite,with martensite and a small amount of bainite were found in the lamination position.The cracks originated from MnS and Al2O3 inclusions,priority to with MnS,which distributed along the banded structure lamination defect.Cleavage fracture shaped lamellar or plume with obvious stratification was found in the lamination position.With the interaction effect of the increase of bainite and martensite and MnS inclusions,the stress concentration was caused and resulted in crack generation.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
赵强，徐亚楠，曹佳丽，马萧萧，柴建峰，程亚男. Q345R钢板分层缺陷原因分析[J]. , 2017, 34(5): 28-31.
ZHAO Qiang，XU Ya- nan，CAO Jia- li，MA Xiao- xiao，CHAI Jian- feng，CHENG Ya- nan. Cause analysis of lamination defect of Q345R plate. , 2017, 34(5): 28-31.
