http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 立轧狗骨形状模型的研究现状与展望
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIU Yuan- ming, ZHANG Dian- hua, ZHAO De- wen
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 实际生产中多采用平立交替的轧制方法来控制热轧产品宽度。在立轧过程中，由于轧件的宽厚比大，变形主要集中在板坯边部，形成狗骨形状。本文介绍了狗骨形状产生的原因，以及国内外学者对狗骨形状模型的实验和理论研究现状；概括了压下率、立辊直径和板坯厚度对狗骨形状的影响规律，并对立轧狗骨形状的进一步研究进行了展望。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Current research and prospect of dog- bone shape model in edge rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The vertical- horizontal rolling method was usually used to control the hot rolled products width in actual production. In vertical rolling,the deformation of slab was mainly restricted in a small zone on the edge because of the high ratio of width to thickness, and then the dog- bone shape was formed. The reason of dog- bone shape formation and the current research of dog- bone model in experiment and theory by the scholars at home and abroad were introduced in this paper. Effect rules of reduction, roll diameter and slab thickness on dog- bone shape were summarized. Prospect of dog- bone further research was also analyzed.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘元铭，张殿华，赵德文. 立轧狗骨形状模型的研究现状与展望[J]. , 2015, 32(6): 61-63.
LIU Yuan- ming, ZHANG Dian- hua, ZHAO De- wen. Current research and prospect of dog- bone shape model in edge rolling. , 2015, 32(6): 61-63.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 新型钢卷运输车
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶南方工程技术有限公司，湖北武汉430223
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 工业钢卷运输中，有常见的连续轨道运输车，也有非连续轨道运输车，轨道断开时，运输车的方案较为复杂。通过对非连续轨道运输车技术方案的调查研究，归纳了其技术特点和利弊，分析了非连续轨道运输车的运动特点，开发了一种新型运输车，有效解决了四轮运输车无法在非连续轨道上行驶的问题，并且克服了现有技术方案的弊端。在结构分析和方案设计中,采用模块设计的方法，把功能和结构进行模块化细分，实现了方案的多样化，可以满足不同工况的生产需求。
keywords_cn: 运输车 钢卷运输 非连续轨道 连续轨道 模块设计
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: New type transportation car for coil
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：As for the coil conveying in the industrial production,a transportation car travelling along the connected tracks was very common,while that along the disconnected tracks needs more complex design of the car proper.Based on the study and research on the transportation car travelling along the disconnected tracks,a new type transportation car was developed.By the newly- developed transportation car,the four- wheeled car could be driven on the disconnected tracks,and the technical bottle- neck and the difficulties during the production were resolved.For structure analysis and proposal design,the method of module design was adopted to subdivide its functions and structures,the proposal diversification was achieved,and the demands during different working conditions could be met.
keywords_en: transportation car, coil conveying, disconnected tracks, connected tracks, module design
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
王子标. 新型钢卷运输车[J]. , 2017, 34(5): 57-60.
WANG Zi- biao. New type transportation car for coil. , 2017, 34(5): 57-60.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 二十辊森吉米尔轧机辊系稳定性的有限元分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: YUAN Kai1,ZHAO Zhi- yi1,LI Xian- long1,LIU Jin1,WU Chao- rong2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.北京科技大学材料科学与工程学院，北京100083
2.广东宝嘉不锈钢实业有限公司，广东揭阳515500
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 应用ABAQUS有限元软件建立了二十辊轧机有限元分析模型，研究了不同辊径配置及不同轧制力工况对二十辊森吉米尔轧机辊系稳定性的影响。结果表明：第1中间辊辊径差不小于2 mm时，第1中间辊和第2中间辊被挤出；第2中间辊辊径差不小于4 mm时，辊系失稳散落；第2中间随动辊比驱动辊小，会使第1中间辊辊间距变小，并使第2中间驱动辊与B、C支撑辊接触点的应力变小。随着轧制力的增大，第1中间辊的辊间距增大，第2中间驱动辊与B、C支撑辊接触点处的应力也增大。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Finite element analysis of the stability of roll system on 20- high Sendzimir mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：By using the finite element ABAQUS software,finite element analysis model of Sendzimir mill was established.The effects of different roll diameter configuration and different rolling force conditions on the roll system stability of Sendzimir mill were studied.The results show that the first intermediate roll and the second intermediate roll are extruded when the difference of roll diameter between the two first intermediate rolls is greater than or equal to 2 mm.The roll system is unstable when the difference of roll diameter between the two second intermediate rolls is greater than or equal to 4 mm.The roll spacing of the first intermediate rolls will be smaller,and the stress of contact point between the second intermediate drive roll and B,C support roll will become smaller when the diameter of the second intermediate follower roll is smaller than the drive roll.With the increase of the rolling force,the roll spacing of the first intermediate rolls would be increased and the stress of contact point between the second intermediate drive roll and B,C support roll would be also increased.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
袁凯 赵志毅 李显龙 刘谨 吴潮荣. 二十辊森吉米尔轧机辊系稳定性的有限元分析[J]. , 2018, 35(3): 52-56.
YUAN Kai,ZHAO Zhi- yi,LI Xian- long,LIU Jin,WU Chao- rong. Finite element analysis of the stability of roll system on 20- high Sendzimir mill. , 2018, 35(3): 52-56.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 低碳冷轧薄板罩式退火工艺优化及性能分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 天津轧一冷轧薄板有限公司技术中心，天津300270
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 冷轧带钢不同阶段退火温度的变化会直接影响带钢的回复再结晶行为，对其显微组织产生不同的影响，致使其具有不同的力学性能。为此，在全氢罩式退火炉中对DD11热轧原料经过冷轧后的带钢采用不同退火工艺处理，分析了退火工艺对冷轧带钢性能的影响。结果表明：提高再结晶退火温度和延长退火时间，材料显微组织基本由等轴晶粒组成，晶界析出条状三次渗碳体。降低回复阶段升温速度，材料能释放出更多的畸变能，可降低再结晶温度。通过优化退火工艺，普通DD11热轧原料的冷轧带钢可达到DC03性能要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Process optimization and performance analysis of batch annealing for low carbon cold rolled sheet
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The change of annealing temperature in different stages will directly affect the recrystallization behavior of strip,and have different effects on microstructure,which makes it have different mechanical properties.Therefore,the influence of annealing process on the low carbon cold rolled sheet properties was analyzed in a full- hydrogen batch annealing furnace.The results showed that improving the recrystallization annealing temperature and prolonging the annealing time could obtain the microstructure of isometric crystal and tertiary cementite,reducing the rate of temperature increase could release more distortion and the recrystallization temperature.Through optimizing the annealing process,the hot rolled DD11 raw materials could be cold rolled to achieve the DC03 steel performance.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
崔贯英，王莹，王刚. 低碳冷轧薄板罩式退火工艺优化及性能分析[J]. , 2018, 35(3): 90-93.
CUI Guan- ying,WANG Ying,WANG Gang. Process optimization and performance analysis of batch annealing for low carbon cold rolled sheet. , 2018, 35(3): 90-93.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 步进梁式运输机为热轧带钢生产线成品收集区的重要组成设备，其工作效率和稳定性直接影响着整条生产线的生产节奏和产量。依托日照钢铁有限公司ESP无头轧制带钢生产线工程，阐述了该生产线所使用的步进梁式运输机的设计校核、加工制造、装配检验、安装调试及使用维护等情况。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: ZHANG Tian,ZHANG Qingchao,TIAN Yong,WANG Zhaodong,WANG Guodong
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Reverse performance optimization system for medium and heavy plate properties based on deep neural network and its application
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Product performance is an important indicator of hot rolled steel production.The adjustment of production process parameters and the development of new products require long debugging cycles,which are likely to cause problems such as unstable product performance and high R&D costs.In order to solve the above problems,further optimize the process and shorten the development cycle,based on the deep neural network and the rule expectation model,a reverse optimization model of the plate structure performance was established,the neural network framework was optimized,and the algorithm was selected.Based on the online production data of a steel plate production line in a factory,the deep neural network model was tested, and the final product properties were predicted.The predicted values were good agreement with the measured values.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了国内外热轧双相钢的发展现状；对热轧双相钢的成分体系和关键生产工艺进行了总结，指出了目前热轧双相钢在生产过程中存在的问题；提出了未来热轧双相钢的主要发展方向为低成本、高强度、低负荷、高表面质量和“以热代冷”。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The development situations of hot rolled dual-phase steel at home and abroad were introduced.The chemical composition system and key production process of hot rolled dualphase steel were summarized,and the existing problems in the production process of hot rolled dual-phase steel were pointed out.It is proposed that the main development directions of hot rolled dual-phase steel in the future are low cost,high strength,low load,excellent surface quality and “hotrolled products replacing coldrolled products”.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the production process of tin board and the structure characteristics of the device, the influence factors on the setting of the tension were analyzed, and the principle of tension setting in two- stand temper mill through the production practice was summarized. The tension system of the typical products were listed, and the optimization program and solutions of improving the stability of tension were given at last.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 低碳低硅合金钢盘条氧化铁皮微观结构的电子显微学研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: CHEN Bo-yu1，WEI Yong1，YAN Hai-feng1，CHEN Yin-li2，GAO Ya-kun2，XU Li-ming2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1．福建三钢闽光股份有限公司，福建三明365000
2．北京科技大学冶金工程研究院，北京100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用EDS和XRD等技术研究了吐丝温度为950 、980 ℃时低碳低硅钢盘条氧化铁皮的显微结构特征及组成相。采用EBSD技术研究了低碳低硅合金钢盘条氧化铁皮的微观结构。实验结果表明：盘条的氧化铁皮结构主要有3层，最内层为FeO，中间层为Fe3O4，而最外层为Fe2O3，且FeO层最厚。吐丝温度对氧化皮厚度有显著影响，吐丝温度较高的情况下氧化皮较厚且结构疏松，有利于机械剥离。盘条氧化铁皮FeO层晶粒尺寸小于Fe基体的晶粒尺寸。盘条氧化铁皮中的FeO相比例最高，相比例与氧化铁皮各层的厚度关系一致，其中吐丝温度较低的实验钢中FeO比例较小，Fe3O4和Fe2O3比例较高。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Electron microscopy study of the microstructure of oxide scale in wire rods of low carbon and low silicon steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：EDS and XRD techniques were used to study the microstructure characteristic and phase composition of oxide scale in wire rods of low carbon and low silicon steel under spinning temperature at 950 ℃ and 980 ℃.EBSD technique was used to study the microstructure of oxide scale of samples.The experimental results show that oxide scale are composed of layers of FeO,Fe3O4 and Fe2O3.In oxide scale,FeO is the innermost and thickest layer,Fe3O4 is the middle layer and Fe2O3 is the outermost layer.Spinning temperatures have an influence on the thickness of oxide scale.The oxide scale is thicker and its structure is more fragile under high spinning temperature,which makes it easier for mechanical exfoliation.Grain size of FeO layer is smaller than that in Fe matrix.The highest proportion of FeO phase in wire rod samples indicates that phase contents is in respond with the thickness of different oxide scale layers.FeO layer is thinner and Fe3O4,Fe2O3 layers are thicker under lower spinning temperature.
keywords_en: low carbon and low silicon steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陈伯瑜，魏勇，严海风，陈银莉，高亚坤，许黎明. 低碳低硅合金钢盘条氧化铁皮微观结构的电子显微学研究[J]. , 2017, 34(2): 22-25.
CHEN Bo-yu，WEI Yong，YAN Hai-feng，CHEN Yin-li，GAO Ya-kun，XU Li-ming. Electron microscopy study of the microstructure of oxide scale in wire rods of low carbon and low silicon steel. , 2017, 34(2): 22-25.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 湖南华菱湘潭钢铁有限公司，湖南湘潭411101
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对12Cr2Mo1R钢冷坯装炉加热时易轧裂的问题，试验研究了12Cr2Mo1R板坯下线后直接热送热装轧制、板坯下线后采用保温罩保温缓冷再温送装炉、板坯下线后堆垛自然缓冷再温送装炉3种工艺，发现前两种工艺轧制后钢板表面容易产生纵裂、网裂和马蜂窝等裂纹，第3种工艺可以有效避免钢板开裂，保证钢板良好的表面质量。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Test study of hot delivery and hot charging process for 12Cr2Mo1R steel slab
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aimed at the problem of slab cracking during the 12Cr2Mo1R steel hot delivery and hot charging process,three different hot delivery and hot charging ways were test studied,i.e.,slab directly hot charging,slab warmed with insulation cover,and slab air slow cooling.The results showed that the third way of slab air slow cooling could avoid cracking effectively and guarantee plate good surface quality.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The convection heat transfer coefficient and equivalent radial thermal conductivity are two important parameters of the heat transfer process in bell-type annealing furnace.The finite element model was estabished and the temperature field was calculated.The model treated the boundary condition based on actual annealing process curve,so it had a certain accuracy.According to the simulation results,spheroidizing annealing process of 8CrV high carbon saw steel had been made.Through this process,good spheroidized annealing structure was obtained,and mechanical properties,such as yield strength,tensile strength and hardness had been improved significantly.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：There will be a large thickness difference of high strength steel strip with high performance fluctuation,and thickness exceed sesriously at head and tail of strip in cold tandem rolling, which will seriously affect the yield of cold rolled products.On the basis of studying the characteristics and functions of the AGC thickness control system of high strength steel,a scheme of feed-forward thickness control for high strength steel was put forward.The new AGC feed-forward thickness control system for high strength steel was developed and tested,the performance of new feed-forward software was stably run in the field,the head and tail thickness difference over 2% of high strength steel strip was reduced in length, and the good results were obtained.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 开冷温度对热轧F/B双相钢组织性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: SHEN Xin- jun1, TANG Shuai1, PEI Xin- hua1,2, WANG Guo- dong1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
2.上海梅山钢铁公司技术中心，江苏南京210039
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用轧后空冷+超快速冷却的方式，研究了开冷温度对热轧铁素体/贝氏体(F/B)双相钢组织性能的影响。结果表明：开冷温度显著影响F/B双相钢的显微组织和性能。开冷温度由747 ℃降至700 ℃时，铁素体体积分数由17.3%增至85.7%，铁素体晶粒尺寸由3.3 μm粗化至3.6 μm，贝氏体中析出的碳化物含量增加。同时，F/B双相钢的屈服强度从594 MPa降至475 MPa，抗拉强度从648 MPa降至532 MPa，伸长率从17.7%升至34.3%，扩孔率从36.4%提高至82.8%。因此，为实现热轧F/B双相钢力学性能和扩孔性能的平衡，开冷温度应控制在730~700 ℃。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effects of start cooling temperature on microstructure and mechanical properties of hot- rolled ferrite/bainite dual- phase steels
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The process of air- cooling followed by ultra fast cooling after hot- rolled was used to investigate the effects of start cooling temperature (SCT) on the microstructure and mechanical properties of a hot- rolled ferrite/bainite (F/B) dual- phase steel. The results showed that the microstructure and properties of the F/B dual phase steels were influenced by SCT obviously. The volume fraction of ferrite phase was increased from 17.3% to 85.7% , the grain size of ferrite size was increased from 3.3 μm to 3.6 μm and the precipitated carbide in bainite was also increased with the SCT decrease from 747 ℃ to 700 ℃. At the same time, lowering SCT from 747 ℃ to 700 ℃ , the yield strength of this steel was reduced down to 475 MPa from 594 MPa, the tensile strength down to 532 MPa from 648 MPa , the elongation up to 34.3% from 17.7% and the hole expansion ratio up to 82.8% from 36.4%, respectively. So, the start cooling temperature should be in 730-700 ℃ to balance the strength and the deformation properties of the hot- rolled F/B dual phase steels.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
沈鑫珺，唐帅，裴新华 ，王国栋. 开冷温度对热轧F/B双相钢组织性能的影响[J]. , 2015, 32(6): 5-7.
SHEN Xin- jun, TANG Shuai, PEI Xin- hua,, WANG Guo- dong. Effects of start cooling temperature on microstructure and mechanical properties of hot- rolled ferrite/bainite dual- phase steels. , 2015, 32(6): 5-7.

So the roughing rolling rhythm was speeded up to meet the whole line rhythm need by the measures of adjusting rolling pass schedule, reducing rolling waiting time, and optimizing operational sequence control.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 冷轧带钢屈曲失稳限的计算方法研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: CHEN Bing, HE Ming- cheng, YANG Yang
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京科技大学机械工程学院, 北京100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 带钢屈曲失稳限的计算是建立冷轧板形控制目标的理论基础，本文通过能量法计算了各种典型浪形缺陷的屈曲临界载荷；利用ABAQUS有限元分析软件建立了带钢屈曲失稳仿真模型，计算了各种典型浪形下的屈曲临界载荷，将有限元仿真结果与解析结果进行了对比，验证了有限元模型的准确性；同时，通过设定不同的工况，得到了带钢屈曲临界条件与带钢宽厚比、张应力之间的关系。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on calculation methods of shape buckling load for cold rolled strips
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Calculation of the critical buckling load for cold rolled strips is the theoretical basis of building flatness control target. Critical buckling loads for several typical of flatness were achieved by using the energy principle in this paper. Then, the behavior of the cold rolled strip buckling was studied using the ABAQUS finite element method. Based on buckling analysis module, the two- dimensional finite element model was developed to calculate the critical buckling load of several typical flatness defeats, and the accuracy of the finite element was verified by comparing with the analytical results. By setting different simulation conditions, the effect of ratios of strip width to gauge and tensile stress on the critical buckling load was studied. The above studies have practical value to build flatness control target for cold rolled strips.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陈兵，何名成，杨洋. 冷轧带钢屈曲失稳限的计算方法研究[J]. , 2016, 33(1): 27-32.
CHEN Bing, HE Ming- cheng, YANG Yang. Research on calculation methods of shape buckling load for cold rolled strips. , 2016, 33(1): 27-32.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：A kind of linear defect formed on the surface of the electrolytic tinplate and its formation process were studied.The research results show that the linear defect has close relationship with the scale pit produced in the hot rolling process.By decreasing the FET of the strip，increasing the amount of cooling water for work roll and opening the cooling water between finish rolling stands，the scale pit formed on the surface of the hot-rolled strip can be controlled preferably,thus the incidence rate of the linear defect can be significantly reduced.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 中间夹层在金属复合板制造过程中的应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: ZHANG Xin-jin, LI Long, LIU Hui-yun, YIN Fu-xing
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中国一重能源装备材料科学研究所，天津300457
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 本文对中间夹层在金属复合板制造过程中的应用进行了回顾，总结了金属复合板结合界面处中间夹层材料的种类，分析了中间夹层材料类型及厚度等对金属复合板界面结合的影响。以不锈钢复合板为例，介绍了其中间夹层不但可以阻止元素扩散避免形成界面脆性相，降低晶间腐蚀，还可以阻止应力腐蚀裂纹的扩展；另外，中间层的合理选用可以提高结合强度并在一定程度上降低对设备大变形量的要求。针对不同的金属复合板材料，选用合适的中间夹层材料及厚度可有效地提高复合界面的结合质量。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Application of Insert Layer in Manufacturing Clad Metal Plates
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In this paper, applications of intermediate insert material in manufacturing clad plate steels were briefly reviewed. The materials of insert layer were summarized, and the effects of material and layer thickness on the bonding strength were analyzed. Taking the stainless clad plate for example, the intermediate insert layer not only could prevent element diffusion and then avoid the formation of brittle phase and reduce intergranular corrosion, but also stop stress corrosion crack expansion. In addition, the proper insert layer could improve the bonding strength and reduce equipment requirements for the large deformation of clad metal plate to some extent. The appropriate intermediate insert material could effectively improve bonding strength of the clad metal plates.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
张心金，李龙，刘会云，殷福星. 中间夹层在金属复合板制造过程中的应用[J]. , 2013, 30(6): 45-49.
ZHANG Xin-jin, LI Long, LIU Hui-yun, YIN Fu-xing. Application of Insert Layer in Manufacturing Clad Metal Plates. , 2013, 30(6): 45-49.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 圆盘剪主轴刚度分析及结构优化
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.沙洲职业工学院机电工程系，江苏 苏州 215600
2.马鞍山钢铁股份有限公司物资公司，安徽 马鞍山 243000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 中厚板圆盘剪剪切能力的不足严重制约了钢铁企业的中厚板精整的能力和质量。通过对剪切主轴进行受力分析，发现主轴和剪刃的刚度不足是制约剪切能力提高的主要因素。为此，建立了主轴系变形的简支梁计算模型，提出了把主轴剪切端的双列调心滚子轴承改为双列圆锥滚子轴承、减少剪刃的悬伸量，并在不改变主轴箱体尺寸的前提下适当增加轴径的解决方案。采用有限元计算模型对该方法进行了验证，实例分析显示，在剪切Q235厚30mm钢板时，优化后的主轴系剪刃间隙和重合度变化量只有优化前的约1/5和1/2，轴承的承载能力也完全满足需要。此方法在某钢厂中厚板圆盘剪改进中得到应用并取得很好效果，为同类圆盘剪的改进提供了理论基础和新的思路。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Rigidity analysis and structure optimization of disc shear main shaft
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The capacity and product quality of the iron and steel enterprises are usually severely restricted by inadequate capacity of disc shear in plate finishing line. The main reason was found, which was the insufficient rigidity of disc shear main shaft. So, in the premise of not changing the size of the main shaft box, all of bearing types on the main shaft were altered from double-row self-aligning roller bearing to double row tapered roller bearings, the shaft diameter was increased appropriately and the overhang of cutting edge was decreased. By means of finite element analysis method, the beam deformation of main shaft was analyzed in an example of shearing 30mm thickness Q235 steel plate, it showed that the variation of the blade clearance and coincidence degree after structure optimization was about 1/5 and 1/2 of that one before the optimization. The carrying capacity of the bearing was also sufficient. This method was applied in a disc shear for steel plate, and good results were achieved. It provides a theoretical basis and new ideas for similar disc shear transformation.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
鲁怀敏， 李小兵. 圆盘剪主轴刚度分析及结构优化[J]. , 2014, 31(5): 25-28.
LU Huai-min, LI Xiao-bing. Rigidity analysis and structure optimization of disc shear main shaft. , 2014, 31(5): 25-28.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research of automatic combustion control system of regenerative heating furnace in hot strip plant
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aimed at the poor effect of automatic combustion control system of a regenerative heating furnace using the fuel of blast- coke mixed gas in a hot strip plant,the L1 and L2 automatic control system were optimized.By realizing this full automatic combustion control,the gas consumption was reduced 9.1%,the loss rate of iron scale was decreased 0.11%.
keywords_en: Key words: air-fuel ratio, automatic combustion control system of L2,L1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘树，谭欧，徐朝辉. 热连轧蓄热式加热炉全自动燃烧控制系统研究[J]. , 2018, 35(2): 65-67.
LIU Shu,TAN Ou,XU Zhao- hui. Research of automatic combustion control system of regenerative heating furnace in hot strip plant. , 2018, 35(2): 65-67.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 化学品船用S32205中厚板表面加工工艺
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Guo- fua,WANG Qing- liangb,JIANG Lu- baoa
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
宝钢特钢有限公司，a.板带厂
b.制造管理部，上海200940
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对化学品船用S32205双相不锈钢中厚板存在表面斜磨痕缺陷、表面粗糙度超上限等问题，通过试验研究，得出了轧制过程中S32205系列钢板表面粗糙度变化数学模型。据此开发并应用了连铸坯修磨后表面粗糙度控制技术、轧制过程单机架轧机工作辊表面粗糙度控制技术、一次抛丸控制技术等，解决了原有问题，并使钢板合格率达到98%以上。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: New surface processing technology for S32205 shipbuilding plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aimed at the problems of inclined grinding marks and out- of- limit roughness of the S32205 shipbuilding plate surface,the whole process was experimentally analyzed,and a mathematic model about the roughness evolution in whole rolling process was obtained.The surface roughness control technique of continuous casting bloom and the working roll,and the shot blasting control technique were studied and applied,so the problem was resolved,and the once qualified rate reached over 98%.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
王国富，王庆亮，江录豹. 化学品船用S32205中厚板表面加工工艺[J]. , 2018, 35(3): 86-89.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 冷却速率对2507超级双相不锈钢σ相析出的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 攀钢集团研究院有限公司特钢所，四川成都610300
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 利用Gleeble 3500热模拟试验机对2507超级双相不锈钢进行了连续冷却试验，采用金相显微镜和扫描电镜电子背散射模式分析了冷却速率对超级双相不锈钢σ相析出的影响。研究结果表明，在连续冷却过程中，冷却速率显著影响2507双相不锈钢σ相的析出含量，冷却速率越小，σ相的析出量越多；冷却速率超过2.0 ℃/s能阻止2507超级双相不锈钢析出σ相。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of different continuous cooling rates on precipitated σ phase of super dual- phase stainless steel SAF 2507
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Continuous cooling test of super dual- phase stainless steel SAF 2507 was studied by using Gleeble 3500 thermal simulation tester,and the influence of different cooling rates on precipitated σ phase was analyzed by combining with metallographic microscope and scanning electron microscopy (SEM) in backscattered electron mode (BSE).The result showed that the precipitated σ phase of super dual- phase stainless steel SAF 2507 was related to the continuous cooling rates,the less the cooling rate lead to the more content of precipitated σ phase,and the cooling rate over 2.0 ℃/s should be ensured effectively to avoid the σ phase.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
张志宏. 冷却速率对2507超级双相不锈钢σ相析出的影响[J]. , 2018, 35(5): 34-38.
ZHANG Zhi- hong. Effect of different continuous cooling rates on precipitated σ phase of super dual- phase stainless steel SAF 2507. , 2018, 35(5): 34-38.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热轧酸洗板表面斑状色差产生机理及控制措施
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: YU Yang1, WANG Chang1, GUO Zi-feng1, WANG Lin1, CHEN Jin2, JIAO Hui-li2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1. 首钢技术研究院薄板研究所, 北京 100043
2. 首钢迁安钢铁有限责任公司, 河北 迁安 064404
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对热轧酸洗板表面的斑状色差缺陷, 从微观特征与生产关联性因素方面进行了研究。结果表明:斑状色差缺陷的产生与基体和氧化铁皮的界面状态密切相关, 酸洗后表面粗糙度的差异是导致色差缺陷产生的直接原因。生产关联性因素跟踪及分析发现: 色差缺陷的产生主要与热轧精轧工作辊辊面的状态密切相关, 轧辊氧化膜剥落导致的铁皮压入缺陷是导致带钢酸洗后出现斑状色差缺陷的主要原因。为此, 制定了合理的热轧工艺及轧辊使用和精轧用水、轧制润滑的优化等控制措施, 成功消除了热轧酸洗板表面的斑状色差缺陷。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study on mechanism and control measures of porphyritic color difference defect on the surface of hot rolled pickled strip
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Both the microscopic characteristic and influencing factors of industrial production on the porphyritic color difference defect on the surface of hot rolled pickled strip were investigated. The results showed that the interface morphology between scale and steel substrate was related to the defect, and the difference of surface roughness between the color difference and normal area induced the color difference. The rolling processing was also discussed, and the results showed that the breaking-off of the oxidation film of roll was the key reason which induced scale defects in to steel substrate and color difference after pickling. Based on the mechanism study, the control measures to the defect were proposed, including optimization about hot rolling processing, roll application scheme, finishing rolling water application and rolling lubricating. Based on these measures, the defect of porphyritic color difference was eliminated successfully.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
于 洋 王 畅 郭子峰 王 林 陈 瑾 焦会立. 热轧酸洗板表面斑状色差产生机理及控制措施[J]. , 2015, 32(2): 22-26.
YU Yang, WANG Chang, GUO Zi-feng, WANG Lin, CHEN Jin, JIAO Hui-li. Study on mechanism and control measures of porphyritic color difference defect on the surface of hot rolled pickled strip. , 2015, 32(2): 22-26.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热连轧铝温度场数值模拟及工艺参数影响分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京科技大学高效轧制国家工程研究中心，北京100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用二维交替差分法建立了铝热连轧轧件温度计算模型，同时采用粒子群算法对模型参数进行了优化。经验证，优化后模型的计算精度在10 ℃以内；利用建立的温度模型研究了铝板带在热轧生产过程中的温度场变化规律，并分析了工艺参数对轧件终轧温度场的影响。研究结果表明，粗轧区轧件温度分布主要由接触导热与轧件内部的热生成两者共同决定，而精轧区还要受到乳液喷淋的影响；轧制速度越大，轧件终轧温度越高，横向温差越大；处于相同机架间的冷却集管的冷却能力几乎相同，而处于不同机架间的冷却集管，随着机架数的增加，冷却能力增强，横向温差随着开启度的增大而减小；轧件宽度对轧件终轧温度的影响很小，而横向温差随轧件宽度的增大而增大；随着乳化液温度的升高，轧件终轧温度升高，而乳化液温度对轧件横向温差没有影响。
keywords_cn: 热连轧铝，有限差分，温度场
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Numerical simulation of temperature field model and analysis of process parameters influence in hot rolling aluminum
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The two- dimensional alternating direction implicit finite difference method was adopted to establish the temperature field model of aluminum strip during hot rolling，and the model was optimized by measured data through the use of particle swarm optimization algorithm.According to verification，the calculation precision of temperature model was within 10 ℃.The temperature variations during strip hot rolling was analyzed with the temperature field model，as well as influence of process parameters on finishing temperature variations.The simulation results show that the temperature distribution during roughing rolling is mainly determined by both the thermal contact conductance and the heat generated inside the rolled piece，while emulsion spray cooling will play a role during finish rolling.The rolling speed is large，the finishing temperature and the transverse temperature difference are large.The cooling manifold between the same stand have the same cooling capacity，while the cooling capacity of the cooling manifold between different stands increases with the increase of the stand number.The transverse temperature difference decreases with the increase of opening degree.The strip width has little effect on the finishing temperature，but the transverse temperature difference increases with the increase of the strip width.The temperature of the emulsion is higher，the finishing temperature is higher，and the temperature of the emulsion has no effect on the transverse temperature difference.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
韩庆. 热连轧铝温度场数值模拟及工艺参数影响分析[J]. , 2018, 35(6): 13-18.
HAN Qing. Numerical simulation of temperature field model and analysis of process parameters influence in hot rolling aluminum. , 2018, 35(6): 13-18.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 铁素体区轧制工艺在半连续轧机上的应用研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: ZHOU Xun1，WANG Xiaodong1，WANG Jian gong1，XIA Yinfeng1，ZHAO Hu2，AI Jiaojian1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司热轧部，河北唐山063200；2.首钢集团有限公司技术研究院，北京100043
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 对比了铁素体区轧制工艺和常规轧制工艺产品力学性能、微观组织和表面质量。分析了生产中粗轧温度、终轧温度、卷取温度、退火温度及轧制润滑控制等对产品组织性能的影响。提出了铁素体区轧制工艺的控制要点，退火后产品可获得更有利的{111}织构，进而获得更优异的屈强比和塑性应变比。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on key technologies of ferrite zone rolling process in semi-continuous rolling mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The differences of the mechanical properties,microstructure and surface quality of products rolled by ferrite zone rolling technology and normal austenite rolling technology were discussed.The effect of the temperatures of roughing rolling,finishing rolling,coiling and annealing temperature on the mechanical properties and microstructure of products were analyzed as well as the rolling lubrication technology. The  control key points of ferrite zone rolling technology were put forward,and more favorable {111} crystal texture could be formed.Thus,the better yield ratio and plastic strain ratio could be obtained.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
周旬，王晓东，王建功，夏银锋，赵虎，艾矫健. 铁素体区轧制工艺在半连续轧机上的应用研究[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(1): 25-30.
ZHOU Xun1，WANG Xiaodong，WANG Jiangong，XIA Yinfeng，ZHAO Hu，AI Jiaojian. Research on key technologies of ferrite zone rolling process in semi-continuous rolling mill. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(1): 25-30.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 退火温度对镀锌780 MPa级双相钢组织性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIU Jing- bao,ZHANG Hong- bo,DU Ming- shan,SONG Hai- wu,WEI Huan- jun,YANG Yu- hou
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 河钢集团唐钢公司技术中心，河北唐山063001
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 研究了不同退火温度对780 MPa级冷轧双相钢组织性能的影响。试验表明：试验钢热轧态组织为铁素体、贝氏体和少量的珠光体，经过冷轧后形成纤维状组织，退火后组织为铁素体和岛状马氏体。对不同退火温度和速度下带钢组织性能进行了分析，带钢在820 ℃退火、保温100 s后，可以获得双相组织且抗拉强度大于780 MPa。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Influence of different annealing temperature on microstructure and properties of 780 MPa cold rolled hot- dip galvanized dual- phase steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Influence of different annealing temperatures on the microstructure and properties of 780 MPa cold rolled hot- dip galvanized dual- phase steel were investigated.The results show that the microstructure of hot rolled strip is F+M+B,the cold rolled strip is fibrous tissue and the annealed strip is F+M.The microstructure and properties of the steel at different annealing temperatures and strip velocities were analyzed,and the dual phase was obtained and the tensile strength of hot- dip galvanized steel reached 780 MPa at the 820 ℃ and 100 s annealing.
keywords_en: hot dip galvanized dual phase steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘靖宝，张洪波，杜明山，宋海武，魏焕君，杨玉厚. 退火温度对镀锌780 MPa级双相钢组织性能的影响[J]. , 2018, 35(3): 41-44.
LIU Jing- bao,ZHANG Hong- bo,DU Ming- shan,SONG Hai- wu,WEI Huan- jun,YANG Yu- hou. Influence of different annealing temperature on microstructure and properties of 780 MPa cold rolled hot- dip galvanized dual- phase steel. , 2018, 35(3): 41-44.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 关于前馈AGC控制的研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1河北工业大学，天津300130；2天津市合远电气有限公司，天津300399
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 在轧钢过程中，由于水印造成的钢坯硬度波动、温度波动都会在轧制过程中产生厚度波动，采用前馈AGC可以解决轧钢过程中这类参数波动引起的带钢厚度变化。分析了前滑系数计算方法和AGC调节量采样、保存及投入方式等，提高了滞后时间控制的精确性，使整卷带钢绝对厚差控制在10 μm以内。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on feedforward AGC controlLIU Qian1，2，LIANG Tao1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Because of the strip hardness and temperature difference caused by reheating furnace,the thickness of whole strip often have deviations in strip hot rolling process.The feedforward AGC can solve this problem.The forward slip coefficient calculation method,the AGC control sampling and running mode were studied and put into practice.Thus,the strip thickness accuracy was controlled within 10 μm.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘茜，梁涛. 关于前馈AGC控制的研究[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(2): 58-60.
LIU Qian，LIANG Tao. Research on feedforward AGC controlLIU Qian1，2，LIANG Tao1. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(2): 58-60.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 600 MPa级汽车桥壳钢生产实践
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Zhi- cong,GUO Xiao,FU Zhong- yuan
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 河北普阳钢铁有限公司，河北武安056305
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了河北普阳钢铁有限公司生产600 MPa级汽车桥壳钢板600QK的生产工艺及产品性能特点，研究了不同未再结晶区开轧温度和待温厚度对600QK钢板的组织和力学性能的影响。结果表明：铌、钛微合金元素的复合添加，有助于细化铁素体晶粒，提高钢材的强度和韧性。通过控制成品氮含量不大于50×10-6，未发现大尺寸TiN夹杂物。采用两阶段控轧工艺，随未再结晶区开轧温度的降低和待温厚度的增加，组织更加细化，钢板的抗拉强度及伸长率变化不大，但屈服强度及-20 ℃冲击功显著增加。产品各项性能良好且稳定，满足了用户的需求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Production practice of 600 MPa grade axle housings steel for automobile
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The features of process and properties of 600 MPa grade axle housings steel plate for automobile was presented and the effect of different rolling start temperature and workpiece thickness in non- recrystallization region on microstructure and properties was investigated.The results showed that the addition of Nb- Ti microalloving elements contributed to refine the ferrite grain,and improved strength and toughness of the steel.By controlling casting slab nitrogen content less than 50×10-6,not larger size TiN inclusions was found in steel.With decreasing rolling temperature,increasing workpiece thickness of non- recrystallization region in two stage controlled rolling process,the microstructures of plate was refined,and the yield strength and impact toughness of -20 ℃ significantly increased,but no obvious effect on tensile strength and elongation was found.The properties of products were fine and stable,and meet the requirements of customers.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
王智聪，郭潇，付中原. 600 MPa级汽车桥壳钢生产实践[J]. , 2017, 34(3): 74-77.
WANG Zhi- cong,GUO Xiao,FU Zhong- yuan. Production practice of 600 MPa grade axle housings steel for automobile. , 2017, 34(3): 74-77.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 特殊不锈钢热带退火酸洗工艺特点
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶华天工程技术有限公司轧钢事业部
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了双相钢、耐热钢、超级奥氏体钢、超级铁素体钢等特殊不锈钢退火酸洗工艺的特点，与普通不锈钢相比，其退火速度较低，退火温度较高，冷却段为全水冷方式，氧化铁皮预处理采用破鳞机与抛丸机相结合的方式，酸洗段预酸洗采用电解中性盐的方法，混酸酸洗段的氢氟酸浓度较高。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 武钢连续电镀锌机组电镀段技术特点
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶南方工程技术有限公司
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了武钢连续电镀锌机组工艺段设备布置，以及电镀段主要设备特点。该机组电镀段采用先进的重力槽，高效节能的两级闪蒸装置和完善的电镀循环系统，保证了机组产能及产品质量。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 提高HGC位置控制动态响应的措施
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 济南钢铁集团有限公司冷轧板厂
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 液压辊缝控制系统 (HGC) 是双机架冷轧机带钢厚度控制的关键环节，通过对双机架冷轧机液压压下系统位置控制方式的研究和改进，提高了HGC位置控制的动态响应，有效解决了带钢厚度波动的问题。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 退火炉内带钢拉伸失稳与屈曲失稳分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIU Shun-ming ， YIN Xian-dong，ZHENG Xiao-fei， TAN Jin-feng
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司，河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 本文分析了带钢在退火炉内瓢曲失稳与拉伸失稳的原因，其与炉区张力、炉辊辊型、带钢规格及材质有关。对于厚窄带钢容易发生拉伸失稳，而薄宽带钢容易发生瓢曲失稳。同时，推导了带钢失稳临界应力公式，并提出了相应措施，使带钢断带由5次/a降低至2次/a。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis of Tensile Instability and Buckling Instability of Strip in the Furnace of Continuous Annealing Line
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The reasons of buckling instability and tensile failure of strip in the annealing furnace were analyzed , which were affected by the tension of furnace area , furnace roll camber, strip specifications and materials. The results showed that the thick and narrow strip was prone to tensile instability, and thin and wide strip was prone to buckling instability. At the same time, the strip buckling critical stress formula was deduced, and corresponding measures were put forward. So, the strip breakage times were reduced from 5times /a to 3 times /a.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LI Xiao- lei1,2,LI Yun- jie1,KANG Jian1,YUAN Guo1,WANG Guo- dong1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
2.首钢迁安钢铁有限责任公司，河北迁安064404
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 以低碳硅锰钢为研究对象，采用直接淬火-配分工艺研究了马氏体区淬火-配分（Q&P）、贝氏体区淬火-配分（B&P）和直接淬火工艺对组织性能演变的影响。结果表明，经Q&P工艺处理后得到马氏体和残余奥氏体的组织，残余奥氏体体积分数大于100%，并且呈现薄膜状分布于马氏体板条间，试样屈服强度大于1 100 MPa，抗拉强度大于1 200 MPa，伸长率在1475%~1600%之间，强塑积可高达21.12 GPa·%。经B&P处理后的试样获得贝氏体基体和17.3%的残余奥氏体组织，试样伸长率高达2100%，强塑积为22.26 GPa·%。经直接淬火工艺处理后的试样，抗拉强度高达1 540 MPa，但残余奥氏体体积分数为3.6%，导致伸长率仅为800%，强塑积为12.32 GPa·%。此外，还发现少量软相铁素体组织，可以降低试验钢的屈服强度。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study on microstructural evolution and mechanical properties in hot rolling direct martensite/bainite quenching and partitioning steels
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of (martensite and bainite) quenching and partitioning and direct quenching processes on microstructure evolution and mechanical properties were studied in low carbon steel.The results indicated that the microstructure of Q&P steels was composed of martensite and more than 100% retained austenite that was located in martensitic laths with film- like shape.The specimens treated by Q&P had high yield strength greater than 1 100 MPa,high tensile strength greater than 1 200 MPa and good elongation about 14.75%- 1600%,which made PSE reach up to 21.12 GPa·%.The sample treated by B&P contained 173% retained austenite and the elongation was 2100%,the PSE of which attained 22.26 GPa·%.The direct quenched sample had high strength 1 540 MPa,but it contained little retained austenite 3.6% leading to bad elongation of 800% and the PSE was 12.32 GPa·%.Additionally,ferrite as a soft phase can decrease yield strength effectively.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李晓磊 ，李云杰，康健，袁国，王国栋. 热轧马氏体/贝氏体区直接淬火-配分钢组织性能研究[J]. , 2018, 35(3): 7-12.
LI Xiao- lei,,LI Yun- jie,KANG Jian,YUAN Guo,WANG Guo- dong. Study on microstructural evolution and mechanical properties in hot rolling direct martensite/bainite quenching and partitioning steels. , 2018, 35(3): 7-12.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 以控制打滑为目标的取向硅钢可逆轧制工艺优化
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.鞍钢集团钢铁研究院，辽宁鞍山114009；2.鞍钢股份冷轧硅钢厂，辽宁鞍山114009
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 在引入打滑因子的基础上，以控制打滑为目标，提出了基于非线性规划法的取向硅钢可逆轧制工艺优化方法。在综合考虑取向硅钢冷轧工艺参数设定原则的前提下，对可行域内目标函数进行寻优，确定最优轧制规程。优化结果表明，采用非线性规划法优化的轧制规程符合取向硅钢冷轧生产设备及工艺要求，能够较好地反映冷轧工艺参数对轧制过程中打滑现象的影响，为实际生产中打滑现象的防治提供了依据。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Rolling schedule optimization for preventing slippage in reverse cold rolling process of grain oriented silicon steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the conception of slip factor and nonlinear programming algorithm,a rolling schedule optimization method for preventing slippage in reverse cold rolling process of grain oriented silicon steel was put forward.Combined with the setting principles of rolling parameters,the optimized rolling schedule was confirmed by target function in the feasible zone.The results show that the optimized rolling schedule is suitable for the requirement of cold rolling equipment and technology for grain oriented silicon steel.The relationship between the rolling parameters and the slippage was obtained,so the rolling parameters adjustment aimed at preventing slippage can be accomplished according to the regularity.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
贾志伟，李元华，张海利，王项龙. 以控制打滑为目标的取向硅钢可逆轧制工艺优化[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(1): 42-44.
JIA Zhiwei,LI Yuanhua,ZHANG Haili,WANG Xianglong. Rolling schedule optimization for preventing slippage in reverse cold rolling process of grain oriented silicon steel. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(1): 42-44.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.攀钢集团研究院有限公司，四川攀枝花617000
2.攀钢集团西昌钢钒有限公司，四川西昌615032
3.攀钢集团成都板材有限公司，四川成都610303
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过现场跟踪调查、缺陷试样检测分析及缺陷卷工艺调查分析，探讨了冷轧无取向电工钢生产过程中出现的酸洗不良、冷轧窄尺及断带的原因。结果表明：酸洗不良的原因在于带钢局部热轧卷取温度过高，正常的酸洗工艺未能将氧化铁皮清洗干净；冷轧出现局部窄尺的主要原因在于酸洗预留切边量过小，当热轧来料宽度处于下限，且带钢板形不良或带钢对中不良时，酸洗圆盘剪切边量过大；断带是板形不良或对中不良所致的跑偏断带。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Discussion on production problems of cold rolled non- oriented electrical steel sheet
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The reasons of the poor pickling,narrowed width and strip breaking of cold rolled non- oriented electrical steel sheet were discussed through the spot tracking,defect samples testing and the processes parameters investigating.The results show that the reason of the poor pickling is that the local strip temperature is too high,and the oxide scales has not been cleaned off in the condition of normal pickling process.The origin of narrowed width is that the reserved cut edge after pickling is too small.When the width of the hot rolled strip is lower,and the strip shape is poor or the strip is not centered,the cut edge of pickling disc shear would be too large and result in narrowed width after cold rolling.The regular strip breaking in cold rolling is resulted from deviation because of poor strip shape or the strip is not centered.
keywords_en: cold rolled non-oriented electrical steel sheet
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
郭太雄，徐权，陈俊，冉长荣，安波，董学强. 冷轧无取向电工钢生产问题探讨[J]. , 2018, 35(3): 23-32.
GUO Tai- xiong,XU Quan,CHEN Jun,RAN Chang- rong,AN Bo,DONG Xue- qiang. Discussion on production problems of cold rolled non- oriented electrical steel sheet. , 2018, 35(3): 23-32.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 差温轧制对厚板芯部变形的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LI Gao- sheng,YU Wei,CAI Qing- wu
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京科技大学高效轧制国家工程研究中心，北京100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用有限元方法建立了厚板轧制的刚塑性有限元模型，以研究在厚板轧制过程中引入厚度方向上的温度梯度对钢板芯部变形的影响。并与传统均温轧制进行对比，研究了差温轧制对钢板头部变形与宽展的影响，以及在两种工艺下钢板厚度方向上应变分布的变化，分析了差温轧制条件下应变、压下量与板坯厚度之间的关系。结果表明，温度梯度轧制有利于增加坯料芯部变形，差温轧制钢板头部呈现单鼓形，而均温轧制钢板头部为双鼓形。均温轧制中心与表面宽展差值? 钗略普庖皇档?6倍。随着板厚减薄，道次压下量增大，差温轧制钢板内部应变逐渐提高。但当道次压下率和板厚过大或过小时，差温轧制对中心应变的改善作用不明显。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: 6Effect of gradient temperature rolling on central deformation of heavy plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The rigid- FEM model for heavy plate rolling was built to investigate the effect of gradient temperature rolling(GTR) along thickness direction on the central deformation of plate.Compared with traditional uniform temperature rolling(UTR),the effects of GTR on the deformation of plate head and lateral spread were illustrated as well as the strain distribution along thickness direction of the plate.The relationships among strain,reduction,and thickness were analyzed.The results show that GTR is conducive to improvement of central deformation of the plate.The head profile of GTR plate is single- bulging while that of UTR plate is double- bulging.The different value in lateral spread between surface and center of UTR plate is 16 times than that of GTR plate.The central strain of GTR plate increases with the decrease of plate thickness and increase of reduction.The influence of GTR is not obvious when the reduction and plate thickness are too large or too small.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李高盛，余伟，蔡庆伍. 差温轧制对厚板芯部变形的影响[J]. , 2018, 35(3): 13-18.
LI Gao- sheng,YU Wei,CAI Qing- wu. 6Effect of gradient temperature rolling on central deformation of heavy plate. , 2018, 35(3): 13-18.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 轧制冷却工艺对低合金超高强钢Q1300组织性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WEN Chang- fei1,DENG Xiang- tao1,WANG Zhao- dong1,YAN Qiang- jun2,CHEN Lin- heng2,WANG Guo- dong1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1. 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点试验室，辽宁沈阳110819
2. 南京钢铁股份有限公司中厚板厂，江苏南京210035
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 以开发屈服强度大于1 300 MPa低合金超高强结构钢为目的，采用不同的轧制及冷却工艺并进行再加热淬火和回火处理，研究了轧制冷却工艺对低合金超高强钢组织性能的影响规律。结果表明，试验钢经控制轧制后奥氏体晶粒被拉长成扁条状，水冷至600 ℃后再空冷至室温所得到的粒状贝氏体组织较直接空冷至室温的组织细小，高温连续轧制后空冷至室温得到的组织为粒状贝氏体+板条贝氏体；相比高温热轧工艺，采用控轧控冷工艺能增大轧态组织的原奥氏体晶界面积，能有效细化再加热原始奥氏体晶粒，晶粒尺寸可减小3.5 μm；经控轧控冷及调质热处理后，钢板具有较好的强韧性，屈服强度为1 345 MPa，抗拉强度为1 590 MPa，-40 ℃冲击功为44 J，各项性能指标均达到相关标准要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Influence of rolling and cooling process on microstructure and properties of ultra- high strength low alloy steel Q1300
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to develop ultra- high strength low alloy structure steel plate which yield strength more than 1 300 MPa,different processes were employed to investigate the effects of rolling and cooling process on its microstructure and mechanical properties.The results showed that austenite grain were elongated into strips after controlled rolling and the granular bainite microstructure was fine when water cooling to 600 ℃ before air cooling.The initial microstructure composed of lath bainite and a few martensite could be obtained under continues rolling at high temperature.Compared to hot rolling process,controlled rolling and controlled cooling process was able to significantly increase the prior austenite grain boundary area.So the finer reheating austenite grain size was acquired,and the grain size could be reduced by 3.5 μm maximally.After the TMCP and quenching and tempering heat treatment,the tested plate had good combination of strength and toughness,yield strength of 1 345 MPa,tensile strength of 1 590 MPa,and the Charpy impact energy at -40 ℃ could be reached 44 J.All indexes could meet the relevant standard requirements.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
温长飞，邓想涛，王昭东，闫强军，陈林恒，王国栋. 轧制冷却工艺对低合金超高强钢Q1300组织性能的影响[J]. , 2018, 35(5): 6-11.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 带头印缺陷机理分析及攻关措施
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: ZAN Xian- liang,CHANG An,WEN Jie,LIN Hai- hai,YU Meng
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢集团有限公司技术研究院，北京100041
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对某企业生产中带头印缺陷频发的问题，对带头印缺陷的产生机理进行了研究。结果表明：带钢厚度、卷筒刚度、卷取张力、上卷温度对带头印缺陷有较大影响，并通过Abaqus有限元仿真分析得到进一步验证。根据机理研究及仿真分析，开展一系列攻关试验，带头印平均长度由前期88.7 m降至34.7 m。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Mechanism analysis and countermeasures of strip head print defect
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the often occuring of strip head print defect during production of a plant,the mechanism of the head print defect was researched.The results showed that there were serious influence of the strip thickness,sleeve stiffness,coiling tension and coiling temperature on the strip head print defect,and these rsults were further verified by abaqus finite element simulation analysis.According to the mechanism study and simulation analysis,a series of research experiments were carried out,and the average length of the head print was reduced significantly from original 88.7 m down to 34.7 m.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过对首钢京唐和迁钢公司2条1 580 mm热轧托盘运输系统的跟踪分析，发现两者辊轮寿命有着明显差别，对此进行了润滑对辊轮磨损影响的试验研究，分析得出辊轮润滑可在不影响托盘运输系统运行稳定性的情况下，明显提高零件寿命。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the tracking analysis of the pallet conveying system of Qiangang 1 580 mm and Jingtang 1 580 mm hot rolling line,the obvious difference of roller lifetime between them was found.By experiment analysis of their pallet roller lubrication,the result was obtained that pallet roller lubrication could obviously increase the service life of the part without affecting the stability of the pallet conveying system.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 强度（屈服强度、抗拉强度）、塑性、韧性和焊接性能是压力钢管及蜗壳用钢的4个质量特征，压力钢管及蜗壳制作过程中需进行不同的变形必然引起性能的变化。通过不同曲率半径变形过程观测变形后钢板的性能试验，考察了南阳汉冶特钢有限公司生产的SX780CF 钢板对压力钢管及蜗壳成形工艺的适应性，结果表明该产品可以替代进口产品。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study on deformation performance of plate for pressure steel tube and volute of hydropower station
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Strength (yield strength,tensile strength),plasticity,toughness and welding performance are the four quality features of the pressure steel pipe and volute steel.Different deformation of pressure steel pipe and volute forming should be occoured during production process.The adaptability of SX780CF plate to pressure steel pipe and volute forming process was investigated by observing the deformation process of different radius of curvature and the performance test of deformed plate.The results show that this plate can replace the imported one.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 提高热轧高强度型材低温冲击性能的研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 重庆钢铁股份有限公司钢研所
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过对某热轧高强度型材低温冲击性能影响因素的分析和研究，发现其低温冲击性能不合格的主要 原因是钢的终轧温度过高而导致钢中出现异常组织及组织粗大，同时取样方式及取样部位也对性能有较大影响。通过将终轧温度控制在870-930℃范围内，轧后禁止进行吹风或喷水冷却，并要求上冷床后进行多支堆放冷却，使该产品一次性能合格率由85.3%提高到97.8%。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: S08AL冷轧板退火态组织和织构特征
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 唐山国丰钢铁有限公司研发部
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用OM、SEM、XRD等方法，试验研究了S08AL热轧板冷轧退火后的组织、织构特征及其力学性能。结果表明：冷轧退火后组织与热轧态差别较大，随退火温度升高，晶粒变大，组织更均匀，游离渗碳体的级别降低650℃和700℃退火后带钢中部的{111}织构强度差别不大。 4种退火工艺相比，700℃退火后带钢的综合力学性能最好。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 接触式板形仪动态标定系统的开发与应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了国内某高校自主研制的1250mm轧机用板形测量仪的原理和组成，并针对接触式板形测量辊压磁式传感器特性不一致而造成系统误差，从而导致板形测量误差的问题，设计了一套动态标定装置、同时采用C++言开发了接触式板形检测辊动态标定软件系统&现场应用表明，该方法能有效消除板形测量辊的系统误差，由动态标定方法所得出的测量辊特性曲线更加准确。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 基于Deform高线粗轧奥氏体晶粒细化研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: ZHENG Fu-yin, WANG Li-ping, DENG Su-huai, CHAO Yue-lin
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢技术研究院, 北京 100041
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 本文结合GCr15再结晶模型, 根据轧线实际孔型参数、轧线布置与轧制程序, 采用刚塑性有限元法, 利用模拟软件Deform对轴承钢线材GCr15粗轧进行了三维有限元模拟, 分析总结了粗轧过程中轧件温度场、等效应变和应变速率的变化规律, 得出粗轧过程动态、亚动态和静态再结晶的百分数和对应晶粒尺寸, 揭示了轧件在粗轧过程中再结晶规律及奥氏体晶粒细化规律, 并且证实了初始晶粒尺寸对粗轧过程奥氏体晶粒细化的影响规律。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Simulation research on austenite grain refining in roughing of wire rod
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the GCr15 steel recrystallization model, practical pass system and rolling schedule, the roughing of GCr15 bearing steel wire rod was simulated by three-dimensional finite element software Deform. The temperature, strain and strain rate of the piece during rolling were analyzed. The dynamic, meta-dynamic and static recrystallization fraction and the corresponding grain size of piece in the roughing process were obtained. The law of recrystallization and austenite grain refining during roughing was revealed, and the influence of the initial grain size on the refining of austenite grain was proved.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 卷取温度对540 MPa级热轧酸洗板组织性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 本钢板材有限公司产品研究院，辽宁本溪117000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 对不同卷取温度下540 MPa级热轧酸洗板的组织性能进行了研究。结果表明，卷取温度为380 ℃时，540 MPa级热轧酸洗板组织为铁素体+粒状贝氏体，ReL≥440 MPa、Rm≥550 MPa，A≥28%，扩孔率达100%；当卷取温度为290 ℃时，钢板组织中出现了马氏体，其屈服强度和抗拉强度明显提升，扩孔性能和伸长率下降；当卷取温度降至220 ℃时，钢板组织中出现了大量马氏体。因此，为获得理想的强度、塑性及扩孔性能，卷取温度不宜过低。
keywords_cn: 540MPa，热轧酸洗板，卷取温度，粒状贝氏体
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of coiling temperature on microstructure and properties of 540 MPa grade pickled plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The microstructure and properties of 540 MPa grade pickled plate at different coiling temperatures have been studied.The results show that the microstructure of plate is ferrite + granular bainite at the coiling temperature of 380 ℃,and the yield strength，the tensile strength，the elongation and the expanding ratio are repectively more than 440 MPa, 550 MPa,28% and 100%.When the coiling temperature is lower than 300 ℃,the martensite is appeared in the microstructure,and the yield strength and tensile strength are increased,the expanding ratio and elongation are decreased.When the coiling temperature reduces to 220 ℃,a large number of martensite is appeared.Therefore,in order to obtain the ideal strength,plasticity and expanding ratio,the coiling temperature should not be too low.
keywords_en: 540MPa, pickled steel, coiling temperature, granular bainite
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
康海军，王旭生. 卷取温度对540 MPa级热轧酸洗板组织性能的影响[J]. , 2018, 35(6): 28-30.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.河钢集团钢研总院，河北石家庄050000；2.河钢集团石钢公司技术中心，河北石家庄050031
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用DIL805L淬火相变膨胀仪研究了铁素体珠光体型非调质钢的连续冷却相变组织变化规律，分析了冷却速率和合金元素对相变组织、显微硬度和CCT曲线的影响。结果表明，Mo有助于获得针状铁素体组织，进而提高韧性，Mn与微合金元素V有助于提高钢的综合力学性能；冷速增大至0.5 ℃/s时，开始出现针状铁素体；冷速小于1 ℃/s时，获得完全的铁素体+珠光体组织；随着冷速的增大，钢的硬度不断增大。
keywords_cn: 铁素体珠光体型非调质钢
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study on continuous cooling transformation of ferritepearlite nonquenched and tempered steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Microstructure evolution of ferritepearlite nonquenched and tempered steel during continuous cooling transformation was studied on DIL805L thermal dilatometer.The influence of cooling rate and alloy elements on microstructure,microhardness and continuous cooling transformation (CCT) curve were analyzed in detail.The results show that the addition of Mo can improve toughness by obtaining acicular ferrite,Mn and microalloy element V attribute to improve comprehensive mechanical properties of steel.When the cooling rate increases to 0.5 ℃/s,acicular ferrite begin to generate,the microstructure at room temperature are ferrite and pearlite entirely when the cooling rate less than 1 ℃/s.Meanwhile,the hardness increase with the cooling rate increase.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 中厚板轧制过程的数值模拟
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢技术研究院宽厚板所
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn:
以Ｌ２４５级管线钢材料的热物性参数（密度、泊松比、杨氏模量、热膨胀系数、热导率和比热）和热模拟压缩实验获得的高温变形时应力－应变曲线等试验数据为基础，在ＭＳＣ．Ｍａｒｃ软件中建立了该钢种材料数据库，并建立了中厚板多道次轧制过程的二维有限元模型。以铸坯厚度为２２０ｍｍ、成品厚度为２５．４ｍｍ 的热轧过程为例，通过对轧件与轧辊接触面间换热系数采用取不同常数值的方法，并依据其生产时所采集的各道次相关工艺参数，对该轧件全道次热轧过程进行了数值模拟，将各道次的轧制力计算值与实测值进行了分析比较，确定了轧件与轧辊间接触面换热系数的最佳值。利用本文模型对厚度为１８０ｍｍ 的轧件单道次轧制过程进行了数值模拟，研究了不同变形工艺参数（轧制温度、道次压下率和轧制速度）对变形区等效应变和等效应力的响。结果表明，在轧机设备能力及生产现场条件允许时，高温粗轧阶段纵轧道次可采用低速大压下
率进行轧制成形，使变形较充分地向轧件芯部渗透，从而使钢板获得细小均匀的晶粒组织，有效改善钢板的强韧性能。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 基于ANSYS/LS-DYNA有限元模拟软件, 以南京钢铁联合有限公司中板厂Q235钢板剪切过程为研究对象, 研究了在不同工艺参数条件下, 钢板的剪切力和侧向力的变化情况, 分析了不同工艺参数对Q235钢板的剪切力和侧向力的影响。结果表明: 22 mm厚的Q235钢板, 最佳侧向剪切间隙为1.0 mm左右; 随着剪切钢板厚度的增加, 最佳侧向剪切间隙值为钢板厚度的4.55%; 重叠量为-4.5 mm处, 侧向力达到最小值, 为12.893 kN; 剪切力和侧向力也随着剪切速度的增大而增大, 增大幅度为5%～8%。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Optimized research on disc shear shearing process
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the fact of the disc shear process for Q235 steel plate in Nanjing Iron and Steel United Co., Ltd., the deformation of shear and lateral force of steel plate under different process parameters were researched by the finite element software of ANSYS/LS-DYNA. And the influence of different process parameters to shear and lateral force of steel plate was analyzed in this paper. The results showed that, the best lateral clearance of Q235 steel plate with 22 mm thickness was about 1.0 mm. The best lateral clearance increased with the thickness of steel plate at 4.55% of steel plate thickness. When the overlap was -4.5mm, the lateral force reached the minimum value, and it was about 12.893 kN. The shear and lateral force increased with shearing velocity, and the rang was from 5% to 8%.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陈东文 黄贞益 郝震宇 许体武 章小峰. 圆盘剪剪切工艺优化研究[J]. , 2015, 32(2): 90-95.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Surface decarbonization depth control technology of medium carbon steel round bar
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of surface decarburization depth of medium carbon steel round bar over the standard problem in Minguang Co., Ltd. of Fujian Sansteel Group, the decarburization thermodynamic and kinetic principle of medium carbon steel were analyzed. Combined with 45, 40Cr ad 40Mn2 of three kinds of steels reheating experiment, the conclusion was obtained , which reheating temperature, holding time and amount of carbon of steel surface were higher, the depth of decarburized layer was thicker. The formula for calculating the depth of decarburized layer was derived. At the same time, the control measures were put forward, and the production effect was better.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The development of 80 mm thickness SX610CF heavy plate for hydropower in Nanyang Hanye Special Steel Co.,Ltd.was introduced.The chemical composition design and TMCP+ tempering process were mainly introduced,including the determination of heating temperature of slab,twostage controlled rolling process and the effect of different tempering temperatures on the microstructure and properties of the plate.The trial production results show that the slab heating temperature is set to 1 190-1 210 °C,and using the designed pressing procedure,the deformation of each pass can penetrate into the core of the plate,the core structure of the plate can be improved.Based on these,the mechanical propeties and impact toughness of plate can meet the technical requirements of hydropower steel.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1．北京科技大学，a.工程技术研究院；b.钢铁技术协同创新中心，北京100083；2.大连鑫永尚科技有限公司,大连辽宁116021
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 长期以来多采用酸洗技术对热轧板、卷和浸镀件等表面进行除鳞处理，这一方面会降低产品的表面质量和性能；另一方面会对操作人员和设备造成损害且污染环境。随着国家对环境保护的重视，国内外均对除鳞工艺进行了研究，探索最新的技术和工艺。综合以往的研究，介绍了几种钢材表面的少酸除鳞技术，以及SCS、EPS、GSPS无酸除鳞技术，指出除鳞工艺的发展方向为少酸或无酸的机械式处理工艺和以磷酸代替盐酸的新工艺。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Introduction of several acidreducing descaling equipment for steel products
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The surface of hot rolled plates,coils and dipped parts had been descaled using  pickling technology for longterm.The final surface quality and performance of products could be reduced,and the operator,equipment and the environment would be damaged by this technology.With the national emphasis on environmental protection,both domestic and foreign researchers were focus on descaling process to explore the best process and technology.The previous research were summarized,and several acidreducing descaling techniques and SCS,EPS and GSPS picklingfree techniques were introduced.It pointed out that the current development direction of the descaling technology was mechanical process with lessacid or freeacid characteristics,and phosphate instead of hydrochloricalid.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 河钢集团邯钢邯宝热轧厂，河北邯郸056003
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对邯宝热轧厂热轧卷开卷后边部表面氧化铁皮呈蓝黑色，中部表面氧化铁皮呈灰白色，用户把这种氧化铁皮颜色差异与产品的力学性能差异相关联的问题，分析了热轧钢卷边部与中部氧化铁皮颜色差异的根本原因，即钢卷边部与中部层间缝隙大小和降温速率存在差异，导致热轧钢卷表面氧化铁皮结构不同。为此，提出了减小带钢凸度、杜绝带钢边部厚度突降、适当增加卷取张力、保证带钢均匀降温等措施，有效改善了带钢表面氧化铁皮颜色差异现象。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study on color difference of oxide between edge and middle surface of hot rolled coil
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the problems of blue-black oxide on the edge and gray oxide on the middle surface of hot rolled strip,and some users relate the difference of the oxide color to the mechanical properties of the product,the causes of oxide colour difference at edge and middle of strip were analyzed,which there were difference of coil interlayer gap size and cooling rate between edge and middle of strip and resulting in different oxide structure.Therefore,some measures were put forward,such as reducing strip crown,avoiding edge thinkness drop,appropritately increasing coiling tension and ensuring strip evenly cooling,which could be effectively improve the oxide color difference of strip.

Thus the problem was resolved, and it′s quite effective on energy saving.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: EF08高合金钢热轧工艺研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: SHI Xu- lin, QIAN Zhang- xin
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 酒钢集团宏兴股份不锈钢研究所，甘肃嘉峪关735100
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过相图、轧制理论以及对热轧带钢金相组织的观察，对比分析了EF08钢、410S铁素体不锈钢和304奥氏体不锈钢热轧过程中的变形抗力和动态回复再结晶能力。结果表明：EF08钢奥氏体区在900~1 200 ℃，热轧过程处于奥氏体相区，其动态回复再结晶能力较410S铁素体不锈钢和304奥氏体不锈钢强；EF08钢的粗轧过程轧制特性与304奥氏体不锈钢相近，精轧后几道次与410S铁素体不锈钢类似。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on the hot rolling process of EF08 high alloy steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In this paper, the deformation resistance force and the capacity of dynamic recrystallization of EF08 steel, 410S ferritic stainless steel and 304 austenitic stainless steel during the hot rolling were analyzed comparatively according to the phase diagram, rolling theory and microstructure of the hot rolled strip. The results show that the austenite phase region of EF08 steel is 900-1 200 ℃, the capacity of dynamic recrystallization is higher than 410S ferritic stainless steel and 304 austenitic stainless steel. The rough rolling characteristics of EF08 steel is close to 304 austenitic stainless steel, and the finish rolling characteristics in the last several passes are similar with 410S ferritic stainless steel.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
石旭麟，钱张信. EF08高合金钢热轧工艺研究[J]. , 2015, 32(5): 17-19.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LI Sheng- cun, LI Bao- wei, LI Zhi- qiang，CHEN Jing- hui
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司，河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对某酸轧机组生产高碳高强钢时切边崩刃现象严重的问题，研究了导致剪刀崩刃的原因和预防措施，并研究了切边剪的切边原理。通过限定上线前剪刃的间隙和重叠量偏差、规定剪刃硬度、合理搭配剪切间隙和重叠量、保持稳定高速的切边速度等措施，使高强钢崩刃现象大幅降低，提高了酸轧高强钢的小时产量。
keywords_cn: 切边剪 间隙量 高强钢 崩刀
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis and countermeasure of blade fracture on rotary side trimmer for high- strength steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aimed at the blade fracture phenomenon of cutting high- strength steel in the pickling and cold rolling line, the causes and preventive measures were studied. Based on the operational principle analysis of side trimmer, some measures were put into use, such as limiting the blade side clearance and overlapping deviation, setting the blade hardness, matching up the side clearance and the overlap, keeping the velocity of cutting side stable and high. So the blade fracture frequency was decreased greatly, and the production per hour of high- strength steel was increased.
keywords_en: side trimmer side clearance high-strength steel blade fracture

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.安徽工业大学冶金工程学院，安徽马鞍山243002
2.新兴际华集团有限公司，北京100020
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Simulation on rolling process of I shape steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In this paper,the blanks of I shape steel is narrow steel bars which result from the discharging and slitting rolling of strip steel.The software of MSC.Marc was used to establish an elastic-plastic finite element model to simulate the Q235 I shape steel hot rolling process which has four continue rolling passes,the specification of the product was 25 mm×5 mm×3 mm.The variation of rolling piece′s deformation,equivalent plastic stress and equivalent strain were studied.The simulation results indicated that the dog bone-shaped was appeared after vertical-rolling and one drum-shaped was appeared after horizontal- rolling.The equivalent plastic stress was larger in the middle of the workpiece cross-section,and the equivalent strain was larger in the side and corner of workpiece that would lead the quality defects during the rolling process.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIU Xiang-hua1,2，MA Bao-guo3,WU Zhi-qiang2，LIU Xin2，CHEN Qing-an2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.东北大学研究院，辽宁沈阳110819

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Pacing control of cutting and transferring billets in DROF process
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to meet the needs of DROF process,the strategy and methods to cut and transfer the billets were discussed.There were two cases,one was that the cast speed was adjustable,how to setup the rules to cut and transfer the billets,the other was the cast speed couldn′t be adjustable,and it also couldn′t be stable,then a new way was proposed which could be described as "cut long at fast strand,cut short at slowly strand,cut right point at stable strand",so as to carry out direct rolling under the reasonable pacing.It provided a reference for the connection between casting and rolling.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 等温温度对低硅含铝热轧TRIP钢组织性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Xiaohui,KANG Jian,LI Zhenlei,LI Yunjie,YUAN Guo,WANG Guo dong
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 以低Si含Al热轧TRIP钢为研究对象，采用扫描电子显微镜、拉伸试验、X射线衍射仪和电子探针等试验方法，研究了不同等温温度对试验钢组织性能的影响。结果表明，试验钢的显微组织主要由多边形铁素体、贝氏体铁素体和残余奥氏体组成，随着等温温度的升高，残余奥氏体分解为新生成铁素体和碳化物；当等温温度为450 ℃时，试验钢的力学性能最佳，其抗拉强度为732.25 MPa，断后伸长率为36%，强塑积为26.36 GPa·%；残余奥氏体的体积分数先升高后降低，而C含量逐渐降低，等温温度为450 ℃时试验钢表现出较强的加工硬化行为。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of isothermal temperature on microstructures and mechanical properties
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Hot rolled TRIP steels with low Si more Al was set as studied object using scanning electron microscopy,tensile test,Xray diffraction and electron probe microanalyzer to study the effect of different isothermal temperature on microstructures and mechanical properties of experimental steels.The results show that the microstructures of experimental steels consist of polygonal ferrite,bainite ferrite and retained austenite,with increasing of isothermal temperature,retained austenite decomposes into new ferrite and carbides.When isothermal temperature is 450 ℃,the comprehensive mechanical properties of experimental steels reach the best,the tensile strength is 732.25 MPa,the total elongation is 36%,and the strength ductility balance is 26.36(GPa·%).Moreover,the volume fraction of retained austenite initially increases and then decreases,while the carbon concentration gradually decreases.With isothermal temperature 450 ℃,the experimental steels exhibit excellent work hardening behaviour.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
王晓晖，康健，李振垒，李云杰，袁国，王国栋. 等温温度对低硅含铝热轧TRIP钢组织性能的影响[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(1): 16-20.
WANG Xiaohui,KANG Jian,LI Zhenlei,LI Yunjie,YUAN Guo,WANG Guo dong. Effect of isothermal temperature on microstructures and mechanical properties. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(1): 16-20.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LI Guanghui1,ZHANG Yilong1,WANG Zirong1,LI Xiaoshao1,YANG Yonggang2,JIANG HaiTao2#br#
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.湖南华菱涟源钢铁有限公司，湖南娄底417009；2.北京科技大学工程技术研究院，北京100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过对高强无间隙原子钢在不同残余元素含量条件下的磷化质量分析，发现随着As、Sn总含量的增加，磷化膜的外观颜色由灰白色变为灰黑色，同时磷化膜晶粒由粒状向棒状发展，磷化膜晶粒尺寸增加。结合扫描电子显微镜、化学法和光谱法的相关检测结果分析，高强无间隙原子钢的外观与磷化膜微观晶粒大小、形状相关，同时发现当w（As+Sn）≤0.0150%时，高强无间隙原子钢可获得较好的外观颜色及磷化晶粒组织。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effects of residual elements on the quality of phosphatic coating in high strength interstitial free steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Through the analysis of the phosphate quality of high strength interstitial free steel under different residual element contents,it was found that with the increase of the total content of As and Sn,the appearance of the phosphate coating changed from gray to grayblack,and at the same time the shape of phosphate coating grains changed from granular to rodlike,the grain size of the phosphate coating increased.Combining the analysis results of scanning electron microscopy,chemical and spectroscopic methods,the appearance of high strength interstitial free steels correlated with the size and shape of the phosphate coating grains.It was also found that when the total content of As and Sn is less than 0.0150%,high strength interstitial free steel had a better appearance and phosphatized grain structure.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李光辉，张益龙，王自荣，李晓少，杨永刚，江海涛. 残余元素对高强无间隙原子钢磷化质量的影响[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(3): 29-32.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The development trend of hot strip subsequent processing was introduced.The suggestions of process route and equipment selection of production line for products come from thin slab casting and rolling line were put forward as well as the equipment configuration and selection of continuous pickling and skin pass mill line,continuous pickling and galvanizing line,continuous skin pass mill and tension leveling line and picklingfree line.It pointed out that China had ability to independently design and manufacture these types of production line,and enterprises should select the corresponding production line according to their own raw material characteristics,product positioning,and financial position and so on.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对轧钢过程特点，分析了轧制过程的主要故障，将故障划分为控制回路级、设备级和系统级。对轧钢过程故障诊断主要方法进行了归纳和分类，对各类方法的优缺点进行了定性分析，指出了故障诊断技术向智能化、系统化和综合化的发展趋势，以及轧钢过程故障诊断将来需要关注的两个研究方向。

1.咸阳职业技术学院，陕西咸阳712046

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过对连续热处理过程中受到不同张力的超窄2Cr13带钢进行拉伸实验以及金相组织观察，探讨了超窄2Cr13带钢生产过程中引入的张力对于其力学性能的影响，结果表明：当带钢所加载的张力不超过98.0 N（宽度减小率不超过1.8%）时，试样的力学性能不发生变化；当带钢所加载的张力大于98.0 N（宽度减小率超过1.8%）时，试样的力学性随张力的增大而变差。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：According to the tensile test and observation on the microstructure of the super narrow 2Cr13 steel strip during continuous heat treatment under different tension,the influence of the tension on the mechanical properties of super narrow 2Cr13 steel strip was discussed.The result showed that when the tension loaded on the steel strip no more than 98.0 N(the width reduce rate no more than 1.8%),the mechanical properties of the sample did not change.When the tension loaded on the steel strip more than 98.0 N(the width reduce rate more than 1.8%),the mechanical properties of the sample became weak as the tension raised.

1. 宝钢不锈钢有限公司， 上海 201900

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对B436L铁素体不锈钢带钢表面易产生辊迹缺陷问题，分析了B436L带钢生产工艺，得出带钢表面辊迹缺陷是热轧过程中带钢与轧辊发生粘结而产生的。为此，对轧辊材质、板坯加热温度、轧制规程、轧制计划等进行了优化，使因粘结导致的辊迹缺陷的发生率由38.4%降低到1.0%以内。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of sticking defect problem of B436L ferritic stainless steel strip, its production process was analyzed, and the reason of strip and roll sticking during rolling was obtained. Therefore, some optimization measures for roll material, slab heating and rolling schedules, rolling plan, etc. were applied. Based on it, the rate of sticking occurring was reduced from 38.4% to within 1.0%.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 对冷轧镀锌带材塌卷问题进行了研究，结合现场塌卷数据统计，提出塌卷产生的力学机理。建立了不同卷取工艺参数下钢卷力能参数分布规律，分析了钢卷卸卷前后层间径向及切向应力变化，根据不同硬芯工艺参数下塌卷极限应力仿真结果，制定了不同厚度带材卷取张力最优值，包括卷取张力硬芯倍数及硬芯卷径，镀锌卷塌卷问题得到有效改善。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on influence of coiling process of cold rolled galvanized strip on coil collapse
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The coil collapse of cold rolled galvanized strip was studied in this paper. Combined with the on- site data statistics of coil collapse,the mechanical mechanism of collapse was put forward.The distribution rule of steel coils mechanical parameters in different coiling technological parameters was figured out.The change law of radial and tangential stress before and after the unloading of the coiler was analyzed.According to the simulation results of limiting stress of coil collapse in different hard core technological parameters，optimal coiling technological parameters for strips of different thicknesses were established，including hard core′s ratio and coiling diameter of the coiling tension,and the coil collapse of galvanized strip was improved.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对微合金钢中厚板边部易出现边直裂缺陷的问题，采用宏观观察、金相分析、扫描电镜观察等方法对中厚板边直裂缺陷进行了分析，认为其是由于轧钢过程中角部和边部展宽折叠到大面所造成的。通过改变加热制度、空冷制度及轧制工艺等，改善了中厚板边直裂问题，减小了裁边量。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 山西太钢不锈钢股份有限公司，山西太原030003
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对出口铁路货车的需求，山西太钢不锈钢股份有限公司研制了屈服强度级别为500 MPa的高强度耐大气腐蚀TQ500NH热轧带钢。介绍了其化学成分设计和热连轧工艺，并对其组织和性能进行了调控。生产实践表明：试制带钢的组织为铁素体+少量贝氏体，拉伸性能波动小，冷弯性能和冲击性能优异，耐大气腐蚀性能良好，可满足出口铁路货车制造的要求。
keywords_cn: 铁路货车 高强度 耐大气腐蚀 热轧钢带 组织 性能
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development of 500 MPa grade high strength atmospheric corrosion resistant steel for rail freight cars
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the need of exported rail freight cars,the 500 MPa grade high strength atmospheric corrosion resistant steel strip was developed in Shanxi Taigang Stainless Steel Co.,Ltd.Its chemical compositions and hot tandem rolling process were designed,and the microstructure and properties were also controlled.The practice showed that the microstructure of ferrite and a small amount of bainite of tested strip was obtained,and small range tensile properties,excellent cold bending performance and impact toughness,good atmospheric corrosion resistance were obtained,which could meet the manufacturing requirements of exported rail freight cars.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 河北普阳钢铁有限公司，河北武安056305
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了河北普阳钢铁有限公司生产Q420qD-Z25厚规格钢板的化学成分设计、控轧控冷工艺及钢板性能。研究了不同未再结晶区开轧温度对Q420qD-Z25厚规格钢板组织和力学性能的影响。结果表明：铌、钒微合金元素的复合添加，有助于细化铁素体晶粒，提高钢材的强度和韧性。采用两阶段控制轧制工艺，随着未再结晶区开轧温度的降低，组织更加细化，钢板的抗拉强度及伸长率变化不大，但屈服强度及-20 ℃冲击功显著提高。轧后钢板下线后迅速进行高温堆垛缓冷，保证了钢板具有优异的Z向性能。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Production practice of Q420qD-Z25 bridge steel plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The chemical composition design,controlled rolling and controlled cooling technology and properites of heavy gauge Q420qD-Z25 plate were introduced,which was developed in Hebei Puyang Iron and Steel Co.，Ltd.The effect of different rolling start temperature in nonrecrystallization region on microstructure and properties was investegated.The results showed that combined addition of Nb+V microalloving elements contributed to refine the ferrite grain,and could improve strength and toughness of the plate.With decreasing rolling temperature of nonrecrystallization region in two stage controlled rolling process,the microstructures was refined,and the yield strength and impact toughness of -20 ℃ were significantly increased,but no obvious effect on tensile strength and elongation was found.By means of plate piling for slow cooling after hot rolling,the Z-direction performance and conformity ratio of ultrasonic flaw detection were guaranteed.The properties of plate were fine and stable,and could meet the requirements of customers.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
