http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the problm of poor resistance to salt spray corrosion of chromium-free passivating steel sheet producted by a cold rolling mill,the passivation film surface morphology and microstructure were studied.The results showed that there were different types of cracks on the surface of sheet.The elastic strain of the steel under different tension were simulated.The cracks could be eliminated by reasonably controlling the tension and drying temperature after passivation,so corrosion resistance of galvanized sheets was improved significantly.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京科技大学高效轧制国家工程研究中心，北京100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 研究了带钢宽度范围内轧制力分布对工作辊磨损的影响，以及“猫耳”状边部轧制力对工作辊磨损的影响；利用实测轧制力分布结果，采用切片法计算了工作辊磨损分布，并对磨损辊型进行预报。基于现场实测数据优化了模型系数，磨损模型求解的预报值与实测磨损辊型值相接近，说明磨损预报模型具有较高的精度；并且模型公式简单、计算速度较快，可用于工作辊磨损辊型的在线预报。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Wear contour prediction model and application of the work roll in hot wide strip mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The influence of the rolling force distribution on the wear of the work roll was taken into account.The impact of the edge rolling force distribution with the "cat ears" on the work roll wear was considered.Based on the results of the measured rolling force distribution,the wear distribution of the work roll was calculated by slicing method.The wear contour of the work roll was predicted.Based on the measured data,the prediction model coefficients were optimized.The predicted values of the wear contour model were approached to the measured one.It is indicated that the wear contour prediction model had high accuracy,the model formula was simple,and the calculation speed was quicker.It could be applied to the on- line prediction of the work roll wear contour in hot strip mill.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘华强，杨荃，王晓晨，王连生. 热轧宽带钢工作辊磨损辊型预报模型及应用[J]. , 2018, 35(4): 45-49.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: ZHANG Hao- yu1，WANG Chuan2,SUN Jie3,CHEN Li- jia1,ZHANG Dian- hua3
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.沈阳工业大学材料科学与工程学院，辽宁沈阳110870
2.辽宁大学轻型产业学院，辽宁沈阳110036
3.东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 实验轧机由于开机时间短、维护不及时等因素易导致其液压系统固有的伺服零偏现象，这对辊缝定位精度产生恶劣的影响，进而造成轧制变形条件发生不可测变化。为了消除该现象对轧制实验结果准确性的干扰，开发了一种伺服零偏自愈控制方法。仿真研究结果表明，当自愈系数与液压辊缝控制闭环比例系数的比值维持系统惯性时间常数的2倍时，可获得最佳控制效果。实际应用结果表明，在有效轧制力工作区间，动态辊缝定位精度小于1 μm。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Self- healing control of servo zero deviation for experimental rolling mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The servo zero deviation of hydraulic system has a bad influence on the gap accuracy due to short available machine time and delayed maintenance in experimental rolling mill.And then the rolling deformation conditions change unpredictably during rolling experiment.In order to ensure the accuracy of rolling experiment,a self- healing control method for servo zero deviation was developed.Simulation results show that when the ratio of self- healing gain to proportional gain of hydraulic gap control loop equals to twice the inertia time constant,the optimal control effect is obtained.The application results show that accuracy of dynamical gap is less than 1 μm in the effective rolling force range.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
张浩宇，王川，孙杰，陈立佳，张殿华. 实验轧机液压伺服零偏自愈控制[J]. , 2018, 35(6): 66-69.
ZHANG Hao- yu，WANG Chuan,SUN Jie,CHEN Li- jia,ZHANG Dian- hua. Self- healing control of servo zero deviation for experimental rolling mill. , 2018, 35(6): 66-69.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.湖南华菱湘潭钢铁有限公司，湖南湘潭411100；2.东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 钢板表面的氧化铁皮不仅影响产品外观质量，在轧制和矫直过程中还会导致氧化皮压入缺陷。采用控制轧制和直接淬火（DQ）工艺，研究了不同的淬火温度与终冷温度对低合金高强钢板表面氧化铁皮的影响，分析了钢板表面氧化铁皮结构及其脆化的原因。试验表明，通过增加除鳞道次并不能有效改善氧化铁皮，精轧轧制温度与轧后加速冷却过程对氧化铁皮结构具有显著影响，高冷速条件下通过降低精轧轧制温度与淬火温度，能够得到以FeO为主要成分的氧化铁皮，其具有良好的塑性并且分布均匀，避免了淬火后强力热矫直时氧化铁皮破碎并压入基体的问题，钢板抛丸后表面光洁。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Control and improvement of oxide scale on the surface of heavy and medium plate by direct quenching
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The oxide scale on the surface of the plate not only affects the appearance of the product,but also leads to the oxide scale indent defect during rolling and levelling.The structure and cause of embrittlement of the oxide scale on the surface of lowalloy high strength plate under direct quenching (DQ) condition were analyzed.The effects of different quenching temperature and final cooling temperature on surface oxide scale were investigated.The results show that the scale can not be effectively improved by increasing the descaling pass.The structure of oxide scale was significantly affected by finishing rolling temperature and accelerated cooling process after rolling.The FeObased oxide scale can be obtained by reducing the finishing rolling and quenching temperatures at high cooling rate,and it has good plasticity and evenly distributed on the plate surface.After shot blasting,the surface of plate was smoothing,which avoided the problem of oxide scale fragmentation and pressing into the matrix during hot levelling process with large levelling force after direct quenching.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘吉文，田勇. 在线淬火中厚板表面氧化铁皮的控制与改善[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(4): 13-18.
LIU Jiwen，TIAN Yong. Control and improvement of oxide scale on the surface of heavy and medium plate by direct quenching. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(4): 13-18.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 小型棒线材生产连铸－轧钢工艺衔接优化
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶赛迪工程技术股份有限公司管材与长材事业部，重庆401122
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过对国内多个小型棒线材企业连铸－轧钢工艺衔接实际生产情况的调研及分析，剖析了小型棒线材连铸－轧钢工艺衔接现状及普遍存在的问题，提出了通过改进生产组织模式、在连铸和轧线加热炉之间增设保温缓冲台架、热坯收集台架、低温坯剔除台架及保温坑等设施的优化方案，可使热送热装比提高到90％以上，加热炉实行冷热坯分装，经济效益明显。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Optimization of continuous casting and rolling technology connection for small bar and wire
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en:
Abstract：
Through the investigation and analysis of the actual production situation of continuous casting and rolling technology connection of many small bar and wire enterprises in China,the current status and common problems of continuous casting and rolling technology connection for small bar and wire were analyzed.The optimization schemes by improving production organization mode and adding insulation buffer platform,hot billet collection platform,low temperature billet removal platform and heat holding pit between continuous casting and rolling line heating furnace were put forward.The hot charging ratio can be increased to over 90%,the cold and hot billet can be divided into different parts in the heating furnace by the optimized schemes.
keywords_en: continuous casting and rolling technology connection
cold and hot billet divided into the heating furnace
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: TIAN  Yong1,SONG Chaowei1,GE Quanjiang2,WANG Zhaodong1，WANG Guodong1#br#

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: CSS—42L是一种综合性能十分优异的高温轴承钢，具有出色的红硬性、耐磨性、断裂韧性、疲劳寿命以及耐蚀性，在航空航天领域具有良好的应用前景。结合当前国内外CSS—42L的研究资料，对其研发背景和发展现状进行了概述，重点概括了CSS—42L的热处理工艺、微观组织特征以及性能特性，并对该技术的发展进行了展望。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Status of research and development of heat treatment techniques for heat resistant bearing steel CSS—42L applied for aviation
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：CSS—42L is a heat resistant bearing steel with excellent comprehensive properties included excellent hot hardness,wear resistance,fracture toughness,fatigue life and corrosion resistance.Based on the current research status of CSS—42L at home and abroad,its research and development background and development process were summarized,and the heat treatment techniques,microstructure and mechanical properties of CSS—42L were mainly described.Meanwhile,the development of the technology was expected.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: Smith预估器在卷取温度控制系统中的应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司，河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对热轧带钢卷取温度控制系统的滞后特点，在带钢卷取温度控制系统中引入了Smith预估补偿器。介绍了Smith预估器的基本原理，并将Smith预估器设计在卷取温度二级控制系统，使Smith预估器采用与设定计算完全一致的数学模型，与常规系统相比，具有稳定性好、超调量小、控制精度高等优点。通过对卷取温度数学模型进行优化，为Smith预估器在卷取温度系统中的应用提供了有力保障。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Application of Smith predictor to coiling temperature control system
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the hysteresis characteristics of hot strip coiling temperature control system, the Smith predictive compensator was applied. The basic principle of Smith predictor was introduced, and the Smith predictor was used in No.2 control systems. Therefore, the Smith predictor using same mathematical model as setting calculation. It compared with conventional system, several advantages, such as good stability, small overshoot and high control precision, were obtained. By optimizing the coiling temperature mathematical model, it has provided the powerful safeguard for the application of coiling temperature system as Smith predictor.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
徐芳. Smith预估器在卷取温度控制系统中的应用[J]. , 2014, 31(4): 67-69.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了目前钢铁市场低迷、产能严重过剩的形势下，国内外主要钢铁企业结合本企业自身的特点，在深加工、绿色生产及社会服务化方面所选择的发展方向和实施措施。为其他钢厂及我国冶金行业战略性转型提供了可借鉴的经验。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 轧辊偏心补偿在本钢1 780 mm热连轧生产中的应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 本钢集团有限公司北营轧钢厂，辽宁 本溪 117000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 轧辊偏心是由轧辊和轧辊轴承形状的不规则造成的。本文分析了轧辊偏心的危害和起因，提出采用LMS自适应滤波的方式来解决轧辊偏心问题，该方式在本钢1 780 mm热连轧生产中的应用表明，其减小了轧辊偏心对轧件厚度的影响，保证了产品质量。
keywords_cn: 轧辊 偏心 LMS自适应 滤波
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Application of roll eccentricity compensation on 1 780 mm rolling line in Bensteel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The roll eccentricity is caused by the irregular shape of the rolls and roll bearing. Harm and causes of the roll eccentricity were analyzed. LMS self-adaption filtering method was put forward, and its application on the 1 780mm hot strip rolling line in Bensteel showed that the effect was good.

赵东辉. 轧辊偏心补偿在本钢1 780 mm热连轧生产中的应用[J]. , 2014, 31(5): 50-52 .
ZHAO Dong-hui. Application of roll eccentricity compensation on 1 780 mm rolling line in Bensteel. , 2014, 31(5): 50-52 .

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 冷轧拉伸弯曲矫直机工艺参数设定影响因素研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: ZHANG Liang1, CHEN Bing2, FU Guang1, SHU Jian-hua2, LIN Hai-hai2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1. 首钢股份有限公司迁安钢铁公司冷轧厂, 河北 迁安 064400
2. 北京科技大学机械工程学院, 北京 100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 在冷轧带钢生产线上，拉矫工艺是通过弯曲与拉伸的共同作用使带钢产生剧烈变形而达到改善板形和表面破鳞的目的，合理设置拉矫工艺参数是现场拉矫机高效运行的关键。本文利用有限元仿真手段，综合分析了延伸率和弯曲辊插入深度的设定因素，重点分析了张力与弯曲辊配置、带钢强化特性、破鳞效果及拉矫机辊系结构对弯曲辊插入深度设定的影响，为现场拉矫机工艺参数的合理配置提供了依据。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research of inflluence factors on process parameters setting of cold rolling tension leveller
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In cold rolling production line, technology of tension leveling achieves the severe deformation of strip steel through interaction of bending and stretching, and finally improves shape and scale breading. Reasonable setting of process parameters is the key to efficient operation of tension leveller. The elongation and bending roll insert depth setting factors by finite element simulation method were analyazed. The influence of tension and bending configuration, strip steel reinforcement characteristics, scale breading effect and tension leveller roll system structure on insert depth setting of beding roll was analyzed. This paper provides reference for process parameters setting on tension leveling.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
张 亮 ，陈 兵 ，付 光 ，舒建华，林海海. 冷轧拉伸弯曲矫直机工艺参数设定影响因素研究[J]. , 2014, 31(6): 5-8.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 水钢预应力钢绞线SWRH82B钢的冶炼工艺
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: XIE Xiang,HU You- hong,WANG Jie,WANG Lin- song,ZHENG Jia- liang,GAO Chang- yi
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 水城钢铁集团公司，贵州六盘水553028
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 水城钢铁集团公司根据GB/T24238- 2009质量标准和用户使用要求，确立了预应力钢绞线SWRH82B钢的内控成分（质量分数）：w(C)=0.79%～0.84%、w(Si)=0.15%～0.30%、w(Mn)=0.60%～0.90%、w(P)≤0.025%、w(S)≤0.015%、w(Cr)=0.25%～0.27%。采用高炉铁水→100 t顶底复吹转炉冶炼→LF炉精炼→150 mm×150 mm方坯连铸的工艺流程生产SWRH82B方坯，用于轧制SWRH82B盘条。采用的质量控制方法有：（1）采用含铝量低的合金脱氧，减少钢中的Al2O3夹杂物含量；（2）采用低氮增碳剂、低氮铁合金对钢水进行脱氧合金化，LF炉采用微正压操作，造好泡沫渣，埋弧精炼，连铸采用全封闭保护钢水浇注，使成品钢中的氮质量分数降到40×10-6以内；（3）将中间包钢水过热度控制在15～30 ℃，结晶器电磁搅拌频率5 Hz、电流320 A，铸坯拉速（1.73±0.02） m/min，二冷段气雾冷却比水量0.62 L/kg，将铸坯中心各种缺陷级别之和控制在3级以内。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Steelmaking technology of SWRH82B for prestressed steel strand in Shuigang
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：To meet the GB/T24238- 2009 standard and user′s requirements,the controlled chemical composition of SWRH82B wire rod used for prestressed steel strand was designed as w(C)=0.79%～0.84%、w(Si)=0.15%～0.30%、w(Mn)=0.60%～090%、w(P)≤0.025%、w(S)≤0.015%、w(Cr)=0.25%～0.27% in Shuigang.This steel billet was produced by the process of blast furnace hot metal and scrap → steelmaking in 100 t top and bottom combined blown converter → refining in ladle furnace → continuous casting to 150 mm×150 mm billet.Methods of its quality control were the followings: (1) alloys with low aluminum were used for deoxidation so as to reduce Al2O3 inclusion in steel;(2) carburant with low nitrogen was used for recarburization,alloys with low nitrogen was used for deoxidation and alloying，minute positive pressure was kept over ladle and arc was submerged in foamed slag in ladle furnace refining,molten steel was kept away from air in closed continuous casting,so as to keep nitrogen content in steel lower than 40×10-6;(3) the temperature of molten steel in tundish was 15-30 ℃ higher than liquidus temperature of SWRH82B,frequency and current of mould electromagnetic stirring was 5 Hz and 320 A respectively,billet drawing speed is(1.73±0.02) m/min,water quantity of air mist spray cooling at the secondary cooling zone in continuous casting was 0.62 litre /kg steel,so as to make the sum grade of various defects in center of billet smaller than 3.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
谢祥，胡友红，王劼，王琳松，郑家良，高长益. 水钢预应力钢绞线SWRH82B钢的冶炼工艺[J]. , 2017, 34(5): 67-71.
XIE Xiang,HU You- hong,WANG Jie,WANG Lin- song,ZHENG Jia- liang,GAO Chang- yi. Steelmaking technology of SWRH82B for prestressed steel strand in Shuigang. , 2017, 34(5): 67-71.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 冷轧工艺对CHRA5管材组织及力学性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: FANG Xudong1,2,LI Yang1,2,XIA Yan1,2,WANG Zhibin1,2,BAO Hansheng3
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.太原钢铁集团有限公司先进不锈钢材料国家重点实验室，山西太原030003
2.山西太钢不锈钢股份有限公司技术中心，山西太原030003
3.中国钢研科技集团有限公司，北京100081
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 研究了冷轧工艺对CHRA5管材组织及力学性能的影响。结果表明：随着冷轧变形量的增加，冷态钢管的等轴晶粒沿着主变形的方向被拉长的效果越来越明显，逐渐形成纤维组织，其室温抗拉强度和屈服强度提高，伸长率下降；强度提高和塑性下降主要集中在冷轧开始变形量小于10%的阶段；随着变形量的增大，固溶后的平均晶粒尺寸缓慢减小，抗拉强度、屈服强度和伸长率变化不大。冷轧时Q值为0.85时钢管表面出现了大量微裂纹，Q值为1.28时钢管端部纵向开裂，Q值为1.00时钢管表面良好；Q值在试验范围内对管材力学性能影响不大。CHRA5合金锅炉管冷轧时应尽量调整Q值接近1。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of cold rolling process on microstructure and mechanical properties of CHRA5 tubes
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The influence of cold rolling process on the microstructure and mechanical properties of CHRA5 pipe was studied.The results showed that with increasing of cold reduction,the effect of elongated at the direction of equiaxed grains of cold steel along the main deformation was more and more obvious,and formed fibrous tissue gradually.Therefore,its yield strength and tensile strength were increased,the elongation was decreased.The strength increasing and plasticity decreasing were mainly occured at the beginning of the cold rolling(less than 10% reduction).With the increasing of reduction,the average grain size of the piece after solid solution was decreased slowly,the tensile strength,yield strength and elongation was changed little.When the Q value was 0.85,the surface of the pice had a large number of microcracks.When the Q value was 1.28,the end part of the steel pipe had crack.When the Q value was 1.00,the piece surface was good.The influence of Q value on the mechanical properties was small in the experimental range.The Q value of CHRA5 alloy tube should be as adjust close to 1 in industrial production.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
方旭东 ，李阳 ，夏焱 ，王志斌 ，包汉生. 冷轧工艺对CHRA5管材组织及力学性能的影响[J]. , 2017, 34(6): 38-41.
FANG Xudong,,LI Yang,,XIA Yan,,WANG Zhibin,,BAO Hansheng. Effect of cold rolling process on microstructure and mechanical properties of CHRA5 tubes. , 2017, 34(6): 38-41.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 连退工艺对烘烤硬化钢CR180B2力学性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 本钢产品研究院，辽宁本溪117000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过连续退火模拟试验，研究了连退工艺参数对烘烤硬化钢CR180B2力学性能的影响，进而对连退工艺进行了优化。结果表明：随着退火温度的提高，试验钢的强度下降，伸长率、n值、r-以及BH值有所提高；随着缓冷温度的提高，试验钢的强度下降，伸长率和r-增加，n值几乎没有变化，而BH值显著增加；随着快冷冷速的增加，试验钢BH值逐渐增加。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Influence of continuous annealing process on mechanical properties of bake-hardening steel CR180B2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Influence of continuous annealing process on mechanical properties of CR180B2 steel was studied by continuous annealing simulator.The continuous annealing process was optimized and further verified by the production test results.The results indicated that the tensile and yield strength were decreased,the elongation,the n value,the r- value and BH value were increased with the increasing of annealing temperature.The strength was decreased,the elongation and the r- value were increased,the n value was unchanged and the BH value was increased significantly with the increasing of slow cooling temperature.The BH value was increased with the increasing of the cooling rate.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李春诚，李霞. 连退工艺对烘烤硬化钢CR180B2力学性能的影响[J]. , 2017, 34(4): 26-29.
LI Chun-cheng，LI Xia. Influence of continuous annealing process on mechanical properties of bake-hardening steel CR180B2. , 2017, 34(4): 26-29.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIN Tian-zia,LIU Mingb,HOU Hua-xinga,ZHAO Taoa,YANG Yinga,ZHANG Zhea
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
鞍钢股份有限公司，a.技术中心
b.产品发展部，辽宁鞍山114009
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 随着耗能减震技术在高层及超高层钢结构建筑抗震设计中的应用，用于制作减震耗能结构的低屈服强度钢日益受到重视。本文介绍了鞍钢屈服强度100～225 MPa级别抗震软钢的化学成分设计、生产工艺，以及实物力学性能、焊接性能及应用性能。结果表明：鞍钢生产的低屈服点钢具有低屈服强度、窄屈服范围以及优良的冲击、焊接及良好的抗震耗能性能，完全满足抗震设计的需求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development and production of low yield point steel used for earthquake resistant in Angang
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：With the application of energy dissipation technology in earthquake resistant design of high-rise and super high-rise steel structures,the low yield strength steel used in the manufacture of energy dissipation structures has been paid more and more attention.In this paper,the chemical composition design,process technology,mechanical properties,welding performance and application performance of the earthquake resistant steel with 100-225 MPa yield strength were introduced.The results show that the low yield point steel developed by Angang has low yield strength,narrow yield range and excellent properties of impact,welding and energy dissipation,and it can fully meet the requirements for earthquake resistant design of buildings.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
林田子 ，刘明 ，侯华兴 ，张涛 ，杨颖，张哲. 鞍钢抗震用低屈服点软钢的开发与生产[J]. , 2017, 34(4): 12-15.
LIN Tian-zia,LIU Mingb,HOU Hua-xinga,ZHAO Taoa,YANG Yinga,ZHANG Zhea. Development and production of low yield point steel used for earthquake resistant in Angang. , 2017, 34(4): 12-15.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: YE Xiao-yu1, ZHANG Kai-hua1, WENG Jian-jun2, WANG Hai-yun2, ZOU Xiao-bo2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1. 攀钢集团研究院有限公司, 四川 成都 611731
2. 攀钢集团西昌钢钒有限公司, 四川 西昌 615000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过热模拟实验, 研究了加热温度、变形温度、变形量、冷却速率和卷取温度对高Nb含量管线钢钢板组织性能的影响, 并确定了工业生产方案。工业试制结果表明: 在1 170~1 200 ℃进行加热保温, 粗轧温度控制在1 020 ℃以上, 变形量控制在30%以上, 精轧入口温度不大于950 ℃, 终轧温度控制在(800±20) ℃, 冷却速率控制在10～30 ℃/s, 卷取温度控制在500～530 ℃, 生产的高Nb含量X80管线钢钢板组织为均匀的针状铁素体, 力学性能优良, ?20、?40 ℃低温冲击功均达到300 J以上, ?15 ℃落锤撕裂试样的剪切面积达到97%以上。
keywords_cn: X80管线钢，轧制工艺，组织，性能
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effects of rolling processes on microstructures and properties of X80 grade pipeline steel with high Nb content
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Through the thermal simulation experiment, the influences of heating and deformation temperature, reduction, cooling rate and coiling temperature on the microstructure and properties of high Nb content X80 pipe line steel plate were studies, and the industrial production schemes were designed. Industrial trial results show that the heating temperature is controlled at 1 170?1 200 ℃, the roughing rolling temperature is controlled at 1 020 ℃, the amount of deformation is controlled above 30%, the finishing start rolling temperature is controlled above 950 ℃, the final rolling temperature is controlled within (800 ±20) ℃, the cooling rate is controlled within 10?30 ℃ /s and the coiling temperature is controlled at 500?530 ℃. Based on it, the microstructure of high Nb content X80 pipeline steel plate is the needle like iron uniform ferrite, and the excellent mechanical properties of plate are obtained. Meanwhile, the impact energy values at ?20、?40℃ are reached above 300 J, and shear area at ?15 ℃ of DWTT specimen is achieved above 97%.
keywords_en: X80 grade pipeline steel, rolling process, microstructure, property

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WU Bing-sheng, ZHANG Zi-bo, WANG Zi-long
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 河北工程大学机电学院, 河北 邯郸 056038
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 本文针对邯郸钢铁公司CSP线轧机的振动问题, 从轧机调速控制系统入手, 对轧机同步电机的速度控制进行了改进, 在传统PID控制基础上运用遗传算法进行基于二进制编码的PID参数整定; 应用盲源分离方法对基于常规 PID 控制和基于二进制编码遗传算法的PID参数整定的电机振动信号进行了分离和功率谱分析, 对两种控制器的性能进行了比较, 并验证了基于二进制编码遗传算法的PID参数整定后电机的稳定性。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Studies on mill vibration with genetic algorithm PID control based on the binary-coded
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the mill vibration problem of CSP line of Handan Iron and Steel Co., Ltd., the speed control of the mill synchronous motor was improved and PID parameters were set by using the genetic algorithm and binary coding based on the traditional PID control and mill drive control system. Application of blind source separation methods for conventional PID control and the PID parameters based on binary coded genetic algorithm tuning, the motor vibration signal was separated and power spectrum was analyzed. The performance of the two controllers were compared, and the stability of motor after parameters setting was verified.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The structure of entry vertical looper and strip deflection problem of continuous annealing line in Xinyu Iron & Steel Group Co., Ltd. were introduced. According to the level data of two roller sides and gap difference between two turning roller ends and the vertical steel wires, the primary cause of strip deflection was confirmed, which was the movable carriage tilt and deviation. http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.武钢研究院，湖北武汉430080
2.东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点试验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research and application of oxide scale control technology in rolling process
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on the basic research of oxide scale formation mechanism and different typical defects on the strip surface,the influencing factors of oxide scale formation associated with different structure and thickness were analyzed in detail.Aimed at three kinds typical oxidation layer,i.e.α-Fe+Fe3O4,FeO and fine Fe3O4/Fe2O3,the structure and thickness control method were obtained.At the same time,the influence of finishing roll roughness on the strip surface quality and subsequent painting quality were studied.The research results were applied to the actual production,the surface free treatment steel,easy-pickling steel and the scale direct hydrogen reduction annealing hot galvanizing products,abbreviated to DRG steel，had been developed out.Free treatment products includes free-pickling steel and free-blasting steel,which were used in the manufacture of heavy truck bearing frame and container side panel respectively.Easy-pickling steel process can significantly reduce hydrochloric acid consumption,improve production efficiency and quality of pickling.The DRG steel process was applied in hot galvanizing production line,using hydrogen direct reduction method to manufacture qualified zinc-coating products,the pickling process was canceled.These technologies and products contained new ideas of flexible manufacturing,reduced the environment pollution and the manufacturing cost.The technical route of the oxide layer control and application were formed.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1. 北京京诚凤凰工业炉工程技术有限公司，北京100176
2. 东北大学材料与冶金学院，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 以某钢厂的一座步进梁式加热炉为例，建立了钢坯与垫块的热传导模型、CF法模型和考虑水管遮蔽作用的二维段法模型。采用有限差分法模拟计算了不同条件下钢坯和垫块温度场及钢坯黑印温差随时间的变化；分析了水梁遮蔽、垫块传导对黑印温差的影响；提出了收得热流（非净热流）修正系数的概念，解决了段法和CF法的衔接问题。模拟结果为确定在线模型估算黑印温差简化算法提供了依据。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Numerical Simulation of Skid Mark Considering Shelter Effection
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on a walking beam reheating furnace, the models of heat conductivity of skid, CFmethod and zone method with the consideration of water beam with shielding effect were built in this paper. Using finite difference method, the temperature map of slab and skid under difference conditions were simulated and calculated. The influence of the shelter of beam and the conductivity of skid were analysed. The definition of received heat flux (non-net heat flux) coefficient was given which is a way of solving the problem in connection between the zone method and CFmethod. The conclusions of this paper can offer evidence of estimating the temperature of skid-mark in on-line model of furnace.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
肖楠 ，陈海耿，胡文超，江华. 考虑遮蔽作用的钢坯水梁黑印数值模拟[J]. , 2014, 31(3): 31-35.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Under different coiling temperature,the effects of adding boron element on the mechanical properties and aging properties of hot rolled SPHC strip were studied.The results showed that adding 20×10-6 boron element and increasing the coiling temperature to 700 ℃ for the low carbon Alkilled steel,the yield strength of strip reduced about 20 MPa effectively while its tensile strength staying the same,thus the yield strength ratio was reduced to 0.64 or so,the deep drawing performance was improved.At the same time,the addition of boron elements can effectively improved the aging properties of low carbon Alkilled steel.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶南方工程技术有限公司， 湖北武汉430223
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 设计了一种新型碎边剪，分析了刀盘在刀轴上的几种安装方式及安装方式对刀片侧间隙调整的影响。根据设计结构，推导出了侧间隙调整数学模型，为剪刃侧间隙调整机构自动化奠定了基础。对新机型与旧机型进行了对比分析，便于剪切设备的选型。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.中科钢研节能科技有限公司，北京100081
2.达涅利冶金设备北京有限公司 技术部，北京100176
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 钢卷小车是冷轧带钢生产中的重要辅助设备。通过对小车工作原理的分析研究，对比了常用的两种形式小车的优缺点；针对生产线的生产能力，车间布局和客户提出的要求，依据小车的主要参数，对小车进行了结构分析、运动分析、设计计算，结构改造以及关键部位的校核计算。同时，针对小车在实际生产中出现的问题，特别是当采用V形鞍座时出现的鞍座变形问题，通过INVENTOR软件，建立了三维模型，并进行了受力分析，分析了成因，并提出最终解决方案。另外，当鞍座采用辊子形式的时候，由于液压缸的压力过大，容易造成开卷机心轴的变形，针对这个问题，也提出了解决方案，并运用到实际生产中。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: The design of a coil car body and problem solution of its saddle
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Coil car is an important auxiliary equipment in cold strip rolling.Through analysis of the working principle of coil car,the advantages and disadvantages of two types of car were compared.In view of the production capacity of the rolling line,workshop layout and requirement of customers,the structural analysis,motion analysis,design calculations,structural transformation and the key parts checking calculation were carried out.Meanwhile,for the problems of coil car ued in production,particularly when the saddle deformation occurs when using Vshaped saddle,the 3D model by INVENTOR software was established,and the force analysis was carried out to looking for the formation reasons, and a final resolved method was put forward.In addition,when using a roller saddle,because of the large cylinder pressure,deformation of the unwinding movement axes likely caused.For this problem,the resolved methods also put forward.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘囡南，苗燕，仲鹏. 一种钢卷小车车体的设计及其鞍座问题的解决[J]. , 2017, 34(6): 56-58.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIU Hai- yun, WANG Wen- zhong, GAO Wen- hua, GAO Yang, WANG Xin- peng, L Yan- sheng
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司钢轧作业部，河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 大型常规薄板热轧生产线主电机的支撑轴承多采用静压滑动轴承型式。所谓静压滑动轴承是相对于动压滑动轴承而言，是指滑动轴承下轴瓦底部引入一路高压润滑油，进而在电机静止状态下建立一个静压油隙。电机各轴承的高压润滑油油隙的测试与调整，是检测轴承功能精度、保证电机轴承可靠稳定运行必不可少的工作，通过对直联轴传动模式的粗轧电机转轴的受力分析，提出了此传动模式下电机转轴的弯曲概念，进而提出了电机轴承油隙测试的新方法。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Shaft bending analysis of main motor of hot rolling roughing mill and a new test method for motor bearing oil gap
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The most of bearings of main motors of conventional hot thin strip rolling line are sliding bearing with static pressure.The static pressure sliding bearing what is called is against the dynamic pressure sliding bearing.It is introduced at the bottom a high pressure lubricating oil to establish a hydrostatic oil gap when the motor in static state for these static bearings.For such large motor,the measure and adjustment of bearing oil gap is a necessary work for detecting the bearing function and accuracy,to ensure the motor bearing reliable and stable operation.The concept of bending of motor shaft based on stress analysis of direct connect to spindle drive mode rough mill motor shaft was put forward,and a new test method for this type of motors bearing oil gap was given.
keywords_en: Key word: rough mill main motor
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘海云，王文忠，高文华，高扬，王新鹏，吕燕生. 热轧粗轧主电机轴弯曲分析及其轴承油隙测试新方法[J]. , 2018, 35(6): 70-73.
LIU Hai- yun, WANG Wen- zhong, GAO Wen- hua, GAO Yang, WANG Xin- peng, L Yan- sheng. Shaft bending analysis of main motor of hot rolling roughing mill and a new test method for motor bearing oil gap. , 2018, 35(6): 70-73.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了调质热处理带钢的发展情况，分析了国内外调质热处理带钢在生产技术和原料供给两方面的差异。指出了作为中间产品的调质热处理带钢对下游深加工产品的影响。预测出这种专业化较强的技术，在不久的将来将有较大的发展空间。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 铁素体不锈钢表面皱折及其评价方法
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: ZHANG Xiang-jun1a，LIU Zhen-yu1a，GAO Fei1b，SONG Xian-lin2，WANG Wei-na2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.东北大学,a.轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室
b.材料科学与工程学院，辽宁沈阳110819
2.中国石油集团东北炼化工程有限公司吉林机械制造分公司，吉林吉林132021
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 皱折缺陷是中铬铁素体不锈钢发生较大塑性变形后容易出现的表面缺陷。这种缺陷往往破坏了不锈钢制品的外观，因此需要对制品进行研磨和抛光以消除皱折的影响。然而，额外的加工工序大幅增加了企业的生产成本，同时不可避免地造成了环境污染。那么，正确认识和评价铁素体不锈钢的表面皱折缺陷就显得非常重要。本文主要讨论界定铁素体不锈钢表面皱折缺陷，并简要介绍表面皱折缺陷的形成原因，进而厘清表面皱折缺陷的评价参数，最后针对已有测试方法存在的问题提出可供参考的解决办法。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Ridging of ferritic stainless steel and its evaluation
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The ferritic stainless steel (FSS) sheet （w（Cr）=16%-21%） is known to develop an undesirable surface corrugation known as ridging during severe plastic deformation.The appearance of stainless steel poducts is seriously damaged by those ridges.In order to remove the defect,all the products must be further honed and polished additionally. The additional procedure increases costs for downstream industries,and causes environment pollution inevitably. Therefore,it is very important to correctly understand and evaluate the ridging of ferritic stainless steel.This paper mainly discussed and defined the ridging of ferritic stainless steel,further clarified necessary parameters for evaluation. In the end,an effective ridging test method for reference was proposed in view of existence problems in commonly used methods.

ZHANG Xiang-juna，LIU Zhen-yua，GAO Feib，SONG Xian-lin，WANG Wei-na. Ridging of ferritic stainless steel and its evaluation. , 2017, 34(4): 66-70.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: PAN Hui1,2,WANG Zhao-dong1,ZHOU Na3,HUI Ya-jun2,WU Ke-min3, DENG Xiang-tao1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
2.首钢技术研究院薄板研究所，北京100043
3.首钢迁安钢铁有限责任公司技术质量部，河北迁安064400
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 对Ti微合金化700 MPa级高强钢钢卷头、中、尾部力学性能、金相组织及析出物进行了研究。结果表明：钢卷头、中、尾部力学性能波动的主要原因是钢卷内外圈析出强化效果不同而导致的。为此，在生产薄规格Ti微合金化700 MPa级高强钢时，采用U形冷却工艺，将钢卷最内圈15 m内的带钢卷取温度提高15～20 ℃，将最外圈15 m内的带钢卷取温度提高10～15 ℃，可使钢卷最内圈强度提高约40 MPa，钢卷最外圈强度提高约20 MPa，有效改善了带钢通卷性能均匀性，提高了通卷性能合格率。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on the performance uniformity of 700 MPa grade Ti-microalloying high strength steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The mechanical properties,microstructure and precipitates of the head,middle and tail of 700 MPa grade Ti microalloying high strength steel coil were studied.The results showed that the main reason of mechanical properties fluctuation in the head,middle and tail of coil was the difference of precipitation strengthening.So,the U-shaped cooling process was used in the production of thin gauge 700 MPa grade Ti microalloyed high strength steel,the temperature was increased 15—20 ℃ within 15 meters of the inner coil and the temperature increased 10—15 ℃ within 15 meters of the outer coil.The tensile strength of the inner coil was increased about 40 MPa and the tensile strength of the outer coil increased about 20 MPa.The uniformity and the pass rate of mechanical performance of coil was improved effectively.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
潘辉 ，王昭东，周娜，惠亚军，吴科敏，邓想涛. Ti微合金化700 MPa级高强钢性能均匀性研究[J]. , 2017, 34(2): 7-9.
PAN Hui,,WANG Zhao-dong,ZHOU Na,HUI Ya-jun,WU Ke-min, DENG Xiang-tao. Research on the performance uniformity of 700 MPa grade Ti-microalloying high strength steel. , 2017, 34(2): 7-9.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 高质量中厚板生产关键共性技术研发现状和前景
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 中厚板是重要的钢铁材料品种，在国民经济建设、人民生活、国家安全等方面具有不可替代的作用。中厚板行业必须进行包括原料炼铁炼钢连铸热轧热处理全流程、一体化的智能化、绿色化改造升级，大力进行技术创新，攻克一批关键共性技术，如中厚板生产全过程的组织调控技术、固相复合与增材制造、中厚板生产过程的智能制造技术等，才能使常规热轧中厚板实现升级换代，迈向世界“第一”，成为世界“唯一”。我国中厚板行业要着力开发中厚板生产新技术、新工艺、新装备、新产品，掌握核心竞争力，才能成为 “工艺绿色化、装备智能化、产品高质化、供给服务化”的全球领跑者，为我国中厚板行业成为世界领先的钢铁工业集群做出贡献。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Status and prospects of research and development of key common technologies for highquality heavy and medium plate production
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Heavy and medium plate is an important steel material variety,which plays an irreplaceable role in national economic construction,people′s life and national security.The heavy and medium plate industry must carry out the whole process of raw materialironmakingsteelmakingcontinuous castinghot rollingheat treatment,integrated intelligent and green transformation and upgrading,and vigorously carry out technological innovation,overcome a number of key common technologies,such as the organization and control technology,the solid phase compounding and additive manufacturing and the intelligent manufacturing technology of the plate production process.Based on these,the conventional plate could be upgrade to become the No.1 and only one in the world.Chinese heavy and medium plate industry should focus on the development of new technologies,new processes,new equipment and new products for the production of plate,and master the core competitiveness,in order to become the global leader of "green technology,intelligent equipment,high quality products,supply and service",and has contributed to Chinese heavy and medium plate industry becoming the world′s leading steel industry cluster.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
王国栋. 高质量中厚板生产关键共性技术研发现状和前景[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(1): 1-8.
WANG Guo dong. Status and prospects of research and development of key common technologies for highquality heavy and medium plate production. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(1): 1-8.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 酸洗工艺对热轧酸洗板表面质量影响机理研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIN Fei1,WANG Chunfeng2,LI Zhifeng1,XIN Xiaobing2,CAO Guangming1,LIU Zhenyu1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819；
2.河钢集团唐钢公司技术中心，河北唐山063009
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 采用现场酸洗工艺研究了热轧SPHC钢的酸洗行为及机理。结果表明，酸洗后试样表面明暗程度与粗糙度有关；在酸液温度65 ℃、酸液浓度170 g/L条件下，酸洗速度的提高改善了酸洗效果，最佳酸洗速度为120 m/min；在酸液温度65 ℃、酸洗速度120 m/min条件下，提高酸洗浓度至220 g/L，基体界面平直度恶化，造成“过酸洗”；在酸液浓度170 g/L、酸洗速度120 m/min时，提高酸液温度至80 ℃，出现“过酸洗”现象；平整、开卷过程造成的氧化铁皮微裂纹对酸洗过程产生良好的推进作用。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study on the effect mechanism of pickling process on surface quality of hot rolled pickling plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Pickling behaviors and mechanism of hot rolled pickling plate SPHC were investigated by simulating pickling conditions in site production in this paper.The results show that brightness of surface of sample after pickling is related to its surface roughness.Under the condition of the acid temperature of 65 ℃ and acid concentration of 170 g/L,pickling quality is improved by increasing pickling speed with the optimum pickling speed of 120 m/min.Straightness of interface deteriorated obviously when acid concentration is increased to 220 g/L with acid temperature of 65 ℃ and pickling speed of 120 m/min,resulting in overpickling.When acid concentration is 170 g/L and acid washing rate is 120 m/min,and acid temperature is increased to 80 ℃,phenomenon of overpickling can be observed.Microcracks of oxide scale caused by process of leveling and unwinding have a promoting effect on pickling.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
林飞，王春峰，李志峰，信晓兵，曹光明，刘振宇. 酸洗工艺对热轧酸洗板表面质量影响机理研究[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(2): 11-18.
LIN Fei,WANG Chunfeng,LI Zhifeng,XIN Xiaobing,CAO Guangming,LIU Zhenyu. Study on the effect mechanism of pickling process on surface quality of hot rolled pickling plate. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(2): 11-18.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热轧定宽机减宽过程对板坯质量的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 攀钢集团西昌钢钒有限公司，四川西昌615000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 定宽机是热轧带钢生产线的重要设备，其作用是增大热轧工序板坯减宽量，从而采用相同宽度的板坯可以生产不同宽度的产品，提高连铸工序生产效率。在定宽过程中，板坯会产生镰刀弯、头部翘曲、头尾失宽、起拱等质量缺陷，影响后续轧制过程的稳定性。通过采用DEFORM3D平台进行有限元模型仿真计算，确定了保持板形质量良好条件下的最大减宽量，研究了定宽工艺对头尾失宽量和定宽机设备参数对板坯锻后形状的影响规律。将研究结果应用于生产，避免了减宽过程中板坯缺陷的产生。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Pangang Group Xichang Steel Vanadium Co.,Ltd.,Xichang 615000,China
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：A slab sizing press is an important equipment for hot rolled strip production line，whoes function is to increase the width reduction of slab in hot rolling process，so that using the same width of slab can produce different width products and improve the production efficiency of continuous casting process.In the width reducing process,quality defects of slab, such as camber,head warping,head and tail width loss and arch lifting will be occured,which will affect the stability of subsequent rolling process.Therefore,the finite element method was applied by using DEFORM3D platform to determine the maximum width reduction under the condition of good shape and quality of slab,and the influence law of the width loss of the head and tail and the equipment parameters of the slab sizing press on the shape of slab after forging were studied.Based on it,the slab defects were avoided during slab size pressing.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
吴林. 热轧定宽机减宽过程对板坯质量的影响[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(4): 25-30.
WU Lin. Pangang Group Xichang Steel Vanadium Co.,Ltd.,Xichang 615000,China. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(4): 25-30.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 乳化液斑迹是冷轧带钢常见的一种质量缺陷，某机组在生产DP钢过程中发生批量乳化液锈斑缺陷，给产品质量控制带来很大影响。通过分析乳化液吹扫装置原理和现场试验调整，最终找出影响吹扫质量的因素。对吹扫装置进行改进并在调整和维护上加强管理后，带钢表面质量得到了良好控制。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 大盘圆生产线卷取机组设备由卷取机前喂料装置和盘圆卷取机组成，两套设备的共同协调工作完成了卷取收集。为了选择合理的参数控制、解决高速棒材对喂料装置的冲击、解决卷取机芯棒遇高温而发生弯曲、避免预弯机出口处堆钢等问题，设计人员在充分研究大盘卷卷取理论知识和卷取机组设备结构的基础上，对该区域设备进行了优化改造，解决了上述问题。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The coiler unit of large coil production line consists of the feeding device and the coiler,coiling and collection process are completed by working together of two equipments.In order to choose the reasonable control parameters,solve the shock effect to feeding device of high speed bar,solve the bending of coiler mandrel in high temperature environment of coiling,avoid steel- heaping accidents at the outlet of pre- bending machine,based on the sufficient study and analysis of coiling process and theory of large coil and equipment structure of coiler unit,the equipment of coiler unit were optimized and reformed.Furthermore,the effects of these problems can be solved.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 安阳钢铁股份有限公司
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对安阳钢铁股份有限公司Φ４００ｍｍ 机组生产的镀锌角钢酸洗质量差的问题，结合氧化铁皮生成理论和现场实际情况，分析了轧制工艺对热轧角钢表面氧化铁皮的影响，提出了改进加热炉温度制度和时间制度、新增高压水除鳞设备、增设精轧冷却水喷雾装置和冷床冷却水喷雾冷却装置与强制风冷装置等措施，使镀锌角钢酸洗质量合格率由８５．０％提高到９９．７％。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 山东理工大学机械工程学院
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 结合双辊薄带连铸中结晶辊装配、修磨和浇注等环节的整体要求，采用弹塑性大变形接触非线性有限元方法，建立了计算结晶辊热辊型的有限元模型，并分析了结晶辊的受力和变形，得出了浇注过程中结晶辊的辊面形状曲线，利用实测的铸带断面形状对计算结果进行了检验，结果表明该方法用于计算结晶辊变形非常有效，可以利用该方法进行结晶辊结构改进和初始辊型设计。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 邯钢３５００mm热轧板坯升温过程温度应力场仿真研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 西安科技大学能源学院
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn:
为提高中厚板坯加热效率和防止出现热应力裂纹，本文在热弹塑性分析理论基础上，采用有限元方
法，建立了邯钢３５００ｍｍ 板坯加热过程分析模型，研究了中厚板坯加热过程中全时域内热应力场变化规律，并优化了中厚板坯加热工艺，提高了板坯加热质量。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of hot rolled banded structure on microstructure and properties of cold rolled dualphase steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of the change of the band structure at different coiling temperatures of hot rolling on the microstructure and properties of cold rolled continuous annealing dualphase steel were studied.The influence of the heritability of hot rolled microstructure on the martensite structure after continuous annealing was analyzed.The effect of dispersed martensite and continuous distribution martensite on the mechanical properties of the finished product was researched.The results show that the coiling temperature of hot rolling is 550 °C,the banded structure is improved compared with the structure at other coiling temperatures,and the martensite is relatively dispersed.The dispersed martensite has better plasticity index than the continuously distributed one.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 快速冷却水系统的动态平衡控制与优化
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 山东钢铁股份有限公司济南分公司宽厚板厂，山东济南250101
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对某厂4300mm宽厚板生产线水处理系统供水泵低水位不供水、回水提升泵组高压电机频繁烧损的问题，通过分析水系统工作原理，认为供水池和回水池容积不能充分利用，机动容积不足造成水系统动态不平衡是问题产生的根本原因。为此，采用同步排吸透平技术并对快冷水系统过程动态平衡的构建和优化，供水泵组实现了-1. 2m最低机动水位10s内启泵；提升泵组启停频次大幅降低，运行良好；同时，设计池容得到充分挖掘利用，实现了需水、供水和回水的动态平衡和工序间的能力匹配，有效解决了供水泵组低水位启泵不供水问题和提升泵组频繁损坏问题。
keywords_cn: 快速冷却 水系统 动态平衡 控制优化
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Homeostasis Controlling and Optimizing of Water-system of Accelerated Control Cooling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of problems of water system used in a 4300mm heavy plate production line, such as no water of supply water pump at low water level, frequent burning of high voltage motor of back water pump, the work principle of water system was analyzed. It found out the main reasons were that water supply pool and return water pool volumes no fully used and mobile volume lack of water caused water system dynamic unbalance . Therefore, using synchronous suction turbine technology and construction and optimization of the dynamic process of fast cooling water system balance, water pump group starting pump was within 10s at -1. 2m minimum water level,pump group start-stop frequency were greatly reduced. At the same time, the pool volumes were fully used, the matching ability of water demand, water supply and return was realized. The problems were effectively solved.
keywords_en: accelerated control cooling water-system Homeostasis controlling and optimizing
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
马 朝 刚. 快速冷却水系统的动态平衡控制与优化[J]. , 2013, 30(5): 66-69.
MA Chao-gang. Homeostasis Controlling and Optimizing of Water-system of Accelerated Control Cooling. , 2013, 30(5): 66-69.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 湖南华菱涟源钢铁有限公司，湖南娄底417009
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 研究了不同成分体系含P高强IF钢在罩式退火条件下的析出物、组织与性能差异。结果表明，微合金元素Nb和Ti是影响试验钢析出物、组织和性能的关键因素。添加Ti的Ti- HIF和Nb+Ti- HIF两种成分体系的试验钢FeTiP析出物数量多，r值较差；添加Nb可以细化钢板组织，使钢板析出强化、细晶强化、固溶强化效果更显著，有利于提高抗拉强度；Nb- HIF成分体系试验钢性能最优，适合罩式退火工艺条件下生产。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Microstructures and properties of high strength IF steels with different chemical compositions by batch annealing process
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The precipitation,microstructure and property of high strength IF steels with phosphorus of various chemical compositions by batch annealing process were studied.The results indicate that the micro- alloy elements of Nb and Ti are the key factors influenced the precipitation,microstructure and property of tested steel,more precipitation of FeTiP occurred on the tested steels of Ti- HIF and Nb+Ti- HIF chemistry with poor r value.The addition of Nb may refine the steel microstructure to significantly enhance the effectiveness of precipitation hardening,fine- grain strengthening and solution strengthening,in favoring of improving the tensile strength of steel.The optimal property with Nb- HIF chemistry can be achieved by batch annealing process.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 钽管热交换器在超高强钢酸洗中的应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 宝钢日铁汽车板有限公司，上海200941
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对基于NbTi微合金化超高强钢热轧原板添加Nb、Ti、Si、Mn、Cr等合金元素，酸洗时与盐酸反应产生难溶物，容易堵塞循环系统，影响酸洗效率的问题，通过对流传热阻垢试验研究了石墨管与钽管的传热与结垢性能。根据试验结果以及热交换器工艺参数，设计了钽管换热器的换热面积，替换了原有的石墨换热器。结果表明，钽合金换热器流动特性和传热性能有所提高,阻垢性能优越，能延长结垢周期，提高酸洗机组的生产效率。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Application of tantalum tube heat exchanger in pickling for ultrahigh strength steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of easy blocking circulation system and affect the efficiency of acid pickling for ultra high strength automobile plate (UTSS)based on NbTi microalloyed high strength steel hot rolled plate with Nb,Ti,Si,Mn,Cr alloy elements which reacts with hydrochloric acid during pickling to produce poorly soluble substances,the heat transfer performance and fouling of graphite tube and tantalum tube were studied by the convection heat transfer scale experimental.According to the test results as well as the heat exchanger process parameters,the tantalum tube heat exchanger heat transfer area was designed to replace the original graphite heat exchanger.The production results show that the flow characteristics and heat transfer performance of the surface tantalum alloy heat exchanger are improved, and prolong the fouling period to increase productivity of pickling unit.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 第3代先进高强度钢AHSS汽车板的开发
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LI Guangying1,WANG Li2,MA Mingtu3,ZHANG Jian4,ZHANG Yisheng5,LUO Rong1#br#
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.中国钢研科技集团有限公司钢铁研究总院，北京100081； 2.宝钢集团中央研究院，上海200941；
3.中国汽车工程研究院，重庆401122； 4.马钢集团科技管理部，安徽马鞍山243003；
5.华中科技大学材料学院，湖北武汉430074
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为满足汽车轻量化、节能减排和抗冲撞安全对高强塑性车身结构材料的需求，各国钢铁业与汽车业合作开发应用第3代先进高强度钢AHSS汽车板取得重要进展。由于金属晶体结构的本质特征，任何提高强度的方法均会导致其塑性的降低，因此第3代AHSS钢超高强度汽车板的开发，面临着金属晶体材料强塑化机理的难题：在大幅度提高汽车板强度的同时如何获得必要的塑性延伸能力及其相应的显微组织？以抗拉强度TS 1 000~1 500 MPa级超高强度汽车板在强塑化机理研究方面取得的两次突破性进展为线索，讨论了第3代AHSS汽车板在淬火碳分配（QuenchingPartitioning）QP处理钢、非均质性纳米组织钢（Heterogeneous Nanostructure Steel）和高强塑性热成形钢（Ductile PressHardened Steel）在研究开发与生产应用方面的国际前沿进展。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development of 3rd generation advanced high strength steel for automotive
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：To meet the requirement of automotive on weightlightening,energysaving,emissioncontrol and crashworthiness,the highstrengthductility materials for autobody structure are needed,and the 3rd generation of advanced high strength steel (AHSS) have been developed by automakers and steel industry in closed cooperation.Due to the native characteristics of metallic material in crystallographic structure,any method to increase its strength will inevitably lead to the decrease of ductility.Therefore the development of 3rd generation AHSS with ultrahighstrengthductility is facing the puzzle in the mechanism of synchronous strengtheningplasticizing in the steel.In the present paper,the important progresses in TS≥1 000-1 500 MPa grade ultrahighstrengthsteel of 3rd generation AHSS were introduced and discussed,including quenchingpartitioning steel,heterogeneous nanostructured steel and ductile presshardened steel.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李光瀛，王利，马鸣图，张建，张宜生，罗荣. 第3代先进高强度钢AHSS汽车板的开发[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(5): 1-.
LI Guangying,WANG Li,MA Mingtu,ZHANG Jian,ZHANG Yisheng,LUO Rong. Development of 3rd generation advanced high strength steel for automotive. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(5): 1-.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 轧辊表面砂轮印缺陷的改进
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 湖南华菱涟源钢铁有限公司技术中心，湖南娄底417009
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 轧辊磨削质量是影响热轧产品表面质量的首要因素，而轧辊表面最典型的缺陷为砂轮印缺陷，其导致热轧带钢表面产生条纹、色差等缺陷。对轧辊表面砂轮印缺陷进行了分析，其不仅与设备精度有关，而且与磨削工艺、砂轮操作等因素相关；为此，从辊型、磨削参数、设备精度方面进行优化，彻底消除了轧辊表面砂轮印缺陷，改善了热轧产品表面缺陷。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on improvement of grinding mark defect on roll surface
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Roll grinding quality is the primary factor affecting the surface quality of hot rolled products.The most typical defect on the roll surface is the grinding wheel mark defect,which causes defects such as streaks and chromatic aberration on the surface of hot rolled strip.The produced causes of grinding wheel mark defect was analyzed,which was not only related to the precision of the equipment,but also related to the grinding process and grinding wheel operation and other factors.Therefore,the roll shape,grinding parameters and equipment precision were optimized,the roll surface grinding defect was completely eliminated,and the surface quality of hot rolled products were improved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
黄建波，李冀. 轧辊表面砂轮印缺陷的改进[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(5): 90-.
HUANG Jianbo，LI Ji. Research on improvement of grinding mark defect on roll surface. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(5): 90-.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热连轧新品种新规格首卷钢尺寸精度控制方法研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京首钢自动化信息技术有限公司传动事业部，北京100041
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对热连轧新品种新规格首卷钢尺寸精度差的问题，提出了一种用于提高新品种新规格首卷钢尺寸精度的方法。当轧制新品种新规格首卷钢时，在常规热连轧规程设定计算程序中增加了自动添加新钢种子程序和层别模型参数调整子程序的功能。在首钢京唐1 580 mm热连轧生产线粗轧机组进行了现场应用，结果表明：新品种新规格首卷钢的宽度命中率由89.96%提高到95.50%，达到了宽度控制精度要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study of the first coil size precision control for new steel grades or new specifications on hot strip mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：To solve the problem of the first coil′s poor size precision of new steel grades or new specifications on hot strip mill, an improved method was proposed. When the first coil of new steel grades or new specifications was rolled, two subroutines which add new steel grades automatically and hierarchy model parameters adjustment were increased in conventional scheduling set- up calculation. A field application was conducted on Shougang Jingtang 1 580 mm hot rolling production line roughing mills. The result showed that the first coil width hit rate of the new steel grades or new specifications rose from 89.96% up to 95.5%. The requirement of width control precision was reached.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
田野，李洁. 热连轧新品种新规格首卷钢尺寸精度控制方法研究[J]. , 2015, 32(4): 70-72.
TIAN Ye, LI Jie. Study of the first coil size precision control for new steel grades or new specifications on hot strip mill. , 2015, 32(4): 70-72.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: SPHC原卷边部黑线缺陷的分析与改善
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: YUAN Wei, LI Chuan, QIAN Zhen- mao, XU Xi- yi, ZENG Yan
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 武汉钢铁股份有限公司热轧总厂，湖北武汉430083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对用户提出的SPHC原卷边部黑线缺陷质量异议，分析了SPHC原卷产生边部黑线缺陷的原因。根据生产实际情况，通过调整粗轧立辊负荷等措施，控制了钢卷边部黑线缺陷距边部的距离，减轻了边部黑线缺陷的严重程度，满足了用户的使用要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis and improvement for the edge black line defect on SPHC coil
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on user′s complains about SPHC coil quality for its edge black line defect, the cause was initially analyzed. In accordance with the actual condition of General Hot Strip Mill of WISCO, the vertical roll reduction of roughing mill was adjusted to decrease the distance between black line and strip edge. And the above problem was resolved.
keywords_en: SP for rough mill vertical roller
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
袁伟，李传，钱震茂，徐希义，曾艳. SPHC原卷边部黑线缺陷的分析与改善[J]. , 2015, 32(5): 66-70.
YUAN Wei, LI Chuan, QIAN Zhen- mao, XU Xi- yi, ZENG Yan. Analysis and improvement for the edge black line defect on SPHC coil. , 2015, 32(5): 66-70.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 新工艺技术在大型棒材生产线上的应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 韶关钢铁股份有限公司
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了合金钢大方（圆）坯连铸技术、合金钢连铸坯热送热装技术、数字化加热炉控制技术、大型棒材轧机，以及大型棒材精整和热处理技术，这些技术的不断改善和应用既提高了大型棒材产品的质量和产量，又降低了大型棒材产品的生产成本。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 产品开发纵横谈
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中国钢铁工业协会
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对我国钢铁行业产能高，利润低而致力于产品开发的现状。本文介绍了我国铁路桥梁的技术进步和铁路桥梁用钢的开发，建筑钢结构的进步和建筑结构用系列高强度钢板的开发，天然气长输管线的进步和X80级管线钢板卷'厚板的开发3个案例，总结了成功的经验及存在的差距，指出跟上用户行业的技术发展，是钢铁企业产品开发永恒的主题。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 炉卷轧机层冷系统在线淬火工艺的开发与应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京科技大学高效轧制国家工程研究中心
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对南钢中厚板卷厂层流冷却装置下集管水流密度低、集管流量不可调节、热交换系数小、冷却效果差等问题，对冷却装置进行了改造。改造后可实现在线淬火功能，并开发了Q550、Q690、Q800等低碳高强钢板。结果表明，改进的层流冷却系统能够满足Q690、Q800高强钢在线淬火对冷却速率、温度均匀性和钢板板形的控制要求，且生产的钢板纵、横向力学性能均匀，组织细小。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热轧带钢轧制节奏的优化
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: PENG Wen1，JI Ya-feng1，LI Ying1，ZHANG Dian-hua1，ZHANG Li2，SUN Jian-min2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1. 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
2. 唐山国丰钢铁有限公司，河北唐山063300
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对热连轧窄带钢生产中由于精轧区轧区长度长、传统控制方式导致轧制节奏慢的问题，通过对两级自动化控制系统进行优化，设置双存储区，优化轧制规程发送时序和速度算法，解决了两块钢同时轧制的问题。唐山国丰钢铁有限公司620mm热连轧生产线据此改进后，小时产量由原先的55块提高到了72块，大大缩短了生产周期，提高了产能。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Optimization and Applications of Rolling Cycle in Hot Narrow Strip Mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of problems of finishing rolling zone long and the rolling rhythm slow by traditional control system of the hot narrow strip production, two level automatic control systems were optimized, and dual storage areas were used. By optimizing rolling schedule sending time and speed of the algorithm, the two pieces were rolled at the same time. By the improved control system, the output per hour was composed of 55 blocks of the original to 72 blocks, the production cycle was greatly shorten ,and the production capacity was increased in the 620mm hot strip rolling line of Tangshan Guofeng Iron and Steel Co., Ltd.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
彭文，姬亚锋，李影，张殿华，张力，孙建民. 热轧带钢轧制节奏的优化[J]. , 2013, 30(5): 44-45.
PENG Wen，JI Ya-feng，LI Ying，ZHANG Dian-hua，ZHANG Li，SUN Jian-min. Optimization and Applications of Rolling Cycle in Hot Narrow Strip Mill. , 2013, 30(5): 44-45.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 低焊接裂纹敏感性耐磨钢HARDOX400钢板的研发
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 南阳汉冶特钢有限公司钢研所,河南南阳474500
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 南阳汉冶特钢有限公司通过JMatPro软件模拟了低焊接裂纹敏感性耐磨钢HARDOX400钢的CCT曲线及辊压式淬火机的冷却能力曲线，并在瑞典SSAB公司的技术要求条件下，以及严控碳当量及焊接裂纹敏感性系数的基础上，利用低碳添加合金元素的化学成分设计，以及合理的热处理工艺，研发出了HARDOX400钢板。钢板各项性能指标优良，显微组织为15～35 μm的板条马氏体。通过销盘磨损试验得出研制的HARDOX400钢板的相对耐磨率是瑞典SSAB 生产的HARDOX400钢板的1024倍。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research and development of HARDOX400 wear resistant steel plate with low susceptibility to weld crack susceptibility
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The CCT curve of HARDOX400 steel and roller pressure quenching machine cooling capacity curve were simulated by JMatPro software.Under the conditions of SSAB HARDOX400 plate technology requirements and strict controls of carbon equivalent and welding crack sensitivity coefficient,the chemical composition of HARDOX400 steel with low carbon and adding other alloy elrments was designed, and the proper heat treatment process was used.Based on these,the HARDOX400 plate was developed,which microstructure was 15~35 μm lath martensite.Its relative wear rate was 1.024 times of Sweden’s SSAB HARDOX400 plate.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
许少普. 低焊接裂纹敏感性耐磨钢HARDOX400钢板的研发[J]. , 2017, 34(6): 19-23.
XU shaopu. Research and development of HARDOX400 wear resistant steel plate with low susceptibility to weld crack susceptibility. , 2017, 34(6): 19-23.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 定宽机在2 250 mm热轧生产线的应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢京唐钢铁有限责任公司热轧部，河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 随着连铸连轧技术的迅猛发展，定宽机因其具有生产效率高、宽度压下调整范围大等优势，逐渐替代了重型的立辊轧机而在热轧产线得到广泛应用；对定宽机的主要设备结构及工作过程原理进行了简要介绍，并结合定宽机在首钢京唐公司2 250 mm热轧线生产使用过程中遇到的问题，制定了优化解决方案，在实际生产中取得了较好效果。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Application of slab sizing press on 2 250 mm hot rolling line
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：With the rapid development of continuous casting and continuous rolling technology,the slab sizing press was gradually replaced the heavy vertical roll mill and had been widely used in hot rolling line,because of its high efficiency and wide width control capacity.In this paper,the main equipment of slab sizing press and its working process were briefly introduced.And combined with its application on the 2 250 mm hot rolling production line in Shougang Jingtang United Iron and Steel Co.,Ltd.,the problems and its optimization solution were analyzed,and good results were achieved in actual production.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
张明生. 定宽机在2 250 mm热轧生产线的应用[J]. , 2017, 34(6): 80-82.
ZHANG Mingsheng. Application of slab sizing press on 2 250 mm hot rolling line. , 2017, 34(6): 80-82.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 温度控制对薄规格带钢炉内跑偏的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 新余钢铁集团有限公司，江西新余338001
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 连退炉生产0.5 mm厚以下带钢时，炉内带钢跑偏除考虑来料板形、炉辊辊形及粗糙度、炉内带钢张力等因素外，加热段带钢升温速率也不可忽视。原因是炉子热容量大，热惯性大，温度检测和控制存在固有的滞后性，带钢升温速率不能得到有效控制，升温速率过快，使加热段带钢出现微瓢曲，在低张力控制下，带钢出现跑偏。通过采用较为精准的带钢温度PID调节器输出限幅控制方案，提高带钢温度控制精度，降低带钢升温速率，明显改善了薄规格带钢炉内跑偏问题。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of temperature control on the strip deviation in annealing furnace
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In addition to the billet shape,furnace roll shape and roughness,and strip tension,the strip reheating rate in heating zone of annealing furnace was a important factor to influence thinner than 0.5 mm strip running deviation in the furnace.The causes were that the furnace thermal capacity was big,the thermal inertia was high,the temperature detection and control had hysteretic nature.Because of the fast heating rate,the strip in heating zone buckled a little,so the strip was easy to deviate.By adopting the precise control scheme of strip temperature PID output limiting,upgrading the strip temperature accuracy,and decreasing the heating rate,the thin gauge strip deviation in the furnace was obviously improved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
黄海生. 温度控制对薄规格带钢炉内跑偏的影响[J]. , 2018, 35(4): 87-89.
HUANG Hai- sheng. Effect of temperature control on the strip deviation in annealing furnace. , 2018, 35(4): 87-89.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 带钢精轧阶段高精度宽度控制策略
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: MA Geng- sheng,PENG Wen,LIU Yuan- ming,YIN Fang- chen,DI Hong- shuang,ZHANG Dian- hua
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 出于节能考虑，带钢热连轧工艺增加中间坯的厚度，提高精轧开轧温度，降低粗轧和精轧总能耗。由于增加了中间坯厚度，精轧过程产生宽展，热连轧机精轧机组采用了两个立辊机架的设计方案。针对此种设备布置，以高精度的宽度控制为目标，提出了一种宽度自动控制策略，包括两个立辊的速度、辊缝的过程设定以及自学习算法。现场应用效果表明：该控制策略保证了穿带和轧制过程的稳定性，宽度精度高，宽度偏差控制在3 mm之内的达到95%以上。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: High precision control strategy of strip width in hot finishing rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：For the sake of saving energy,intermediate slab thickness and finishing entrance temperature were increased,so that the total energy consumption of the roughing and finishing rolling was reduced.Due to the intermediate slab thickness increase,width spread occurred in finishing rolling process and there were two vertical rolling stands in hot strip finishing mill.In order to control width precisely with this layout of finishing mill,a width control strategy was proposed including two vertical rolling speed and gap setting and self- learning algorithms.Application result showed that the control strategy could ensure the stability of the threading and rolling process and high precision width,over 95% of strip width deviation was controlled within 3 mm.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
马更生，彭文，刘元铭，尹方辰，邸洪双，张殿华. 带钢精轧阶段高精度宽度控制策略[J]. , 2017, 34(3): 61-63.
MA Geng- sheng,PENG Wen,LIU Yuan- ming,YIN Fang- chen,DI Hong- shuang,ZHANG Dian- hua. High precision control strategy of strip width in hot finishing rolling. , 2017, 34(3): 61-63.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 中厚板氧化铁皮对冷却过程的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 福建三钢闽光股份有限公司中板厂，福建三明365000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 热轧钢板在轧制时除鳞方式不同，即使采用相同的控冷工艺参数，其终冷温度差异较大，这是由于钢板表面氧化铁皮的厚度和形态不同导致的。为此，研究了氧化铁皮对钢板冷却过程的影响。结果表明：较厚的氧化铁皮使钢板表面粗糙增大，使传热过程中的流动边界层发生变化并对冷却过程中核态沸腾汽泡的产生具有较大影响，从而提高了冷却强度且使钢板冷却不均，出现浪形。同时分析得出：钢板表面麻点缺陷、氧化铁皮破碎、FeO的结构易使其表面粗糙度增大。因此，通过调整加热及热轧过程工艺参数，减少氧化铁皮的形成或避免产生粗糙表面都可以有效避免对钢板造成不均匀冷却，使板形得到明显改善。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: The effect of oxide scales on cooling process of plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The finishing cooling temperature different was great of plate by different descaling model,even with the same cooling process parameters.This was due to the different thickness and shape of the oxide on the surface of plate.Therefore,the effect of the oxidized on the cooling process of plate was studied.The results show that the thicker oxide increases the surface roughness of the plate,which changes the flow boundary layer during the heat transfer process and has a great influence on the nucleation boiling bubbles in the cooling process,thus increasing the cooling strength ,and making the plate cooling inhomogeneous and forming wave defect.At the same time,it is found that the dent defects on the surface of the plate,the oxidation broken,and the FeO structure easy to increase the surface roughness.Therefore,by adjusting the process parameters of heating and hot rolling,reducing the formation of the oxide or avoiding the rough surface could effectively avoid the uneven cooling of the plate.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
魏重增. 中厚板氧化铁皮对冷却过程的影响[J]. , 2018, 35(1): 23-26.
WEI Chong- zeng. The effect of oxide scales on cooling process of plate. , 2018, 35(1): 23-26.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 中高碳钢焊接技术在冷连轧中的应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 安徽楚江特钢有限公司，安徽芜湖241008
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过现场试验，对比分析了常规手弧焊工艺与先经预热后经保温的新焊接工艺在65Mn带钢冷连轧过程中的焊缝状态。结果表明：经新工艺焊接后的带钢顺利完成了3个机架的冷连轧，没有断带。将此工艺延伸至40Mn、50钢、50CrVA等中高碳带钢的生产，冷轧效果都满足要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Application of medium and high carbon steel welding technology in cold continuous rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The welding qualities were contrasted by field test,which were conventional manual metal- arc welding and new welding method of preheating plus heat preservation after welding for 65Mn steel strip in cold rolling process.The test results showed that the strip welded by this new method could be fully continuously cold rolled by three mills,no strip breaking occurred.Also the good effects were reached by this new method for 40Mn,50 steel,50CrVA and other high carbon steels strip.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
唐时葵. 中高碳钢焊接技术在冷连轧中的应用[J]. , 2018, 35(2): 85-87.
TANG Shi- kui. Application of medium and high carbon steel welding technology in cold continuous rolling. , 2018, 35(2): 85-87.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 武钢1580mm生产线降温轧制工艺的实践
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: XU Xi-yia, LI Chuana, TAN Wenb
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
武汉钢铁集团有限公司，a 热轧总厂
b武钢研究院，湖北武汉430080
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对现行加热温度制度中加热温度过高而造成能耗较高、生产成本较高的压力，武钢热轧总厂三分厂经过充分研究分析，进行了降温轧制实践，部分商品材和供冷轧用带钢的热轧加热温度从1250℃大幅降低至1170℃，使轧线成材率提高约030%，吨钢加热平均能耗下降约0040GJ/t，产生了良好的经济效益和社会效益。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Application of Low Temperature Rolling Technology in 1580mm Production Line of WISCO
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aiming at the high heating temperature in current system caused the high cost and high energy consumption, the low temperature rolling technology was practiced in Genernal Hot Rolling Plant of WISCO, the heating temperature of some strips which were final goods or used for cold rolling were reduced from 1250℃ to 1170℃ , the yield increased by about 030%, the average energy consumption per ton steel heating decreased about 0040GJ The good economic and social benefits were obtained
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
徐希义，李传，谭文. 武钢1580mm生产线降温轧制工艺的实践[J]. , 2014, 31(1): 24-28.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 帘线钢盘条表面脱碳计算模型的研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: GAO Hang, GUO Da-yong, ZHANG Bo, WANG Bing-xi
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 鞍山钢铁股份有限公司技术中心， 辽宁鞍山114001
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 帘线钢盘条表面脱碳会加剧盘条内外层变形程度的不均匀性，严重时可能导致断丝。通过分析碳原子在帘线钢热轧过程中的扩散行为，建立了考虑变形和温度变化的帘线钢盘条脱碳计算模型。该模型计算结果与实测值非常接近，可用于指导生产工艺改进，提高产品质量。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The surface decarburization of cord steel wire rod will aggravate its uneven deformation degree even lead to breakage. By analyzing the diffusion of carbon atoms in the hot rolling process of cord steel wire rod , the calculation model of decarburizing which considered the deformation and temperature change was established. The calculated result was close to the measured value. It would be used to improve production process and product quality.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 双层不锈钢管三辊斜轧数值模拟与参数优化
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Yun- long，HU Zhi- qiang，WANG Kai- kun
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京科技大学材料科学与工程学院，北京100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 设计了一种核电站一回路主管道用双层不锈钢管的复合成形工艺，解决了传统锻造或铸造工艺成品长度受限的问题，同时满足了复杂工作环境对管道性能的特殊要求。采用Deform- 3D有限元模拟软件对外层21- 2N奥氏体耐热不锈钢与内层12Cr- 12Ni马氏体耐热不锈钢的双层套管三辊斜轧成形过程进行了模拟研究与参数优化，分析了双层不锈钢管的内外层变形情况、应力应变场及温度场的分布规律，并通过设计正交试验获得了最优变形的参数组合。模拟结果表明，三辊斜轧过程中，等效应力、等效应变与温度的最大值均集中在外层管与轧辊的接触区，且外层管整体性能参数要大于内层管。通过正交设计试验的极差分析与方差分析，最终获得最优变形参数为粗轧温度1 100 °C，送进角8°，轧辊转速200 r/min。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Numerical simulation and processing parameter optimization of the double- layer stainless steel tube by three- roll cross rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The composite forming process of the double- layer stainless steel tube,which is used in the coolant pipe for the primary loop system of the pressurized water reactor,is proposed and solves the limited length of traditional forging or casting.It can meet the material property requirements and adapt to the complex working environment.For the double- layer tube which was assembled by outer austenitic heat- resistant stainless steel 21- 2N and inner martensitic heat- resistant stainless steel 12Cr- 12Ni,the simulation and processing parameter optimization of its three- roll cross rolling were analyzed by Deform- 3D.The deformation of the inner and outer layers and the distribution of stress,strain and temperature field were simulated and discussed.The processing parameter of the optimal deformation was obtained by orthogonal test.The simulation results show that the maximums of effective stress,effective strain and temperature concentrate in the contact area of the outer tube and the roll.All the parameters of the outer tube are greater than the inner tube.Through the range analysis and variance analysis of the orthogonal test,the optimal deformation parameters of the roughing rolling temperature is 1 100 °C,the feeding angle is 8° and the roll speed is 200 r/min.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
王云龙，胡志强，王开坤. 双层不锈钢管三辊斜轧数值模拟与参数优化[J]. , 2018, 35(6): 39-44.
WANG Yun- long，HU Zhi- qiang，WANG Kai- kun. Numerical simulation and processing parameter optimization of the double- layer stainless steel tube by three- roll cross rolling. , 2018, 35(6): 39-44.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 焊丝用线材酸洗后黑线形成原因分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.河钢集团钢研总院，河北石家庄050023；2.河钢集团唐钢公司，河北唐山063016
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对焊丝用盘条酸洗后存在黑线的现象，采用光学显微镜、电子显微镜和能谱分析法对比了盘条正常部位与酸洗后黑线部位氧化铁皮厚度、组成成分差异。结果表明，酸洗后黑线为厚度异常的氧化铁皮，且Si含量偏高，附着力强，酸洗难以去除造成的。从而对轧制工艺和控冷工艺提出了相应的改进措施。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Causes analysis of the black lines formation of welding wire rod after pickling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：For the phenomenon of black line after pickling of wire rod for wielding,the thickness and composition difference of the scale of the normal part of the wire rod and the black line after pickling were compared by optical microscope,electron microscope and energy spectrum analysis.The results show that the black line after pickling is an iron oxide scale with abnormal thickness,and the Si content is high,its adhesion is strong,and pickling is difficult to remove.Therefore,the corresponding improvement measures are proposed for the rolling process and the controlled cooling process.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李杰，刘毅，杨边疆. 焊丝用线材酸洗后黑线形成原因分析[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(2): 40-42.
LI Jie,LIU Yi,YANG Bianjiang. Causes analysis of the black lines formation of welding wire rod after pickling. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(2): 40-42.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热处理工艺对NM400低合金钢板组织性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 研究了在线淬火-缓冷-回火工艺对NM400低合金钢板组织性能的影响，并与同等工艺条件下离线热处理后实验钢板的显微组织和力学性能进行了比较。结果表明：在线淬火-缓冷-回火工艺处理的钢板可获得大量压扁拉长的板条马氏体、铁碳化合物和少量的残余奥氏体组织，而离线热处理的钢板则获得较为规则的板条马氏体组织。在线淬火-缓冷-回火处理工艺可提高耐磨钢板的屈服强度和塑性，而离线热处理耐磨钢板的冲击韧性和抗拉强度较好。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: The effect of heat treatment process on microstructure and mechanical properties of NM400 low alloy plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Microstructure and mechanical properties of NM400 low alloy plate were investigated under the treatment of on-line quenching-slow cooling-tempering process and conventional off-line heat treatment process.The results showed that large amounts of deformed lath martensite,carbides and small amounts of retained austenite were obtained at the condition of on-line quenching-slow cooling-tempering process,while more regular lath martensite and larger carbides were obtained by the conventional off-line heat treatment process.The yield strength and ductility of the wear resistance steel plate could be improved by online quenching-slow cooling process.While the impact toughness and tensile strength of the wear resistant steel plate could be significantly improved by off-line heat treatment.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李军辉，邓想涛，王昭东. 热处理工艺对NM400低合金钢板组织性能的影响[J]. , 2016, 33(4): 6-8.
LI Jun-hui,DENG Xiang-tao,WANG Zhao-dong. The effect of heat treatment process on microstructure and mechanical properties of NM400 low alloy plate. , 2016, 33(4): 6-8.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 分析了影响热连轧带钢断面楔形的主要因素，利用精轧机后楔形检测设备，提出了一种楔形动态控制方法。该方法在某1 580 mm 热连轧生产线上应用，使每月带钢楔形精度提升了13%左右，带钢楔形、凸度双合格率从原先49%左右提升到稳定的65%左右，效果明显。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The key effects on the strip section wedge were analyzed. Application to a 1 580 mm HSM showed that the wedge accuracy rose about 13%, both profile and wedge qualified products also increased from 30% to 60% steadily.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 家电用普冷板材表面状态对磷化效果的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Jin, ZHAO Xiao- long, PAN Hong- tao, LUO Xiao- yang
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 酒钢宏兴股份有限公司碳钢薄板厂，甘肃嘉峪关735100
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对酒钢家电板磷化后出现严重发黄缺陷的问题，借助光学显微镜、电化学工作站等分析手段对其金相组织、电化学特性、表面粗糙度以及板面残留等进行了分析。结果表明：钢板表面残碳控制是工业生产提高钢板表面活性，改善磷化发黄缺陷的主要手段。从而提出了工艺优化措施，有效降低了钢板表面磷化发黄缺陷。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Influence of surface quality on phosphatizing effect of the cold rolled sheet for home appliances
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the serious yellow rusted defect on the surface of cold rolled sheet for home appliances produced by Jiuquan Iron & Steel Co., Ltd., the metallurgical structure, the electrochemical character, the surface roughness and relict of cold rolled sheet had been investigated by means of metalloscope and electrochemical measurement system. The results showed that controlling the carbon deposits of sheet surface was the key to improve the phosphatizing effect and the surface activity. Therefore,the corresponding optimization process measures to improve the surface quality were put forward, and the defect occurred rate was obviously reduced..
keywords_en: cold rolled sheet for home appliances
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 基于小波分析的轧机齿轮箱故障诊断
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: ZHANG Jian- xin，LIU Han，HOU Ye- bo
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 上海宝钢工业技术服务有限公司，上海201900
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 轧机齿轮箱为轧钢生产线关键设备，其状态的好坏直接影响着轧线的生产和效益。本文简要介绍了小波变换理论，并通过对现场轧机齿轮箱振动信号的采集，采用谐波小波变换，对采集的振动信号进行处理和分析并与变换前的信号进行比对，诊断了现场轧机齿轮箱故障，对轧机齿轮箱状态进行了把握，真正实现了设备的状态管理。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Mill gearbox fault diagnosis based on wavelet analysis
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Mill gearbox as the key equipment of steel rolling line, the quality of its status directly affects the production and efficiency of rolling lines. The wavelet transform theory was simply introduced. For the on- site mill gearbox vibration signal acquisition, using harmonic wavelet transform and treating the vibration signal, the on- site mill gearbox failures were diagnosed. The device state management was realized.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
张建新，刘晗，侯叶波. 基于小波分析的轧机齿轮箱故障诊断[J]. , 2016, 33(1): 45-48.
