http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 多级分类表面检测系统在冷轧薄板产线的应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Lin1，YU Yang1，SUN Hai2，WANG Chang1，PANG Zai-gang1，CHEN Jin3
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.首钢技术研究院薄板研究所，北京100043
2.北京首钢冷轧薄板有限公司技术质量部，北京101304
3.首钢股份公司迁安钢铁公司，河北迁安064404
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 表面质量是决定冷轧薄板总体质量的重要因素之一。目前，基于机器视觉发展而形成的表面质量在线检测系统已经开始在国内诸多钢厂得到实践应用。本文通过对以线扫描为基础原理的在线表面质量检测系统的分析，详细介绍了该系统的工作原理及多级分类规则的应用，并对检出效果进行了评述。某冷轧公司引入了配备高速摄像头以线扫描方式检测缺陷的表面质量在线检测装置，通过对系统参数进行优化以及应用多级分类检测规则，实现了对20余种常见表面缺陷的检测和判定，并对冷轧薄板表面质量进行全面监控，提高了薄板生产的可控性和生产效率。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Application of surface inspection system with multi-level classification on the cold thin gauge strip rolling line
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Surface quality is one of the important factors that determine the overall quality of the cold rolled strip.Now,the surface quality on-line detection system based on machine vision development has begun to be applied in many domestic steel mills.Working principle of the surface quality on-line detection device and the applications of the multi-level classification were introduced in detail.Based on the basic principle analysis of the device,the detection results was reviewed in this paper.Surface quality on-line detection devices was brought into the cold strip rolling line,which could detect surface defects by the equipped high-speed cameras through lin scanning.Through the system paramaters optimization and application of multi-level classification detection rules，more than twenty kinds of common surface defects could be detected and judged,the overall monitoring of surface quality of the cold rolled strip was realized,and the controllability and production efficiency of the cold rolled strip was improved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
王林，于洋，孙海，王畅，庞在刚，陈瑾. 多级分类表面检测系统在冷轧薄板产线的应用[J]. , 2016, 33(5): 63-66.
WANG Lin，YU Yang，SUN Hai，WANG Chang，PANG Zai-gang，CHEN Jin. Application of surface inspection system with multi-level classification on the cold thin gauge strip rolling line. , 2016, 33(5): 63-66.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶南方工程技术有限公司冷轧分公司，湖北武汉440223

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：A new bridle design method ,based on base factor, helpful to figure out exact tension of the bridle roll, was described in this aritle.The concerned factors such as ,reducer, centrifugal force，plastic deformation，was concerned in the bridle roll power design. Bridle roll designed in this new method runs economically.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: CHEN Huaxiang1，LIU Shunming1,LI Yanglong2,TAN Jinfeng1,HU Jianjun1#br#
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司，河北唐山064000；2.首钢集团有限公司技术研究院，北京100043
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对首钢京唐公司2 230 mm连退线生产1.2 mm以下薄规格铝镇静钢带钢表面斜纹缺陷严重的问题，利用一级PDA数据分析与有限元模型计算相结合的方法，研究了斜纹产生的机理，即薄规格铝镇静钢平整时采用了较大的延伸率与轧制力。这是由于薄规格铝镇静钢平整需采用较大的平整延伸率和轧制力以消除屈服平台；同时，有限元计算发现平整机下支撑辊单独传动方式能够导致薄规格铝镇静钢平整延伸率较大。为此，采用了提高平整机前后张力、降低平整延伸率、提高平整液浓度和流量、降低平整机速度的措施，成功消除了薄规格铝镇静钢带钢表面斜纹缺陷，显著提升了产品质量和经济效益。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Twill defect elimination of thin gauge Alkilled steel strip in Jingtang 2 230 mm continuous annealing line
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the serious problem of twill defect on the surface of Alkilled steel strips with 1.2 mm thickness or below produced by the 2 230 mm continuous annealing line of Shougang Jingtang Company,the combination of the firstlevel PDA data analysis and the finite element model calculation was used to study the twill defect generation mechanism,i.e.,the tempering used a large elongation and rolling force for thin gauge Alkilled steel strip.This is because the thin gauge Alkilled steel needs large temper elongation rate and rolling force to eliminate the yielding platform.At the same time,the finite element calculation results show that the separate driving mode of the bellow backup roll of the temper machine can lead to the large temper elongation rate.Therefore,some measures of increasing the tension forward and backward tensions of temper mill,reducing the temper elongation rate,increasing the concentration and flow rate of the temper solution,and reducing the speed of the temper mill had been applied,and the twill defects on the surface of the thin gauge Alkilled steel strip had been successfully eliminated,which significantly improved the product quality and economic benefits.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陈华祥，刘顺明， 李洋龙， 谭谨峰， 胡建军. 京唐2 230 mm连退线薄规格铝镇静钢斜纹缺陷的消除[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(6): 48-52.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of nitrogen content on the hardenability of boron steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to ensure the hardenability of boron steel, effect of w(Ti)/w(N) ratio on the effective boron of boron steel was studied by the OM, hardness testing, gas content and chemical titration analysis which quenched using the laboratory furnace. Results showed that effective rate of boron in boron steel of w(Ti)/w(N) critical value is 6. When w(Ti)/w(N) was 6 or less, with the decreasing of w(Ti)/w(N) ratio, boron yield greatly reduced, caused the hardenability volatile. When w(Ti)/w(N) was 6 or higher, the rate of boron element w(Ti)/w(N) ratio had little effect, even if the w(Ti)/w(N) ratio increased again, the content of acid soluble boron no longer changed. In addition, the increase of nitrogen content mainly was in steelmaking process, so the steelmaking process should be intensively controlled.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 非接触式板形仪在冷轧连退机组上的应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京首钢冷轧薄板有限公司，北京101304
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了应用于某冷轧厂连退线6辊CVC平整机上的SI- FLAT板形仪的工作原理和使用情况。现场实践表明：SI- FLAT非接触式板形仪通过检测带钢振幅获得板形信息，设备自身对测量结果准确性影响较小。在检测过程中，带钢与测量元件不接触，避免了对带钢表面质量的影响。因此，更适用于高端汽车家电板生产线。同时，针对SI- FIAT板形仪存在的薄板板形检测失效、厚板下表面划伤、目标曲线单一等问题，进行了设备改造和参数优化，进一步提高了板形仪的使用效果。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Application of non- contact shape meter in CAL of cold rolling line
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The working principle of SI- FLAT non- contact shape meter and its application in a 6- high CVC skin pass mill of a CAL were introduced. Practical applications indicated that non- contact flatness shape meter obtained strip flatness messages by using the amplitude signal, so the affection of device itself on the measurements accuracy was less. In the processing, the strip did not contacted with measuring device, so it had no influence on strip surface quality. Therefore, it was more suitable for high- quality auto sheet production appliances. For the problem of signal loss during detecting thin strip and scratch on thick strip bottom surface, some equipments were modified and relative parameters were optimized. Then the target flatness curves were also optimized.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
闻达，李振. 非接触式板形仪在冷轧连退机组上的应用[J]. , 2015, 32(5): 62-65.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LUO Xu1,2, YANG Cai- shui1, KANG Yong- lin1, LI Jun- hong2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.北京科技大学材料科学与工程学院，北京100083
2.攀钢集团研究院有限公司，四川攀枝花 617000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过采用低锰（w(Mn)=0.6%~0.8%）钛微合金化（w(Ti)=0.045%~0.060%）的成分体系以及控轧控冷工艺，成功试制出低成本钛微合金化Q345B带钢。结果表明：不同厚度规格带钢的屈服强度为413~468 MPa，抗拉强度为571~595 MPa，伸长率为25.3%~27.9%，常温冲击功为105~134 J，冷弯性能合格，均满足国标要求。Ti的析出物有尺寸大小为50~100 nm的方形TiN粒子和尺寸小于10 nm的球形纳米TiC粒子，充分发挥了Ti的细晶强化和沉淀强化效果。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study on the microstructure and mechanical properties of low cost titanium micro- alloyed Q345B steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：By using low manganese content (w(Mn)=0.6%-0.8%)and Ti micro- alloyed (w(Ti)=0.045%-0.060%)component system and TMCP process, low cost Ti micro- alloyed Q345B strip was developed successfully. The results indicate that the yield strength of the tested strips with different thickness is 413-468 MPa, the tensile strength is 571-595 MPa, the elongation is 25.3%-27.9%, the impact energy at room temperature is 105-134 J, the cold bending property is qualified, and all the properties meet the GB requirements. The precipitates of Ti include square TiN particles with 50-100 nm and nano- spherical TiC particles with less than 10 nm, and it gives full play to the effect of fine grain strengthen and precipitation strengthen of titanium.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to solve the problem of the strip running deviation in the vertical loop in a continuous annealing line,the influence factors were analyzed.Using the theoretical calculation and data measurement method,the important factors of the verticality and straightness of the orbit,the level of the loop car and the gap of the guide wheel were found.To this end,some effective adjustment methods were proposed to solve the problem of the strip running deviation in the vertical loop.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 型钢全轧程仿真软件的开发与应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: TAO Gong- ming 1, FAN Hong- ping 1, ZHU Guo- ming2 ,ZHU Hua- lin 1, L Pan- feng 1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.攀钢集团攀枝花钢钒有限公司，四川攀枝花617062
2.北京科技大学，北京100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 型钢轧制是一个连续的过程，单工序仿真分析存在效率低、精度差的问题。针对单工序仿真存在的不足，通过捕捉模型拓扑关系特点，进行了温度继承、轮廓提取等关键技术的研究，开发了型钢全轧程仿真分析软件。统计表明，单工序仿真分析其前处理时间是全轧程仿真分析软件的10倍左右，与现场实际结果相比，形状误差为8%~10%，轧制力误差为35%~40%，而全轧程仿真分析软件的形状误差为3%~5%，轧制力误差为5%~10%。该软件在现场得到广泛应用，解决了诸多型钢质量难题，降低了型钢产品开发难度。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development and application of full rolling process simulation software
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The steel rolling process is continuous. Single process simulation analysis (SPSA) has the problem of low efficiency, poor accuracy. In view of that, by analysis of model characteristic of topology relationship, the key technology such as temperature inheritance, contour extraction is researched, the full process simulation analysis(FPSA) software is developed. Statistics show that pre- treatment time of the SPSA is about 10 times of the FASA software, form error of 8%- 10%, rolling force error of 35%- 40% than the actual results. For the FASA software, form error is 3%- 5%, rolling force error is 5%- 10% . The software is widely used in the field, much problem of steel quality is solved, the development difficulty of steel product is reduced. Efficiency and cost of process optimization and product development are improved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陶功明，范红平，朱国明，朱华林，吕攀峰. 型钢全轧程仿真软件的开发与应用[J]. , 2015, 32(4): 46-49.
TAO Gong- ming , FAN Hong- ping , ZHU Guo- ming ,ZHU Hua- lin , L Pan- feng . Development and application of full rolling process simulation software. , 2015, 32(4): 46-49.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In this paper, high temperature tensile tests were performed by using a Gleeble 1500D thermal simulator to determine the reheating temperature of UNS S32760 dual- phase stainless steel. Combining analysis of ingot grain size and the ratio of the two- phase, the reasonable hot rolling and heat treatment technologies for this steel were obtained. Based on theses processes schemes, the mechanical properties and wear resistance property of tested plate were good.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 彩色涂层板绿色生产新工艺
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶京诚工程技术有限公司，北京100176
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 当今绝大多数的彩涂板生产线为溶剂型辊涂工艺，其排放的废气严重污染大气，是形成雾霾的原因之一。介绍了一种新型绿色环保的彩色涂层板生产新工艺，分析了该机组的技术亮点。通过传统溶剂辊涂生产工艺与粉末喷涂工艺的对比，从工艺、能耗及运营成本、产品性能、环境影响等方面作了详细分析，指出了粉末彩涂板的广阔发展前景。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: A new green process for the color coating line
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The main style of color coating line is the solvent color coating.However,it exhausts gases which seriously pollute the atmosphere，and this is one of the reasons for the formation of haze.A new technology and its technical advantages of a new powder color coating line were introduced.In contrast to the traditional solvent color coating line,this new powder coating line shows vast potential for the future development,with advantages in process,energy consumption,running cost,product property and environmental effect.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对广东省韶关钢铁有限公司板材厂矫直厚规格钢板时矫直机能力不足、设备故障频发、矫直效果差等诸多问题，分析了其主要影响因素，即设备老化、矫直设备工艺设计不合理、操作工技能不佳。为此，制定了相应的对策措施，矫直机矫直力从8 000 kN提升到15 000 kN，并且运行稳定。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: Si含量对热轧酸洗板表面氧化铁皮的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 日照钢铁控股集团有限公司，山东日照276806
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对生产SPHC系列产品时存在氧化铁皮压入缺陷的问题，研究发现随着Si含量的增加，氧化铁皮有减少趋势。通过观察，发现Si原子主要富集到氧化铁皮下层，与O原子结合生成SiO2或更复杂的氧化物，能阻碍O原子与Fe原子发生反应，在连铸及轧制过程中提高了低碳钢的抗氧化性能。同时，Si含量的增加可部分弥补位错或空位缺陷，不利于Fe、C等原子与O结合，而这表现出来的结果是加重了晶体内部畸变程度，使铁基体强度提高。
keywords_cn: 热轧酸洗，氧化铁皮，薄规格，以热代冷
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Influence of Si content on the surface scale of hot rolled pickling strip
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the defect problem of scale pressed in the surface of SPHC series products,the study found that scale had a tendency to decrease with the increase of Si content.The results show that Si atoms are mainly enriched in the inner layer of scale and combine with O atoms to form SiO2 or more complex oxides,which can prevent O atoms from reacting with Fe atoms and improve the resistance oxidation performance of low carbon steel during continuous casting and rolling.At the same time,increasing Si content can partially compensate for dislocation or vacancy defects,which is not conducive to the combination of atoms such as Fe and C,and the internal distortion of the crystal is strengthened.So,the strength of the iron matrix is improved.
keywords_en: Hot rolling and picking, Oxide Scale, Thin specification, Hot rolling products take place of cold rolling products
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 六辊冷轧机辊系弹性变形快速算法
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶南方工程技术有限公司,湖北武汉430223
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为了快速计算六辊冷轧机辊系的弹性变形，提出了一种新的辊系弹性变形算法。该算法直接采用数值法计算轧辊挠曲，避免了复杂的公式推导，简化了计算过程；在辊系协调变形的迭代计算过程中，内层迭代首次引入辊间中心点处压扁和辊间压扁区倾斜两个迭代调节量，建立了与辊间接触合力和接触区的总力矩的联系，外层迭代通过不断修正辊间相对压扁量增量循环迭代辊间接触力与轧辊挠曲，实现了整个辊系变形的快速协调。通过与国外计算结果比较和算例的验证，证明其有好的计算精度、收敛性和快速性，能离线指导新轧机工艺方案设计，具备板形在线设定计算应用的可能。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Fast algorithm of rolls elastic deformation of 6-high cold rolling mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to fast calculate the rolls elastic deformation of 6-high cold rolling mill,a new algorithm for calculating rolls elastic deformation was presented.The algorithm directly calculate the rolls bending by numerical method to avoid the complex formula derivation and simplifying calculation process.During iteratively calculating rolls coordinating deformation,the center flattening and flattening district tilt between rolls were introduced as two iterative variables in the inner iteration.A relationship between the two variables and total contact force and moment was established.In the outer calculation,rolls deflection and pressure were iteratively calculated by continuously modifying the relative flattening incremental,and quickly obtained the rolls deformation coordination.By comparison with foreign calculation results and examples verification,the algorithm was proved its good calculation accuracy,convergence and rapidity.It could guide the process design of new rolling mill,and had the possibility of online flatness setting calculation.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
吴有生，严裕宁. 六辊冷轧机辊系弹性变形快速算法[J]. , 2017, 34(2): 14-18.
WU You-sheng,YAN Yu-ning. Fast algorithm of rolls elastic deformation of 6-high cold rolling mill. , 2017, 34(2): 14-18.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 通过合金成分设计，轧制、热处理工艺的探索，开发了低合金高强度海洋软管用钢，其屈服强度大于600 MPa且满足抗氢脆、抗氢致开裂、抗应力腐蚀开裂性能，并通过全浸腐蚀实验对该钢的海水腐蚀行为进行了研究。结果表明，采用低C、低Mn并复合添加耐蚀元素Cr、Mo和采用合理的热轧、冷轧、调质处理工艺，可获得满足抗应力腐蚀开裂性能的600 MPa级高强钢。耐蚀元素的添加使实验钢具有良好的耐海水腐蚀能力，腐蚀稳定状态下的平均年腐蚀速率为0.11 mm/a。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development of lowalloy high strength steel for marine flexible pipe with high resistance to stress corrosion cracking
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The lowalloy high strength steel used for marine flexible pipe was produced in terms of alloy composition design,rolling and heat treatment.The yield strength of steel was greater than 600 MPa and the performances to resist hydrogen embrittlement,hydrogen induced cracking and stress corrosion cracking were excellent.Seawater corrosion behavior of the experimental steel was also studied.The results showed that the high strength steel (ReL>600 MPa) with high stress corrosion cracking resistance was obtained in terms of reducing C,Mn content,adding corrosion resistant elements Cr,Mo in chemical composition,and adopting reasonable hot rolling，cold rolling  and quenching and tempering treatment processes.Seawater corrosion test results showed that the steel had excellent corrosion resistance to seawater by addition of corrosion resistant elements,and the annual corrosion rate was 0.11 mm/a.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
高秀华，张大征，杜林秀，杨宁宁. 低合金高强度抗应力腐蚀开裂海洋软管用钢的开发[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(4): 1-6.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 钢绞线用YL82B热轧盘条翘皮缺陷原因分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 凌源钢铁股份有限公司技术中心，辽宁凌源122504
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对国内某钢厂生产钢绞线用YL82B热轧盘条时，盘条表面存在翘皮缺陷的问题，对其产生原因进行了宏观观察和金相检验分析。发现轧制过程中轧件下表面喷上冷却水导致其变形不均匀、连铸坯存在角部和侧面振痕处横向裂纹是缺陷产生的主要原因。通过除去轧件下表面冷却水、提高连铸机设备对弧精度和优化连铸机振动参数，解决了翘皮缺陷问题。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Cause analysis of scar defect of YL82B hot rolled wire rod for steel strand
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aimed at the scar defect on the surface of YL82B wire rod for steel strand,the causes were analyzed by the macroand microobservation.It found out that there was cooling water spraying from the bottom of rolled wire leading to an uneven deformation,and there were some transverse crack on the corner and side of continuous casting billet.By taking the measures of removing the bottom cooling water,improving the centering precision and optimizing the vibration parameters of continuous caster,the scar defect was eliminated.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 退火方式及化学成分对汽车油箱用IF钢疲劳性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 湖南华菱涟源钢铁有限公司，湖南娄底 417009
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 对比研究了不同成分体系IF钢在不同退火方式下的组织、疲劳性能与振动时间的差异。研究结果表明，油箱振动时间的长短与材料的疲劳抗力有直接的关系；连续退火的IF钢较罩式退火的疲劳抗力要优；B可以细化罩式退火IF钢的组织，提高晶界结合强度，提高疲劳抗力；罩式退火TiIF钢中，复合添加Nb+B，细化晶粒效果和提高疲劳抗力的效果最为明显，疲劳抗力接近于连续退火的TiIF钢。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effects of annealing mode and chemical composition on fatigue property of IF steel used for fuel tank
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en:
Abstract：
The microstructure,fatigue resistance property and vibration time of IF steel with different chemical compositions treated by different annealing modes were studied.The results show that the vibration time of the fuel tank is directly related to the fatigue resistance of the IF steel.The fatigue resistance property of IF steel treated by continuous annealing process is better than that treated by batch annealing process.B can refine the microstructure of batch annealed IF steel,improve the bonding strength of grain boundary and increase fatigue resistance.In the case of batch annealed TiIF steel,the effect of complex adding Nb+B on grain refinement and fatigue resistance improvement is the most obvious,and the fatigue resistance is close to that of TiIF steel treated by continuous annealing process.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
张益龙， 刘景佳， 王自荣. 退火方式及化学成分对汽车油箱用IF钢疲劳性能的影响[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(5): 43-.
ZHANG Yilong，LIU Jingjia，WANG Zirong. Effects of annealing mode and chemical composition on fatigue property of IF steel used for fuel tank. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(5): 43-.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 中厚板UFC-ACC联动冷却控制系统的开发
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: TIAN Peng，HAN Wei, LI Xin-lei，DONG Zhan-bin，LI Qun，SUN Wei-ming

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 在深入研究某中厚板厂新增超快速冷却系统的特点及功能的基础上，结合已掌握的德国西马克层流冷却控制技术，提出了两个冷却设备的基础自动化系统和过程自动化系统联动控制技术方案，为新增超快冷控制系统的嵌入找到了一个合适的切入点。基于UFC-ACC联动冷却控制系统，该厂已开发并批量生产了多个钢种（管线钢、高强钢、压力容器钢等）中厚板产品。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development of UFC-ACC linkage cooling control system for medium plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Based on in-depth study in a medium plate plant of new ultra fast cooling system features and functions, and combined with the available SMS Demag laminar cooling control technology, linkage control technical scheme of basic automation system and process automation systems of two cooling equipment was put forward, and a suitable starting point of adding the new ultra fast cooling control system was found out. Based on UFC-ACC linkage cooling control system, plates, such as pipeline steel, high strength steel and pressure vessel steel , were developed and produced.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The effects of controlled cooling process on mechanical properties of hot rolled Hbeam with heavy flange thickness after rolling were analyzed.The results show that the maximum yield strength of Hbeam could be reached 397 MPa,the maximum tensile strength could be reached 543 MPa,the elongation is 29.5% and the impact energy at 0 ℃ is 132 J by using controlled cooling process.The excellent mechanical properties and great group production efficiency could be obtained when the cooling rate of product surface in controlled cooling process no less than 54 ℃/s and the surface temperature no above than 590 ℃ after controlled cooling in practical production.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 南京钢铁联合有限公司中厚板卷厂, 江苏 南京 210035
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为提高中厚板生产的厚度精度, 建立了包括轧制力自适应及弹跳方程自适应的两维自适应模型, 并划分出厚度层别﹑宽度层别﹑轧制力层别及钢种层别。按照轧制时间的由近及远, 模型对根据实际生产数据回归的相关参数进行指数平滑法处理, 以高精度地获取轧制力自适应及弹跳方程自适应系数。该两维自适应模型在某3 500 mm轧机的过程控制系统中的应用效果良好。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Application of self-adaptation control for plate production
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：To enhance the gauge precision of plate, two-dimensional self-adapt model was built, including the self-adapt of rolling force and self-adapt of mill spring. In order to distinguish self-adapt parameters with high precision, layers dividing of gauge, width, rolling force and steel grades were carried out in the model.Among them, nature logarithm method was used to the layers dividing of gauge and rolling force. Exponential smoothing method was used to deal with the real-time data of rolling process and so that to get the self-adapt parameters of rolling force and spring function. This two-dimensional self-adapt model was applied in the process control system of a domestic 3 500 mm mill, and favorable result was reached.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
朱鹏举. 自适应在中厚板生产中的应用[J]. , 2015, 32(2): 72-75.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Hot rolling technology of SWRH82B wire rod used for prestressed steel strand in Shuigang
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：High quality SWRH82B wire rod meeting the demands of GB/T24238- 2009 standard and user′s requirements was developed in Shuicheng Iron and Steel Group Corp.,which sorbite constructure rate arriving to 95%,no cementite network in center of wire rod,tensile strength reaching 1 140- 1 280 MPa,reduction of cross sectional area more than 35%,extreme difference of tensile strength in one coil below 30 MPa.Some measurements were applied into practice,such as setting individual billet reheating schedule,water cooling and air cooling schedule,enhancing air fan capacity,and adopting cone rollers and air splitting device on air cooling roller table.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 昆钢炉卷轧机加热炉蓄热式节能改造实践
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1．上海嘉德环境能源科技有限公司，辽宁沈阳110179
2.武钢集团昆明钢铁股份有限公司安宁公司，云南安宁650302
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了武钢集团昆明钢铁股份有限公司炉卷轧机加热炉蓄热式节能技术的改造。通过改造前后相关参数的比较，表明了焦炉煤气常规板坯加热炉改造为高炉煤气双蓄热加热炉的技术可行性。
keywords_cn: 大型自压紧全封闭炉门
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Practice on regenerative energysaving technology revamping for reheating furnace of Steckel mill in Kunming Iron & Steel Co.,Ltd.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The process of using regenerative energysaving technology revamping the reheating furnace of Steckel mill in Kunming iron and steel Co.,Ltd.of WISCO was introduced.Through the comparisons of related parameters before and after reformation,The technology feasibility of conventional COG slab furnace reformed to BFG dual regenerative furnace was assured.
keywords_en: Combined flow field pull type burner
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李坤鹏，李东，杨奇. 昆钢炉卷轧机加热炉蓄热式节能改造实践[J]. , 2017, 34(6): 89-90.
LI Kunpeng,LI Dong,YANG Qi. Practice on regenerative energysaving technology revamping for reheating furnace of Steckel mill in Kunming Iron & Steel Co.,Ltd.. , 2017, 34(6): 89-90.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 极薄带钢高速清洗工艺技术及关键设备
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶南方工程技术有限公司,湖北武汉430080
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对近期对电镀锡产品需求旺盛、很多企业开始或即将准备新建电镀锡生产线的背景，开发了极薄带钢常规电流密度高速清洗工艺技术及关键设备，提高了冷硬卷产品质量。该工艺技术采用碱喷洗+碱刷洗+电解清洗+水刷洗+水漂洗的组合式，建设成本低。实践证明：机组高速运行稳定可靠，带钢表面质量良好。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: High speed cleaning processing technology and key equipment for ultra- thin gauge strip
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the recent domestic demand for electrolytic tinplate products,and based on the background of many companies started or ready to construction new electrolytic tinplate line,the high speed cleaning processing technology and key equipment were developed,which is used conventional current density for the purpose of improving the quality of chilled cold coil.This technology combined with multistage strengthen process by alkali spray + alkali wash scrub + electrolytic cleaning + water wash scrub + water rinse.It has cost customer lower construction.The practical production showed that the high- speed operation of the line was stable and reliable,and the better steel strip surface quality was obtained.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
吕敏建. 极薄带钢高速清洗工艺技术及关键设备[J]. , 2018, 35(2): 55-58.
Lv Min- jian. High speed cleaning processing technology and key equipment for ultra- thin gauge strip. , 2018, 35(2): 55-58.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 真空对称轧制304+Q235B复合板生产实践
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 山西太钢不锈钢股份有限公司临汾分公司,山西临汾041000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Production practice for 304+Q235B clad plate by vacuum symmetrical rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of some problems of developing 304+Q235B clad plate,such as blank bulging,rolling cracking and unqualified of ultrasonic inspection,the reasonable processes of finishing,reheating and rolling were established.The 304+Q235B clad plate was succesfuly developed,and the qualified rate was reached over 97%.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 中厚板轧机微尺度静定化升级
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: SHEN Guangxian1, ZHENG Yongjiang1, WANG Tao2, HUANG Qingxue2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 1.燕山大学机械工程学院，河北秦皇岛066004；2.太原理工大学，山西太原030024
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 摘要：中厚板轧机常因受到事故干扰而不能实现其高端轧制能力，其关键在于约0.3 mm的轧辊弯曲挠度和轧辊轴承座侧面与机架窗口立柱之间约1 mm间隙两个微尺度量的负面影响。依据机构学微尺度静定设计理论对中厚板轧机的微尺度静定化进行升级。辊系机构静定化设计包括取消原偏移距设置并采用智能衬板以实现轧制过程中四辊平行，防止四列短圆柱滚动轴承烧损、轧机颤振、板带镰刀弯和辊系叼板窜辊等弊端的同时还提高了轧机固有频率。中厚板轧机的机构学静定化升级，可充分释放轧机高端能力，实现大压下轧制新工艺并可生产高强度新品种板带，达到降本增效的目的。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Upgrade of the micro-scale statically determinate heavy and medium plate rolling mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The heavy and medium plate rolling mills are often disturbed by accidents and thus the designed high rolling capacity of the mill can not be realized.The key issue lies in the two parameters involving the roll bending deflection about 0.3 mm and the clearance between the side surfaces of the housing window and chock.The upgrade of the microscale statically determinate heavy and medium plate rolling mill should be carried out based on the microscale statically determinate design of the theory of mechanism,namely the offset distance should be cancelled and the intelligent liner plate should be used to maintain the rolls parallel and to prevent some disadvantages involving burning loss of the fourrow roller bearing,chatter,later movement and camber shape of the strip.The natural frequency of the mill can be greatly improved.The high capacity of the mill and new rolling technology with large reduction rate can be used after the upgrade of the microscale statically determinate heavy and medium plate rolling mill to produce high strength new products and to reach the goal of cost decreasing and benefit increasing.
keywords_en: heavy and medium plate rolling mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
申光宪， 郑永江，王涛，黄庆学. 中厚板轧机微尺度静定化升级[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(1): 9-15.
SHEN Guangxian, ZHENG Yongjiang, WANG Tao, HUANG Qingxue. Upgrade of the micro-scale statically determinate heavy and medium plate rolling mill. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(1): 9-15.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 低压缩比厚规格钢板轧制工艺开发
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 山东钢铁集团日照有限公司，山东日照276805
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 山东钢铁集团有限公司100～120 mm厚Q345系列钢板前期均采用复合制坯生产，成材率低、加工费用高、生产周期长。为此，通过控制加热温度、采用道次大压下量轧制工艺、轧后采用强水冷工艺并优化正火工艺后，成功实现了用250 mm连铸坯生产100～120 mm厚Q345系列钢板，且钢板内部质量及性能均满足要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Development of rolling technology for heavy plate by low compression ratio
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The 100- 120 mm thickness Q345 series plates were produced by the technology of composite billet in the past in Shandong Iron and Steel Group Rizhao Co.,Ltd.However,this production mode had the drawbacks in higher waste and cost,and longer producing cycle.Based on this,some measures were put into production,such as controlling reheating temperature,using heavy reduction per pass rolling technology and forced water cooling after rolling,and optimizing normalizing process.And the 100-120 mm thickness Q345 series plates were produced successfully by 250 mm thickness individual continuous casting slab,with qualified internal quality and mechanical performance.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
孔雅（. 低压缩比厚规格钢板轧制工艺开发[J]. , 2018, 35(2): 73-74.
KONG Ya. Development of rolling technology for heavy plate by low compression ratio. , 2018, 35(2): 73-74.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 薄规格高强钢轧制稳定性的提高
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司热轧部，河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Improvement of the rolling stability of thin gauge and high strength steel strip
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Thin gauge steel sheet can not only reduce the cost,but also replace some part of cold roll products.The influence factor of production of thin gauge and high strength steel of 2 250 mm HSM were analyzed and researched,and some measures were proposed based on production practice.By optimizing heating regulation,rolling temperature decrease,transfer bar camber control and finishing mill stable rolling,and improving device accuracy,the rolling stability of thin gauge and high strength steel were improved a lot,and production capacity were ensured.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 钢坯表面横裂纹在轧制过程中的演变及遗传性研究
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 华北理工大学冶金与能源学院，河北唐山063210
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Evolution and heredity of transverse cracks of billet during rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Affected by many factors in the billet continuous casting，periodic transverse cracks on the surface of the billet is formed inevitably.If these transverse cracks can disappear in rolling process，the production efficiency and economic benefit will be greatly improved.The effect of pass on surface transverse crack was analyzed by DEFORM- 3D software and laboratory simulation of bar rolling process.The evolution law of surface transverse cracks in bar rolling process was obtained.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 中厚板氧化铁皮压入缺陷形成原因及控制策略
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 福建省三钢闽光股份有限公司中板厂，福建三明365000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对中厚板“花斑”缺陷问题，采用扫描电镜（SEM）和电子能谱（EDS）仪分析了氧化铁皮压入区域氧化铁皮厚度及底层物质构成；结合钢材加热过程中表面一次氧化铁皮的形成机理，通过生产试验验证了由于铁橄榄石附着导致钢板表面氧化铁皮无法除净，在轧制过程中压入钢板表面且在后续冷却过程中剥离，形成“花脸”缺陷的根本原因。为此，提出了加热和轧制工艺的控制措施，有效改善了钢板的表面质量
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Formation causes and control strategies of oxide scale indentation defects in heavy and medium plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：For the problem of "ｇｒａｎｏｐｈｙｒｉｃ"  defect on the surface of plate,the thickness and the composition of the scale in the indented area were analyzed by scanning electron microscopy(SEM)and electron spectroscopy(EDS).Combined the surface oxidation formation mechanism during slab heating process and the production tests,the "ｇｒａｎｏｐｈｙｒｉｃ"  defect formation causes were verified that the scale on the surface of the plate could not be removed due to the adhesion of the olivine,and it was pressed into the surface of the plate during the rolling process and peeled off during the subsequent cooling process.Therefore,the control measures for heating and rolling processes were proposed,and the surface quality of the plate was effectively improved.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
詹光曹. 中厚板氧化铁皮压入缺陷形成原因及控制策略[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(2): 26-30.
ZHAN Guangcao. Formation causes and control strategies of oxide scale indentation defects in heavy and medium plate. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(2): 26-30.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 薄带钢带头卷取褶皱分析与改进
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Yanlong,L Zhe,ZHANG Zhijie,HU Xiaozhou,ZHANG Liqiang,MIAO Hewu#br#
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢智新迁安电磁材料有限公司，河北迁安064400
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 取向硅钢带头卷取质量的好坏直接影响到钢卷在后工序流转过程中的成材率等重要指标，而薄带钢带头卷取褶皱是卷取质量异常较为常见的形式之一。针对薄带钢带头卷取褶皱问题，经过分析，通过调整助卷皮带松紧度及抱臂小翻板的角度，避免了横向褶皱的产生；通过提高出口辊组精度管理，从根本上消除了带钢纵向卷取褶皱的隐患。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Analysis and improvement of thin gauge strip head coiling fold
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The coiling head quality of the oriented silicon steel is very important in its production,which directly affects the product qualification rate of the steel coil in the next process.To solve the problem of thin gauge strip head coiling fold,some measures were proposed,one was by adjusting the wrapper belt tightness and the angle of small arms to avoid the transverse folding,the other was by improving the precision management of the exit roller group to eliminate the hidden danger of strip lengthwise coiling fold.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
王彦龙，吕喆，张志杰，胡晓周，张立强，苗贺武. 薄带钢带头卷取褶皱分析与改进[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(3): 78-80.
WANG Yanlong,L Zhe,ZHANG Zhijie,HU Xiaozhou,ZHANG Liqiang,MIAO Hewu. Analysis and improvement of thin gauge strip head coiling fold. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(3): 78-80.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: Nb元素对低合金耐磨钢组织性能的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: ZHENG Jian1,DENG Xiang- tao2,WANG Zhao- dong2,LUO Deng1
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.湖南华菱湘潭钢铁有限公司技术质量部，湖南湘潭411101
2.东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 对含Nb和不含Nb两种成分低合金耐磨钢板NM400热轧和热处理态的组织性能进行了研究，并对比分析了微量Nb元素对其组织性能的影响规律。研究结果表明:在低合金耐磨钢中添加质量分数为0.02% 的Nb，在相同的控轧控冷和离线热处理工艺条件下，钢板强度和硬度增加，低温冲击韧性提高。在相同的工艺条件下，微量Nb元素的添加对钢板组织中原始奥氏体晶粒的细化是其低温韧性提高和硬度增加的主要原因。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Effect of niobium on the microstructure and mechanical properties of the low alloy abrasion resistant steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Microstructure and mechanical properties of low alloy abrasion resistant steel plates of NM400 with Nb and without Nb were investigated under the process of hot rolling treatment and off- line heat treatment condition process,and the effect of Nb on the microstructure and mechanical properties of plates were analyzed.The results showed that the strength,hardness and especially the low temperature toughness were increased by addition the 0.02% niobium at the same condition of hot rolling and heat treatment process.The grain refined of prior austenite and lath martensite were the main reason of the enhancement of strength and low temperature toughness.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
郑健，邓想涛，王昭东，罗登. Nb元素对低合金耐磨钢组织性能的影响[J]. , 2018, 35(2): 12-14.
ZHENG Jian,DENG Xiang- tao,WANG Zhao- dong,LUO Deng. Effect of niobium on the microstructure and mechanical properties of the low alloy abrasion resistant steel. , 2018, 35(2): 12-14.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 低碳钢原边轧制边裂成因分析及控制
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: ZHANG Liang- liang1,2, YU Yang1,2,GAO Xiao- li1,2,WANG Chang1,2,WANG Lin1,2，SHI Hai- tao3
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.首钢集团有限公司技术研究院，北京100043
2.绿色可循环钢铁流程北京市重点实验室，北京100043
3.首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司，河北唐山063000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Cause analysis and control measures for edge crack of non- trimming rolled low carbon steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the problem of edge crack defects of low carbon steel seriously affected the normal rolling of the cold rolling production line,which has resulted in some damage to the economic benefits.The different macro- morphology characteristics of edge crack defects had been classified systematically.Meanwhile，through the whole process investigation on steelmaking，hot rolling and cold rolling procedure and micro means such as metallography，electron microscopy,the causes of different types of defects were also analyzed.With the suitable measures of consistent system being adopted，the edge crack of non- trimming rolled low carbon steel was controlled effectively，and the edge quality was improved obviously．

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 高速冷连轧过程中乳化液流量的优化控制
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司，河北唐山064000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对冷连轧机组有时出现轧制力随着轧制速度的增加而增加，即轧制力与轧制速度关系的“反常”现象，分析了其产生原因，建立了前滑值、打滑因子、板形值与乳化液流量与轧制速度关系模型，形成一套适用于冷连轧机组乳化液流量和轧制速度的综合优化控制技术。采用该技术，在保证产品板形良好的前提下，可以有效控制前滑、防治打滑和避免“反常”现象的出现。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Optimization control of emulsion flow during high-speed cold rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：For the cold continuous rolling mill,the rolling force increases with the increase of rolling speed,that is,the "abnormal" phenomenon of rolling force and rolling speed.The cause of the phenomenon was analyzed,and the models between front slip,slip,flatness and emulsion flow and rolling speed were established.A comprehensive optimization control technology suitable for the emulsion flow rate and rolling speed of the cold continuous rolling mill was formed.Using this technology,under the premise of ensuring good product shape,it can effectively control the strip front slip,prevent strip slippage and avoid the occurrence of "abnormal" phenomenon.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘学良, 柯于军, 潘东远. 高速冷连轧过程中乳化液流量的优化控制[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(1): 46-50.
LIU Xueliang,KE Yujun,PAN Dongyuan. Optimization control of emulsion flow during high-speed cold rolling. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(1): 46-50.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 卷取温度对不锈钢带钢表面氧化铁皮的影响
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北海诚德金属压延有限公司，广西北海536017
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 分析了氧化铁皮结构、性质、厚度与不锈钢带钢卷取温度之间的关系，概述了改善氧化铁皮分布状态、厚度和成分控制的基本方法。经过实际生产应用，提高酸洗工序的产出率约0.5%，降低酸洗不足重工量约 1 000  t/月。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: The influence of coiling temperature on the surface scale of stainless steel stripSU
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The relationship between the structure,properties and thickness of oxide scale and the coiling temperature of stainless steel strip was analyzed.The basic methods for improving the scale distribution,thickness and composition control were summarized.After actual production and application,the yield of the pickling process was increased by about 0.5%,and the weight of the pickling was reduced by about 1 000 t per month.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
苏坤. 卷取温度对不锈钢带钢表面氧化铁皮的影响[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(1): 79-81.
SU Kun. The influence of coiling temperature on the surface scale of stainless steel stripSU. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(1): 79-81.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 精品建材典型质量问题分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 陕钢集团汉中钢铁有限责任公司，陕西汉中724200

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: DING Changwen1，WAN Yangang1，GAO Song1，DU Xianfeng2，LI Bin3，ZHONG Tingzhen4
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.哈尔滨哈飞工业有限责任公司，黑龙江哈尔滨150060
2江苏永钢集团有限公司,江苏张家港215628
3.天津市先导倍尔电气公司，天津300300
4北京科技大学,北京100081
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对目前我国大多数高速线材生产线属于摩根第3、第5代水平，急需升级改造的现状，研制了新型双机架减定径机组。介绍了新型双机架减定径机组的技术特点及应用效果。生产实践表明：终轧温度由950 ℃降至850 ℃以下，细化了组织晶粒，提高了产品性能；终轧速度由85 m/s提高到105 m/s；产品尺寸精度由原±0.25 mm提高到±0.10 mm；穿水后盘条表面不生锈，实现了降本增效和升级换代的目的。
keywords_cn: 减定径机组 轧制速度 质量 精度
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: The Technique characteristics of the first domestic developed doublestand sizing reducer mill and its production practice
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the need to uppgrade urgently of the most of high speed wire rod production lines in China,a new type doublestand sizing reducer mill was developed.The technique chracteristics and application effects were introduced.The practice show that the finishing rolling temperature is dropped from 950 ℃ to below 850 ℃,the grain is refined and the product performance is improved.The finishing rolling speed is increased from 85 m/s to 105 m/s,and the product size precision is increased from ±0.25 mm to ±0.10 mm.Meanwhile,passing through the water,the surface of wire rod does not get rusty.It achieves the purpose of the cost decreasing and benefits increasing and also upgrade and updated.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
丁长文，王延刚，高松，杜显峰，李斌，钟廷珍. 国内首套双机架减定径机组技术特点及其实践[J]. , 2017, 34(6): 53-55.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 5 m厚板生产线的产品质量与设备功能精度
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 宝山钢铁股份有限公司厚板部，上海200941
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 质量是企业竞争力的第一要素，设备功能精度状态的良好是支撑产品质量的重要保障。介绍了宝山钢铁股份有限公司厚板部在5 m 厚板生产线上实施的全员主动参与质量管理、聚焦产品质量缺陷产生原因加强设备日跟踪周检测制度、“三不放过”让产品质量意识成为一种习惯等设备功能精度管理措施，全面提升了5 m 厚板生产线产品质量管理水平。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Product quality and equipment function/accuracy of the 5 m heavy plate line
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Product quality is the first element of a enterprise′s competitiveness.Good function and accuracy status of the equipment is the best guarantee of product quality.Some effective management methods were researched for the 5 m heavy plate line in Baoshan Iron & Steel Co.,Ld.,such as full part participation in quality management,daily tracking and weekly check for the equipment based on the product defect,cultivating quality management habit of three no- passing principles.So,the quality management level was highly improved of 5 m heavy plate line.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 辽宁中车轨道交通装备有限公司技术中心，辽宁辽阳111000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 介绍了采用半连轧工艺生产工字钢的工艺流程，根据现有连轧生产设备和工艺，对孔型系统进行了优化设计，将扩腰孔型应用到连轧工艺中，在同一套孔型中仅更换3个孔即可轧制不同规格的工字钢，降低了企业生产成本，增加了企业竞争力。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Practical application of expanding waist pass for I- beam section
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The semi- continuous rolling process for I- beam section was introduced.According to the existing rolling production equipment and process,the pass system design was optimized.The expanding waist pass was applied to continuous rolling process.Under the condition that only three passes were replaced in the same set pass system,the different specifications of I- beam section were rolled.The production cost was reduced,and the competitiveness of enterprises was increased.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
安文强. 扩腰孔型在连轧工字钢中的实际应用[J]. , 2018, 35(2): 79-80.
AN Wen- qiang. Practical application of expanding waist pass for I- beam section. , 2018, 35(2): 79-80.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 高强度船板表面花斑缺陷的形成机制及改进措施
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: HAO Xiao-qiang1,WANG Xin1,WANG Zhao-xuan1,CHEN Dai-qiao1,JIA Tao2,LIN Xiao-jiang2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.重庆钢铁股份有限公司中厚板厂，重庆401258
2.东北大学，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 基于金相分析和气泡试验，分析了高强度船板表面花斑缺陷的形貌特征和微观组织，研究了化学成分、轧制工艺对花斑缺陷的影响。结果表明：花斑缺陷的形成原因主要是二次氧化铁皮在轧制过程中被压入钢板基体，导致钢板表面形成厚度差异较大的氧化铁皮，钢板抛丸后形成凹凸不平的斑状缺陷。通过降低钢中硅含量、优化高压水除鳞方式、低成本改进高压水除鳞系统，有效控制了高强度船板表面花斑缺陷。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Formation mechanism and improvement measures of granophyric defect on the surface of high strength ship plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The morphology characteristics and microstructure of the granophyric defects on the surface of high strength ship plate were analyzed based on metallography analysis and bubble test.The effects of alloy composition,rolling process on this defect were investigated.The results showed that the secondary iron oxide was pressed into the steel plate surface in the rolling process,which led to the formation of iron oxide with large different thickness on the plate surface,after shot blasting the uneven granophyric defects formed on the plate surface.The granophyric defects were controlled by lowering Si content,optimizing high-pressure water descaling method and improving the high-pressure water system with low cost.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
郝小强，王鑫，王照玄，陈代巧，贾涛，林小江. 高强度船板表面花斑缺陷的形成机制及改进措施[J]. , 2016, 33(3): 73-76.
HAO Xiao-qiang,WANG Xin,WANG Zhao-xuan,CHEN Dai-qiao,JIA Tao,LIN Xiao-jiang. Formation mechanism and improvement measures of granophyric defect on the surface of high strength ship plate. , 2016, 33(3): 73-76.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热连轧高强钢板形瓢曲原因分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.武汉科技大学材料与冶金学院，湖北武汉430081
2.武钢研究院，湖北武汉430080
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 高强钢钢板瓢曲已严重制约了其在汽车行业的应用，对其生产工艺进行分析，发现冷却不均引起的残余内应力是造成钢板分条后瓢曲的主要原因。通过调整钢板上下表面冷却水水量、采用间断式冷却模式、进行堆垛缓冷，显著降低了高强钢钢板的残余应力，使分条后钢板不平度不大于6 mm/1 700 mm的合格率提高至85%。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Cause analysis of warp defect of hot-rolled high-strength steel plate
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：One important factor of restricting the application and development in automotive industry of hot-rolled high-strength steel plate is the warp defect,in which the residual stress caused by uneven cooling is regarded as the main cause in longitudinal cutting after investigation of the production process.The residual stress of such high-strength steel plate could be reduced significantly by adjusting the upper and lower plate surface cooling water and using both the intermittent cooling mode and stack slow cooling mode.Then,the qualified rate of plate flatness less than 6 mm/1 700 mm after longitudinal cutting was improved to 85%.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
梁文 ，吴润，刘永前，汪水泽. 热连轧高强钢板形瓢曲原因分析[J]. , 2016, 33(4): 9-12.
LIANG Wen，WU Run，LIU Yong-qian，WANG Shui-ze. Cause analysis of warp defect of hot-rolled high-strength steel plate. , 2016, 33(4): 9-12.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对攀枝花钢钒有限公司冷轧厂原有罩式炉机组存在的问题，提出了改造方案和详细改造内容，介绍了加热罩相应改造设备的作用、组成、结构及技术参数。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Reconstruction of heating mantle of bell annealing furnace
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aimed at the problem of bell annealing furnace inhere of cold rolling mill of Panzhihua Steel & Vanadium Co.,Ltd.,the reconstructive scheme and the reconstructive details were proposed.The new heating mantle equipment compose,structure and function were introduced.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
杨继德. 攀钢罩式退火炉加热罩改造[J]. , 2016, 33(6): 99-101.
YANG Ji-de. Reconstruction of heating mantle of bell annealing furnace. , 2016, 33(6): 99-101.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 极薄带轧制过程的晶体塑性有限元分析
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIU Xiang- hua1a，1b，ZHAO Qi- lin1b，CHEN Shou- dong2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1. 东北大学，a.轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室
b.材料科学与工程学院,辽宁沈阳110819
2.铜陵学院机械工程学院，安徽铜陵244061
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 极薄带轧制过程中，当轧件厚度降低到与晶粒尺寸同一量级时，其变形在很大程度上受到晶粒形态和取向等内部组织状态的影响，传统塑性理论不能直接用于微观塑性成形的分析。介绍了采用晶体塑性有限元方法对极薄带轧制过程所做的研究，如轧件厚度和晶粒尺寸对轧制变形的影响、塑性变形时滑移系的激活和运动等。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Foil rolling process analyzed by crystal plasticity finite element method
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In metal foil rolling,when thickness of foil decreased to the same scale of grain size,the deformation behavior of foil is influenced greatly by its internal state,such as morphology and orientation of grains.Classical plasticity theory is not suitable for analysis of plastic deformation at microscopic level.In this paper,studies on metal foil rolling process by employing crystal plasticity finite element method were introduced.For example,the influence of thickness and grain size of foil on deformation of foil,activation and development of slip system in plastic deformation.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘相华 ，赵启林，陈守东. 极薄带轧制过程的晶体塑性有限元分析[J]. , 2018, 35(5): 1-5.
LIU Xiang- huaa，b，ZHAO Qi- linb，CHEN Shou- dong. Foil rolling process analyzed by crystal plasticity finite element method. , 2018, 35(5): 1-5.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热轧带钢酸洗山水纹缺陷的形成机理
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 河钢集团唐钢公司，河北唐山063016
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 分析了热轧带钢酸洗山水纹缺陷的形成机理，即粗轧时板坯表面新生成的或者残留的氧化铁皮在辊缝中开裂，在轧制力作用下，硬度比氧化铁皮低的基体金属被挤压入裂缝形成粗轧条纹。现场调查显示，精轧除鳞后粗轧条纹上残留大量黑色Fe3O4，这些残留的氧化铁皮颗粒在精轧时被压入带钢基体并与带钢同步纵向延展，导致酸洗后带钢表面相应区域与周边正常区域出现轻微的粗糙度差异和明显的色差，形成山水纹色差缺陷。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Formation mechanism of  landscape defect on hot rolled strip surface after pickling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The new or residual oxide scale on the surface of the slab is cracked in the roll gap during roughing rolling,and under the pressure of rolling,the steel is extruded into the cracks and form the roughing rolling fringes.Industrial production show that there is residual black Fe3O4 on the roughing rolling fringes after finishing descaling,then the residual oxide scale particles are pressed into the steel substrate during finishing rolling,and extended with the steel along the rolling direction,which lead the corresponding surface of the strip to the slight difference of surface roughness and apparent difference of color with normal area,so cause landscape defect.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
吕长宝. 热轧带钢酸洗山水纹缺陷的形成机理[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(1): 31-36.
Lü Changbao. Formation mechanism of  landscape defect on hot rolled strip surface after pickling. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(1): 31-36.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热连轧精轧机工作辊换辊过程稳定性探讨
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 重庆钢铁股份有限公司，重庆401258
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对某热连轧厂精轧机人工换辊方式存在的操作问题，通过优化下阶梯垫的设备结构和控制时序、增设精轧推拉缸上下工作辊对位装置、解决零调过程中阶梯垫油缸缸头易脱落等问题，大大提高了换辊操作的稳定性，且换辊时间从30 min减少到20 min内，提高了作业率。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Discussion on work roll change stability in hot rolling finishing mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Aimed at the operation problem for the roll change by manual work in a hot rolling finishing mill,the down step pad structure and control sequence were optimized,the alignment device for the finishing mill upper and down roll were added,and the problem of lifting cylinder head easy to falloff in the zero adjustment process was solved.So the roll change stability was improved,the roll change time was reduced from 30 minutes to 20 minutes,and the operation efficiency was advanced.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
徐朝辉，李月潇，齐元龙. 热连轧精轧机工作辊换辊过程稳定性探讨[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(1): 68-70.
XU Zhaohui,LI Yuexiao,QI Yuanlong. Discussion on work roll change stability in hot rolling finishing mill. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(1): 68-70.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 轧制力比率负荷分配方法在热连轧中的应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 首钢京唐钢铁联合有限责任公司，河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 主要介绍了热连轧精轧机组轧制力比率负荷分配方法，阐述了初始厚度分配以及负荷分配的原理。采用模型经验值并在轧制过程中进行适当修正，得到较为合理的目标负荷分配比率。由机架出口厚度初值的计算结合Newton-RaPhson法进行反复迭代，最终可得到最佳的厚度分配值。实践证明轧制力比率负荷分配方法能够保证精轧机组运行顺稳，满足在线控制的要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Application of load distribution method of rolling force ratio on hot strip rolling
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The load distribution method of rolling force ratio in hot rolling mill was introduced,and the principles of initial thickness distribution and load distribution were described.By the appropriate correction to the model empirical value and the rolling process,reasonable target load distribution ratio was obtained.By the calculation of the initial stand delivery thickness and the iterative method of Newton-RaPhson,the optimal thickness distribution value could be obtained.Practice proved that this load distribution method could ensure the stability of the finishing mill,and meet the requirement of online control.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
史金芳. 轧制力比率负荷分配方法在热连轧中的应用[J]. , 2017, 34(2): 48-49.
SHI Jin-fang. Application of load distribution method of rolling force ratio on hot strip rolling. , 2017, 34(2): 48-49.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热轧钢材表面氧化铁皮微观结构表征技术综述
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LI Zhi- feng,CAO Guang- ming,WANG Fu- xiang,LIU Zhen- yu
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 东北大学轧制技术及连轧自动化国家重点实验室，辽宁沈阳110819
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 热轧钢材氧化铁皮控制不当会引起表面缺陷，为了提高热轧钢材的表面质量，需要对其氧化产物结构和状态进行系统的分析检测，包括了解氧化铁皮的种类和结构、氧化铁皮的表面及断面形貌、氧化铁皮或氧化铁皮与钢基体界面处的元素分布等。由于目前表面分析技术种类多，且新技术不断得到应用，本文按照钢材氧化铁皮研究的表征步骤归纳了各种技术的特点和应用情况，可为钢材高温氧化理论研究和生产现场工艺优化提供帮助。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Review of characterization techniques on oxide scale microstructure of hot rolled steels
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The surface defects of hot rolled steels can be caused by improper control of oxide scale.Systematic analysis and detection of structure and status of oxide scale is an important way to improve the surface quality of steels.The characterization techniques focus on species,surface and cross- section morphology and the elements distribution of oxide/matrix interface of oxide scale.The various new type of characterization techniques have been widely applied in the studies of high temperature oxidation behavior.The paper summarizes the specialty and application of characterization techniques following the general steps,which provide a reference for the theory study of high temperature oxidation behavior and production process optimization.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
李志峰，曹光明，王福祥，刘振宇. 热轧钢材表面氧化铁皮微观结构表征技术综述[J]. , 2017, 34(3): 56-60.
LI Zhi- feng,CAO Guang- ming,WANG Fu- xiang,LIU Zhen- yu. Review of characterization techniques on oxide scale microstructure of hot rolled steels. , 2017, 34(3): 56-60.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
太原钢铁集团有限公司，a.热连轧厂
b.技术中心，山西太原030003
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 随着TMCP技术的发展，通过合理设计合金元素含量和在线快冷工艺，可实现相变强化、细晶强化和亚晶强化，从而实现热轧卷板强度、塑性、韧性和可焊性的良好匹配。考虑到特殊品种结构对超快层流冷却速率的要求，太钢对2 250 mm热轧生产线层流冷却区域进行了全线加密设备改造，通过采用密集快冷卷取温度控制技术，实现了高强度管线钢的减量化生产。
keywords_cn: 粗调全线密集冷却，带钢宽度方向均匀冷却控制，可变段长跟踪控制
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Application and research on the reinforced cooling control in hot strip mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：With the development of TMCP technology, through the rational design of alloy element content and online fast cooling process, the phase transformation strengthening, fine grain strengthening and subgrain strengthening could be realized, and the good properties match of strength, plastic, toughness and welding of strip/plate was obtained. Considering the special structure of the varieties of ultrafast laminar cooling rate requirements, laminar cooling zone in 2 250 mm hot rolling production line was reformed to intensive fast cooling and coiling in TISCO, the high strength pipeline steel reduction production was realized .
keywords_en: the reinforced micro zone , even temperature control across strip width, variable segment length for tracking control
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
王津平，边育秀. 热轧层流密集冷却控制的研究与应用[J]. , 2015, 32(5): 13-16.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Taking the coil car in metallurgical industry as an example，the form,structure characteristics and disadvantages of moveable cover plate commonly applied recently were introduced.The characteristics and design principle of a new type moveable cover plate,presents design method were described,which provided favorable information for design and transformation of similar equipment.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Ju,ZHANG Chun-yu,LI Wen-wu,DING Song-nian，ZHAO Xiao-fei,LI Xiao-na
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 中冶陕压重工设备有限公司，陕西西安710119

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The position control mode of the exit telescopic guide for strip threading and back-end swing in the continuous processing line and skin-pass line was investigated.The mathematics relationship between the encoder pulse number m of exit telescopic guide swing angle and the coil diameter was established.The coiler run stably and the strip surface quality was improved by this automatic control mode for the telescopic guide swing angle according to coiler diameter.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.首钢技术研究院，北京100043
2.首钢迁安钢铁有限责任公司，河北迁安064404
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 板形和表面质量是影响热轧薄带钢最终成品质量的两大关键因素。针对首钢迁钢2 160 mm和1 580 mm两套热轧平整机在生产薄规格集装箱板和酸洗板板形质量和表面质量的差异，通过建立四辊平整机的有限元模型，结合现场实际工况，对比研究了工作辊弯辊功效、凸度调节范围和辊间接触压力分布，通过投入使用VCR支撑辊和高次负凸度工作辊的辊型配置，有效满足了薄带钢平整对于板形和表面质量的高要求。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study on flatness control and surface improvement in hot rolling temper mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Flatness and surface quality are the two key influence factors on the hot-rolled thin gauge strip quality.In view of the problems of flatness control and surface quality of thin gauge handling container plate and pickled sheet tempered in 2 160 mm and 1 580 mm temper mills of Shougang Qianan Iron & Steel Co.,Ltd.Based on the FEM model of 4-h temper mill,some studies had been done about the bending efficiency,the crown adjusting range and the contact pressure distribution between roll.With the using of vary-contact backup roll and negative-crown work roll,the strip flatness and surface quality were improved effectively in hot rolling temper process.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.酒钢宏兴股份有限公司钢铁研究院，甘肃嘉峪关735100；2.钢铁研究总院功能材料
研究所，北京100081；3.兰州理工大学材料科学与工程学院，甘肃兰州730050；
4.省部共建有色金属先进加工与再利用国家重点实验室，甘肃兰州730050
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 钢坯经加热炉加热后不可避免地会形成氧化铁皮，氧化铁皮不仅会对产品的外貌形态、表面质量以及尺寸精度等造成影响，还会降低非可再生资源的利用率，造成无形资产的浪费。为此，对钢坯在加热过程中的氧化机理、影响因素进行了总结，并展望了钢材氧化铁皮的控制及改性技术，为有效降低钢材的氧化烧损提供了改进方向。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Review on the oxidation mechanism and its research of steel billet in heating process
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The steel billet will inevitably form iron oxide scale after heating in the heating furnace.The iron oxide scale will not only affect the appearance,surface quality and dimensional accuracy of the product,but also reduce the utilization rate of nonrenewable resources and cause intangible assets.waste.Therefore,the oxidation mechanism and influencing factors of the billet in the heating process were summarized,and the control and modification technology for the steel oxide scale was prospected,which provides an improved direction for effectively reducing the oxidation loss of the steel.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
赵小龙，王雍期，唐兴昌，张志坚. 钢坯在加热过程中的氧化机理及其研究综述[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(6): 66-68.
ZHAO Xiaolong,WANG Yongqi,TANG Xingchang,ZHANG Zhijian. Review on the oxidation mechanism and its research of steel billet in heating process. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(6): 66-68.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 高强钢切边剪工艺参数的优化
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: LIU Zhiheng，ZHANG Naiqiang，LI Shan，GUO Songling，LU Yingjie，ZHAO Tianhuan#br#
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 河钢集团乐亭钢铁公司冷轧部，河北唐山063000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对冷轧高强汽车板切边工艺生产过程中出现印痕、浪形缺陷的问题，分析了剪刃间隙、剪刃重合量、带钢张力、带钢速度对剪切质量的影响，对剪切工艺和设备参数进行了优化，对不同钢种、规格，建立了剪刃间隙、重叠量，刀片直径、胶环直径与切边效果的对应关系，有效解决了切边过程中带钢下表面印痕缺陷，切边后边浪缺陷等问题。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Optimization of process parameters of edge shearing for high strength steel strip
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In view of the problems of printing marks and wave defects of high strength automotive strip shearing,the influence of blade clearance,the blade overlap,the strip tension and the strip speed on shearing quality were analyzed.The shearing process and equipment parameters were optimized.For different steels and gauges, the relationships between the blade clearance,the blade overlap amount,the blade diameter,the diameter of the rubber ring and the shearing effect were established，the printed and wave defects of high strength automotive steel strip were effectively resolve.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘志恒，张乃强，李山，郭松岭，卢英杰，赵天环. 高强钢切边剪工艺参数的优化[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(6): 99-102.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热轧钢材氧化及表面质量控制技术的发展及应用
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 北京科技大学工程技术研究院，北京100083
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 热轧钢材表面质量是生产控制的重要指标之一，越来越受到重视。热轧钢材表面氧化铁皮的结构、厚度受氧化热力学、动力学及固相反应的影响，氧化铁皮的结构、高温力学行为和物理特性直接影响其去除效果。钢材的化学成分设计，以及热轧生产过程中加热、轧制和冷却过程中氧化铁皮的去除与控制，直接决定了最终产品氧化铁皮的厚度和结构，从而决定了其表面质量控制效果。热轧钢材表面氧化控制技术已经开始在表面缺陷控制、不同深加工方式钢材的氧化层设计、减量酸洗和免表面处理等方面得到了应用。为了充分挖掘该技术的潜力，还要根据热轧产品的用途进行深度的研究与开发。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Evolution and application of oxidation and surface quality control of hot rolled steel products
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：Steel surface is one of the important indexes of quality control.The structure and thickness of the oxide scale on the surface of hot rolled steel are affected by the thermodynamics,kinetics and solid state reaction.The structure and the mechanical behavior and physical properties of the oxidized surface directly affect the removal efficiency.The chemical composition design of steel,control and removal of oxide scale during the heating,rolling and cooling process of hot rolling production process,directly determines the scale thickness,structure and surface quality control effect of the final product.The technology of surface oxidation control of hot rolled products has been applied in the control of surface defects,the design of oxide layer in different kinds of deep processing,acid reduction of pickling and surface- treatment- free steel.In order to fully tap the potential of the technology,in- deep research and development should be carried out based on the use of hot- rolled products.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
余伟，王俊，刘涛. 热轧钢材氧化及表面质量控制技术的发展及应用[J]. 轧钢, 2017, 34(3): 1-6.
YU Wei,WANG Jun,LIU Tao. Evolution and application of oxidation and surface quality control of hot rolled steel products. Chinarolling, 2017, 34(3): 1-6.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 基于高斯过程构建钢轨轧制力模型的方法
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: TAO Gongming,WU Guoxian,ZHU Hualin,GUAN Xudong，LIU Zicai
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 攀钢集团攀枝花攀钢钒有限公司轨梁厂，四川攀枝花617062
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 在钢轨轧制过程中，轧制力一定程度上对轧制参数调整有着指导或参考作用，一个成材率高、缺陷率低的轧制过程，必然会对应一个合理的轧制力分布。轧制力上冲过大不仅会使轧制状态靠近轧制系统的极点，稳定性降低，而且会导致轧辊磨损、疲劳加快，并将导致钢轨表面质量、规格波动等问题。采用高斯过程回归算法，基于现场生产数据建立了压下量与轧制力模型，为钢轨轧制过程轧制力的精确控制，提供了一种残差较小的统计模型。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: A method of constructing rail rolling force model based on Gauss process
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In the process of rail rolling,the rolling force can guide or adjust the rolling parameters to a certain extent.A rolling process with high yield and low defect rate is bound to correspond to a reasonable distribution of rolling force.Too large rolling force will not only make the rolling state near the pole of the rolling system,but also decrease the stability,and will cause roll wear and fatigue to accelerate in a long time.The problems will be followed，such as rail surface quality,specification fluctuation and so on.The Gauss process regression algorithm was used in this paper,based on the field production data,the model of the reduction and rolling force was  set up,which provides a statistical model for the precise control of the rolling force in the rail rolling process.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
陶功明，吴郭贤，朱华林，官旭东，刘自彩. 基于高斯过程构建钢轨轧制力模型的方法[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(3): 42-46.
TAO Gongming,WU Guoxian,ZHU Hualin,GUAN Xudong，LIU Zicai. A method of constructing rail rolling force model based on Gauss process. Chinarolling, 2019, 36(3): 42-46.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热连轧液压活套压力控制的改进
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 马鞍山钢铁股份有限公司第四钢轧总厂，安徽马鞍山243000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 以热连轧液压活套系统为研究对象，对活套的张力控制原理和电液控制系统进行了研究和分析，并且在液压缸的压力PI控制器中加入了补偿控制等改进措施，并以马钢2 250 mm热轧精轧产线为试验平台，投入功能以及对控制参数进行了校正，提升了活套张力控制的稳定性。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Improvement of hydraulic looper pressure control of hot strip mill

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为改进贝氏体钢的生产工艺，对贝氏体超高强钢进行了控轧+空冷（1#钢）、控轧+快冷（2#钢）试验，对轧后钢板组织性能进行了检测分析。结果表明，1#钢（空冷）的显微组织主要为板条贝氏体和铁素体；2#钢（快冷）的显微组织主要为板条马氏体；1#钢和2#钢的抗拉强度都在1 500 MPa以上，并具有良好的塑性、韧性，但1#钢的综合性能优于2#钢。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Research on microstructure and mechanical properties of 1 500 MPa grade super-high strength steel
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：To improve the production process of bainite superhigh strength steel,the tests of controlled rolling + air cooling(1#sample) and controlled rolling+fast cooling (2#sample) were carried out,and the microstructure and mechanical properties of rolled plates after testing were analyzed.The results show that the microstructure of 1# sample is (air cooling) mainly consists of lath bainite ferrite,and the microstructure of 2# steel (fast cooling) is mainly lath martensite.The tensile strength of tested steels are above 1 500 MPa,and the good plasticity and toughness are obtained.But the comprehensive performance of 1# sample is better than 2# sample.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation: 黄建国，王亚芬. 1 500 MPa级超高强钢组织性能的研究[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(1): 21-24.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 在利用工业大数据指导钢铁企业进行智能热轧的生产实践中，发现钢铁工业数据在建模中存在诸多问题，如数据信噪比低、分布不均衡等，这给基于数据驱动的智能热轧工艺优化设计技术的实现造成了严重阻碍。围绕热轧生产中带钢奥氏体再结晶、奥氏体相变、微合金碳氮化物析出和组织性能对应关系以及氧化铁皮演变过程，结合人工智能理论对组织性能预测技术在智能热轧中发挥的核心作用进行了阐述，并对东北大学2011钢铁共性技术协同创新中心先进短流程工艺技术与装备方向在钢铁智能制造方面研究中取得的成果进行了介绍。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: The predicting technologies for microstructure and properties and their core roles in smart hot rolling processes
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：It is found that there are many problems in the modeling of industrial data of hot rolled strips in application of industrial big data in intelligent hot rolling of iron and steel enterprises,such as low signaltonoise ratio and unbalanced distribution of data,which seriously hinders the realization of datadriven intelligent hot rolling process optimization design technology.Based on the process of austenite recrystallization,austenite transformation,precipitation of microalloyed carbide and nitride,the relationship of microstructure and property and the evolution of oxide scale in hot rolling production,the core role of the prediction technology of microstructure and property in intelligent hot rolling with the theory of artificial intelligence was described.Besides,the achievements in the research of intelligent manufacturing of iron and steel of Advanced Short Process Technology and Equipment Direction of the 2011 General Technology Coinnovation Center for Iron and Steel of Northeast University were introduced.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
刘振宇，曹光明，周晓光，吴思炜，王国栋. 组织性能预测技术及其在智能热轧中的核心作用[J]. 轧钢, 2019, 36(2): 1-7.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: WANG Jie,XIA Meng,CHENG Ding,WU Baoqiao,XING Jun,WU Meizhuang
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 马鞍山钢铁股份有限公司技术中心，安徽马鞍山243000
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 为解决H210 mm×134 mm×6 mm×10 mm规格A572(Gr65)高强度热轧H型钢翼缘端部“龟裂”问题，借助有限元模拟软件，对其成因进行了分析。结果表明，A572(Gr65)钢高温塑性较差，当其粗轧段压下量较大且轧槽深度较浅时，粗轧中间坯腿长不足，后续道次长腿困难，导致第6、第11、第14道次孔型未充满，轧件腿端未被加工，从而出现翼缘端部“龟裂”缺陷。为此，对孔型系统进行了优化，成品翼缘端部“龟裂”缺陷得以消除。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Pass system optimization for small size and high strength hot rolled H-beam
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：In order to solve the problem of "crack" on the flange end of H210 mm×134 mm×6 mm×10 mm gauge hot rolled A572 (Gr65) steel H-beam,the causes were analyzed by finite element simulation software.The results show that A572 (Gr65) steel has poor high temperature plasticity,when the roughing rolling reduction is large and the groove depth is small,the length of billet leg is insufficient,and it is difficult to make long legs in subsequent passes.The passes of No.6,No.11 and No.14 are not full,and the leg end of the rolled piece is not rolled,thereby "crack" defect is formed on the flange end.Therefore,the pass system was optimized,and the "cracking" defect was eliminate.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:
汪杰，夏勐，程鼎，吴保桥，邢军，吴湄庄. 小规格高强度热轧H型钢孔型优化[J]. 轧钢, 2020, 37(1): 49-52.
WANG Jie,XIA Meng,CHENG Ding,WU Baoqiao,XING Jun,WU Meizhuang. Pass system optimization for small size and high strength hot rolled H-beam. Chinarolling, 2020, 37(1): 49-52.

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 热轧过程控制设备监测系统的设计与实现

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_cn: 纯铁带钢退火后表面碳黑和氧化色的防止
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn: 山西太钢不锈钢股份有限公司技术中心
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对未经脱脂处理就直接在罩式炉中进行退火处理的冷轧纯铁带钢表面常出现碳黑和氧化色等表面缺陷的问题，分析得出碳黑的主要成因是残留的碳氢化合物在高温下分解而形成分子碳沉积在带钢表面，氧化色的主要成因是出炉温度过高。通过实施大流量吹氢而创造出还原性较强的炉内气氛、定期清洁罩式炉、确保出炉温度低于150℃等措施后，基本避免了碳黑和氧化色缺陷。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 针对济钢1700mm ASP线生产中带钢头部存在中间浪问题，研究了精轧机平衡系统，计算了平衡力和弯辊力。根据计算结果，工作辊平衡力由原700kN调整为480kN，弯辊力由800kN调整为500kN，生产表明，轧机系统运行稳定，基本消除了带钢头部中间浪，有效改善了钢板板形。

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1. 中冶赛迪工程技术股份有限公司冷轧事业部，重庆400013
2. 重庆市钢铁冶金工程技术研究中心，重庆401122
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 板形调控机构的功效系数是冷轧板形闭环反馈控制系统中最为关键的参数，直接影响到板形控制效果的好坏。针对有限元方法计算时间长和在线实验方法风险大、成本高等缺点，本文采用修正的影响函数法建立了六辊冷轧机的辊系弹性变形计算模型，通过求解轧后带钢横向平直度分布来确定各板形调控机构的功效系数，计算值与实测值的分布吻合得很好，轧辊弯辊功效系数的误差都小于1. 2%，轧辊倾斜功效系数的误差小于3. 5%。基于修正影响函数法建立的理论模型计算速度快，可以作为在线设定模型使用。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Study on the Actuator Efficiency Factor of Six-high Cold Rolling Mill
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The actuator efficiency factor is the key parameter of the flatness closed loop feedback control system for cold rolling directly affecting the result of shape control. To avoid long calculation time of finite element method and big risk and high cost of the online test method,a model based on modified influence function method to use for roll stack deformation calculation of six-high cold rolling mill was built in this paper. Strip transverse flatness distribution was calculated and then all flatness actuator efficiency factors were determined. Well agreement between the calculated and measured actuator efficiency factors, error of roll bending actuator is less than 1. 2% and error of roll tilting actuator is less than 3. 5%. The theoretical model based on modified influence function method can be used as online setup model for it′s fast speed calculation ability.
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.citation:

http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.author_cn: SUN Chao- fan1， XU Hai- wei1， YU Yang1， ZHOU Xun2， WANG Song- tao2， XIAO Bao- liang2
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.org_cn:
1.首钢技术研究院，北京100043
2.首钢京唐联合钢铁有限公司，河北唐山063200
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_cn: 分析了厚规格车轮钢表面麻坑缺陷的微观形貌及成因，针对缺陷成因提出了相应的热轧生产控制策略。研究表明：厚规格车轮钢轧后氧化铁皮厚于常规钢种，用户开平过程中带钢表面氧化铁皮发生破碎后从带钢基体脱落，随开平过程被矫直辊压入带钢表面进而形成麻坑缺陷；采用“降温增水提速”的工艺措施，降低板坯出炉温度、精轧入口温度，增加精轧机架间冷却水量，提高精轧轧制速度，可以有效控制带钢表面氧化铁皮厚度，显著降低麻坑缺陷的发生率。
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.title_en: Cause analysis and control measures on pockmarks formed on the surface of thick automobile wheel steel strip
http://www.chinarolling.com/CN/abstract/.abstract_en: Abstract：The micro morphology and cause of pit defect on the surface of heavy gauge wheel steel strip were analyzed, and the corresponding hot rolling production control strategies were proposed. The result showed that the iron oxide thickness of the thick gauge wheel steel after rolling were higher than conventional steel, the strip surface oxidized iron were broken from the strip matrix and pressed into the surface during decoiling and straightening . The strip surface oxidation thickness could be effectively controlled and the pit defect could be significantly reduced by corresponding measures, such as decreasing the slab tapping temperature and finishing rolling start temperature, increasing finishing rolling inter- stand cooling water amount, increasing finishing rolling speed.
